original: I'm sorry, I'm not about to do that without at least a single gyro to show for my efforts.
string: 悪いけど、見返りのジャイロが1つもないなら、引き受けるわけにはいかないわ

original: I won't give up that easily.
string: そう簡単にあきらめはしない

original: Is it really... it is! I was hoping we'd find this. It's a diagram for a dwemer crossbow. Much more sophisticated, and powerful, than the ones we use.
string: まさか… やっぱり！ これを探してたのよ。ドゥーマーのクロスボウの図面だわ。今使っているものの何倍も洗練されてて、しかも強力よ

original: The sunbursts would certainly hurt anything, but is especially devastating to the undead.
string: 太陽の炎はどんな相手も傷つける事ができるが、特にアンデッドには効果的だ

original: Why does the sky look like that?
string: なぜ空があんな風に？

original: I think that might have been what we were waiting for.
string: まるでわたし達が訪れるのを待っていたように思えますわね

original: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
string: つまり、あなたのほんの一部がかの地に乗り移って、代わりに、ソウル・ケルンのかけらがその隙間を埋めたのよ

original: I can't decide which parts of you I'd like to keep for a while...
string: お前のどの部分をしばらくとっておこうか迷っている…

original: Have to say, I'm glad that's over.
string: 認めるよ、終わってほっとしたって

original: Are there other Vigilants still out there?
string: まだ他にも番人はいるのか？

original: With them, and the materials in this room, we should have everything we need.
string: それと、この部屋の材料があれば、必要なものはすべて揃うはず

original: I don't recall addressing you, worm.
string: お前に話しかけた覚えはないぞ、虫ケラ

original: What? No, no. Yes, I see. All right.
string: えっ？ いえ、いいえ、はい。分かりました

original: Mortal fool, you can't stop us.
string: 愚かな定命め。我々はとめられないぞ

original: Well? I'm waiting.
string: で？ どうしたのだ？

original: A pristine copy of my first volume. Only one in print, actually.
string: これぞ第一巻の初版本。印さつされたものは、なんとこの1冊だけ

original: I was close with my mother, but she just kept feeding me her opinions of him, and eventually I started believing them.
string: わたしは母と仲がよかったけれど、母は父の事をどう思っているのかをわたしにすり込み続けましたわ。やがてわたしは母の意見を信じるようになったのです

original: We'll get to that. For now, get acquainted with the space.
string: それはまた後程。ひとまず今は、この場所に慣れてくれ

original: All I remember is that damn dremora and his minions bursting into my home and sending me to their prison.
string: 覚えているのは、家に押し入ってきた忌々しいドレモラとその手下によってこの牢屋に送り込まれた事だけだ

original: Do you have a moment? Gunmar and I have been talking and, well, we're slightly worried.
string: ちょっといい？ ガンマーと話してたんだけど、ちょっと心配になってきたの

original: Is that why you're free now?
string: それで自由になれたのか？

original: Well, I've been so busy, I dunno. What are you, kidding me?
string: さあね、ずっと忙しかったんだ。何のつもりだ？ からかってるのか？

original: Of course. I wouldn't be telling you where to find it if I desired it for myself.
string: もちろんさ。自分のものにするなら君にそのありかを教えてないよ

original: I'll take you to the monster you're hunting. (Persuade)
string: 狙っている怪物のところに案内しよう(説得)

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: You here for the Skooma? Head around inside, there's a trap door that'll lead you in.
string: スクゥーマがほしいのか？ じゃあ横手に回って中に入れ。落とし戸の奥に部屋がある

original: Kill their leaders. That should put a stop to a full out war.
string: 彼らのリーダー達を殺して。それで全面戦争は阻止できるはずよ

original: Burn them all!
string: 焼き尽くせ！

original: We didn't all get to have parents like yours. Sometimes this is just... how it is.
string: あなたの両親みたいな親の下に生まれて来なくてもよかったでしょうに。まあ… そういうものなのでしょうけど

original: Sure, that's what they all say.
string: 当然だね、誰もがそう言うよ

original: Three's a crowd. Get rid of your other friend, and I'm yours.
string: 三人は多すぎますわね。お仲間と別れてきましたら、お供いたしますわ

original: Transform into the Vampire Lord, and I will teach you more.
string: 吸血鬼の王の姿になれ。さらに説明しよう

original: Find all of them! Don't let any of them get away!
string: 全員見つけ出せ！ 1人も逃がすな！

original: Why would a necromancer want to deal with them?
string: 死霊術師が彼らと取引したがる理由は？

original: Take a left up here. This is one of those weird double-barred security measures that my father put in when he got more paranoid.
string: 左に折れて。これは例の複式施錠装置の1つですわ。疑心暗鬼を募らせた父が設置したものですわね

original: I'm pretty sure she's a vampire, actually.
string: 彼女も十中八九、吸血鬼だろう

original: I wonder how many copies I'll sell? Hundreds? Thousands? I'll hire the finest bookbinder I can find.
string: 何冊売れるかな？ 百？ 千？ 最高の出版社を見つけなくては

original: I watch the gate. Ain't much else to tell.
string: 門を見張ってる。それだけの事だ

original: Serana can make you one of us again.
string: セラーナがもう一度お前を我らの一員に変えてくれる

original: Let's head back to Isran and let him see what we've got first. I'm betting he'll lend us a sword or two.
string: イスランのところへ戻って、わたし達が手に入れたものをまず見せましょう。剣の1本や2本はきっと貸してくれますわよ

original: There's not a whole lot to tell.
string: 説明できる事は、そう多くありませんわ

original: I'll speak to Falion. I've heard he knows about these things.
string: ファリオンと話してみますわ。こういう事に詳しいと聞いておりますの

original: In his eyes, she'd be dying for the good of all vampires.
string: 彼の考えでは、彼女はすべての吸血鬼のために死ぬ事になる

original: There's probably groves like this all over Tamriel. Most people just don't even know what to look for.
string: タムリエルのあちこちにこんな森がきっとあるはずですわ。みんな何を探すべきなのかすら分かっていないだけですわね

original: A single gyro would be enough, I think. Believe me, this is useful stuff.
string: ジャイロがたった1つあればいいはずよ。それで本当に役立つものができるの

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to. (Intimidate)
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない(威圧)

original: Craven fool. This isn't over.
string: 愚かな臆病者め。これで終わりだと思うな

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Before my father became obsessed with the prophecy, mother and I spent quite a bit of time together.
string: 父が予言にとりつかれる前は、わたしと母は一緒にいる事が多かった

original: Idiot. You didn't really think I'd let you walk out of here either, did you? Vingalmo wants you both dead.
string: ばかね。ここから立ち去らせるはずがないでしょう？ ヴィンガルモは二人両方の死をお望みよ

original: Are you taking me to him?
string: わたしを彼の所へ連れて行きますの？

original: A battleaxe. (25 husks)
string: 両手斧(魂のハスク25個)

original: I think perhaps you should speak to Isran. You don't look... well.
string: イスランと話した方がいいぞ。なんだか具合が悪そうだ

original: Katria? No, no that's not possible!
string: カトリア？ 馬鹿な、そんな事があってなるものか！

original: See to it at once.
string: 直ちに手配してくれ

original: Its craftsmanship has no equal anywhere within Tamriel and possibly beyond.
string: タムリエルどころか、どこの世界にも比類するものがない技術で造られたものだ

original: What have you got for sale?
string: どんな物を売ってるんだ？

original: No, just...
string: いや、違う…

original: If there's any way I can be of service, please let me know.
string: 何か役に立てる事があったら、是非教えてくれよ

original: They had control of my mind, but fortunately they couldn't possess my soul.
string: 精神は支配されてしまったものの、幸い魂まではとりつかれずにすんだ

original: This isn't really a good time.
string: あまりいいタイミングではありませんわね

original: Here you go.
string: ほらよ

original: If you need anything else, I'll be here.
string: 他に何かいる時は、ここに来てくれ

original: Speak with Fura Bloodmouth. She has something for you.
string: フーラ・ブラッドマウスと話すといい。何かあるはずだ

original: I can handle myself. (Persuade)
string: 自分のことは自分でやれる(説得)

original: There must be something you want.
string: 何かしら、欲しいものがあるはずだ

original: I find it hard to believe he's changed his mind. He said some very hurtful things to me before I left.
string: 彼の気が変わったとは思えない。ひどく傷つくような事まで言われたのよ

original: While that's one less trouble maker to keep an eye on, you could have been more discreet in your approach to the problem.
string: 監視するべき厄介者が一人減ったとはいえ、もっと用心深く問題へ取り組むべきだったな

original: I know very little about them.
string: 彼らについてはほとんど知らないわ

original: Leave this place.
string: ここから立ち去れ

original: Aaaayyyaarrrrgghh!
string: あやあああるぐ！

original: I'd like to buy an armored troll. (<Global=DLC1TrollCost> gold)
string: 武装したトロールを買いたい(<Global=DLC1TrollCost>ゴールド)

original: I'll take you as far as I can, but I'm not hanging around and it's gonna cost you extra.
string: 遠いのは構わないが、向こうで待ってるのはごめんだよ。どうしてもって言うなら別料金をもらう

original: I want to come with you.
string: 一緒に行かせてほしい

original: Let's just say that my mother and father had a bit of a falling out.
string: わたしの父母がちょっとした仲違いをした、とだけ言っておきますわ

original: That felt strange.
string: 妙な感覚だった…

original: Any ideas?
string: 他にいい考えは？

original: As you wish.
string: かしこまりました

original: Excellent, here you are.
string: 素晴らしいわ、さあどうぞ

original: Your guess is as good as mine. This place looks pretty different from when I was locked away.
string: わたしにもよく分かりませんわ。幽閉されていた頃からずいぶんと印象が変わっていますのよ

original: What do you need? Blades, armor, smithing materials?
string: 何がほしい？ 剣か、鎧か、鍛造の材料か？

original: It sounds like you don't like either of them very much.
string: どちらのこともあまりこころよく思っていないみたいだな

original: I'm not going to waste my time making sure your friend doesn't get killed. When it's just you and me, we can go.
string: 味方の命を守る事に必死になって、時間を無駄にしたくはありませんの。あなたと二人だけなら、すぐ出発いたしますわ

original: Fine. You could've just said 'no'.
string: 分かったわ。一言「ダメ」って言えばいいのよ

original: Of course there are. Most of us spend our lives as nomads, traveling from place to place in our endless war against evil.
string: もちろんだ。我々の大半は流浪の暮らしを選び、悪との終わりなき戦いで各地を転々としている

original: You dare walk away from me? In my own hall, before my own court, you dare insult me?
string: 私に背を向けるのか？ 我が城で、我が臣下の前で、私を愚弄するというのか？

original: Too slow!
string: 遅くてよ！

original: Don't...
string: 嫌ですわ…

original: That's what everybody says, right up until they find their throat being ripped out by a pack of hungry vampires.
string: みんなそう言うんだ。飢えた吸血鬼の一団に喉笛を食い千切られるまではな

original: This is it. Home sweet... castle.
string: これですわ。懐かしの… 我が城

original: Where can I find him?
string: 彼はどこにいる？

original: If I leave the Soul Cairn, can I safely return?
string: ソウル・ケルンを離れた場合、無事にもう一度来ることはできるだろうか？

original: Anyway, we should keep moving.
string: とにかく、先を急ぎましょう

original: How does anyone expect me to write my opus with all of these rude interruptions?
string: 失敬な連中に邪魔されてばかりで、どうやって作品を仕上げればいいんだ？

original: For two weeks I've tracked that bear, and now find that you've killed it on your own.
string: あのクマを2週間も追っていたんだが、1人で仕留めてしまったのか

original: A Moth Priest? What in Oblivion do you need a Moth Priest for?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶だと？ 一体どうしてそんなものが必要になるんだ？

original: But once we threw our lot in with Molag Bal... people just don't think about their families anymore. "Power takes precedence," he always said.
string: けれどモラグ・バルに運命をゆだねると… 家族の事なんてどうでもよくなってしまいますの。父はいつも「力の前に力なし」と言っていましたわ

original: I see. You're simply here to stop the Tyranny of the Sun, despite the cost to Serana. Nothing else matters.
string: なるほど。太陽の専制を阻止するためだけに来たのね。セラーナが犠牲になろうと。他の何も重要ではない

original: Once there was a group dedicated to a similar cause. They called themselves the Dawnguard.
string: 以前はそのような大義で活動する集団が存在していた。彼らは自分達をドーンガードと呼んでいた

original: That's it.
string: そうだ

original: I believe there's more to it than that.
string: 私はそれ以上の存在だと思うわ

original: You wouldn't dare. Now shut up and keep on watch.
string: あなたには無理よ。さあ黙って警戒を続けなさい

original: I just don't feel comfortable sharing that moment with a total stranger, I'm sorry.
string: 赤の他人にその場を見られるのはどうも落ち着きませんの

original: Look, I care about you. A lot. And I'll come with you wherever you want to go.
string: ねえ、わたしはいつでもあなたの事を考えて、どこにでもついて行きたいと思っておりますわ

original: Now, volume two begins! What else?
string: さあ第二巻だ！ 始めるっきゃないだろ？

original: Don't worry about it.
string: 心配いらない

original: You care nothing for Serana or our plight.
string: セラーナや私達の苦境はお構いなしなのね

original: No, this was different. He never trusted Florentius, always thought him to be trying to get attention.
string: いや、違うな。フロレンティウスは目立ちたがっていると言って、まるで信用していなかった

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to stop him... to make everything right.
string: 違いますわ、そうではありませんの。わたし達は父を止めるために… すべてを正すためにここへ来ましたのよ

original: You could call it that. Didn't put up much of a fight but made for a tasty snack. A rich bouquet of flavors, I would definitely recommend it.
string: そうとも言えるわね。大して抵抗しなかったけど、おいしい間食にはぴったりよ。豊かな香り。ぜひともお薦めするわ

original: It's what some call the domain of Molag Bal. His place in Oblivion.
string: モラグ・バルの領地とも呼ばれる、オブリビオンにおける彼の場所よ

original: A small price to pay for the betterment of our kind.
string: 我が一族の発展のための、微々たる犠牲だ

original: You'll think you're best of friends, until you find his fangs in your neck.
string: 親友かと思い込んでいたら首筋に牙を突き立てられている、といったところだ

original: Are you all right?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: You just enjoy the fresh air and leave the rowing to me.
string: こぐのは任せて、新鮮な空気を存分に味わってくれ

original: What is it?
string: 何だ？

original: So I need to fill this at each wayshrine?
string: それぞれの祠でこれを一杯にすればいいと？

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: I know, and I'm sorry that happened. But now...
string: ああ、残念な事だった。だが今は…

original: Hope you're getting along with Isran. He takes some getting used to.
string: イスランとは、うまくやれてる？ 彼、慣れないうちは難しいタイプだから

original: Still, those of us here have as much of an obligation to protect Skyrim as any other, wouldn't you agree?
string: でも、ここのみんなと同じようにスカイリムを守る義務があるわ。そうでしょ？

original: I'll meet you there.
string: 現地で待ち合わせよう

original: The more we feed, the greater our prowess will grow. We could perhaps discover even more gifts of Hircine.
string: 食べれば食べるほど能力が大きく育つわ。ハーシーンの贈り物をさらに見出せるかも知れない

original: Nordic ruins. Even older than I am. I wonder if the draugr are as gullible as they were when I was a girl.
string: ノルドの遺跡ですわね。わたしの歳よりも古い場所。今でもドラウグルはわたしの子供の頃と同じくらいノロマなのかしら

original: You will not touch him.
string: 彼には指一本触れさせませんわ

original: Not again!
string: 勘弁してよね！

original: Do you still want to come with me?
string: まだ一緒に来る気はあるか？

original: Can you help get my soul back?
string: 魂を取り戻したい。どうすればいい？

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Where is he now?
string: 今はどこに？

original: I can't believe I lost those pages.
string: あの原稿を失くすなんて、おれは一体何だってどうして

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: I can't believe it. You're one of them... Talk to Isran. Maybe he can help you. Please, I don't want to have to kill you.
string: 信じられない。奴らの仲間じゃないか… とにかくイスランと話すんだ。たぶん力になってくれる。早くしろ、あんたを殺したくない

original: Prelates of these shrines were charged with teaching the mantras of Auri-El to our Initiates.
string: 祠の聖職者は皆、入信者達にアーリエルの真言を教える役割を担っていた

original: You're staying here?
string: ここに残るのか？

original: Perhaps some coin will jog your memory? (<BribeCost> gold)
string: 金銭が少々あれば、思い出してもらえるかな？(<BribeCost> ゴールド)

original: Well of course we do. I'm old, not stupid.
string: もちろんやっている。私は年寄りだが愚か者ではない

original: The two of them just never got along. That's why Isran didn't have you go looking for him when he sent you after us.
string: 彼らの関係はずっと険悪なの。だからイスランも、あなたに彼を探しに行かせず、私達のところへ来させたのよ

original: Well, now that's done.
string: これで終わりですわね

original: When I find you, I'm going to gut you like a deer and feast upon you blood!
string: 見つけたら鹿のようにはらわたを裂き、血をすすってやろう！

original: Performing the Ritual of the Ancestor Moth within the glade should provide the answers you seek.
string: その湿地内で聖蚕の儀式を行えば、探している答えが見つかるだろう

original: No, no, you must get away! If I'm seen talking to you, they'll blame me!
string: ちょっと、近づかないでくれよ！ こんなところを誰かに見られたら目も当てられない！

original: Stop apologizing for everything.
string: 何にでも謝るのはおよしになって

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: It's probably best for you if we're not seen together right now.
string: 今は一緒にいるところを見られない方があなたのためかも知れませんわ

original: Any idea where it could be?
string: どこにあるかの見当は？

original: Yes, I've been aiding Tolan.
string: ああ、トランに協力してきた

original: What do we need to do?
string: 何をすればいい？

original: Ha ha. They seem quite taken to you now that you're carrying some of the tree bark.
string: ふふっ。あなたが木の皮を持っているから、蚕達があなたに頬を染めてますわ

original: The boss said it's some sort of profaned spring. It looks like blood, but it's not the real thing.
string: ボスが言うには、不浄の泉のようなものだって。一見血に見えるけど、実は違うのよ

original: I know this is difficult for you. I hope you trust me.
string: 難しい決断なのは分かりますわ。信じてくれるといいのですけれど

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: What did you do?
string: 何をした？

original: Why? What's happened?
string: どうして？ 何があった？

original: No, you've proven your strength to him.
string: 違いますわね、あなたは自分の強さを証明してみせた

original: Who are the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターとは？

original: How about a sample? (Persuade)
string: 味見をさせてもらえないか？(説得)

original: The day is dark as night! What's happening?
string: 昼が夜みたいに暗い！ 何が起きているんだ？

original: Got a fire in your belly to kill vampires, eh? Good for you.
string: 吸血鬼と戦いたくてうずうずしてるのか？ 結構な事だ

original: I've tracked this damned bear for two weeks; I'll not let it have any more victims.
string: あのくそったれなクマをもう2週間も追い続けている。これ以上犠牲を出させてたまるものか

original: All right. Here goes.
string: では始めますわ

original: I'm starting to think you like this as much as I do!
string: あなたも楽しくなってきたんじゃない？

original: Right. So they have this woman, and an Elder Scroll.
string: なるほど。ではその女性も、そして星霜の書も連中の手の中にあるというわけだ

original: (grunt)
string: うう…

original: It's hard to describe. The Soul Cairn is... well, hungry, for lack of a better word. It's trying to take your life essence as payment.
string: 説明しにくいのですが、ソウル・ケルンは… いわば、飢えているようなものなのです。代償としてあなたの命を吸い取ろうとしている

original: You can use my coffin whenever you like.
string: 私の棺はいつでも使ってちょうだい

original: All right. I'll meet you back at the castle.
string: 分かりましたわ。城に戻りましたら、またお会いしましょう

original: I always wondered what the dwarves actually looked like. I hear they're like elves, but with beards.
string: ドワーフの実物はどんなふうなんだろうとずっと思っておりましたの。エルフに似てるけど、ヒゲを生やしてるんですって

original: And that story led you here?
string: その話に基づいてここへ？

original: Harkon will reward us richly for this.
string: ハルコンはたっぷり見返りをくれるはず

original: Do you think there's more Aetherium somewhere?
string: まだエセリウムがどこかにあるだろうか？

original: With experience, your powers will grow and you will discover new ways to use them.
string: 慣れてくれば力が成長し、新たな使い方が見えてくる事だろう

original: And how exactly do you plan on stopping him?
string: では、厳密にはどうやって彼を止めるつもり？

original: The only things that can survive here are the Ideal Masters, the undead and the souls themselves. Well, if you want to call that "living."
string: ここで生きていけるのはアイディール・マスターとアンデッド。そして魂だけですから。あら、“生きる”という言い方はちょっと変ですわね

original: Sit down and enjoy yourself.
string: まあ掛けてくつろいでくれ

original: None can deny your power now.
string: あなたの力を否定できるものはもうないわ

original: It's not about you! You've been so great in getting me back here.
string: あなたのせいではございませんのよ！ ここに連れ戻してもらって大いに感謝していますわ

original: You are welcome here... for now.
string: 歓迎しよう… 今のところはな

original: Come forward. You have nothing to fear here.
string: 近くへ来い。恐れる事はない

original: Simple. He says 'kill', I kill.
string: 単純よ。彼が“殺せ”と言い、私が殺す

original: Please, don't be angry with me.
string: お怒りにならないで下さい

original: Please... No more...
string: 頼む… これ以上…

original: Yes, the place was crawling with vampires.
string: ああ、吸血鬼だらけだった

original: They belong among our kind, not gathering mold in some vagabond's treasure pile.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。放浪人の宝の山の中でカビを生やしたりなどしてないよ

original: Come with me.
string: 一緒に来てほしい

original: I warned them. I knew something like this would happen eventually. But they didn't listen, and look where it's gotten them.
string: 彼らには警告したんだ。今回のような事態がいつか起こる事は分かっていたからな。でも彼らは警告に耳を傾けなかった。そしてご覧の有り様だよ

original: Will you be a hunter, or will you be prey?
string: お前は狩人になるのか、獲物になるのか？

original: I can't see the sun. Where did it go?
string: 太陽が見えない。どこへ行った？

original: This matters to me.
string: こちらにとっても重大な問題だ

original: Me too.
string: わたしも

original: I understand what you did for Serana and for me, but the prophecy never sat well for me, and I don't want to be a part of it. I'm sorry.
string: セラーナと私のためにしてくれた事は承知よ。でもお告げには決して納得いかないし、かかわりたくもない。ごめんなさいね

original: Your existence is meaningless!
string: 貴様の存在など、何の意味もない！

original: What happened to the castle courtyard?
string: 城の中庭で何が起きたんだ？

original: Set your hatred aside and try to see the larger picture, Isran.
string: 憎しみを忘れて大局を見るんだ、イスラン

original: You dare defy your father?!
string: 父親に逆らうだと！？

original: Who are you?...
string: あなたは誰… ？

original: I owe you a debt for the timely rescue.
string: タイミングよく助けてくれてありがとう。君には借りができたな

original: For the reading? Yeah. Just let the old man know when you're ready.
string: 解読のために？ そうか。では準備ができたらこの年寄りに教えてくれ

original: Serana and her mother disappeared long ago.
string: セラーナとその母親はだいぶ前にいなくなった

original: What will happen to the Chantry now?
string: 礼拝所はこれからどうなる？

original: You simply need to retrieve the gem. The moment you touch it, your soul essence will be restored.
string: 石を取り戻すだけでいいのよ。それに触れた瞬間、魂のエキスは元通りになるわ

original: You sound like you were a weird little kid.
string: だいぶひねくれた子供だったみたいだな

original: I'm <Alias=Player>. Who are you?
string: <Alias=Player>という。そちらは？

original: I've brought the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を持ってきた

original: I can actually assist you in that regard.
string: それに関しては、任せてくれ

original: What does it mean to be a werewolf?
string: ウェアウルフになると、どうなるんだ？

original: I can feel my strength returning each time I am set free from that prison!
string: あの監獄から解き放たれるたびに、力が戻ってくるのが分かる！

original: Maybe I could have seen this coming. We could all be better off now.
string: おそらくこうなるのは予測できたはず。そうしたら今こんな目に遭わずに済んだというのに…

original: Isran knows how to fight those monsters. He's been preparing for this day for a long time.
string: イスランはあの怪物どもとの戦い方を知っている。長い間この日に備えてきたんだ

original: A basic one? Of course. That is, assuming you know anything about steel smithing. It's pretty simple.
string: 基本的なもの？ もちろん。この通り、鍛冶を少しでも知っているなら。簡単よ

original: I knew it was only a matter of time before she'd return with hatred in her heart.
string: 娘がその心に憎しみを宿して戻るのも、時間の問題だとは分かっていた

original: Aye lass.
string: 分かったよ、お嬢さん

original: It's your choice whether to attempt to deal with them or force your way through.
string: そいつらを相手に取引してみるか、強引に突破してみるかは自由だ

original: That's it, out there to the north. We used to keep a boat around here to get there and back.
string: そうですわ、北に行ったところですの。そこまで行って戻ってくるためのボートを、わたし達はこの辺りに確保しておきましたのよ

original: Where can I learn more about magic?
string: 魔法を学ぶには、どこに行けばいい？

original: I heard you might need help.
string: 困っているらしいと聞いた

original: No, there's another way. The question is, how much are you willing to risk to find Auriel's Bow?
string: いや、他にも方法はある。問題は、アーリエルの弓を見つけるために君がどれだけの危険を冒せるかだ

original: Make this easier for you, tell me what I want to know. (Persuade)
string: 聞きたいことを話してくれた方が楽だぞ(説得)

original: Good.
string: いい返事ね

original: Like the best of friends. I would never hesitate to share anything with her.
string: 親友みたいな存在でしたわ。母となら何でも話し合えた

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: We didn't really get along. Best that I haven't seen them in a while.
string: 親とは不仲だった。しばらく会っていないのがむしろ救いだ

original: I need to find someone named Florentius.
string: フロレンティウスという人物を探している

original: Now, where was I...
string: さて、続きはどこからだったか…

original: Is that another one of those wayshrines up there? I wonder where this one goes...
string: あそこにあるのは旅の祠ではなくて？ あれはどこと繋がっているのかしら…

original: Nervous?
string: 落ち着きませんの？

original: Why am I able to bestow the gift of Harkon's blood?
string: 自分もハルコンの血の恩恵を他人に授けられるのはどうしてか？

original: You have no dominion here!
string: ここでは貴様など、何の力もない！

original: Something tells me the divines favor you, my friend.
string: 見ていると、神々に気に入られているように思えてくるよ

original: Yes, they smell like trolls. But do you have to? Consider washing up a bit more often.
string: そうさ、トロールみたいな悪臭だよ。もう少し頻繁に風呂に入る気もないのか？

original: Yyyaaaarrgghh!
string: いやあああるぐぐぐ！

original: I thought death was a release, not an eternity of torment.
string: 死は解放だと思ってたのに、実際は永遠の苦しみだった

original: My traitor wife stole one of them away and then disappeared.
string: 妻が私を裏切り、その一つを盗み出して行方をくらました

original: Fine, here you are. (4000 gold)
string: いいだろう、払おう(4000ゴールド)

original: I'm going to rend you limb from limb!
string: バラバラに引き裂いてやる！

original: Keep searching for her notes. She probably had a journal or something.
string: 彼女のノートを探しましょう。たぶん日記か何かをつけていたはずですわ

original: I see... I... I understand. Thank you
string: ああ… 分かった。ありがとう

original: What can I do for you?
string: ご用は何だい？

original: The skies of Keizaal are mine again!
string: ケイザールの空は再び我がものとなった！

original: It's... complicated. I can't really talk about it. I'm sorry.
string: ややこしい話なのです。悪しからず、話せるような内容ではございませんわ

original: Gah...
string: ぐう…

original: If you need anything, say the word. I can still forge a decent blade.
string: 何か必要なら言ってね。まだまだ立派な刀剣を鍛えるわよ

original: Grab my journal, would you? We're going to need it.
string: あたしの日記を手に入れてくれない？ それが必要になるよ

original: Come on!
string: かかっておいで！

original: When you first transform into a Vampire Lord, you will hover in the air. While you do, you will command the powers of Blood and Night.
string: 吸血鬼の王に変身すると、初めは体が宙に浮かび上がる。その間は血と、夜の力を操る事ができる

original: Well, that's the thing. We don't know where he is. Haven't seen him in years.
string: それが問題なの。彼の居場所は分からないわ。もう何年も、姿を見てないの

original: We were once a wealthy and prosperous society that occupied a portion of Skyrim.
string: 我が同胞はかつて、スカイリムの一部を支配する豊かで高貴な種族だった

original: Which shrine? Well, I... I'm going to them all. Yes. One at a time. Until I've visited all the shrines to all the gods in Skyrim.
string: 祠？ えーと… 全部回るつもりさ。そう。巡礼なんだ。スカイリムの全ての神の、全ての祠を巡る旅だ

original: DialogueGenericHello
string: DialogueGenericHello

original: I can hardly believe it. This is it. We've actually found the Forge! At last!
string: とても信じられない。これだよ。本当に鋳造器具を見つけたんだ！ ついに！

original: I therefore honor-name you "Qahnaarin," or Vanquisher in your tongue.
string: よってそなたに征服者を意味する“クァーナーリン”の名を授けよう

original: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
string: 星霜の書を取り戻したのだから、もう行くべきよ

original: What do you mean, "like you"?
string: “わたしと同じ”とは？

original: Those are my only options?
string: 他に選択肢はないのか？

original: I suspected as much.
string: そんなことだろうと思った

original: Do you ever feel lonely?
string: 孤独を感じた事はおありになって？

original: Good question. Hard to say.
string: いい質問ですわね。断言はできませんが

original: Well, I think it's specifically the black ones. I don't know if the Soul Cairn takes just any leftovers.
string: ええ、特に黒い方に関しては。ソウル・ケルンが残り物なら何でも受け入れるかどうかは分かりませんわね

original: Not a serious threat, but we can't leave them completely unchecked or they may become one.
string: 深刻な脅威ではないが、完全に放置していればそうなるかも知れない

original: What are you talking about?
string: 何の話をしてるんだ？

original: It's amazing what I'm able to learn from studying these Dwemer plans.
string: ドゥーマーの図面から学べる事は計り知れないわ

original: I never got the chance.
string: そんな機会はなかった

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Oh, I'm sorry. Didn't mean to bring up a bad memory.
string: ああ、ごめんなさい。嫌な事を思い出させるつもりはありませんでしたの

original: I can help you find out what that is.
string: それが何かを知りたいなら、手伝ってさしあげますわ

original: I have five soul husks here.
string: 魂のハスクを5個集めてきた

original: Death is nothing to me...
string: 死ぬなんてなんでもないね…

original: Turn back...
string: 引き返して…

original: Hold it right there.
string: ちょっと待ってくれ

original: Keep yourself armed and protected as best you can.
string: 可能な限り、武器や防具を充実させておく事だ

original: The one with the ruined castle? Don't you know that place is cursed? Even seasoned sailors steer far around that place.
string: 城の廃墟がある所かい？ あの島は呪われてるのを知らないのか？ ベテランの船乗りだって避けて通る場所だぞ？

original: Originally owned by the Jarl of Riften back in the Second Era, it was a bit of a black mark on the Hold's history.
string: 元は第二紀の頃にリフテンの首長が所有していたものだった。要塞の歴史におけるちょっとした汚点だがな

original: Arkay warns it's baneful charge abates with each dawn. Something to keep in mind, I suppose.
string: アーケイからの注意だが、高まった攻撃力は夜明けと共に元に戻る。これは覚えておいた方がいいな

original: In an age of strife, when dragons return to the realm of men, darkness will mingle with light and the night and day will be as one.
string: 戦いの時代、ドラゴン達が人間の国に舞い戻る時、闇と光が混ざり、夜と昼はひとつになる

original: Lead on.
string: 案内して下さいましね

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Your time is at an end!
string: これで終わりだ！

original: You realize it's not really necessary to take on that form here.
string: ここではその姿になる必要はないぞ

original: The Dawnguard were there. They fought well, but not well enough.
string: ドーンガードがいて、精一杯の抵抗をしてきたが、敵ではなかった

original: Really? You had to take the armor? Come on, leave me with a little dignity...
string: 本気？ 鎧を取る必要があったの？ 参ったよ、幻滅しちゃうね…

original: No.
string: いいや

original: That's good enough for me. Go see what the vampires were looking for in this Dimhollow Crypt. With any luck, they'll still be there.
string: 私にとっては好都合だ。吸血鬼どもがディムホロウ墓地で何を探していたのか確かめようじゃないか。運がよければ、奴らはまだそこにいるはずだ

original: You're infected? Get away from me. Get yourself cured, or don't come near Fort Dawnguard again.
string: 感染者か？ 近寄るんじゃない。治療をするまでは二度とドーンガード砦に近づくなよ

original: What is it between you two?
string: 一筋縄ではなさそうな親子関係だ

original: Here's where I fell. Feels like ages ago.
string: 落ちたのはここだよ。ずいぶん昔に感じるな

original: Looks like you know your daedra.
string: デイドラの事をよく知っていらっしゃるようですわね

original: You know where to find me if you need more.
string: 必要になったら来てくれ

original: I've located the petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I should be able to extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 太古の吸血鬼が石化した遺体の在処を見つけた。遺体を持ってきてくれたら、血の聖杯の効果を延長させる事ができるはずだ

original: So let me take the lead in there.
string: だから中ではわたしにお任せを

original: That was a dark time in my life. I did a lot of things I ended up regretting.
string: 人生最悪の時期だった。後悔しか残らない事をいくつもしでかしたもんだよ

original: No. This has to end here and now.
string: いいえ、これは今ここで終わらせるべきですわ

original: What was that?
string: 今のは何だ？

original: Can you train me in Smithing?
string: 鍛造の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: Your husband is such a soul, and the stars appear cooperative. Now is your chance.
string: 君の旦那さんは大した人だ。それに星の巡りも味方している。今がチャンスだな

original: Yes, I'd like you to change my appearance. (<Global=DLC1SurgeryCost> gold)
string: 外見を変えてくれ(<Global=DLC1SurgeryCost> ゴールド)

original: Good. I assume you took care of that little infestation. Did you figure out what they were looking for in there?
string: よし。あの侵入者に対処してくれたようだな。奴らがあそこで何を探していたのか分かったか？

original: Well, look what we have here... someone with flesh on their bones.
string: おや、誰かと思えば… 肉づきのいい人じゃないか

original: It's my family home. Not the most welcoming place, but depending on who's around, I'll be safe there.
string: わたしの家族の家です。そこまで歓迎されないかも知れませんが、誰がいるかによっては安全なはず

original: I want to add some punch to our crossbow capabilities, I've done all I can on my own. I need a little inspiration.
string: クロスボウの威力を改良したいんだけど、思いつく事は全部試してしまったの。何か新しいアイデアがほしいのよ

original: Actually, now that I think of it... I'm going to come along with you.
string: 実際問題、考えてみたのですけれど… あなたと一緒に行く事にしましたわ

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: そんなことはさせない

original: I won't let you defile this place, foul being!
string: この場所を穢す者は許さん！

original: Give me everything you are carrying.
string: 持っているものを全部渡してほしい

original: Anyway, this is all very touching, but don't we have some more important things to worry about right now?
string: とにかく、とても感動的なお話ですけれど、今はもっと心配しなければならない事がありましてよ？

original: Isran asked me to find you.
string: イスランに言われて訪ねに来た

original: I need training in Speech.
string: 話術の訓練をしてほしい

original: You know where to find me if you change your mind.
string: 気が変わりましたら、わたしはいつもの場所におりますわよ

original: These vampires claimed they had some purpose in store for me, but they wouldn't say what. Probably hoping to ransom me, the fools.
string: この吸血鬼達は私に対して何か企んでると言ってたが、詳しくは語らなかった。おそらく身代金目当てだろう。愚か者どもめ

original: I'm only here to kill you.
string: お前に引導を渡しに来ただけだ

original: If a line of communication could be established with them, maybe they can find peace.
string: 彼らとの交流手段が確保できれば、平和な関係が結べるかも知れない

original: Castle looks so big from down here. I mean, it is big, but, well, even bigger.
string: 下から見上げると随分大きく見えますわね。いえ、実際大きいのですけれど、それ以上に大きく見えるという事ですわ

original: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
string: ヒジェリム、ウィンドヘルムの家だ

original: It's over. He's dead, and the prophecy dies with him.
string: 終わったな。奴は息絶え、予言も潰えるだろう

original: This is a waste of time.
string: 時間の無駄だ

original: I can see that.
string: なるほどな

original: These pages meant the world to me. Thank you!
string: この原稿はおれの全てなんだ。ありがとう！

original: I've found your mother's notes.
string: 母親の日記を見つけた

original: You said something happened to the Hall of Vigilants?
string: さっき、番人の間がどうかしたとか？

original: And now for the feast.
string: ここからは宴だ

original: ShoutEndShort
string: ShoutEndShort

original: Well then I'm very sorry, but I just can't walk away from this project yet.
string: そう、じゃあ残念だけど、まだここで仕事を続けなくちゃ

original: I spent my life tracking down that legend... until my damn apprentice stole everything from me, and published it all under his own name.
string: あたしは伝説を追うのに生涯を費やした… あの見習いがすべてを盗み、彼の名前ですべてを発表するまではね

original: You're always welcome to return here at any time, of course.
string: 用があればいつでもここに来てくれ

original: That's not your concern.
string: 君が心配することではない

original: I offer you my blood. Take it, and you will walk as a lion among sheep. Men will tremble at your approach, and you will never fear death again.
string: 私自身の血だ。これを得れば羊達の間を狼として歩め、近づけば人々がふるえ上がる事だろう。死を恐れる必要もなくなる

original: You can't get rid of me that easily.
string: そう簡単に、わたしはいなくなりませんわよ

original: I often wonder where we'd be if the Dwemer were still around. Ah well. We'll have to manage with the scraps we find.
string: 今もドゥーマーがいたらどうなってただろうってよく考えるの。まあ、手に入るガラクタで何とかやっていくしかないわね

original: Our blood grants us power to calm and relax. If you currently lack the gift, forgo feeding for a day and that power will come naturally.
string: 我々の血は心の平穏をもたらす力を授けてくれる。もし今その力を感じないなら、血の分配を1日控えれば自然と戻ってくるはずだ

original: Tradition dictates the females be offered to Molag Bal on his summoning day. Few survive the ordeal. Those that do emerge as a pure-blooded vampire.
string: 伝統により、モラグ・バルの召喚日には女性が捧げられる。その試練を生き延びる者はほぼいない。生き延びた者は純血の吸血鬼となって現れる

original: But I can see this having its uses. Do you have any elven arrows on you?
string: さておきこれには使い道があるようですわ。エルフの矢は持っておりますの？

original: If? I've been assuming that's where all this is going.
string: もし？ 全部がそういうものだと思っておりましたわ

original: I've killed the Dawnguard masquerading as a <Alias=Target>.
string: <Alias=Target>になりすましていたドーンガードを始末した

original: You disappoint me, Serana. You've taken everything I provided for you and thrown it all away for this... pathetic half-breed vampire.
string: 失望したぞ、セラーナ。私がお前に与えたもののすべてを投げ捨てたというのか、この情けない半吸血鬼のために

original: The Elder Scrolls vanished from the Imperial City around 175 of this era and have been scattered across Tamriel by forces unknown.
string: 星霜の書は今世紀の175年頃に帝都から紛失し、未知の力によってタムリエルのあちこちにばらまかれた

original: What do you mean? Why were the vampires after this woman?
string: どうして？ どうして吸血鬼たちは彼女を？

original: Convince the Jarl of the threat and he'll let you destroy the creature. If not, then do your best not to get caught.
string: まずは吸血鬼の脅威を首長に知らせる事だ。そうすれば堂々と奴の首をとれる。それが無理なら、捕まらないよう最善を尽くせ

original: If anyone is going to stand in their way, it's going to be us.
string: 奴らを止める事ができるのは、我々だけだ

original: I'll be here.
string: ここで待っておりますわ

original: And yet, as my mortal life neared an end, I faced a seemingly invincible enemy -- my own mortality.
string: しかし、寿命の終わりが近づくと共に、私は打倒不可能と思える敵、自らの命のぜい弱性と向き合う事になったのだよ

original: You'll pay for your insolence!
string: 思い知らせてやる！

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of man is he?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。どんな旦那様なのかしら？

original: Now you're beginning to see why I wanted to protect Serana, and why I've kept the other Elder Scroll as far from her as possible.
string: これで、私がセラーナを守りたかった理由、そして星霜の書を彼女からできるだけ遠ざけてきた理由が分かり始めたでしょう

original: And I suppose you're the one Tolan says is actually doing something about this mess.
string: 君がこの惨状を何とかしてくれるらしいな。トランから聞いたが

original: What if you're wrong?
string: 間違っているとしたら？

original: I've... never heard of him. Is he well supported?
string: その名は… 初耳ですわね。人望があるのかしら？

original: But don't draw attention. Some kills are for fun, some for profit. And others are for sending messages. This one is a message.
string: ただし目立たないで。楽しみや利益のための殺しもあれば、意図を伝えるための殺しもある。今回は意図を伝える方

original: Let's move faster. The sun is... it's not great for my skin, if you know what I mean.
string: 急ぎましょう。太陽は… お肌の大敵ですのよ。分かっているとは思いますけれど

original: These vampires are becoming a real menace.
string: この吸血鬼どもは深刻な脅威になりつつある

original: So where is this Elder Scroll?
string: その星霜の書はどこに？

original: So this is the grand tour of Skyrim's caves that you're showing me?
string: すると、これはスカイリムの洞窟巡りという事？

original: That's the last of them. Poor sods can't resist after they get a taste of your dosed Skooma.
string: こいつで最後よ。マヌケどもには、薬入りのスクゥーマを飲ませたからもう抵抗できないわ

original: Follow me, this way.
string: ついてきて、こっちよ

original: Have you ever thought about marriage?
string: 結婚を考えたことはあるのか？

original: Even if I could, it would only serve to hinder your efforts.
string: たとえできたとしても、あなたの努力の妨げにしかならないわ

original: Well, that's a ridiculous question. Everyone traveling through here has said that the Oblivion Gates have been opening all over Tamriel.
string: 愚かな質問だ。ここを通る旅人達は皆、タムリエルのあちこちでオブリビオンの門が開いていると言ってるぞ

original: I think our potential is on the rise. Hircine smiles on us. Let's not question too much.
string: 潜在力が上昇しているみたいよ。ハーシーンがほほ笑んでいる。疑問は捨てましょう

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: That's the last one, isn't it? It's... it's almost time. I'll meet you at the Forge!
string: それが最後の一つだね？ …いよいよだ。じゃあ鋳造器具の所で！

original: Hmm...
string: ふむ…

original: How so?
string: どうして？

original: I'll finish up here and head in that direction soon as I can. See you there.
string: できるだけ早くここを終らせて、そっちへ向かうわ。後で会いましょう

original: What's going on? Where did the sun go?
string: どうなってる？ 太陽はどこだ？

original: You can't walk around here like some common mortal!
string: 平凡な定命の者みたいにここを歩き回ってはだめよ！

original: We should strike them first before they can muster a larger force.
string: 彼らが大軍を召集できるようになる前に、先に攻撃するべきよ

original: Certainly not enough to devolve them into the sad and twisted beings they've become.
string: だがそれだけで、あれほどまでに卑しく邪悪な生き物に変わってしまうはずがない

original: Good.
string: いい返事だ

original: Thank you! You're too kind.
string: ありがとう！ 君は優しい人だね

original: Glad you're finally listening. Come on, let's move.
string: お分かり頂けたようですわね。さあ、急ぎましょう

original: Umm... this is the part where we usually get in the boat. You with me?
string: うーん… 普通ならボートに乗るところですわね。ついて来ますの？

original: Well, well. I haven't seen one of these beauties in a long time. A rare find in the original falmer language.
string: これはこれは。目にするのはずいぶん久しぶりだな、この種の掘り出し物は。ファルメルの原語で書かれた、珍しい一品だ

original: I don't think anyone's ever met the Ideal Masters. I'm not even sure anyone knows what they look like.
string: アイディール・マスターに会った人なんていないと思いますわ。彼らがどんな姿なのかさえ定かではありませんのに

original: Don't worry, I'm fine.
string: 心配ない、大丈夫だ

original: I don't know what she was thinking.
string: 何を考えてたんだか

original: I was glad to find out not only the bad rumors were true.
string: 悪いうわさだけが真実ではないと分かってうれしかったわ

original: Bring the Dawnguard honor.
string: ドーンガードに名誉を

original: So my daughter applied some of the lessons I taught her about necromancy, did she?
string: では娘は私が死霊術について教えた中から、いくつかの教訓を生かしたわけね？

original: It's symbolic. I don't expect you to understand.
string: 象徴を理解できなくても無理はない

original: That bark's pretty fragrant, no wonder the moths are attracted to it.
string: あの樹皮はすごく良い“香り”がしますもの。蚕が引き寄せられるのも無理ありませんわ

original: Well, before we spoke to my mother in the Soul Cairn, I would have said we bring the bow to my father.
string: ソウル・ケルンで母と話をする前でしたら、弓を父のところに持って行こうとわたしは言ったでしょうね

original: There were too many of them, and only one of me.
string: こっちは一人で、多勢に無勢だった

original: But their time has come to an end. And you will be the one that ends it.
string: でも彼らの時代は終わり。そして終わらせるのはあなたよ

original: You need to locate the tallest of the rocky spires that surround these ruins.
string: この遺跡を囲む岩のような尖塔のうち一番高いものを探す必要があるわ

original: Qoth...Zaam!
string: クォス…ザーム！

original: It's Durnehviir... he's here! Defend yourselves!
string: ダーネヴィール… 来たわ！ 身を守って！

original: Windhelm. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ウィンドヘルム(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: But bringing something from the Soul Cairn gives you something much more powerful.
string: けれどもソウル・ケルンから何かを持ってこられれば、もっと大きな力が手に入る

original: Were you successful?
string: うまくいったのか？

original: Stay away from the Oblivion Gate I told them. Did they listen? Of course not.
string: オブリビオンの門に近づいてはいけないと言ったけど、彼らが聞くわけないだろ？

original: It's disrespectful and dangerous to walk around here mortal. What were you thinking?
string: 定命の者がここを歩き回るのは無礼で危険な事よ。何を考えていたの？

original: Why are you here, Tolan? The Vigilants and I were finished with each other a long time ago.
string: なぜここにいるんだ、トラン？ 番人と私の関係はずっと昔に切れたはずだぞ

original: Ready for more? I certainly am.
string: 次を探してきてくれる？ 待ちきれないわ

original: The only thing I see around here in abundance are soul husks. You know, those ugly fungus-looking things growing out of the ground.
string: この辺で山ほどあるものと言えば魂のハスクだけだ。あの地面から生えてる変てこりんなキノコみたいな奴だよ

original: I'm not going to be the one to destroy a marriage. I'm sorry.
string: こちらから別れを切り出すのは嫌ですわよ。お生憎様

original: You are in danger. A vampire has infiltrated your court.
string: 吸血鬼が宮廷の一員になりすましているため、危険だ

original: Something's wrong with the moondial here. Some of the crests are missing and the dial is askew.
string: ここの月時計は何かおかしいですわ。クレストがいくつかなくなっていますし、時計自体も傾いてますのよ

original: Just look around, will you?
string: ちょっと、辺りを見てきてくれない？

original: But I think I turned out ok.
string: でも今は大丈夫ですわ

original: Do as I command, and you will reap the rewards. Defy me, and I can offer you only pain and suffering.
string: 命じた通りにやればほうびをとらそう。抗うならば、やれるのは苦痛と苦悶だけだ

original: Gaaahh...
string: ぐうう…

original: It appears that way. I suppose he wanted to put the past behind him.
string: そのようですわね。過去を忘れたかったのかも知れない

original: Tell me more about what's going on.
string: 何が起きているのか、聞かせてくれ

original: I liked to explore. My parents almost never let me off the island, so yeah, I poked around down here a lot.
string: 探検するのが好きでしたの。両親がほとんど島の外に出してくれませんでしたから、ここをずいぶん見て回りましたわ

original: Blind? Yes. I'm afraid so.
string: 目が見えない？ 残念だがその通りだ

original: Return to me when your part is done. And may you enjoy your second nuptials.
string: やるべき事が済んだら戻ってきてくれ。素敵な2度目の結婚式になりますよう

original: What I didn't know is someone had hired the Morag Tong to kill him as well.
string: 他の奴が、同じ高官を暗殺するためにモラグ・トングを雇ったとも知らずに

original: The secret is our mystic Redwater Spring. The magic in the waters opens the mind to experience Skooma in a way like never before.
string: 秘密は、秘伝のレッドウォーター・スプリングよ。水に込められた魔法で精神が解放されて、これまでにないスクゥーマが体験できるの

original: Hunh...
string: うう…

original: I will share that knowledge with you gladly, master. What do you wish to know?
string: 主様、その知識を喜んであなたと共有します。何が知りたいのですか？

original: Have to put a stop to this menace...
string: 奴らの脅威を食い止めねば…

original: The Dawnguard were protecting him, and they nearly killed me.
string: ドーンガードが彼を守っていて、殺されかけた

original: However, the majority of necromancers that are foolish enough to enter into a bargain with the Ideal Masters wind up here... as harvested souls.
string: ただし、愚かにもアイディール・マスターとの取引を試みる死霊術師の大多数はここで終わるはめになる… 収穫された魂として

original: Kill their leader before it has a chance to escape!
string: リーダーを殺すのよ、逃げる機会を与えちゃ駄目！

original: And that was just one trap! Look around! Who knows what else this thing is capable of?
string: しかもそれは罠の一つに過ぎなかったんだ！ 見回してごらんよ！ こいつら一体他に何をしてくるかな？

original: We're called the Dawnguard, and we need you to read an Elder Scroll.
string: 我々はドーンガードという。読んでもらいたい星霜の書がある

original: I need you to kill Arch-Curate Vyrthur... my brother.
string: 兄弟を… 最高司祭のヴィルスールを殺してほしい

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: Good.
string: いい返事ね

original: Your name sounds familiar...
string: 名前に聞き覚えがある気が…

original: At least Barknar and I are here together.
string: 少なくともバークナールと私はここで一緒よ

original: Bother someone else.
string: 他の誰かのところへ行きなよ

original: The ingredients are in the vessel.
string: 材料は器に入れた

original: Everyone couldn't have possibly agreed to that.
string: 全員が同意したとは信じがたい

original: You're the one who matters to me.
string: 大切なのは君の方だ

original: This is no place for you.
string: ここはあなたの来る場所じゃない

original: Stop wasting my time, Garan.
string: そんなのは時間の無駄だな、ガラン

original: It is done. <Alias=Spouse> has been welcomed into the family.
string: <Alias=Spouse>が血を分けた家族となった

original: Does he have the Scroll? Is everything ready?
string: 書は彼が持っているな。準備は万全なのか？

original: Why would they require sustenance?
string: どうして彼らは糧を必要とするのだろう？

original: I only hope that you will allow me the precious moments of time there through your call.
string: 我を呼び寄せる事で、わずかでもかの地に戻れればと願うばかりだ

original: Be careful, and keep my daughter safe.
string: 気をつけて、そして娘の安全を守ってね

original: I hope you comprehend killing better than you comprehend speech.
string: おしゃべりより殺しの方を理解してほしいものだな

original: Oh dear. No, I'm afraid that's not going to work at all.
string: ダメだね。それではまったくうまくいかないだろう

original: Should you run out of magicka, you can descend to the ground and fight as the beasts do.
string: マジカが尽きてしまった場合、地面に下りてけだものどもと同様に戦う事もできる

original: I've been sworn to protect this vale and everything it represents until I die.
string: 命が尽きるまで、この峡谷とここにまつわるすべてを守り抜かねばならない

original: Light armor. (25 husks)
string: 軽装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: Serana believes in me, why won't you?
string: セラーナに信用されているのに、信用できないのか？

original: There are people I've met and worked with over the years. We need their skills, their talents, if we're going to survive this.
string: ここ何年かの間に私が知り合い協力し合った人々がいる。この状況を切り抜けるには、彼らの技術と才能が必要だ

original: ...Dawnguard getting to be more than a nuisance... gather some of the hunters... teach them a lesson...
string: …ドーンガードの奴ら、目障りじゃ済まなくなってきてる… ハンターを集めてるとか… 思い知らせてやらないと…

original: Ohhh... that's good stuff. Believe me friend, I've tried it all and this is the best.
string: ふむう… 上物ですね。冗談抜きであらゆる種類を試しましたが、これが最高です

original: I'll be here. Don't take too long, now!
string: ここにおりますから、あまり待たせないで下さいましね！

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: Stand aside!
string: どいてよ！

original: I've heard the rumors around Skyrim. I know something's going on. And I've seen the vampires.
string: 噂はスカイリム中を駆けめぐってる。何かが起きてる事は分かってるんだ。吸血鬼の姿だって何度も見てるし

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: And I'm not half the vampire Lord Harkon is. Truth is I'm better with a forge than I am with claws or fangs.
string: それでも吸血鬼としてはハルコン卿の足元にも及ばない。実際、爪と牙を使うよりも鍛冶の方が得意なの

original: Damn moths! Why are they doing that?
string: どうして蚕が寄ってくるんだ？

original: There you are. I'm... I'm back.
string: あなた。わたし… 還ってまいりましたわ

original: What's stopping you?
string: どうして自力では逃げられないのか？

original: Politics bore me terribly, but they're a fact of life here.
string: 政治は退屈極まりないが、ここでは日常の一部だよ

original: It'll be good to get out of the sun for a while.
string: しばらく陽光から逃れるのもいいですわね

original: Begone, foul creature!
string: 邪悪な種族め、消え去るがいい！

original: Let someone else rule. I just want to kill and feed.
string: 支配は他の誰かに任せるわ。私はただ殺して食べたいだけ

original: May the blessings of Auri-El protect you as you climb the road to the Inner Sanctum and final enlightenment.
string: アーリエルの祝福が、汝とともにあらん事を。最奥聖域での悟りへの旅路に幸多からん事を

original: If she made it there, we'll find her.
string: 彼女の足取りを追えば、見つかるさ

original: He can help you. Go now, please, before you lose control of yourself.
string: 彼が力になってくれるはずだ。早く行ってくれ。理性が残ってるうちに

original: Can you feel the power of the ancient blood coursing through your veins?
string: 古き血が体を駆けめぐるのを感じるか？

original: Will I be able to keep this amulet?
string: アミュレットはそのままもらっていいのか？

original: I don't know yet. The Moth Priest died before finishing the transcription, but he did name the Elder Scrolls that contained the prophecy.
string: まだ分からん。聖蚕の僧侶は写本を終える前に死んでしまったが、予言が書かれた星霜の書の名は記されていた

original: I just wonder if that meant it was my job to be giving.
string: あれは、わたしの役割が担う事という意味でしたのかしら

original: I still remember how to fight!
string: 戦い方ならまだ憶えてますの！

original: One moment I'm raising a sword against that necromancer, the next moment I found myself here. What happened?
string: あの死霊術師に向かって剣を振り上げた、次の瞬間にはここにいた。一体どうなってるんだ？

original: What's happening...
string: 何が起きている…

original: We need to put a damper on their efforts and give those trouble makers something to worry about other than harassing our interests.
string: 奴らの努力に水を差さねばならん。あの厄介者達に悩みの種を植えつけて、我々の利益を害するのをやめさせるんだ

original: You made it! And you've brought the shards!
string: やったね！ 破片を持ってきてくれたんだ！

original: Are you mad, woman? After the trouble I've gone through?
string: 正気か、お嬢さん？ これだけやった挙句にか？

original: Victory to the Dawnguard!
string: ドーンガードに勝利を！

original: Here. Let me show you how this works...
string: これよ。使い方を教えるわね…

original: I am ready to receive the ancient blood.
string: 古き血を授かる用意ができた

original: It must have been important to the vampires as well, for them to risk an open attack on the Vigilants.
string: 番人達に堂々と攻撃を仕掛ける危険を冒したとなると、吸血鬼達にとっても重要なものだったようだ

original: Arkay says you'll be facing warlocks.
string: アーケイによれば、敵はウォーロックだ

original: The corpse is to be the message, not the attack.
string: 死体は攻撃ではなく伝達のために使うのよ

original: Let me think about it.
string: 考えてみる

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: Whatever they're doing with them, they've been harvesting for millennia. No telling how many souls are trapped here.
string: いずれにせよ、彼らは数千年もの間それを収穫し続けておりますの。ここにどれほどの魂が捕えられているのかは誰にも分かりませんわ

original: My time... has come...
string: これで… 最後か…

original: See the Resonators up there? Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: あそこの共鳴装置が見える？ あれを正しい順番で叩けば、扉は開くはずだよ

original: Of course! Let's go.
string: もちろんですわ！ さあ行きましょう

original: Do you still want the Elder Scrolls?
string: まだ星霜の書が欲しいか？

original: Very funny.
string: そうか

original: I've learned the whereabouts of a troublesome Dawnguard member. You will track him down and dispose of him.
string: 煩わしいドーンガード構成員の居場所が分かった。彼を追いつめて始末しろ

original: But you... take that out into the world. And if anyone asks, tell them what we discovered. Together.
string: でもあんたは… それを世界へ持ち帰って。そして誰かに聞かれたら、あたし達の発見を伝えてよ

original: Is there no end to this nightmare?
string: この悪夢に終わりはあるのか？

original: I didn't want you to think I was one of those... you know, the women who just sit in their castle all day?
string: よくいるあの… お城に一日中座っている部類の女だと思われたくなかったのです

original: You're already as good as I am. There's nothing you can learn from me.
string: もう同じくらいの腕前よ。教えられる事は何もないわ

original: You might look around a bit. Maybe one of our predecessors still has a clue.
string: 少し見て回ったらどうかな。先に来た者達が手掛かりを残してるかも知れない

original: No doubt she'd like you to lead her into such a place. Then, when you're alone and beyond help, the fangs will come out!
string: そのような場所に誘い込んで、助けの来ない場所で一人になった時に牙をむく、ってやつかもね…

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: I need you to do something for me.
string: やってほしいことがある

original: Look, I'm happy to help you run any errands you need to, but I've got my own destination. Could you help me get there whenever we're done?
string: あなたのお使いに協力するのは構いませんけど、わたしはわたしで行きたい所がありますわ。あなたの用事が終わったら、連れて行って頂けないかしら？

original: Vaaz!
string: ヴァーズ！

original: Yes. I've kept it safely secured here ever since I was imprisoned.
string: ええ。ここに幽閉されて以来ずっと、これを守ってきたの

original: Very good. Should you visit him again, I suspect you'll find our new sibling appreciates his transformation.
string: 素晴らしい。彼に次会った時、我々の新しい同胞として自分に起こった変化を感謝してる事が分かるだろう

original: Taron Dreth, the world's foremost expert in Dwemer metallurgy. Not that you would know anything about that.
string: タロンだ。このタロン・ドレスはドゥーマーの鋳造技術に関しては世界最高の権威なのだよ。君にこんな事を言ってもしょうがないが

original: May Auri-El's glow shield you from your enemy.
string: アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守らん事を

original: They've holed up in an abandoned fort in the Reach.
string: 彼らはリーチにある廃墟と化した砦に潜伏した

original: You're... you're mortal! What are you doing here like that?
string: あなたは… 定命の者！ そんな状態でここで何をしているの？

original: When the prey is riled, it makes things difficult for us.
string: 獲物をいら立たせれば、ややこしい事態になるわ

original: Here to join the Dawnguard? Good.
string: ドーンガードに入りたい？ いい心がけだ

original: I don't think you can ever be ready to kill your parent.
string: 両親を殺す準備なんて、いつまで待って頂いてもできませんわ

original: My mother spent a lot of time trying to contact them directly, to travel to the Soul Cairn itself.
string: 母はそういった存在と接触をとれないか、つまりソウル・ケルン自体に行けないかという検討にかなりの時間を費やしましたわ

original: Child, my life ended long before you were born!
string: ガキめ、貴様が生まれるはるか前に、命など捨てたのだ！

original: You don't know what it's like, coming from a family like that.
string: そんな家庭で育つのがどんな事か、あなたには分かりませんわ

original: I guess we should head towards your family's home, then.
string: そちらの家族の住む家に向かうとしよう

original: There are five in total, spread far apart across the Chantry.
string: 全部で5つある。広大な礼拝所のあちこちに散らばっているんだ

original: What do you need?
string: 何が必要ですの？

original: ...still always hungry... there's no prey down in this hole... need to hunt more... all this hiding and skulking around, pah...
string: …相変わらずいつも腹が減ってる… この穴蔵には獲物がいない… もっと狩らなければ… こそこそ逃げ隠れするのはもううんざりだ…

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: So what do we do?
string: どうすればいいと思う？

original: Oh yes. They were an important part of the process here.
string: ああ。ここでの大切な儀式の一部だった

original: Nature will do the rest.
string: その後は自然の成り行きに任せるんだ

original: You can meet me at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で合流しよう

original: The moment you hand over the bow your usefulness ends. He'll kill you and then he'll take my blood for the damn prophecy.
string: 弓を渡した瞬間あなたは用済みになりますわよ。父はあなたを殺して、それからあの下らない予言のためにわたしの血を抜き取るのでしょう

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: But... it's hopeless. I died here, just like all the others. Turn back. Turn back before you become the next victim.
string: でも… 絶望的だよ。他の皆と同様、あたしもここで死んだ。さあ帰りな。次の犠牲者になる前に引き返すんだ

original: Farewell, friend. May the light of Auri-El illuminate your darkest hours.
string: さようなら、友よ。苦難の時も、アーリエルの光が導いてくれるだろう

original: Everything's been torn down... the whole place looks... well, dead. It's like we're the first to set foot here in centuries.
string: 何もかもが破壊されてますわ… この場所全体がまるで… 死んでいるようですのよ。何世紀もの間、誰も足を踏み入れてなかったように見えますわね

original: The moment your father discovers your role in the prophecy, that he needs your blood, you'd be in terrible danger.
string: あなたの父がお告げの中のあなたの役割に、あなたの血が必要な事に気づいた瞬間に、恐ろしい危険にさらされるのよ

original: Even if he won't help the Vigilants, he could at least offer us shelter for the moment.
string: 番人の手助けはしないとしても、少しの間、安全な場所に入れてくれたっていいのに

original: Do you get lonely?
string: 孤独を感じる事はありまして？

original: Let's keep looking around.
string: 周りをよく見て用心なさって

original: I must have failed. Harkon's found a way to decipher the prophecy, hasn't he.
string: 失敗したに違いないわ。ハルコンはお告げの解読方法を見つけたのね

original: Here's everything I have. Sorry there isn't more.
string: ここにある物で全部よ。少なくてごめんね

original: No answer? Then I'll take it from your corpse!
string: 答えないのか？ ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！

original: You can't stop the inevitable!
string: 死を避ける事はできないぞ！

original: There's enough for us to fight out there. I don't need us having to defend ourselves within our own fort.
string: 外にも敵は十分すぎるほどいるのに、砦の中でも身を守るなんて事態は避けたい

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: He's a priest of Arkay. Well, he was. It's... it's complicated.
string: 彼はアーケイの僧侶なの。今は違うけど… 複雑な事情でね

original: "Too extreme", they called me. Well, that doesn't seem to have worked out in their favor, now has it?
string: 彼らは私の事を“考えすぎ”だと言っていたが、バカを見たのはどっちだったろうな

original: Because we're going to need her help.
string: 彼女の助けが必要になるからだ

original: You mentioned a treasure?
string: さっき、宝があると？

original: What? You... you found the Forge? The Aetherium Forge?
string: 何？ お前が… 見つけただと？ エセリウムの鋳造器具を？

original: I'd very much like to have those scrolls. Someday I may be able to return them to their rightful place in the Imperial City.
string: 星霜の書を是非とも授かりたいね。帝都の本来あるべき場所にそれを戻す日もいつか来るだろう

original: Isran, of all people. We're reduced to asking him for help.
string: あのイスランに助けを求めるしかないなんてな

original: Now that the Castle is yours, I was wondering.
string: 城がお前のものになったところで、提案だが

original: A woman? Trapped in there? That doesn't make any sense. Who is she? More importantly, where is she?
string: 女が？ 閉じ込められてる？ どういう事だ。その女は誰なんだ？ それよりもっと大事な事だが… 彼女はどこにいる？

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: Like that they were supposed to guard some vampire here, but wound up all becoming vampires themselves when they saw how powerful he was.
string: ここにいる吸血鬼を護衛するために来たけど、吸血鬼のすごい力を目の当たりにして、自分達も吸血鬼になってしまったんだとか

original: How about my house in Windhelm?
string: ウィンドヘルムの家はどうだ？

original: It would make you a bit weaker when we travel through the Soul Cairn, but we might be able to fix that once we're inside. Maybe.
string: ソウル・ケルンを通る際に力が弱まってしまうかも知れませんが、中に入ってから解決方法が見つかるかも知れませんわ。その保証はありませんけど

original: That's of course if you're foolish enough to try it.
string: 知恵があれば、試そうとは思わないだろうがな

original: This better not be all the things you just can't be bothered with.
string: この件が、あなたの手に負えるといいのですが

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Please, make use of my coffin whenever the need arises.
string: どうか私の棺を使ってほしい。必要なときにはいつでも

original: Here we are, in view of seeing the prophecy fulfilled. These are truly great times.
string: 予言の実現を目の当たりにするとは。本当に素晴らしい時代だな

original: Then what?
string: その後は？

original: It all comes back to my father.
string: すべては父にまつわる話なのです

original: Good. Do not offend me by losing it again.
string: よし。再び失くすなどという無礼のないようにな

original: You will not leave this valley alive!
string: 生きてこの峡谷を出られると思うな！

original: Thanks again for all your help.
string: 手助けに本当感謝するよ

original: Settle down. No need for threats. Lead the way. But I'm warning you, I'm not afraid to fight you if I have to.
string: 落ち着け。脅す必要なんてない。先に行け。ただし、警告しておく。必要があればいつでも戦うぞ

original: How so?
string: どうして？

original: I was going to say the same thing to you.
string: 同じ事を言おうと思っておりましたの

original: You did it! You have all of my pages!
string: やってくれたか！ 原稿を見つけたんだな！

original: What was the Hall of the Vigilants?
string: 番人の間とは？

original: How long will that take?
string: どれくらい時間がかかるのだろう？

original: You... always say what you think, don't you?
string: あなたって人は… 思った事をいつでも口にしてしまいますのね

original: Die, you traitorous dog!
string: 死ね、薄汚い裏切り者が！

original: Falmer, if I understand Arkay correctly.
string: アーケイによれば、ファルメルらしい

original: For centuries we lived here, far from the cares of the world. All that ended when my wife betrayed me and stole away that which I valued most.
string: 我々は世の気苦労から遠く離れ、何世紀もここで暮らしてきた。しかしそんな時代も、妻が私を裏切り、もっとも大切にしていたものを奪い去った事で終わりを告げた

original: Well, growing up the way I did, you get used to it.
string: まあ、わたしみたいな育ち方をしたら、慣れますわよ

original: Living room. (<Global=HDSolitudeLiving> gold)
string: リビングルーム(<Global=HDSolitudeLiving> ゴールド)

original: I feed when I'm hungry, I sleep when I'm tired, and I kill whenever I'm in the mood. Those are the things that are important to me.
string: 空腹な時に食べ、疲れれば眠り、殺したい気分の時にはいつでも殺す。それが私にとって重要な事

original: Feed upon those who are sleeping, and your vulnerability to sunlight will diminish along with your powers.
string: 眠っている者の血を吸えば、力と共に太陽光に対するぜい弱性も弱まっていく

original: In return, I was to serve them as a Keeper until the death of the one who calls herself Valerica.
string: ただし、ヴァレリカと名乗る者が死すまで、番人として彼奴らに仕えるのを条件としてだ

original: Unh!
string: あああ！

original: Well, it started with the followers of Mehrunes Dagon having Emperor Uriel Septim VII assassinated.
string: 事の起こりは、メエルーンズ・デイゴンの信者が皇帝ユリエル・セプティム7世を暗殺した事件だ

original: And we will not return without it. Vingalmo and Orthjolf will make way for me after this.
string: そして手に入れるまでは帰らない。事が終われば、ヴィンガルモとオースユルフは裸足で逃げ出すだろうな

original: Knowing that Serana shares that blessing with me, I'm already terrified that Harkon will get his hands on her.
string: セラーナがその祝福を共有している事を知った今、ハルコンが彼女に手を出す事が恐ろしいの

original: There's only one thing left to do. We have to prove this actually works. That this is the real Aetherium Forge.
string: する事はあと一つだけ。これが実際に動く、真のエセリウムの鋳造器具だと証明しなくちゃならない

original: I've failed you... my lord...
string: 神よ… 御心に応えられませんでした…

original: Want my advice? Avoid getting wrapped up in Vingalmo's schemes. He's after the throne, and he'll kill anyone that gets in his way.
string: 一つ言っておくと、ヴィンガルモの企てに関わらない方がいい。玉座を狙っていて、邪魔者は誰であろうと殺すような奴だ

original: Destroy every last one of them!
string: 一匹残らず倒すんだ！

original: Ha ha ha. Here you are.
string: あははは。見つけたぞ

original: Don't worry about me, I'll be fine!
string: 心配しないで、大丈夫だ！

original: Looking to hire a boat?
string: 船を雇いたいのかい？

original: A more "serious" group of the Vigilants of Stendarr. Sometimes when you skin a skeever, you find he has a more aggressive mate.
string: 攻撃的な、ステンダールの番人においてもより“危険な”集団よ。スキーヴァーの皮をはぐ時のあなたみたいに

original: You're a good daughter.
string: あなたはいい娘ですわ

original: After all these years, that's the first thing you ask me? Yes, I have the scroll.
string: 久しぶりに出会って、真っ先に聞く事がそれですの？ ええ、その書なら持っておりましてよ

original: There has to be another way.
string: 他に方法があるはずだ

original: I don't know, maybe. Won't know until we get him out of there.
string: そうかも知れない。奴をあそこから追い出すまで確かな事は言えないよ

original: The twisted forms you've seen didn't occur overnight. It isn't a plague or a disease that ravaged our species.
string: お前達が目にする邪悪な姿は、突然現れたわけではない。あれは我が種族を蝕む伝染病のようなものだ

original: Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?
string: ソウル・ケルンについて聞かせてほしい

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: I'll be at the dock whenever you're ready.
string: 準備ができましたらいつでも波止場にいらっしゃって

original: I have a new task for you, thrall.
string: 新たな使命を与える

original: I hear you're doing a lot of the work in tracking down these vampires. If there's anything I can do to help, let me know.
string: 吸血鬼達の追跡にずいぶん活躍しているらしいわね。何か手伝える事があれば知らせてちょうだい

original: Come on, the bow has to be in this valley somewhere.
string: さあ行きましょう。弓はこの谷のどこかにあるはずですわ

original: You did? Let me see them.
string: そうですの？ 見せてもらえて？

original: You could always go back and get my journal, you know.
string: 戻ってあたしの日記を取ってくる事はいつでもできるんだよ

original: Do you think there's more Aetherium somewhere?
string: まだエセリウムがどこかにあるだろうか？

original: Not until we have the bow. But... you're right.
string: 弓を手に入れた後の話ですわ。でも… そうですわね

original: Can I ask you something first?
string: 先に一つ聞いていいか？

original: That's why I'm here. Let's go.
string: そのために来た。行こう

original: What's that, Lord? Well, should I tell her?
string: 何ですって？ それは彼女に話しても？

original: I'll be off then.
string: それでは、先を急ぐか

original: This is everything I've got right now.
string: 今あるのはこれで全部だ

original: I ain't in the mood to talk. Ohhhh...
string: 今は話をする気分じゃない。ああ…

original: Damn things are like flies. No matter how many you kill...
string: いまいましい、ハエみたいな奴らだ。いくら殺しても…

original: Why else would she risk her life to come here?
string: そうでなければどうして命を危険にさらしてこんな所まで？

original: This feels like the right way. I was starting to worry.
string: こちらで正解ですわね。一時はどうなる事かと思いましたわ

original: The moment we gave ourselves to Molag Bal, things got really icy between them.
string: わたし達がモラグ・バルに身を捧げた瞬間、両親の関係は冷えきってしまったのですわ

original: That's the thing... what's the point of a moondial? I always wondered why she didn't just have the whole thing ripped out.
string: そこなのですが… 月の満ち欠けを知ってどうするのかしら？ なぜ丸ごと撤去しないのか、昔から不思議でしたの

original: Although I would gladly die by your hand, perhaps I could offer an alternative way to read the scrolls?
string: あなた様の手にかかって死ぬのは本望ですが、書を読む別の方法をできれば教えて差し上げたいです

original: She'll help us?
string: 協力してくれるのか？

original: Were you a part of all that?
string: 一枚かんでいたのか？

original: Yes. Please, follow me.
string: ええ。お願い、ついてきて

original: Hunters! Take his heart!
string: みんな！ 奴の心臓を狙え！

original: May Auri-El keep you free from harm.
string: アーリエルの守護があらん事を

original: Became obsessed with the Dwemer. Took off north saying he had found some old artifact. Haven't seen him since.
string: ドゥーマーに夢中になってしまってね。ある古の秘宝を見つけたと言って北へ旅立ってしまった。それからは音沙汰ひとつない

original: Go away! We don't suffer trespassers!
string: 立ち去れ！ 侵入は許さんぞ！

original: What can it do?
string: 具体的な効果は？

original: Just... leave me alone for now. I'll be fine.
string: 今は… そっとしておいて下されば。わたしは大丈夫ですわ

original: I guess you'll never get to find out.
string: それは一生分からないかも知れませんわ

original: Supposedly, the bow draws its energy from the sun itself, which it why it shows up in that prophecy.
string: おそらく弓はその力を太陽自身から得ておりますのよ。だからあの予言に登場するのですわね

original: That... has to be the place. I've never seen a building like that before.
string: きっと… あれがそうですわ。あんな建物は見た事がありませんもの

original: Come with me, "pilgrim."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“巡礼者”よ

original: It was.
string: 昔はそうでしたわね

original: Those vampires put up a hell of a fight.
string: 手ごわい吸血鬼どもだったわ

original: What I can't figure out is why she said it that way.
string: なぜあのような言い方をしたのかよく分かりませんわ

original: Explain this "ritual."
string: その“儀式”について説明してほしい

original: Nothing, until you choose to use it.
string: 別に何も。力を使わない限りはね

original: With your left hand, you can wield the power of blood magic to raise the dead.
string: 左手では血の魔法の力を使って死者をよみがえらせる事が可能だ

original: Last I knew he was out scouring Skyrim for more beasts to tame.
string: 最後に消息を聞いた時は、飼い慣らす野獣をさらに求めてスカイリムを探索していたとの事だ

original: We knew Isran was working on something, but we had no idea he'd found this place.
string: イスランが何かを推し進めているのは分かっていたが、あんな場所を見つけたとは初耳だった

original: Very well. I'll hurry on my way there before more of those vampires turn up.
string: 分かった。吸血鬼達がぞろぞろ現れる前にすぐそこに向かおう

original: I have more pressing matters at the moment.
string: 今はそれどころではない

original: The moondial definitely wasn't like this the last time I saw it.
string: この月時計は絶対こんなふうではありませんでしたわ、わたくしが最後に見た時には

original: Indeed. It is no small thing to submit yourself to the flesh sculptor's knife.
string: そうよね。肉体改造医のナイフに身を委ねるのは容易ではないわ

original: What have you got for sale?
string: どんな物を売ってるんだ？

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をするの？

original: I count the nobility of both the Empire and the Dominion among my clients.
string: 私は帝国と自治領両方の貴族を顧客としているの

original: The scent has gone cold.
string: 匂いがしないな

original: Not fond of vampires, are they?
string: 吸血鬼はお嫌いでしょう？

original: The air here... it feels different. Almost like...
string: ここの空気… 違う感じがするよ。まるで…

original: This is, or was, the epicenter of our religion. Most of the snow elf people worshipped Auri-El.
string: ここは我らの信仰の中心地だった。ほとんどのスノーエルフはアーリエルを信じていたのだ

original: Serana?
string: セラーナ？

original: That doesn't exactly make me want to open up.
string: 信用したくはなりませんわね

original: Return to me when your part is done.
string: やるべき事が済んだら戻ってきてくれ

original: By the divines! It's as if my eyes have been opened! I am blinded by the light of your majesty. I... I must obey you.
string: おお、神々よ！ 覚醒とはこの事です！ あなた様の威光の強さで目が見えない… ご用を何なりと

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: It's fine.
string: 問題ない

original: Always good to have a backup plan, in case the claws and teeth aren't enough.
string: 爪と歯では足りない場合に備え、代替策を持つのはいい事よ

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: We left together, but that partnership didn't last very long. I didn't agree with some of his methods.
string: で、一緒に脱退したものの、コンビは長続きしなかった。方向性の違いって奴だよ

original: Make use of my coffin whenever you like. My home is your home.
string: 棺は自分のものだと思って、自由に使ってくれてかまわないからね

original: What's that? No, that's not what I...  Yes, but... Are you sure? Really?
string: 何だって？ いえ、そういう意味では… はい、しかし… そんな、本当ですか？

original: Where are you headed?
string: どこへ向かう？

original: I see a vision before me, an image of a great bow. I know this weapon! It is Auriel's Bow!
string: 見えるぞ… 巨大な弓が見える。この武器には見覚えがあるぞ！ アーリエルの弓だ！

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: She's the daughter of a powerful vampire lord.
string: 強大な吸血鬼の王の娘だ

original: Right to the point, aren't you. I like that. Not like those fools in the order.
string: 短刀直入だな。好ましい事だ。教団の能なしどもとは大違いだよ

original: Because most of the stories end with the Ideal Masters duping the necromancers, who end up dead or wishing they were dead.
string: 話のほとんどではアイディール・マスター達に出し抜かれた死霊術師達が、死んだり、いっそ死にたいと思ったりする結末でしたから

original: Summon them you mean?
string: 召喚するということか？

original: Let's just get this over with.
string: とにかくやってしまおう

original: No, they didn't. But that's why I like being out here with you.
string: それはございませんわ。あなたと一緒に出掛けるのは好きですもの

original: I'm not sure.
string: 分かりかねますわ

original: Lead on.
string: 案内して

original: The scroll I presume you found with Serana speaks of Auriel and his arcane weapon, Auriel's Bow.
string: おそらくあなたがセラーナと一緒に発見した書には、アーリエルと彼の神秘の武器、アーリエルの弓の記述がある

original: We'll return soon.
string: すぐに戻る

original: To which shrine are you headed, "pilgrim."
string: 次の巡礼はどの祠で？

original: We're up against vampires.
string: 敵は吸血鬼だ

original: Fine, suit yourself.
string: そう、ご自由に

original: Nobody's ever asked me that before. I... I don't know.
string: そんな事、聞かれた事がございませんの… 分かりかねますわ

original: What do you make of all this?
string: これは、つまり…？

original: You're doing well, but two of the spires remain intact.
string: いい調子ね、でもまだ二つの尖塔が手つかずのままよ

original: Death first!
string: さっさと死ね！

original: Perhaps. Do you have a way out of here?
string: かもな。ここから出る方法を知ってるか？

original: Get out of my way.
string: 邪魔をするな

original: You contracted a disease, perhaps, but you are no true vampire.
string: 疾病にはかかったかも知れんが、真の吸血鬼ではないな

original: Given how I've lived... what I've done... I can't ask the gods for a blessing like that.
string: 今までの人生とか… やってきた事を思えば… そんなふうに神の祝福なんて望めませんわ

original: Serana can change that. I suggest you ask her to.
string: セラーナに変えてもらうよう頼むがいい

original: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
string: ヴリンドリルの間、マルカルスの家だ

original: What must I know about being a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼として知っておくべきことは？

original: He died by my hand.
string: この手で倒した

original: Heh... wait, you're serious? This is the Redwater Den, purveyors of the best Skooma outside of Balmora.
string: え… ちょっと、冗談よね？ このレッドウォーターの隠れ家は、バルモラ以外では最高のスクゥーマが手に入る場所よ

original: Auri-El forgives you.
string: アーリエルの許しを請え

original: Might I offer an alternative?
string: 代案を提供してもいいかな？

original: There you are. Give me a hand with this door, would you?
string: そこにいたんだね。この扉を手伝ってくれないかな？

original: I already have the other three shards.
string: 既に残りの破片を3つとも持っている

original: That was interesting.
string: 興味深い体験だった…

original: It's not too far, now. At least, I don't think it is. I thought you knew the way?
string: もうそんなに遠くありませんわ。少なくともわたしの見立てでは。道は分かっておりますわよね？

original: That's one of them Imperial scholars, right? Old man with a gray robe?
string: 帝国の学者さんかい？ 灰色のローブを着たじいさんか？

original: How can we get in without your father noticing?
string: 父親に気づかれずに入るには？

original: The previous owners of the castle had a sundial in the courtyard, and obviously that didn't appeal to my mother.
string: 城の前の住人達は中庭に日時計を作っていて、母はもちろん芳しく思っておりませんでしたわ

original: Are you sure Valerica has the Elder Scroll?
string: ヴァレリカが星霜の書を持っているのは確実なのか？

original: The quicker we find the Keepers, the quicker we can leave.
string: 番人達が早く見つかれば、それだけ早くここを出ていけますわ

original: And it seems we have a problem.
string: 我々は問題を抱えているようだな

original: If I can remain useful, those above me will see fit to keep me here.
string: 役に立つところを見せれば、ずっと置いてくれるだろうからね

original: But something's wrong. He never looks as though he's in pain or under duress. He just... stands there and watches, as though waiting.
string: しかし、何か変だった。苦痛を感じていたり、脅されていたりするようには見えなかった。ただ… 何かを待つように立っていただけだ

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: You're dead.
string: あなたはもう死んでいる

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: I hope I have something that interests you. I always wish to be of service.
string: 何かお気に召すものがあるといいけど。人様の役に立ってこその商売だからね

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: The Elder Scrolls have served me well, Dexion.
string: 星霜の書は役に立ってくれたよ、デキソン

original: Falmer up ahead.
string: ファルメルがこの先にいるよ

original: Teamwork, right there.
string: チームワークの勝利ですわ

original: Why do you have an Elder Scroll?
string: 星霜の書を持っている理由は？

original: Perhaps you care to explain this letter then?
string: この手紙について説明してもらいたい

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: What?
string: 何？

original: If you were anybody else, I'd probably be taking some blood from you for asking that.
string: あなた以外の人でしたら、そんな事を頼んできたら血を抜き取ってやりましたのに

original: Excuse us. I need to fetch the Bloodstone Chalice.
string: 失礼。ブラッドストーンの聖杯を取ってこなければ

original: Why her? What significance does she have? We don't have enough information.
string: なぜ彼女が？ 彼女に何の意味があるんだ？ 情報が足りないようだ

original: The Jarl's in danger. A vampire plays as a visiting "advisor" to the court. Destroy it before it's able to complete its foul business.
string: 首長に危険が迫っている。吸血鬼が1匹、宮廷で“特別顧問”の地位に就いているんだ。奴の汚い企みが完遂する前に、始末してほしい

original: If there's anything at all I can help you with, please ask.
string: 何かできる事があれば言ってくれ

original: At first you may pity the thin-bloods. But after disposing of a few, you realize they aren't worth the worry.
string: 最初は血の薄い者達を哀れむかも知れない。でも数人殺した後には、彼らが心配に値しないと分かるわ

original: These chosen few can divine events of the past and future within the scrolls, though in time, it drives us to blindness.
string: 選ばれしそのわずかな者達は、書に記された過去と未来の出来事を読み取る事ができる。ただしそれと引き換えに、何も見えなくなる運命が待ち受けているが

original: Welcome, Initiate. This is the Wayshrine of Sight.
string: ようこそ、入信者よ。ここは物見の祠だ

original: Come on, let's take it to Dexion.
string: 行きましょう。デキソンに届けますわよ

original: Glorious. Serana claims you're her guardian, yet your first instinct appears to be greed. I see that my daughter is still as naive as ever.
string: ご立派ね。セラーナはあなたを保護者だと言う。あなたの最初の動機はどうやら強欲だったようなのに。娘は相変わらずうぶな子だわ

original: Come on, she's leading us to the scroll.
string: 行きましょう。母が書の在りかまで案内して下さいますわ

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: We won't know until we find her.
string: 彼女を見つけなければ、何とも言えない

original: The story they'd like you to believe is that they were such a noble bunch, doing the honorable thing and saving lives.
string: 彼らは自分達が高貴で、誇りに満ちた行いをし、人々の命を救う者達だと信じさせようとする

original: It was only just a little bit ago. I bet you can catch them if you hurry up.
string: ほんの少し前の事だよ。急げばきっと追いつくんじゃないかな

original: As promised, I now teach you the first word of Soul Tearing: "Rii" - the essence of your enemy's life force.
string: 約束どおり、ソウル・ティアリングの最初の一語、“リィ”を教えよう。敵の命の粋を意味する

original: DLC1ThrallHellos
string: DLC1ThrallHellos

original: Let's just pretend you didn't, all right?
string: なかった事にしておきましょう？

original: Alchemy laboratory. (<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy> gold)
string: 錬金器具(<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy> ゴールド)

original: From what I saw in the vision, the Elder Scroll which foreshadows the defiance of the gods with the blood of mortals is the key to the prophecy.
string: 私が見たものから判断すると、定命の者の血による神への反逆を予兆する星霜の書が、予言の根幹となるはずだ

original: You have forsaken my gift. The ancient blood no longer flows through your veins. Don't deny it!
string: 我が恩恵を捨て去ったのか。古き血はもうお前の体に流れてはいない。否定しても無駄だ！

original: Heard they're reforming the Dawnguard. Vampire hunters or something, in the old fort near Riften. Might consider joining up myself.
string: ドーンガードを改編しているらしいね。吸血鬼ハンターか何か、リフテンの近くの古い砦で。入隊しようかな

original: Where were you captured?
string: どこで捕まったんだ？

original: Ah, yes, the Elder Scroll! I admit, I'm looking forward to this.
string: ああ、星霜の書ですね！ 正直言って、とても楽しみですよ

original: Tell me what you're looking for and maybe we can make a deal... if you have the husks.
string: ほしいものがあるなら取引しよう… ハスクとね

original: She had to be up to something in that garden. I'm hoping it's a clue that will tell us where she went.
string: 母はあの庭で何かをしていたはずですわ。それが母の居場所を見つける手掛かりになればいいですわね

original: This "stranger" has done more for me in the brief time I've known her than you've done in centuries!
string: その“よそ者”の彼女は、お母様が何世紀もの間にしてくれた以上の事を、わずかな間にしてくれましたのよ！

original: I keep the forge running day and night in case Lord Harkon needs anything.
string: ハルコン卿が何か必要な時のために、鋳造器具は昼夜動かしておくわ

original: (Invisible Continues Linked to Self)
string: (見えないまま、自身にリンクする)

original: I will place my name with you and grant you the right to call my name from Tamriel.
string: そなたに我が名を預け、タムリエルから呼びつける事を許そう

original: Aren't we there yet?
string: まだ着きませんの？

original: Back in the Second Era, the Jarl of Riften had a son. Adventurous type, too much for his own good it seems.
string: 第二紀の時代、リフテンの首長には息子が一人いた。冒険好きで危険をかえりみない性格だった

original: You're here because we're abominations in your mind. Evil creatures that need to be destroyed.
string: ここにいるのは、内心では私達を嫌悪しているからだわ。破滅させられるべき邪悪な生物として

original: I don't have any gyros on me.
string: ジャイロの持ち合わせはない

original: Soul trap me. I won't feel right as a vampire.
string: 魂縛をかけてほしい。吸血鬼になったら自分に納得ができなくなりそうだ

original: Talk to Isran. He'll decide if he wants you for the Dawnguard.
string: イスランと話せ。ドーンガードに必要な人材かどうかは彼が判断する

original: My ship... what happened to my ship? Where am I?
string: 船は… 私の船はどこ？ ここは一体どこなんだ？

original: That took longer than usual. How deep are we?
string: 普通より長くかかったね。どれだけ深いのかな？

original: The power of my blood will purge that filth and make you whole again.
string: 私の血の力で汚れが浄化され、再び万全な状態に戻れるだろう

original: Hopefully he'll be gracious enough to make you one of us again.
string: 彼が寛大にも君をまた仲間にしてくれるといいね

original: All clean. I feel like I can breathe again for the first time since I was turned.
string: 清々しいですわ。まるで、姿を変えられてから初めて呼吸するような気分

original: I know! Arkay told me of your success!
string: やっぱり、やってくれたな！ アーケイの言った通りだ！

original: I'm sorry, I had heard there were vampire hunters here. I thought they might want to know about a vampire plot to enslave the rest of the world.
string: ここには吸血鬼ハンターがいると聞きましたので。吸血鬼達が世界を隷属させる計画を練っているとなれば、知りたがるかと思ったのです

original: What exactly are you planning to do to these vampires?
string: 吸血鬼らをどうするつもりで？

original: We should honor our agreement with him.
string: 彼との約束を守るべきだ

original: If we do, he'll have to die.
string: もしそうなら、彼には死んでもらうしかない

original: My Lady.
string: お嬢様

original: Oh no you don't!
string: いや、やめて！

original: After my bite, you collapsed and fell into a slumber. Now your flesh has acclimated to the new blood that courses through your veins.
string: 噛まれたお前は倒れ、昏睡状態となった。そして今や、肉体が身体を巡る新たな血に順応したのだ

original: You know, an important member of society. Someone attached to the Jarl's court, a merchant, a bard, a priest, someone with stature.
string: まあ、社会的に重要な人物だな。首長の宮廷の関係者とか、商人、吟遊詩人、司祭などの社会的地位のある者がいい

original: Ah, Solitude. Best port in Skyrim. You should try the Spiced Mead while you're there.
string: ソリチュードか。スカイリム一の港がある街さ。あそこのピリ辛ハチミツ酒はお勧めだ

original: Do you know where these other scrolls are?
string: 他の星霜の書のありかは？

original: The darkness hums and we sing its praises. Sweet melodies. Sweet like the water that flows through their veins.
string: 闇がハミングし、私達はその称賛を歌う。甘い旋律。彼らの血管を流れる水のように甘い

original: That's over half of the pages found. Keep it up!
string: もう半分以上見つけたのか。いいぞいいぞ！

original: Something bad happens, word spreads. More bad things happen, people worry.
string: 悪い事が起きると、うわさが広まる。さらに悪い事が起きると、人々は不安になる

original: There's my husband...
string: 夫がいる…

original: Your end has come!
string: ここで終わりだ！

original: Glad to see you've taken care of your little problem, and kept it from becoming my problem.
string: 君が自分の問題に対処できた事と、それが私に飛び火しなかった事をうれしく思うよ

original: The Dawnguard tried to stop me, but they posed no threat.
string: ドーンガードが止めようとしてきたが、問題にならなかった

original: Well, too bad for you... I intend on keeping it. Let's see if your blood has any power to it!
string: でもお生憎様。これは渡しませんわよ。あなたの血の力がこれにも通用するかどうか、見てみましょうか！

original: ...blood... so hungry all the time now... need to hunt again soon...
string: …血がほしい… 今じゃそう思わない時はない… 早く狩りを再開しないと

original: DialogueFerrySystemIdle
string: DialogueFerrySystemIdle

original: At their bases, the barrier's energy is being drawn from unfortunate souls that have been exiled here.
string: その根元では、ここに追放されてきた不運な魂から障壁のエネルギーを吸収しているの

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Divines guide you.
string: 神々の導きがあらん事を

original: We end this here and now!
string: 今、ここで決着をつけてやる！

original: You would dare show up here after becoming mortal, abandoning all that Lord Harkon has granted you?
string: ハルコン卿に与えられたものをすべて捨て去り、定命の体になった上でここに姿を現すとはな

original: She's asking me to take her home, to some castle.
string: 家に案内するように頼まれた。どこかにある城だとか

original: If we open that one, we'll be able to move around this valley a lot faster.
string: あれを開けば、この谷をずっと速くまわれるようになりますわ

original: My family has its problems, but they're our problems.
string: わたしの家族は問題を抱えておりますけど、あくまで家族の問題ですわ

original: All I said to Potema was I thought she looked a little portly in that gown. How was I supposed to know?
string: ポテマには、そのドレスだと少し太って見えると言っただけさ。だって知らなかったからね

original: Best not to damage our reputation. Let your actions be as discrete as possible.
string: 評判を落とさないよう注意が必要だ。なるべく目立たずに行動するといい
