original: You'll get the hang of it.
string: そのうちコツが分かる

original: There's nowhere to run. And I'm certainly not moving in with my mother, if that's what your implying.
string: 逃げる場所などありませんわ。それに母と一緒に引っ越してこいと言いたいのでしたら、それは無理な話ですわね

original: I'm here to join the Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガードの一員になりたくて来た

original: I'm glad we're finally taking the fight to those monsters.
string: ついにあの怪物どもに戦いを仕掛けるのか。うれしいな

original: Your old place would suit us just fine.
string: 今まで住んでいた家に一緒に住ませてもらえればいい

original: Go. Reconsider your plight.
string: 行って。自分の立場を考え直しなさい

original: Another time, maybe.
string: また後で

original: Nnyyyaarrgghh!
string: んにゃあああるぐぐ！

original: Oh thank you, milady. Thank you!
string: 奥様… ありがとうございます！

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: He fought well though. Jeron and Bresoth were no match for him.
string: 奮戦していたがな。ジェロンとブレソスは歯が立たなかった

original: You realize that doesn't impress anyone here.
string: そんな事では誰も何とも思わないぞ

original: Let's get that portal open.
string: 転移門を開こう

original: Not until you get rid of whoever your other friend is.
string: 他の仲間と別れてきてくれましたらね

original: Why, are you interested in my services? I warn you, my skills do not come cheaply.
string: あら、私の仕事に興味があるの？ 言っておくけど、私の技術は安くないわよ

original: The vampires will show us no mercy. They've proven that.
string: 吸血鬼達は容赦なしだぞ。歴史がそれを証明している

original: Very supportive.
string: 協力的ですのね

original: Very good. I'll just... I'll be going now.
string: いいですとも。ちょうどその… 行こうと思ってたんです

original: Of course it matters to you, but you don't get to make this decision for me.
string: 関係があるのは分かりますが、わたしの事で決断を下す必要はなくてよ

original: Have you been to Winterhold before?
string: ウィンターホールドを訪れたことは？

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Oh. Well, I'm not sure. I guess it came from fighting them, thinking "what could be worse?"
string: そうだな…奴らと戦いつつ、「これ以上最悪な事があるか」と思った事か？

original: I doubt very much that they'll hasten to exact revenge for freeing me from the ruins.
string: 私を遺跡から解放した事に対して、急いで報復を求めるとはとても思えないわ

original: This is my savior, the one who freed me.
string: これはわたしの心のよりどころ。わたしを自由にしてくれたものですわ

original: Lord Harkon. Remember your place.
string: ハルコン卿。立場をおわきまえに

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: When you get back to Tamriel, let them know I still exist.
string: タムリエルに戻ったら、ジウブはまだここにいると伝えてくれ

original: We'll stop these monsters. We have to; we're the only ones who can.
string: 奴らを止めてみせる。我々がやるしかない

original: As you can see from my bandages, it's not that I'm unwilling, it's that I'm physically unable.
string: この包帯を見ればお分かりだと思いますが、やりたくないのではなくできない体なんです

original: Can't anyone become a vampire if bitten by one?
string: 噛まれたら誰でも吸血鬼になりうるのでは？

original: What trickery is this?
string: 何の茶番だこれは？

original: Got him!
string: 倒した！

original: It sounds like you weren't thinking clearly.
string: 考えが甘かったんじゃないのか？

original: If anything happens to Serana, I'll have you answer for it.
string: もしセラーナに何か起これば、責任を取ってもらうわ

original: Who'll need thralls when the very sun is at our mercy?
string: 太陽そのものが我々の意のままになれば、従徒など必要なくなる

original: Isran? Needing someone else's help? Never thought I'd hear that.
string: あのイスランが？ 他人に助けを求めるだと？ 前代未聞だな

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Descend to the ground, and you can attack with your claws and feed upon your prey to regain your strength.
string: 地面に下りれば爪で攻撃し、獲物を糧にして力を取り戻す事ができる

original: Otherwise, all I can do now is grant you my hopes for a safe journey.
string: 質問がないなら、旅の無事を祈って送り出すだけだ

original: That's not really your business.
string: あんたには関係のないことだ

original: All right, so obviously not this way, either.
string: いいですわ。この道でもない事は明らかですわね

original: Very well then, you leave me no choice!
string: そうか、ならば仕方あるまい！

original: Gaan!
string: ガーン！

original: By the time the compact had been completed, it was too late for us to even attempt to intervene.
string: 盟約が成立した頃には、すでに我々が手出しできない状況だったのだ

original: I will find you. Then you will beg me to let you die.
string: 必ず見つけ出して、慈悲を乞わせてやるわ

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何だ？

original: Well... I trust you'll take care of this unwanted visitor. My guards will not interfere with you carrying out my justice.
string: なるほど… この招かれざる客を処理してくれるな。お前が私の正義を執行するのに衛兵は干渉しない

original: Don't leave, you'd have better dreams here...
string: 帰る前に、いい夢見ていきなさいよ…

original: If I ever see her again, she will pay most dearly for that betrayal.
string: もしまた会う事があれば、裏切りの代償を存分にとってやるとも

original: We're getting close. I'm sure of it.
string: 近づいていますわ。確かですのよ

original: I'm afraid in their current form, they still believe the Chantry to be an active center of worship.
string: 気の毒な姿になってしまっているが、彼らは今もこの礼拝所が聖地だと信じている

original: May your blades stay sharp.
string: 刃が鋭くあらん事を

original: Oh, look at you. What've you done? You've gone and gotten yourself turned into one of them.
string: なんてザマだ。何をやったんだ？ 吸血鬼殺しが吸血鬼になったわけか

original: Both of you were obsessed with your own paths. Your motivations might have been different, but in the end, I'm still just a pawn to you, too.
string: お父様もお母様も自分の道を譲らなかった。理由はたぶんそれぞれ違っていたのでしょうけど、結局は二人ともわたしをただの道具としか見ておりませんのよ

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: Do you... know what you're doing?
string: あなた… 目算はありまして？

original: Tell me about your home.
string: 家について聞かせてほしい

original: It's time for you to suffer!
string: 今度はお父様が苦しむ番ですわ！

original: Find Lord Harkon at once and ask him to please... "correct" the situation.
string: すぐにハルコン卿を見つけ、彼に… 状況を“正して”くれるよう頼め

original: Do I look like a "sir" to you, boy? I'm not a soldier, and you're not joining the army.
string: 私の事を“サー”とでも呼びたいのか、新人君？ 私は兵士ではないし、君が入隊する予定もない

original: Is something wrong?
string: 何か問題でも？

original: My long-lost daughter returns at last. I trust you have my Elder Scroll?
string: 長らく行方の知れなかった娘がようやく戻ったか。星霜の書は持っているのだろうな？

original: Wayshrine?
string: 祠とは？

original: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
string: ソウル・ケルンを旅した事で、あなたの身体はかの地に同調したの

original: I have never understood the Nord fascination with weapons. Magic is so much more versatile, don't you think?
string: なぜノルドが武器に魅了されるのか理解できない。魔法の方がはるかに万能だとは思わんかね？

original: We own the night, fool.
string: 夜は私たちのものだ

original: Truth is, I'm a little nervous. I've never done anything like this before. I hope you don't mind if I walk up with you.
string: 正直、ちょっとビビってるんだ。何しろこういうのは初めてだから。一緒に行っても構わないかな？

original: How is your work going so far?
string: 作品の進み具合は？

original: Unh... where is... who sent you here?
string: ああ… ここは… あなた、誰に言われていらっしゃったの？

original: For Auri-El!
string: アーリエルのために！

original: Where did the sun go?
string: 太陽はどこへ行ったの？

original: You're no match for me, fledgling.
string: お前みたいなひよっこ、敵じゃない

original: Lots of theories. Some say they feed on them like I feed on blood.
string: 仮説は色々ありますわね。わたしが血をほっするように彼らはそれをほっすると言う人もおりますわ

original: I saw a drawing of this once. This shard... it's... it's part of a key. A key made of pure Aetherium! The key to the Forge!
string: これの絵を見た事があるよ。この破片は… 鍵の一部だよ。純粋なエセリウムからできた鍵！ 鋳造器具への鍵だ！

original: Of course! It is my duty to serve, and I am happy to do it!
string: いいとも！ 人様のお役に立てるのは嬉しいね！

original: It's around the side of the castle. Let's move.
string: 城の横手に回ったところですわ。行きましょう

original: Do you still want to come with me?
string: まだ一緒に来る気はあるか？

original: Opus? What do you mean?
string: 作品とは？

original: By the way... my name is Serana. Good to meet you.
string: ところで… わたしはセラーナ。どうぞよしなに

original: Which, I'm sorry to say, means your usefulness is at an end!
string: つまり、お前はもう用済みだという事だ！

original: Years of mocking, of dismissal... and now suddenly here you are, begging for help.
string: 何年もの間あざけり疎外してたくせに… 突然やってきて助けを求めるのか？

original: Now that the first volume's complete, there's no much left to do but begin work on the second.
string: 第一巻が完成した今、次にする事は第二巻の執筆しかないだろうが

original: We need to do all that nonsense to get into the temple, so we can kill your brother and claim Auriel's Bow?
string: こういう馬鹿げた事をしてまで寺院に入らなければならないのは、あなたの兄弟を殺してアーリエルの弓を手に入れるためという事ですの？

original: Another time, perhaps.
string: また次がある

original: Forgive my astonishment, but I never thought I'd witness the death of that dragon.
string: 驚いてごめんなさい、でもあのドラゴンの死を見るとは思いもしなかったの

original: Get back here!
string: 戻ってこい！

original: Would you look at that. An exploding crossbow bolt. This should be fun!
string: ちょっと見てよ。爆発するクロスボウのボルトだって。アツいわね！

original: Gaan...
string: ガーン…

original: I guess... we kind of have to go way back. To the very beginning. Do you know where vampirism came from?
string: おそらくは… これまでの事を逆向きに、始まりまで辿って行かねばなりませんわね。吸血鬼がどこから来たかご存知？

original: Well, you could waste a lot of time trying to figure out our next move, or you could let me help.
string: 次にどうすべきかを決めるのに多大な時間を浪費してもいいでしょうし、わたしの助言に耳を貸すのもよくてよ

original: You shouldn't blame yourself.
string: 自分を責めるべきじゃない

original: It generally doesn't occur until a Moth Priest is in his latter years, but in my case I simply wasn't preparing myself properly.
string: それが聖蚕の僧侶の身に起こるのは通常晩年だが、私の場合は準備を怠ってしまったんだよ

original: Can't say I'm surprised.
string: 驚く事でもないがな

original: Didn't I tell you to step forward? Hmm... Farm boy, eh? What's your weapon?
string: 前に出ろと言わなかったか？ ふむ… 農民の子か？ お前の武器は何だ？

original: Here's all of the pages.
string: ページはこれで全部だ

original: Keep strong, and eyes open. We're on a different path now.
string: 心を強く持って、目の前をしっかりお見すえになって。別々の道を行かなければなりませんのよ

original: Without the royal blood flowing through you, you're one step away from the rest of the thralls.
string: 体に流れる王族の血がなければ、従徒どもとお前の違いは微々たるものだ

original: Let's just find my mother and get out of here.
string: すぐに母を見つけてここから出ましょう

original: I have ordered the court to assemble. I have a new task for us all to carry out, and that includes you.
string: 臣下の者達に集まるよう指示した。我々全員でなすべき事がある。お前を含めてな

original: I really do enjoy killing vampires.
string: 吸血鬼狩りはなかなか楽しめるものだ

original: I was hoping it wouldn't smell this bad.
string: 思っていた以上に酷い臭いですわ

original: They didn't tell you she was immortal.
string: 不死身だとは聞いてなかったんだな

original: You don't scare me. Let's go.
string: 脅しは必要ない。行こう

original: It is an honor to serve Harkon, is it not?
string: ハルコンに仕えるのは名誉な事だろう？

original: I suppose I'd rather be here than most other places in Skyrim. If Isran needs me, it must be pretty bad.
string: スカイリムにあるどんな宮殿よりも、ここの方がいいわ。イスランに呼ばれるなんて、最悪の状況って事だもの

original: Hey, uh, don't tell Isran I was afraid to meet him by myself. Not the best first impression for a new vampire hunter, I guess.
string: なあ、俺が1人で会うのを怖がってたって事、イスランには言わないでくれよ。吸血鬼ハンター志願者としちゃ、あんまりいい印象与えないだろうからね

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Any other ideas?
string: 他にいい考えはありまして？

original: You know as much as I do. I can't teach you anything new.
string: 既に同じくらいの腕になってるだろう。これ以上、教えられる事はない

original: You give the Ideal Masters souls, they give you powers to summon the undead. It's all very business-like.
string: アイディール・マスター達に魂を捧げれば、アンデッドを呼び出す力を授けてくれる。まるで商取引のように

original: Hmm. Cowards.
string: なんて臆病だ

original: Are you saying that I need to become a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼になる必要があると？

original: Hm. Did I call it "The Great Hunt" or was it just "The Hunt?" Bah, I can't remember!
string: あーむ、「グレートハント」と書いたかな？ 単に「ハント」だったか？ ブァー、思い出せんじゃないか！

original: You seem to have lost the gift that has been given to you. Perhaps Serana will grant it to you again.
string: せっかくもらった贈り物を失くしたみたいだね。多分セラーナがまたくれるんじゃないかな

original: I've no love for living out of a tent, but I'll take that over being ripped apart.
string: テント暮らしが好きとは言わないが、八つ裂きにされるよりマシだ

original: Hmm. Nothing.
string: うーん。何も匂わない

original: That's... complicated. And I'm not totally sure if I can trust you.
string: それは… 複雑ですわね。それに、あなたが信用できるかどうか分かりかねますわ

original: Well, looks like some other guests have taken over since my mother left.
string: なるほど、母がいなくなったあとは、他のお客さんが引き継いだようですのね

original: You haven't seen a sack full of dwarven gyros lying around, have you? I'd swear I left it right here.
string: この辺りに、ドゥーマーのジャイロが入った袋はなかった？ 確かにここに置いたんだけど

original: I'll admit, I don't know that I can trust you, but I know I can't rely on the Vigilants for anything. So we'll have to work together for now.
string: 正直言って、君を信頼していいのかどうかは分からん。だが番人達が役立たずとあっては、我々は協力せざるを得ない

original: Exactly!
string: その通りですわよ！

original: Fought vampires wherever they found them. I aim to continue that mission.
string: どこであろうが、吸血鬼を発見すると彼らは戦いを挑んだ。私はその任務を遂行し続けたいんだよ

original: Maybe your mother didn't trust you, either.
string: 母親は君自身のことも信用していなかったのかもな

original: Hmmm... interesting... those dwarves were clever creatures. I'll tinker around with these techniques and see what I can come up with around here.
string: へえ… すごいわね… 頭の切れるドワーフがいたのね。この技術に手を加えて、ここで手に入る物で何か作ってみるわ

original: Still, if he sent you to find me, it may actually be pretty bad.
string: それでも、あなたをここによこしたという事は、状況は悪いみたいね

original: Forget it.
string: 大きなお世話ですわ

original: Track him down and dispose of him.
string: その男を追い詰めて始末してくれ

original: What about the Dragonborn?
string: ドラゴンボーンについては？

original: Can you teach me more about archery?
string: 弓術の腕を鍛えてほしい

original: Enough of this!
string: いいかげんにしろ！

original: No, no. You must speak with Lord Harkon, not me!
string: 違う違う。話す相手はハルコン卿だ、僕じゃない！

original: Try... taking it out?
string: 試しに… 取ってみる？

original: Did you see where he went?
string: 彼がどこに行ったか見まして？

original: It appears I have you to thank for turning my daughter against me.
string: 娘を心変わりさせたのはお前の仕業のようだな

original: Isran was right all along. We should have listened to his warnings. It's too late for the Vigilants now.
string: イスランの言っていた事は正しかった。彼の警告に耳を貸すべきだった。番人達はもはや手遅れだよ

original: Come with me, "merchant."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“商人”よ

original: Good thing we stopped that prophecy, huh?
string: あの予言が成就するのを阻止できてよかったわね

original: I've got more leads on additional Dwemer plans.
string: 新しいドゥーマーの設計図の手がかりを掴んだの

original: What the... get back! Hurry!
string: あれは… 戻って！ 早く！

original: That's a fine looking animal you've got there. I had a dog once. Kept getting fur in my mead.
string: 素敵な動物を飼っているね。私にも以前犬がいて、いつもハチミツ酒に毛が入ったよ

original: What do the Masters provide in return?
string: アイディール・マスターらがもたらす見返りは？

original: (Heavy breathing)
string: ハァ、ハァ

original: Unnnhhhh...
string: ウウウン…

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をしてるんだ？

original: Let's make some more stories.
string: わたし達の物語を紡ぎましょう

original: No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to complete the prophecy our way, not his.
string: それは誤解ですわ。お父様のやり方ではなく、わたし達なりのやり方で予言を成就させるために来ましたのよ

original: Isn't it obvious? They're soft, the lot of them.
string: 明白な事実だろう？ 彼らは例外なく考えが甘いんだ

original: I see you chose a suitably high profile target. Well done.
string: ちゃんと人目につく標的を選んだようだな。よくやった

original: We're going to a place I've never been... and we're goind to see my mother. After all these years.
string: わたしが行った事もない場所におもむいて、母と会う事になるなんて… 何年ぶりになるのかしら

original: My business is my own. Just tell me what I need to know.
string: こちらの問題だ。質問に答えるだけにしてくれ

original: Then we have no further need of you.
string: ならばもう用済みだ

original: I'm working on it, now give me some silence so I can think.
string: 今やってるところだ。考えをまとめたいから静かにしてくれないか

original: Cursed, not dead. Doomed to exist in this form for eternity. Trapped between laas and dinok, between life and death.
string: 死ではなく、永遠にこの姿で存在させられる呪いなのだ。ラースとディノク、生と死の狭間に閉じ込められて…

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: Let's not waste too much time, then.
string: でしたら時間を無駄にしすぎない方がいいですわね

original: Neh...Viir!
string: ネー… ヴィール！

original: Run, coward! Run and never return!
string: 行け、腰抜けめ！ 二度と来るな！

original: What about the scroll?
string: 星霜の書が何か？

original: Very good, though I suspect there's more wherever he came from.
string: うまくいったな。もっとも、奴の仲間がまだまだいそうだが

original: I'm sorry I don't have more to offer.
string: あいにく品切れだよ

original: This must be that beautiful Skyrim weather I've always heard about.
string: これが噂に聞くスカイリムの美しい空ですのね

original: How dare you set foot in here, after being infected by those foul beasts?
string: あの忌々しい獣どもに汚（けが）されたあとで、よくもここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな

original: Auriel's Bow will be mine!
string: アーリエルの弓は私のものだ！

original: Mmm hmm.
string: はいはい

original: I'll be here if you change your mind.
string: 気が変わったら、ここにおりますわ

original: Terrible, simply terrible.
string: 本当、全く最悪だった

original: Making sure you're not vampires. Can't be too careful.
string: 吸血鬼でない事の確認だよ。念には念を入れないとな

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: そんなことはさせない

original: Normally, I'd send you to the Imperial City in Cyrodiil to seek answers at the Imperial Library, but that avenue no longer exists.
string: 本来ならシロディールの帝都にある帝国図書館で答えを探す事をお勧めしたいが、あそこの通りはなくなってしまったんだ

original: Ah, of course. The prophecy. You've come here to stop me from taking Auriel's Bow and shrouding the world in darkness.
string: ああなるほど、予言か。私がアーリエルの弓を手にし、この世を闇で覆ってしまうのを止めに来たのだな？

original: Why the trolls, of course! You seem to have quite a way with them.
string: だいたい、なんでまたトロールなんだ！ どうやら、連中の扱いを心得てるらしいが

original: The people of Morrowind were so grateful to have the roads safer again, they took to calling me "Saint Jiub" and then the other names followed.
string: モロウウィンドの人々は、安全に街道を歩けるようになって喜んでくれた。その功績を讃えられ、“聖ジウブ”などと呼ばれるようになったってわけだ

original: Life here is better than you could find anywhere in Skyrim.
string: ここでの暮らしはスカイリムで一番だよ

original: Now, acknowledge me as your master!
string: 主として我を受け入れよ！

original: Considering the state I'm in, I'd say that option vanished a long time ago.
string: 今のこの姿では、そんな望みはとうの昔に消えちまったさ

original: You've turned her against me!
string: 娘を離反させたな！

original: His own little fortress. Well, I guess I'll get to see what he's been up to all this time.
string: 自分だけの要塞というわけだ。まあ、今まで何を企んでたのかを確かめる、いい機会になるな

original: I would never harm Serana. She's too important to me.
string: 大事なセラーナを、傷つけなどしない

original: Pay a visit to the beast's last known contact. Do what you must to find where it's hiding now.
string: 奴が最後に会ったと分かっている人物を訪ね、どこに隠れているかをどうにかして聞き出すんだ

original: How do the necromancers communicate with them?
string: 死霊術師たちはどうやって疎通を？

original: What would mudcrabs want with my satchel, anyway?
string: マッドクラブが私のカバンを盗んで、何をどうするっていうの？

original: And they have an Elder Scroll.
string: そして奴らは星霜の書を持っている

original: As a vampire, you will gain new powers, but also a weakness to sunlight.
string: 吸血鬼になると新たな力を発揮できるが、同時に太陽光が弱点となる

original: I wonder what these souls do all day. They look... bored.
string: こういう魂は日がな一日、何をして過ごしているのかしら？ なんだか… 退屈そうですわね

original: Still, it's my duty to help protect Skyrim as much as any Nord's, don't you think?
string: それでも他のノルド達と同じように、私にもスカイリムの防衛に協力する義務があるわ。そう思わない？

original: My life's work. Unraveling one of the great mysteries of the dwarves.
string: あたしの一生の仕事だよ。ドワーフの偉大な謎の一つを解明する事

original: Good to see a new face here. Especially one that isn't attached to an elf.
string: 新顔が訪ねてくるのは嬉しい事だ。エルフの顔じゃないとなれば、なおさらの事

original: Oh, come now... spare me your notions of kinship.
string: これはこれは、我々の間柄を誤解してはいまいか？

original: Oh, very well. I don't know how you expect me to keep this place in order when I can't make a profit.
string: そうかい。利益を上げずに店を経営しろとか言うんじゃないだろうな？

original: Well met, friend.
string: やあ友よ

original: I serve my master's will.
string: 主様の仰せのとおりに

original: Where do you want to go?
string: どこに行きたいんだ？

original: The sky is so dark. What does it mean?
string: 空がこんなに暗いわ。どういう意味なの？

original: I have made the Moth Priest my thrall.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を下僕にした

original: How many do you need?
string: いくつ必要なんだ？

original: The secret of the bow's power is written elsewhere. I think there is more to the prophecy, recorded in other scrolls.
string: 弓の力の秘密はどこか別のところに書かれている。他の書に記録された予言の続きがあるようだ

original: Nothing you can't handle.
string: 楽勝だろ

original: Ah, yes. That. There were... well, complications.
string: ああ、そうでした。実はその… ちょっと面倒がありまして

original: So, you've returned.
string: ほう、戻ったのか

original: Precisely! The people will put pressure on the Dawnguard who are apparently murdering their fellows without provocation.
string: そのとおり！ 理由もなく市民を殺す事に対して、ドーンガードに対する風向きは強くなるはずだ

original: What he fails to realize is how much attention would be called to our kind if the prophecy came to fruition.
string: 彼が理解していないのは、お告げが実現した場合に私達の同類がどれほど関心を持つかという事よ

original: Why wouldn't Isran like me asking about Florentius?
string: どうしてフロレンティウスのことを聞くとイスランが嫌がるんだ？

original: Isran needs your help.
string: イスランが力を借りたがっている

original: I worry it'll never be safe to go home.
string: 二度と安全に家へ帰れないのかしら

original: So now what?
string: お次は？

original: The reason I'm standing in front of you as only a whisper of my former self should tell you that.
string: こうして声だけでお前に語りかけているのを見りゃ分かるだろ

original: You there, hold fast!
string: そこのお前、待て！

original: Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
string: 父に仕えている人？

original: Tell me again about being a Vampire Lord.
string: 吸血鬼の王の力についてもう一度聞きたい

original: I need someone out in the field, taking the fight to the damn vampires, while we're getting the fort back into shape...
string: 我々が砦を再建してる間に、外の世界で吸血鬼達に戦いを挑む者が必要なんだ

original: The vampires were looking for a woman trapped in Dimhollow.
string: 吸血鬼らは、ディムホロウ墓地に閉じ込められた女性を探していた

original: How do you serve Lord Harkon?
string: ハルコン卿にはどのように仕えているのか？

original: Since it's your first time... sure. Find a booth and enjoy.
string: まあ、ここは初めてみたいだし… いいわ。空いてる部屋を見つけて楽しんで

original: We may feed again today.
string: 今日はまた食事にありつける

original: My desire to speak with you was born from the result of our battle, Qahnaarin.
string: 戦いの果てに、言葉を交わしたいと思ったのだよ、クァーナーリン

original: Then how are you sure they even exist?
string: だとしたら、どうしてそいつらが実在すると確信がもてる？

original: I murdered others for money. And before you think I belonged to some romantic or secretive guild, think again.
string: 金のために人も殺った。何かロマンチックな秘密結社の類に属していたと思うなら、それは大間違い

original: Greetings, master. What do you need?
string: 主様、ご用は何ですか？

original: Destroying the head vampire is usually sufficient to scatter its minions, though it's best to destroy every last one of them.
string: 大抵は頭目格の吸血鬼を倒せば手下どもは四散するが、最後の1体まで根絶やしにするのが最善ではある

original: These Vigilants never know when to give up. I thought we'd taught them enough of a lesson at their hall.
string: 番人どももあきらめが悪いな。番人の間で思い知らせてやったつもりが

original: Still over half the pages are missing. Keep trying.
string: まだ原稿は半分残ってる。頑張って探してくれ

original: I wonder what happened to them.
string: 彼らに一体何があったのかしら

original: I imagine you know why we're here.
string: ここに来た理由は、言うまでもないんだろうな

original: Arvak!  Where are you, boy?
string: アルヴァク！ どこにいるんだい？

original: While the blessed state of undeath can be "accidentally" conferred - consider the brutish creatures you find wailing in dank hovels in the wild...
string: 不死の祝福は“図らずも”授けられるが… 荒野のジメジメしたあばら屋で泣き叫ぶ野蛮な者達を見てみなよ…

original: My best beloved! I never knew the night held such vibrant color, or that the air vibrated so. And at times, it's as if the very shadows whisper.
string: 最愛の人よ！ 夜がこれほどまでに鮮やかな色を秘め、大気がこうも活き活きとしているなんて！ そして時には、影そのものがささやきかけてくるかのよう…

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: This is my hunting ground.
string: ここは私の狩り場だ

original: Because he himself bestowed upon you a portion of his vitality when he infused you with his own blood the night you returned with Serana.
string: 彼自身が君に彼の力の一部を授けたからだよ。セラーナと一緒に戻ってきた夜に、彼の血を君はもらっただろう

original: It wasn't always like this. Best-preserved dwarven city I'd ever laid eyes on. And then... the earthquake hit.
string: ずっとこうだったわけじゃない。かつて見た中で最も保存状態のいいドワーフの都市だった。その後… 地震が起きたんだよ

original: Auriel is one of the elven gods. He's with the rest of them in Aetherius.
string: アーリエルはエルフの神の一人ですわ。彼ら神々はエセリウスにおりますの

original: I'll bring you everything we have on them, but it's not much.
string: それに関しては我々が持っているすべてを授けよう。だが、あまり大した量ではない

original: Come with me, "bard."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“吟遊詩人”よ

original: Gaan...
string: ガーン…

original: As well you should have.
string: お前もそうするべきだった

original: Climb on in the boat and get comfortable.
string: 船に乗ってくつろいでくれ

original: Do you have any insights about your Elder Scroll reading?
string: 星霜の書の解読について何か気づいたことは？

original: It was the Betrayed... they did something to him, I just don't know why Auri-El would allow this to happen.
string: 裏切られし者の仕業であろうな… 奴らに何かされたのだ。アーリエルはなぜこんな事を許すのだろうか

original: Almost...
string: あと少しだよ…

original: Stay back!
string: お下がりになって！

original: The sun is gone! We're all doomed!
string: 太陽が消えた！ 皆破滅だ！

original: This won't end well for you!
string: ろくな結果になりませんわよ！

original: Potions my friend, potions! Possibly some spells. Maybe some other things I've forgotten about. Actually I'm not sure. Let's see, shall we?
string: 薬、そう薬だ！ 呪文もあるかも知れない。思い出せないが、他のものも。実は自分でもはっきり分からない。ちょっと見てみよう

original: I was hoping you might want to talk about it.
string: そのことについて話せるかと思って…

original: Our friend here has been ordered to fill the Chalice.
string: この友人が聖杯を満たすよう命じられた

original: Half the people in your little crew would just as soon kill me as talk to me.
string: あなたのお仲間さん達の半数は、わたしと話すくらいなら殺そうとするでしょうね

original: Yes, it is, and it's mine.
string: ええ。わたしのものですわ

original: Rocks and valley, crevices and hiding places. This is the kind of place where hermits and fanatics dwell.
string: 岩がちな谷間と、裂け目だらけで身をひそめる場所に事欠かない地形。世捨て人や狂信者が住むにはうってつけの場所ですわね

original: So this is what it's like on the other side.
string: 世界の裏側って、こんな感じなのか

original: Feel the last word of Soul Tearing within yourself: "Zol" - the unlife that results when a soul is imprisoned in dead flesh.
string: ソウル・ティアリングの最後の一語、“ゾル”を感じよ。魂が死した肉体に幽閉された時に生じる、不死の事だ

original: That's why our leader Isran is reestablishing the Dawnguard. Real, serious vampire hunters.
string: ゆえに我らの長であるイスランが、本格的な吸血鬼ハンターの組織であるドーンガードを再興させつつある

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: Well, once the Initiate's enlightenment was complete, he'd bring the ewer to the Chantry's Inner Sanctum.
string: 新人が完全に悟りを開くと、水差しを持って最奥聖域に向かう事になっていたのだ

original: You're not a vampire anymore?
string: 吸血鬼ではなくなったのか？

original: And you...
string: お前は…

original: Does it bother you that we're working against your father?
string: 父親を出し抜こうとしているのは気にならないのか？

original: Have you ever seen anything like this?
string: このようなもの、今まで見たことあるか？

original: Good. I knew I was sending the right woman for the job.
string: いいぞ。仕事の人選は間違ってなかったようだな

original: Turns out my mother was sneakier than I thought. I wonder what she's hiding?
string: 母は思ったよりも隠し事をなさる人でしたのね。一体何をしまいこんでいたのかしら？

original: Follow me. I'll take you to it.
string: ついて来い。案内しよう

original: Oh. I... I see.
string: ああ… そうですのね

original: Take care.
string: 気を付けて

original: No, and I'm not going to waste men looking. We're fighting a war against your kind, and I intend to win it.
string: ダメだ。そんな事に人員を割くのは無理だ。我々は君達の種族と戦ってるんだぞ。そして私はその戦いに勝つつもりでいる

original: Our empire had temples to some of the other deities: Trinimac, Syrabane, Jephre and Phynaster rounded out the rest.
string: 我々の帝国には、他の信仰も根づいていた。トリニマック、シラベイン、イェフレ、フィナスタール、挙げればきりがない

original: The old water cistern. On some days, this would smell just... be glad you weren't here then.
string: 古い貯水池ですわ。ここの臭いときたら日によっては… 言わぬが花というものですわね

original: When I fled Castle Volkihar, I fled with two Elder Scrolls.
string: ヴォルキハル城を脱出した時、二つの星霜の書を持ち出したわ

original: It is the great spire at the heart of the Imperial City, among the tallest towers in all of Tamriel.
string: 帝都の中心部にある巨大な塔だ。タムリエルで最も高い塔のひとつだよ

original: What turned your people into the Betrayed?
string: 同胞たちが裏切られし者に変貌した理由は？

original: Should your husband go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 夫がいなくなったらどうする？ 一緒に住むのが耐えられなくなって… その… バケモノとね

original: I was hoping to feed.
string: 食事にありつけると思ったのに

original: You made a pact with Molag Bal?
string: モラグ・バルと契約を結んだのか？

original: Stay here. I'll go check it out if you open the door back up.
string: ここにいらして。後ろの扉が開くかどうか見てきますわ

original: Watch yourself. This bear is vicious.
string: 用心しろ。実に凶暴なクマだ

original: You sure? They might prove useful.
string: そうか？ 役に立つかもしれない

original: Ooh, good. I was just starting to get bored.
string: わあ、素敵。待つのに退屈してたところよ

original: Honestly, I don't know. Necromancers are always interested in souls, though, so that probably has some kind of interest.
string: 正直分かりませんけど、死霊術師は誰でも魂をほしがりますから、同様の何かがあるのかも知れませんわね

original: Do you... do you need anything, Feran?
string: 何かその… 必要なものはないですか、フェラン？

original: Wait... that almost makes sense!
string: お待ちになって… きっとそうですわ！

original: It became quickly apparent that the best way I could help would be by wiping out the cliff racers.
string: どうすりゃいいかはすぐに分かった。クリフ・レーサーを壊滅させるのが一番だって

original: I'll not aid a vampire. Not even you. Get yourself cured, or you're dead to me.
string: 吸血鬼の手助けはしない。たとえあんたでもな。治してからきてくれ

original: I think both of our parents have failed us. Just you and me against the world, now.
string: わたし達二人とも、親に捨てられたのですわ。一緒にこの世界へ立ち向かいましょう

original: Blood of the sick. Blood of the weak. Blood of the unsuspecting noble lord. Savor each flavor. Unsuspecting, delicious prey.
string: 病人の血。弱者の血。無防備な貴族の血。それぞれの味を楽しむわ。疑う事を知らない、美味な獲物

original: My business is my own. Just tell me what I need to know.
string: こちらの問題だ。質問に答えるだけにしてくれ

original: Just one gyro. One, and I can get back to work. Where are they?
string: ジャイロ1個でいいのよ。1個あれば、仕事に戻れるのに。どこにあるのかしら？

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: I don't want to step on anyone's toes. Come back to me when you're alone.
string: 人が嫌がる事はいたしませんわ。寂しくなったら、お戻りになられて

original: Very good. That's one less monster we need to worry about.
string: よし。悩みの種の化け物を1体減らせたな

original: I think we both know... it's time to face my father.
string: わたし達二人とも分かっているはずでしてよ… 父と対決する時が来た事を

original: The restoration of this wayshrine means that Vyrthur must be dead and the Betrayed no longer have control over him.
string: この祠が再建されたという事は、ヴィルスールは死に、裏切られし者に操られる事もなくなったわけだ

original: I don't feel... right... I'm going to lay down... for awhile...
string: 何か… おかしい… 少しの間… 横になるよ…

original: The power is growing within you, and now you must learn to wield it.
string: 体の中で育ちつつある力の、使い方をおぼえる必要がある

original: There you are. Looks like this place has been cleaned out. At least the shard is still here...
string: そこにいたんだね。この場所は空っぽみたいだけど、少なくともまだとっかかりはある…

original: Maker... it can't be. Serana?!
string: 神よ… まさか。セラーナ！？

original: I can't say that I'm surprised by your answer. Until I get my second volume published, no one will ever know of my achievements.
string: 驚くような事じゃないぞ。手記の第二巻を出版するまで、我が偉業は誰も知らなかったのであるからして

original: I'm ready when you are.
string: 準備はできておりますわ

original: Let's not revisit that.
string: 思い出したくもありませんの

original: What? Are you certain?
string: 何ですって？ 確かなの？

original: Well done! I trust you'll put those to good use then.
string: よくやった！ 君ならきっと有効に利用してくれるはずだ

original: There's an unused inlet on the northern side of the island that was used by the previous owners to bring supplies into the castle.
string: 島の北側に放棄された入り江がありますの。前の所有者達が城に荷物を持ち込む時に使っていた場所なのですけれど

original: Was there something else?
string: 他に何かあった？

original: Figures I'd be woken by a couple of know-nothings. So where are we off to, now?
string: つまり、何も知らない人達に起こされたわけですのね。それで、これからどこに行きますの？

original: Praise Arkay!
string: アーケイばんざい！

original: It sounds like she did everything for your sake.
string: すべては君のためにやったんじゃないのか？

original: Not only that, but Auriel's Bow is in safe hands.
string: それだけではなく、アーリエルの弓も確保したんだな

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: The Dawnguard are apparently focused on exterminating vampires, noble and brute alike.
string: ドーンガードは吸血鬼の根絶に重点を置いている、貴族もけだものも一様にな

original: The Dawnguard would want me to kill you.
string: ドーンガードは君を殺せと言うだろう

original: Well, I'll be out of your hair soon enough.
string: 離れますわね

original: Come on. We can talk about this another time.
string: 行きましょう。この話はいつでもできましてよ

original: Whatever is required! I am happy to do whatever is asked of me. I only wish to be useful.
string: どんな事でも喜んで！ とにかく役に立ちたいんだ

original: Arvak! Arvak, where are you? Arvak, please come back! Come back!
string: アルヴァク！ どこにいるんだ？ アルヴァク、頼むから戻ってきてくれ！

original: You try my patience, <Alias=QuestGiver>.
string: 我慢の限界を試されている気分だ、<Alias=QuestGiver>

original: Well, well. You made it. Good. Isran's in the fort. He'll get you sorted out.
string: おお、無事に着いたか。イスランは砦にいる。話せば色々分かるはずだ

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: If you need some help, I'm ready.
string: わたしの力が必要でしたら、いつでも準備できてましてよ

original: Is this a dwarven city? I can't believe they'd let it get so run down.
string: これがドワーフの都市？ こんなに荒れ放題なんて信じられませんわ…

original: Nice castle you've got here.
string: なかなか素敵な城だな

original: I command you to travel to Castle Volkihar.
string: ヴォルキハル城に行け

original: This is Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦だ

original: It's important that I find him right away. (Persuade)
string: すぐにその彼を見つけないといけない(説得)

original: Ah, you are here. Good.
string: おお、来たのか。よいぞ

original: I mean... as much as anyone. Not a lot.
string: 人並みには。それほどではありませんわ

original: But not me! I knew it all along!
string: だが、俺は違う！ ずっと信じていた！

original: Anyway, my mother and I didn't feel like inviting a war with all of Tamriel, so we tried to stop him. That's why I was sealed away with the Scroll.
string: とにかく、母とわたしは全タムリエルとの戦争を引き起こす気にはなれず、止めようとしたのです。だからこそ星霜の書と共に埋められていたのですわ

original: Come on, I think it's over here.
string: ついて来て、こっちだと思うよ

original: Sometimes we venture out into the world in search of more scrolls for our library at the White-Gold Tower.
string: 白金の塔の書庫に加える巻物を探して、時に我々は世界中を旅する事もある

original: It's ruled by unseen beings known as the Ideal Masters.
string: そこはアイディール・マスターと呼ばれる不可視の存在達が支配する場所ですの

original: There's no hiding from me...
string: 私から隠れられると思うな…

original: I have nothing more to say to you.
string: もう話す事はないよ

original: The Tyranny of the Sun requires Serana's blood?
string: 太陽の専制の成就にはセラーナの血が必要なのか？

original: Congratulations, friend. You've won a well-deserved victory here.
string: おめでとう、尽力の甲斐ある勝利だったな

original: I'll scatter your ashes myself!
string: 風に舞う塵となれ！

original: I promise to try and make this as painless as possible. Hold still.
string: なるべく痛くないようにいたしますわね。そのまま動かないで…

original: Where do you expect me to go?
string: どこに行けばいいのだ？

original: I don't know what a Moth Priest is, but I did see an old man in a robe not long ago. He was riding in a wagon with some Imperial guards.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が何かは知らないけど、ローブを着たおじいさんならこの間見たよ。帝国軍の衛兵と一緒に荷馬車に乗ってた

original: Then go forth, child. May the enrichment of Auri-El strengthen your resolve as you undertake your journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: さあ、行くがいい。アーリエルの力が汝の意思をさらに強くし、最奥聖域への道のりを助けるだろう

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: Let's check that out.
string: 調べてみましょう

original: So you sought the Soul Cairn for answers.
string: そのため答えを求めてソウル・ケルンに来たと

original: Arkay's never clear on life and death. Is she still alive? There's always hope...
string: アーケイは生や死をはっきり言わない。彼女は生きてるのか？ まだ希望はあるはずだ…

original: "The Winking Skeever." Charming name.
string: “ウィンキング・スキーヴァー”。チャーミングな名前ですわね

original: Alright. Now take note. He'll mind you and us Dawnguard, but there's no accounting for other folk.
string: さて、心得ておいてほしいのは、お前や我々ドーンガードには気を遣ってくれるが、それ以外に対しては分からないって事だ

original: You want us to help you?
string: 手を貸してほしいと？

original: That's the last time I argue with a dremora.
string: ドレモラと言い争いになったのは、あれが最後だな

original: My lord! Everyone! Serana has returned!
string: 主様！ みんな！ セラーナが戻ったぞ！

original: So this is where your Vigilants came from? No wonder you look so lost all the time.
string: となると、ここがあなた達番人の本拠ですの？ あなたがいつも途方に暮れたような顔してるのも無理ありませんわね

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: We've got enough to worry about right now. You stay focused, and I'll worry about me.
string: 今は他の問題がたくさんありましてよ。それに集中しなくては。わたしもわたしの問題に集中いたしますわ

original: I understand the concern.
string: 理解できる懸念だ

original: He'll tell you what a monster I am, that I can't be trusted... You mark my words, it's him you need to worry about.
string: 我（われ）がいかに人でなしで、信用に値しないか… とか言ってくるだろうが、警戒すべきなのは奴の方だからな！

original: In a manner of speaking.
string: そういう言い方もできる

original: What do you know about the Elder Scrolls?
string: 星霜の書について教えてほしい

original: We can't waste time on cryptic clues.
string: 謎めいた手掛かりに割いている時間はない

original: No. He has to die. We have no choice.
string: ありませんわね。彼は死ぬべきですわ。他に道はなくてよ

original: Now that the Dawnguard are back, the vampires' reign of terror is about to end.
string: ドーンガードが戻った今、吸血鬼の恐怖支配が終わるのも間近だ

original: If I had foreseen the value they placed on my own soul, I would never have come here.
string: もし彼らが私自身の魂に置いた価値を予見していたら、ここには決して来なかったわ

original: Not that I ever saw.
string: 見た事はございませんの

original: Lord Harkon will finally have his wish... to see the prophecy fulfilled. Then we will all benefit.
string: いずれハルコン卿の望みが叶い、予言が成就する。そうなればみんなが得をするんだ

original: And instead you found me. So what's your next step, now that I'm here?
string: 代わりにわたしを見つけたわけですのね。それで、次はどうしますの？ わたしはここにおりますのよ？

original: Let's sate our hunger together.
string: 共に飢えを満たすとしよう

original: Well, I assume so. It cast a spell at me from some kind of strange black crystal.
string: 多分な。不気味な黒い水晶みたいなもので呪文をかけられたんだ

original: It's... it's true. It's all true! Come on, let's check it out!
string: 本物だ… まさしく本物だよ！ さあ、確かめよう！

original: Not bad. Not bad at all.
string: いける、いける

original: Don't get yourself killed!
string: 殺されるのを待ってちゃダメ！

original: When I was tossed in here I felt myself falling... and I dropped the pages I had been holding.
string: ここに送られた時、すっ転んだような気がする。その時、持っていた原稿を手放してしまったんだ

original: Harkon disbelieved in their existence, though perhaps he felt slighted they were not already in his possession and only feigns indifference.
string: ハルコン自身はその存在を疑ってるよ。でも多分、彼はアミュレットが自分のものではない事が気に食わないんだ。だから無関心を装ってるのさ

original: You're new here, so I'll explain this once. You feed from the thralls as much as you like. You kill them, and I'll split you in half.
string: ここは不慣れだろうから、一度だけ説明する。従徒どもの血は好きなだけ飲んでくれていいが、殺したりしたらお前を引き裂いてやるからな

original: I'd read stories about the Solitude windmill, but I didn't expect it to be that big!
string: ソリチュードの風車の事は本で読んだことがありますけれど、まさかあんなに大きいなんて！

original: Trust me. I lived in that castle for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: お任せあれ。あの城には長い間住んでいましたから、あそこの事なら隅から隅まで知っていますの

original: Please, take the bow... it's yours.
string: この弓はお前のものだ… 持っていってくれ

original: Kill the abominations!
string: 化け物どもを殺せ！

original: Let's keep moving. I feel like we're being watched.
string: 先に進みましょう。誰かに見張られてる気がいたしますの

original: The Ideal Masters have charged him with overseeing the Keepers, and will undoubtedly investigate the fact that the barrier has fallen.
string: アイディール・マスターに、番人を監視する任務を負わされているの。きっと障壁が破れた事実を調査するはずよ

original: Get rid of this interloper and you and I can be on our way.
string: この侵入者をどうにかして、出発はそれからですわね

original: For the time being I will remain here, on the overlook and continue trying to keep the Sanctum free of the Betrayed.
string: しばらくはこの見張り台に残って、裏切られし者から聖域を守る仕事を続けるつもりだ

original: There's so much to do. I'm going to head out and start tracking things down. We'll meet again, I'm sure of it.
string: やる事は山ほどある。出発して色々探し始めよう。また会おうね、必ずだよ

original: We have to keep my mother alive!
string: お母様を守りますのよ！

original: I will be happy to assist you with your Elder Scroll. Just tell me where I need to go.
string: 星霜の書の事なら喜んで協力するよ。行くべき場所があればどこだろうと言ってくれ

original: His ambition will justify any actions. Put your faith in him, and you will regret it, I promise you.
string: 彼の野望はどんな行動でも正当化するだろう。信頼したら後悔するよ。本当さ

original: Mother!
string: お母様！

original: No, I don't think so.
string: いや、違うと思う

original: Florentius? Really? I assumed Isran would want nothing to do with him.
string: フロレンティウスだと？ イスランが関わりたがるとは思えないが

original: I don't suppose you have some good news for me.
string: いい知らせは多分ないんだろうな

original: The <Alias=Boss> at <Alias=Dungeon> has been dealt with.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Boss>を片付けた

original: Now that I think on it, I did see your priest.
string: よく考えたら、確かにその司祭を見たよ

original: We're looking for some Vampires that have been reported in the area. Seen any?
string: この一帯にいるらしいという吸血鬼を探している。見かけなかったか？

original: And take this as well. Seeing as Saint Jiub has ascended to pure spiritual form, I won't need it any longer.
string: それと、こいつもくれてやろう。この聖ジウブが真の精霊に姿を変えた以上、もう必要のないものだ

original: ...I won't hide down here forever... gather a few of the brethren, we'll strike out on our own...
string: …ずっとここに隠れているつもりはない… 仲間を集め、打って出てやる…

original: That's close enough, fool. Now you die!
string: バカめ、近づきすぎたな。死ね！

original: A strange race, these Falmer.
string: 変わった種族ですわ、このファルメルというのは

original: Can I use your blood, then?
string: 血を使わせてくれるのか？

original: Of course I do. What do you want?
string: もちろんさ。何がほしいんだ？

original: Alas, the vampire can cloud the minds of those he preys upon. It won't be easy to convince anyone he's other than he appears.
string: 吸血鬼は獲物の精神をくもらせる力をもつ。奴の正体を人に信じさせるのは容易な事ではない

original: Well, you've met most of us. My father's not exactly the most stable, and eventually he drove my mother crazy with him.
string: 会った事がおありでしょう。父があまりに頑固で、そのせいで母をひどく怒らせたのですわ

original: Isran found something for you to do, eh? I thought he'd like you. Good luck!
string: イスランから何か言いつかったのかい？ あんたなら気に入られると思っていたよ。幸運を！

original: Where is this "Darkfall Cave?"
string: その“ダークフォール洞窟”はどこにあるの？

original: Orthjolf, for example. He'll tell you he means well, but believe me, he can't be trusted at all.
string: 例えばオースユルフがそうだ。善人ぶってるけど、実はまったく信用できない。本当だよ

original: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
string: ホワイトランの家に住めばいい

original: Begone! You're not welcome here!
string: 立ち去れ！ お前の来る所じゃない！

original: Stendarr grant that you do not have to face the same test and be found wanting.
string: そちらが同じ試練にさらされ、力不足が判明しないよう、ステンダールのご加護あれ

original: Heard anything about a Moth Priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Not... yet...
string: まだ… まだだ…

original: None of the others ever made it this far.
string: ここまで来られた奴は他にいないよ

original: Any idea how to get out of here?
string: ここから出る方法は？

original: Oh, absolutely. But my mother's not a coward.
string: そのとおりですわ。でも母は卑怯者ではございませんの

original: This place tears at me as though I'm still alive and being drawn and quartered. I... can't stand it anymore.
string: この場所は苦しみばかり。まるでまだ生きていて、体を引き裂かれるような… これ以上は耐えられない

original: If eternal night fell, there are many who wouldn't stand for it. They would raise armies in attempts to return things to normal.
string: 永遠の夜が訪れれば、それに我慢できない者達が大勢現れる。彼らは軍隊を召集し、事態を普通に戻そうとするでしょう

original: I'd be happy to, but your purse is lighter than you think.
string: 応じたいのも山々だが、財布が思いの他軽いようだな

original: Wow.
string: わあぁ…

original: Scions of the night! Hear my words!
string: 夜の末えい達よ！ 我が言葉を聞け！

original: Living here, I have access to magic I couldn't possibly imagine before.
string: ここに住んでると、以前は想像もできなかった魔法にお目にかかれるよ

original: It's not a question of trust... he's just obsessed with the prophecy.
string: 信頼うんぬんの問題ではなくて… 父は予言一辺倒になってしまったの

original: Knowing him, anything at all that reminded him of her was just destroyed.
string: 父の性分を考えると、母を思い出させるあらゆる要素が破壊されたでしょうね

original: Now tell me, whom do you represent, and what do you want with me?
string: さて、教えてくれ。君は誰の使いで私に何の用があるんだ？

original: Let me show you what I need.
string: 探しているものがある

original: I'll take you to the monster you're hunting. (Persuade)
string: 狙っている怪物のところに案内しよう(説得)

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of necromancers. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 野蛮な血の者が死霊術師の一団と一緒に潜伏したわ。おそらく同族の隠れ場所を作りたいのね

original: He's holed up with a group of a bandits.
string: 山賊の一団と共に立てこもっている

original: Where are you?
string: どこにいる！

original: Let's finish this!
string: 終わらせてやる！

original: It... it was you? You created that prophecy?
string: あれは… あなたでしたの？ あなたがあの予言を創り出したと？

original: As far as I've heard, no one's seen them and returned to Tamriel to tell about it.
string: 聞いた限りでは、それらを目にしてタムリエルに戻れた者はいないようですけれども

original: I've been pouring over some of the tomes left here in the keep. Interesting stories, indeed.
string: この書庫に残されていた書物をひっくり返して調べてみた。非常に興味深い話だったよ

original: She says she lives in a castle near Solitude.
string: ソリチュードの近くにある城に住んでいるとか

original: So you'll help us?
string: 手を貸してくれると？

original: You dare defy me?
string: 私に歯向かうつもりか？

original: I've allowed my hatred of your father to estrange us for too long. Forgive me.
string: あまりに長い間、あなたの父への憎悪に任せて疎遠になってしまった。どうか許して

original: I think you'll need to find some arrows, first. Only elven ones will work for this, remember?
string: まずは矢を見つけないといけませんわ。使えるのはエルフの矢だけですわよ、覚えてまして？

original: Arkay, we're going to need your help more than ever.
string: アーケイ、これまでにないほど、あなたの力が必要になりそう

original: You have done well.
string: よくやってくれた

original: You hate him that much?
string: そこまで憎んでいるのか？

original: I'm looking for a vampire.
string: 吸血鬼を探している

original: You know more than I do now. Arkay has us both beaten, but he's not giving up all his secrets.
string: もう、教えられる事はない。アーケイはもっと知ってるが、秘密は明かさないだろう

original: Yeah.
string: ですわね

original: What happens now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: Of course. Hasn't everyone?
string: もちろん。誰だってそうだろう？

original: "The Tale of the Great Moth Priest Hunt." Not something I'd want to read.
string: 「聖蚕僧侶戦記」。わたしの趣味とは違いますわね

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: I do, but you can't leave that way.
string: 自分が知ってる方法ではあなたは出られない

original: Where are you!
string: どこにいる！

original: All right, here we go.
string: いいですわ、行きましょう

original: And that's any of your business because... ?
string: そちらに関係のある話なのか？

original: The bow! Use the bow!
string: 弓ですわ！ 弓を使って！

original: Oh... damn it...
string: ああ… 何て事ですの…

original: Sure, got plenty. What am I gonna' do with it?
string: もちろんたくさん持ってるよ。何に使うとするかな？

original: He'll help you get around this wretched place, but I'm sure he'd be much happier someplace sunnier.
string: あいつがいれば、このろくでもない土地を動き回るのに便利だよ。もっと明るい所の方が喜ぶけどね

original: If you're here for business, go ahead. Otherwise, get lost.
string: 仕事があるなら構わないが、そうじゃなきゃ消えな

original: As you desire.
string: 望むならな

original: Arkay and I will take care of the little ones! You find the leader!
string: 雑魚はアーケイと俺が引き受ける！ お前はリーダーを探せ！

original: If you want to waste your time, that's fine. But I've got my own destination in mind. Maybe you could help me get there when you're done?
string: 時間を無駄にしたいなら、それでも構いませんわ。ですが、わたしはわたしで行きたい所がありますの。あなたの用事が終わったら、連れて行って頂けません事？

original: Are you ready now?
string: 用意はいいかしら？

original: Oh, wonderful. A war of succession. Good to know the world didn't get boring while I was gone.
string: なるほど、後継者争いですわね。わたしがいない間に世の中が退屈になっていなくて安心いたしましたわ

original: I disagree.
string: 賛成できかねますわ

original: And what happens when you've slain me? Is Valerica next? Is Serana?
string: 私を倒したらどうするのだ？ 次はヴァレリカか？ セラーナか？

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: Sorry, but that Moth Priest's comings and goings are none of my business, and none of yours either.
string: 悪いがその聖蚕の僧侶がどこから来てどこに行こうが、こっちには関係のない話さ。あんたにもな

original: We may never return.
string: 二度と戻らないかもしれない

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: All right, then. Hold still.
string: なら構いませんわね。じっとしてて

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: Are you trying to get my attention?
string: 何か言いたいことでも？

original: Fight bravely, friend.
string: 戦いは勇敢であれ

original: What do you mean by "discreet."
string: “慎重に”とは？

original: You're back, good! So, what happened?
string: 戻ったか、よかった！ それで、どうなったんだ？

original: What trickery is this?
string: 何の茶番だこれは？

original: He took the road southwest out of town, and said he was going to be crossing over the Dragon Bridge. That's all that he told me. I hope it helps.
string: そいつは町を出て南西に向かったよ。ドラゴン・ブリッジを渡ると言ってな。それ以上の事は教えてくれなかった。お役に立てたならいいが

original: No, I am alive only because the vampires spared me.
string: 自分が生きているのは吸血鬼達に見逃してもらったからだ

original: Oh. All right then. You know where to find me.
string: そう。結構ですわよ。わたしの居場所はご存知ですわね

original: Keep your neck covered!
string: 喉笛をさらさないように！

original: It is the greatest token we can bestow upon those we love and wish to see protected.
string: 我々が愛し守るべき者達に捧げられる最高の贈り物をね

original: Ah, yes. I see. Well, if you do change your mind, please let me know.
string: そうか。まあ、気が変わったら教えてくれ

original: It is good to know that I will not have to do it alone. I am glad this Dawnguard exists.
string: 独りでやらなくていいのはありがたい。ドーンガードがいてよかった

original: That's actually a matter for debate.
string: それは意見が分かれるところかもしれない

original: That's easy to say, but I definitely didn't help things.
string: 口で言うのは簡単でしょうけれど、わたしにはどうする事もできませんでしたの

original: I found you equally worthy.
string: こちらも互角の相手だと感じた

original: Incredible. Simply incredible.
string: すごい。ただただすごいですわ

original: Nobody. I just walked in here.
string: 別に誰でもない。たまたま通りがかっただけだ

original: Just be sure to keep your eyes open and your guard up.
string: 目を見張って、気を抜かないようにさえしてくれれば

original: Until next time.
string: ではまた

original: Did you really come here expecting to claim Auriel's Bow?
string: ここに来ればアーリエルの弓が手に入ると、本気で思ったのか？

original: These people were... why would anyone want to set up camp here?
string: この人達は… どうしてここでキャンプを張ろうとしたのかしら…

original: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
string: それが何を意味するかはまだ分からないが、突き止めてみよう。おそらく吸血鬼達がほしがるものを彼女が持ってるか、彼女自身が重要なのかのどちらかだろう

original: Unf!
string: フン！

original: Take me near the castle to the west. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge> gold)
string: 西の城へと渡してほしい(<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge>ゴールド)

original: Hiding with the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードと共に隠れている？

original: This leads out to the courtyard. Just head for the door.
string: ここを行けば中庭に出ますわ。まっすぐ扉に向かって

original: Beautiful. That staff... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの杖… 非の打ちどころがない

original: Look, you're great. Really. But I just don't think that's for us.
string: ええ、あなたは素晴らしい方だと思いますわ。でも、それはわたし達の話ではありませんのよ

original: Excellent. That should prevent the problem from escalating.
string: 素晴らしい。これで問題の悪化を防げるだろう

original: Spiders? All right, we can handle this. Come on!
string: スパイダー？ 相手にはできるね。行くよ！

original: Where did these rings come from?
string: それらの指輪の出どころは？

original: Guards! Kill her!
string: 傭兵ども！ 奴の頭をねじ切れ！

original: Then let's face him, together.
string: 共に彼と対決しよう

original: What do you want now?
string: 望みは何だ？

original: Every Moth Priest is taught this ritual, but few ever get the chance to perform it... you should consider yourself fortunate if it works for you.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶はみんなこの儀式について教わるが、実行する者はほとんどいない… うまくいったら幸いだよ

original: Stand aside.
string: どけ

original: Look around for the missing crests. Even in this mess, they should stick out.
string: なくなっているクレストを探しますのよ。これだけ散らかっていても、あれは目立つはずですわ

original: It's not that simple. I guess it never is with families, is it?
string: そんな簡単な話ではございませんの。家族は関係ないと思いませんこと？

original: I... I can't really tell.
string: わたしには… 何とも言えませんわ

original: By the Divines, this couldn't get much worse. This is more than you and I can handle.
string: おお神々よ、こいつは最悪だ。私と君の手には負えないな

original: The first vampire came from Molag Bal. She... was not a willing subject. But she was still the first.
string: 最初の吸血鬼はモラグ・バルから生まれましたの。その彼女は… 自ら望んだのではなかった。けれども彼女は真祖となった

original: I will resist you, monster. I must!
string: バケモノめ、お前の言いなりにはならないぞ。絶対に！

original: Haran manages the inn in Winterhold. A forsaken place under the shadow of the mages guild. She will help us keep an eye on the mages.
string: ハランはウィンターホールドで宿屋を営んでいる。魔術師ギルドの近くにある廃れたところだ。彼女が魔術師達を監視するのを手伝ってくれるだろう

original: All quiet now.
string: 物音がしないな

original: There you are!
string: そこだ！

original: Want to head out there and collect some more?
string: 他の図面も探してきてくれる気はない？

original: I can only assume the gates have been closed by now.
string: とうに門は閉じているとは思うけどね

original: I'll meet you in Dimhollow Crypt. I owe these vampires a debt of vengeance.
string: ディムホロウ墓地で合流しよう。吸血鬼どもに借りを返さないとな

original: If you listen closely when you find the glade, you should be able to hear their song... a soft, harmonious trilling.
string: 先人の湿地を見つけたら、耳を澄ませる。すると彼らの歌が聞こえるだろう… 優しくて調和のとれた歌声が

original: Good, let's get inside there. The sun is starting to get to me.
string: よかった。中に入りましょう。もう陽の光がそこまで来ていますわ

original: Must have run off.
string: 逃がしたみたいだな

original: So, if you'd be a dear and collect those plans for me?
string: その図面を持ってきてもらえたら、助かるんだけど？

original: It's like the world is alive again. Just like me.
string: わたしと一緒に、世界にも生命が戻ったような思いですわ

original: What do these rings do?
string: その指輪の効果は？

original: Fairly well, I'd say. I've managed to get this far without blowing myself up, I still have all my limbs...
string: かなりいいと思う。ここまでの開発で、爆発もしてないし、手足もちゃんと無事だし…

original: Still, its liquid is powerful, full of magic. Others have noticed, though they have never fully realized its potential.
string: それでも、強力で魔力にあふれる液体だ。気づいた者もいたが、その潜在力を十分には理解しなかった

original: You don't trust her, fine. Trust me. I believe her.
string: 彼女が信用できないと言うなら、彼女を信用しているこちらを信用してほしい

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: ガンマーに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: Vingalmo and Orthjolf both long for our Lord's throne, but cannot make overt moves against him.
string: ヴィンガルモとオースユルフは我らの主の玉座を切望している。だが露骨な行動は取れない

original: Ever since he decided to make that prophecy his calling, we kind of drifted apart.
string: あの予言を天命と見なして以来、疎遠になっていきましたわ

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: Who are the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: You brought that up before... I think I was a little short with you.
string: 前にもこの話をしましたね… わたし、ちょっと無愛想すぎでしたかしら

original: Oh no! What have I done?
string: ああ、とんでもない事を！

original: You risked everything to get Auri-El's Bow, and in turn, you've restored the Chantry.
string: すべてを投げ打ってアーリエルの弓を手に入れ、礼拝所を立て直してくれた

original: Fools? Why do you say that?
string: 愚かな者たち？ どうしてそう思う？

original: Coldharbour?
string: コールドハーバーとは？

original: Just get all of the ingredients into the vessel.
string: 材料をぜんぶ器に入れて下さいまし

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: Make it 3,000 and you have a deal. (Persuade)
string: 3000にまけてくれれば払おう(説得)

original: Maybe that's why I worked so hard to redeem myself once I was freed.
string: 脱獄した後、あれほど熱心に働いたのはその償いのためだろうな

original: Ran off, I suppose.
string: 逃げたのかな

original: By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
string: 我々の素性については娘から聞いている事だろう

original: I'm sorry, my friend. I can no longer be of use in this matter.
string: 悪いがこの件に関してはもうお役に立てないよ

original: Tell me about your family.
string: 家族について教えてほしい

original: It certainly seems the Vigilants of Stendarr can't help themselves. No surprise there.
string: ステンダールの番人は手詰まりのようだな。あの体たらくでは驚くに値しないが

original: Speak with Orthjolf. He has something for you.
string: オースユルフと話すといい。何かあるはずだ

original: The soul of a dragon is as resilient as its owner's scaly hide.
string: ドラゴンの魂は、それを宿すうろこ状の皮と同じぐらい回復力がある

original: Are you alright? That looked painful.
string: 大丈夫ですの？ 苦しそうでしたけど

original: I think it is, actually.
string: 実際、そうだと思いますわ

original: Ha. Isran's going to like you. He's up the hill in the fort. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.
string: ふっ、イスランに気に入られそうだな。彼は丘の上の砦にいる。ドーンガードにふさわしいかどうか、見てくれるだろう

original: I'm sorry, it's not that... it's just that I don't know who I can trust just yet.
string: ごめんなさい、他意はございませんの… 誰を信用していいのか、分からないのです

original: We need strength, power. Not magic. Elves don't seem to understand that.
string: 我々に必要なのは腕力と武力で、魔力じゃない。エルフどもはそこが理解できないようだ

original: Hello there.
string: やあ、こんにちは

original: Provided for me? Are you insane?
string: わたしのため？ 気は確かですの？

original: Home? Well, where is that? Some dusty crypt or frigid cave?
string: 家とは？ ほこりだらけの墓穴か、凍りついた洞窟？

original: Stop struggling. I'll give you a swift and beautiful death.
string: 悪あがきはやめなさい。そうすればひと思いに死なせてあげる

original: A song? I, uh... I seem to have misplaced my lute. Another time perhaps?
string: 歌を？ えっと… リュートをどこかに忘れてきたようだ。また今度でいいか？

original: My mother kept this a secret, even from me. She must have been up to something she thought was dangerous.
string: 母はこの事をわたしにさえ秘密にしていましたわ。きっと何か危ない事をやっていたのですわね

original: My offer is still a thousand. Did you want to sell?
string: 買い値は1000ゴールド、変わらないぞ。売ってくれるのか？

original: You had your chance to escape, vampire.
string: 逃げるチャンスがあったのに

original: Uh, my weapon? I mostly just use my pa's axe, when wolves are attacking the goats or something.
string: 武器？ 親父の斧だよ。ヤギが狼に襲われた時なんかに使うぐらいさ

original: It would be nice not to always be so thirsty.
string: 決して癒されない喉の渇きがなくなるのなら、いいかも知れませんわね

original: I used to help my mother tend a garden in the courtyard here.
string: 母がここの中庭の庭園を世話するのをよく手伝いましたわ

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Help!
string: 助けて！

original: Remember that Harkon isn't to be trusted. No matter what he promises, he'll deceive you in order to get what he wants.
string: ハルコンは信頼できないという事を覚えておいて。彼が何を約束しようと、望むものを得るためにはあなたを欺くわ

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: The moment I was infected by one of my own Initiates, Auri-El turned his back on me.
string: 弟子だった新人に感染させられたその瞬間から、アーリエルに見放されたのだ

original: Hhyyaarrggh!
string: はああー！

original: I commanded every vampire in the court to look for them, but after centuries of searching without success, I lost hope.
string: 配下の吸血鬼総出で行方を探したが、何百年かけて探っても手応えが得られず、私は絶望した

original: He'll cozy up to you, use his honeyed words to get you to lower your guard, then use you and throw you away when he's done with you.
string: 近づいてきて甘い言葉で油断させ、利用した上で用が済んだら捨て去るつもりだ

original: Look to the cities. Speak to innkeepers, carriage drivers, anyone who would meet a traveler.
string: 街に行き、宿屋の主人、馬車の御者、旅人に出会いそうな者達と話してこい

original: That would fit with the rest of it... I don't like it, but you did right to play along. We need to find out what this is all about.
string: それでしっくりくるな… 気に食わないが、君はうまくやってくれた。この件の真相を解明しよう

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Talk to Gunmar if you need materials.
string: 材料がほしかったら、ガンマーに言うといいわ

original: Kill that beast!
string: あいつを殺して！

original: I've collected all the Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 血の魔法の指輪をすべて集めた

original: I'm not sure whether that makes you brave or foolish. What brings you here?
string: 勇敢なのか向こう見ずなのか分からんな。ここにはどうして？

original: Come on. It's just around the side.
string: さあ。横手に回りましょう

original: I thought you were dead.
string: 死んだのかと思った

original: Yes, he said to meet him at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ああ、ドーンガード砦に来てくれと言っていた

original: Unless...
string: もしくは…

original: No... I won't let you ruin centuries of preparations...
string: やめろ… 何世紀もかけた計画を台なしにする気か…

original: What do you know about Elder Scrolls?
string: 星霜の書についてはどこまで？

original: But... with everything in my past, I don't think I could bring myself to go into a temple and ask for that kind of blessing.
string: でも… 自分の過去の事を考えると、聖堂に入って祝福を願うなんて、できそうもありませんわ

original: I'll kill Harkon.
string: ハルコンを殺すつもりだ

original: I'm impressed you could find a Moth Priest so quickly.
string: 驚いたな。聖蚕の僧侶をそんなに早く見つけるなんて

original: And so I'm going to give you a chance to get yourself cured.
string: 治療のチャンスをやろう

original: You'll be a welcome addition to the court, I'm sure.
string: 君はきっと喜んで宮廷に迎え入れられるだろう

original: We just need... we need help.
string: ただ… 我々は助けを必要としているだけだ

original: Your pathetic powers are no match for mine!
string: その程度の力で、勝てると思うな！

original: That... that wasn't me you were fighting.
string: あれは… 君と戦うつもりはなかったんだ

original: You Vigilants were never trained for...
string: 君達番人はまったく訓練を受けてないな…

original: I appreciate your concern for me, but Serana is all that I care about. You must keep her safe at all costs.
string: 心遣いに感謝するわ、でも私が心配なのはセラーナだけ。何としても彼女の安全を守ってちょうだい

original: Ah, if only your traitor mother were here, I would let her watch this reunion before putting her head on a spike.
string: 私を裏切ったお前の母親がこの場にいれば、この再会を見せてやったうえで頭から串刺しにしてやるのだが…

original: Is that what passes for security with your lot? I can't say that I'm feeling any more confident.
string: あれがあなた達にとっての用心ですの？ これ以上に自信が湧いてくる話もありませんわね

original: Whether you believe it or not, the scrolls have a mind of their own. If they didn't want you to find them, they wouldn't allow it.
string: 信じられないかも知れないが、書には意思があるんだよ。君が発見者になれたのは、書がそれを望んだからだ

original: Arkay tells me the Sun Fire spell can break open those caches, but I've never found one. I think he might be lying to me.
string: アーケイの話では、宝の隠し場所は太陽の炎の呪文で開くが、どこを探しても見つからない。一杯食わされたのかもな

original: Take my advice, don't listen to that talk of the "face sculptor" down in the Ragged Flagon. "Face butcher" is more like it from what I've heard.
string: 忠告するわ、ラグド・フラゴンにいる“顔面改造医”の話は聞いちゃだめよ。聞いた限りでは、むしろ“顔面破壊屋”の方が近いわ

original: I'm not known for my patience.
string: 私は気が短いのだ

original: By the blood of my ancestors...
string: ああ、ご先祖様、なんて事ですの……

original: I haven't noticed any vampire menace.
string: 吸血鬼の脅威は特に感じていないが

original: We'll celebrate our victory.
string: 共に勝利を祝おう

original: Where're these vampires coming from? We need to wipe them out before things get worse.
string: この吸血鬼どもはどこから来る？ 事態が悪化する前に、奴らを一掃しなければ

original: Isran, Carcette is dead. The Hall of the Vigilants... everyone... they're all dead. You were right, we were wrong. Isn't that enough for you?
string: イスラン、カルセッテは死んだ。番人の間で… 全員死んだ。お前が正しく、我々が間違っていた。それ以上何を求める？

original: I was on the trail of something big. It led me here, and... I didn't make it.
string: ある大物を追っていたんだ。それでここにたどり着いて… 失敗した

original: Oh. I didn't even know. Is it a happy home?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。幸せな家庭なのかしら？

original: You don't trust Vingalmo?
string: ヴィンガルモを信用できないのか？

original: This vampire showed up while you were away.
string: 君の留守中に吸血鬼が現れた

original: Then I'll take it from your corpse! Kill her!
string: ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！ 奴の望みを絶て！

original: The bow has to be in here.
string: きっと弓はここにありましてよ

original: You mean, do I get lonely?
string: さびしさを感じたりするか、という意味かな？

original: It's time we take the fight to their door.
string: そろそろ連中に戦いを仕掛ける時だ

original: I don't suppose there's a cure.
string: 治療する方法はないんだろうな

original: The items it made were so powerful they went to war over it, and the Forge was lost. Or so the story goes.
string: それからできるアイテムがあまりに強力なために、彼らはそれを巡って争い、鋳造器具は失われたと言われているんだよ

original: First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.
string: セラーナの次は聖蚕の僧侶か。ハルコン卿はきっと君の事がお気に入りだな… 今のところは

original: I... I suppose this is difficult for you.
string: 私は… 君には難しいと思うが

original: Wait, what? That's not what we agreed. We take it back together.
string: ちょっと待った… 何だって？ 話が違うぞ。一緒にそれを取り戻すはずじゃないか

original: That's quite a bold claim. I'd need proof before I could possibly accept it.
string: かなり大胆な要求だな。たとえ受け入れるとしても、その前に証拠が必要だ

original: I was expecting someone from my family. I don't recognize you. Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
string: 家族の誰かだと思いましたの。あなたの事は知りませんわ。父に仕えてる人ですの？

original: Why would someone who isn't... like me... come all the way down here?
string: わたし達の仲間でもない人が、こんなところまで何をしにいらっしゃいましたの？

original: I'll feed your corpse to the Betrayed.
string: 死体は裏切られし者の餌にしてやる

original: I've located one of the lost ancient Amulets of Night Power.
string: 太古の夜の力のアミュレットのひとつがどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: Well, there's the Falmer, to start with. Deadly rapids. Major earthquakes. Massive chasms. Unstable ground. Lethal falls.
string: そうだね、まずはファルメル。そして命取りの急流。大地震。巨大な裂け目。不安定な地面。死をもたらす滝

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: My congratulations on defeating Harkon. Clearly, you are the superior vampire.
string: ハルコンへの勝利を祝福する。紛れもなく、お前は優れた吸血鬼だ

original: Master, I have done as you asked and traveled here.
string: 主様、ご命令を遂行してここに参りました

original: Let's head back up there and see if we can read the scrolls.
string: あそこに戻って、書が読めるかどうか確かめましょう

original: Are you sure? I'm willing to do it, but you need to think it through.
string: 本当ですの？ わたしはよろしいけれど、しっかり考えた方がよくてよ

original: The Ideal Masters unleashed their Keepers and sent them to destroy me.
string: アイディール・マスターは番人を解き放ち、私を殺すために送り込んだ

original: Perhaps you should. I count some of the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim among the members of my court.
string: そうするといいかもな。我が臣下にはスカイリムで最も古く、強大な吸血鬼らの何体かが属している

original: How could I help?
string: どうすればいい？

original: Why is it so dark?
string: なぜこんなに暗いんだ？

original: Shhh. They're watching us. Always watching.
string: シー。彼らが見てる。いつも見張ってるんだ

original: In the unlikely event that I ever require you for some reason, I shall find you. Until then I see no reason for us to be speaking.
string: 万が一何かの用事ができた時は、こちらから君を見つけるよ。それまで君とおしゃべりする理由はないな

original: We both realized that if Isran's even allowed us in here, he must be really concerned.
string: 私達がここにいる事をイスランが許すだけでも、かなり悩んでる証拠だわ

original: Gelebor and his kind are easily manipulated fools.
string: ギレボルもその同胞も、流されやすい愚か者ばかりだ

original: Go on.
string: 続けてくれ

original: Hold still, then.
string: では動かないで

original: Fellow hunter, we're looking for some Vampires that have been reported in the area. Have you seen any?
string: お仲間か。この一帯にいるらしいという吸血鬼を探している。見かけなかったか？

original: So you prefer living in the shadows.
string: 影に生きることを好むと

original: I'd never do anything that could hurt you.
string: あなたを傷つけるような事はしたくありませんわ

original: I wonder if the fires are still burning in the Imperial City...
string: 帝都の火はまだ燃えてるのかしら？

original: In my language, the Qahnaarin is the Vanquisher, the one who has bested a fellow dovah in battle.
string: 我らの言葉でクァーナーリンは征服者を意味する。仲間のドヴァーを戦いで打ち破った者の事だ

original: Might come in handy.
string: 役立ちそうだ

original: That's too bad. Do you know how they're doing now?
string: 残念ですわね。今どうしてるかお分かりには？

original: As I've told you before I'm a Daughter of Coldharbour... offspring to Molag Bal.
string: 以前言ったように、私はコールドハーバーの娘… モラグ・バルの子孫よ

original: Might be that I have, but I can't say for sure.
string: そうかも知れないが、確かな事は言えないね

original: I can crush skulls with the best of them. Let me show you a few things.
string: 頭蓋骨を砕くのは誰よりも上手よ。ちょっと見せてあげましょうか

original: Fair enough. What do you have?
string: なるほど。何があるんだ？

original: Be a dear and fetch me another set of Dwemer diagrams?
string: 他のドゥーマーの設計図も持ってきてくれないかしら？

original: If we follow that path around, we can find the other switch.
string: 向こうの道をたどれば、別のスイッチが見つかるはずですわ

original: Let's kill those... Keeper things and get back to the prison.
string: さあ… 番人どもを片づけて、牢屋へと戻りましょう

original: And if I want to remain a werewolf?
string: ウェアウルフのままでいたいと言えば？

original: Neither do I.
string: わたしもですわ

original: It pains me to think you'd travel with Serana under the guise of her protector in an effort to hunt me down.
string: あなたが私を捜し当てるために保護者を装ってセラーナと旅した… そう考えると胸が痛むわ

original: Now where is it I'm supposed to be going?
string: それで、どこに向かえばいいのかしら？

original: Any advice for a new vampire hunter?
string: 新米の吸血鬼ハンターに助言は？

original: She was very fond of her alchemical garden in the castle courtyard. She taught me quite a bit about cultivating quality reagents.
string: 母はお城の中庭にある錬金術用の庭園がとても好きでしたわ。わたしに質のいい試薬の作り方を色々教えてくれましたのよ

original: Fools.
string: 愚か者め

original: You... you know too much. I can't afford to let you live.
string: お前は… 知りすぎている。生かしてはおけん

original: The sun cannot protect you any more!
string: 太陽はもうお前たちを守れない！

original: Yeargh!
string: イイヤァ！

original: It's difficult to have a conversation with you like that. Would you mind changing back?
string: その様子では話しづらいわ。元に戻ってくれない？

original: What do we do now?
string: これからどうする？

original: What a wonderful place you've brought me.
string: 何て素敵な場所なのでしょう

original: Anyway, I'm quite happy in my current pursuits. So if you'll excuse me...
string: とにかく、私は今の仕事に満足してるから。じゃあ、失礼…

original: They're mystic entities that lord over the Soul Cairn, controlling every aspect from its fabric to its appearance.
string: 彼らはソウル・ケルンに君臨する神秘的な存在で、その素材から外見まですべての側面を支配している

original: All right Isran, you've got us all here. Now what do you want?
string: イスラン、来てやったぞ。お次は何だ？

original: What happened to this place?
string: ここで何が起きたのか？

original: I am Jiub. Some call me Saint Jiub. Others call me Jiub the Eradicator. Perhaps you've heard of me?
string: ジウブだ。聖ジウブや、根絶者ジウブと呼ぶ者もいる。聞いた事あるよな？

original: Depends how much you're paying.
string: それは買い値によるな

original: One more word of warning. There's a dragon that calls itself Durnehviir roaming the Cairn. Be wary of him.
string: もう一つ警告するわ。ダーネヴィールと名乗るドラゴンがケルンをうろついている。用心して

original: Don't worry, I'm not in any danger or anything like that. It'll just be more unpleasant to run into my father.
string: 別段、危険にさらされてるわけではございませんの。父に会うのがそれだけ不愉快な出来事になるだけで

original: Why do you think I was asking?
string: あなたに尋ねたと思ったの？

original: So close...
string: もうすぐだ…

original: I've been really wanting to get out and explore a bit.
string: 外に出て、歩き回ってみたくてたまらなくなりましたのよ

original: Got it.
string: よしなに

original: Any soul gem?
string: どんな魂石でも？

original: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
string: それが何を意味するかはまだ分からないが、突き止めてみよう。おそらく吸血鬼達がほしがるものを彼女が持ってるか、彼女自身が重要なのかのどちらかだろう

original: Why hide? Face Auri-El. Face your end!
string: なぜ隠れる？ 出てきてアーリエルの裁きを受けろ！

original: You're no pilgrim.
string: 巡礼者などではないな

original: Now, I believe that Lord Harkon wishes to speak with you.
string: さて、ハルコン卿がお前と話したがっている事だろう

original: You blood will not protect you from me.
string: その血は私から身を守るのには役立たない

original: The vampires are much more dangerous than we ever dreamed. The Dawnguard is the only hope now.
string: 吸血鬼達は想像よりはるかに大きな脅威だ。残された希望はもはやドーンガードだけ

original: Now, you might already know that Molag Bal is the original source of vampirism.
string: さて、モラグ・バルが最初の吸血鬼を造った事は、もうご存知ですわね

original: Not at this rate, no.
string: この調子ではだめかも知れませんわね

original: The water from the spring makes the skooma so much more potent, we'll have all the thralls we'll ever need.
string: 泉の水によってスクゥーマの中毒性が格段に強くなる。使っても使いきれないほどの従徒を確保できそうだ

original: Well I need to do some testing on this new weapon, and I was thinking a live target would be helpful.
string: この新しい武器の性能を確かめたいんだけど、生き物を的にして試すのがいいと思うの

original: No, I'm here to prevent our annihilation.
string: 我々の根絶を防ぐためにここにいる

original: Well, go on! What are you waiting for?
string: さあ、ほら！ 何を待っているの？

original: I wish I could say how many we numbered, but only a privileged few knew that, and they're dead now.
string: 我々が総勢何名ほどだったのか分かればいいんだが、それを知っていたのは要職の数名だけで、いずれも死んでしまっている

original: And if I refuse your gift?
string: 申し出を断わったらどうなる？

original: If you can find them, we might have a chance.
string: 君が彼らを見つけてくれたなら、我々にも勝算が立つかも知れない

original: Just leave me alone for a bit.
string: しばらく一人にしてちょうだい

original: But of course, neither of us can read it.
string: もちろん、わたしどもはどちらも読めないわけですが

original: Half the pages, eh? You're getting there.
string: 原稿の半分、とな？ その調子で頑張ってくれ

original: Watch your step.
string: 足元に注意して

original: I need to find a Moth Priest.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探している

original: I'm going to Dimhollow Crypt. Perhaps I can be of some small assistance to you.
string: ディムホロウ墓地に向かう事にする。少しは助力できるかもな

original: You are testing my patience.
string: いつまで待たせる気だ？

original: I know this isn't an easy choice. Take your time.
string: おいそれと決められる話ではありませんわね。じっくり考えるのがよろしくてよ

original: You became trapped.
string: だが閉じ込められてしまった、と

original: Bring the two of them back here, and we can get started on coming up with a plan.
string: 彼ら二人をここに連れてくるんだ。計画を立てるのはそれからになる

original: Gah... let's clear out this steam so we can take a look.
string: ゴホ… この蒸気を払って、見てみようか

original: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
string: どこかに引越しをしたいな

original: For my daughter's safe return, you have my gratitude.
string: 娘が無事に戻った事、感謝している

original: Follow me.
string: ついて来い

original: We're also going to need a sample of her blood. Which... if we could get that, we wouldn't even be trying to do this in the first place.
string: 彼女の血も少し必要みたいですわ。それが手に入るくらいなら、こんな手順はそもそも必要ないというのに

original: I'll find you yet, coward.
string: すぐ見つけてやるぞ、卑怯者め

original: Your life ends here, Vyrthur!
string: お前の命はここで尽きますのよ、ヴィルスール！

original: I'm on my way to Markarth to confer with my colleague, Calcelmo. I've no time to stop and chat.
string: 同僚のカルセルモと会うためにマルカルスに行くところだ。立ち止まっておしゃべりする暇はない

original: It involves carefully removing the bark from a Canticle Tree which will in turn attract Ancestor Moths to you.
string: それにはカンティクルの木から樹皮を慎重にはがす作業が含まれる。そうする事によって聖蚕が集まってくるんだ

original: My love! I knew you'd come for me! I just knew it!
string: 愛しの君よ！ やっぱり来てくれたな！ 思った通りだ！

original: I think they transcend what we perceive as a physical form.
string: 彼らは私達が物理形態として感知するものを超越していると思うの

original: How about you pay for your habit like everybody else. We're not running a charity here.
string: 他の人と同じように、お金を払って楽しんだらどう？ 慈善事業じゃないのよ

original: You see the Tyranny of the Sun as your chance at deification, and like Harkon you won't hesitate to destroy anything that stands in your path.
string: 太陽の専制を自分の神格化の好機と見なしているのね。そしてハルコンと同じく、邪魔するものすべての破壊もためらわない

original: You're... you're a vampire?
string: あなたは… 吸血鬼ですの？

original: Thanks again for searching. I don't know what I'd do without my pages.
string: 探してくれてありがとう。原稿がなかったら、どうなっていた事か

original: Enough of these games. Fight me!
string: 遊びは終わりだ、堂々と戦え！

original: For those who cherish memories of loved ones, their compassion often conceals the beast.
string: 愛する者の想い出を大事にする者の思いやりこそが、化け物を隠す一助となっている事がしばしばある

original: Like I said. I don't know what you're talking about.
string: 言ったろう。何の話か分からないね

original: Who is your father?
string: 父親とは？

original: All right.
string: いいだろう

original: Just a taste...
string: ちょいと味見を…

original: You've arrived at the Wayshrine of Resolution.
string: ここは意思の祠だ

original: Once saw Harkon rip a man in half. He's powerful like you wouldn't believe.
string: ハルコンが男を真っ二つにするのを見た事がある。信じられないほど強いのよ

original: The Empire will send someone to find me. You'll see!
string: 帝国は私を探しに誰かを送り込む。そのうち分かるぞ！

original: Now, if everyone will please be quiet, I must concentrate.
string: みんな静かにしてくれるかな… 集中したいんだ

original: Stay away from the crystals or you may find yourself becoming one of us.
string: 水晶に近づいてはダメだ。こんな姿になりたくないならね

original: Do I get a reward for finding your daughter?
string: お嬢さんを見つけた見返りはもらえるのか？

original: I know you do, but this is something I need to do alone.
string: 分かっておりますのよ、けれどもこれは一人でやらなくてはいけない事なのです

original: That letter's the last I've heard of him and mentions where he is. Now please, leave me alone.
string: あれが彼から届いた最後の手紙だ。居場所が書いてある。さあ、もう一人にしてくれ

original: Serana has sacrificed everything to prevent Harkon from completing the prophecy. I would have expected her to explain that to you.
string: セラーナはハルコンがお告げを実現するのを防ぐためにすべてを犠牲にしてきた。それを彼女からあなたに説明してくれると思った

original: A cure? Why even think of it that way?
string: 治療法？ どうしてそのような事を？

original: Neh...Viir!
string: ネー… ヴィール！

original: Pitiful. Simply pitiful. I expected more from the defiant fool that beguiled my daughter.
string: 情けない、実に情けないぞ。我が娘を魅了した身の程知らずが、その程度か

original: I need you to do something.
string: 手伝ってもらおうかな

original: Careful now... this area's not stable.
string: 用心して… この場所は不安定だ

original: It... almost doesn't even look real. You know?
string: とても… この世のものとは思えませんわ

original: You're dead!
string: お前は終わりだ！

original: You. Come forward. I would speak with you.
string: あなた。こちらへ来なさい。話しましょう…

original: Is that... the Forge?
string: あれは… 鋳造器具？

original: The Empire supports Elisif, and killed Ulfric for his rebellion.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持していて、反乱を起こしたウルフリックを討伐した

original: Keep your eyes open, here.
string: ここは用心なさって

original: We'll return for you when we can.
string: できるだけ早く迎えに来る

original: I'm ready to carry out this task.
string: 使命を果たす準備ができた

original: I miss the warm sunshine. Green grass. Blue skies. I miss being alive.
string: 暖かい陽の光や、緑の草原や、青い空が恋しいな。生きてた頃に戻りたい

original: Certainly. Where can I find this castle?
string: もちろんです。その城はどこにあるのですか？

original: Hey!
string: ちょっと！

original: I will avenge you, brother.
string: 仇は討ってやる

original: I'll see you soon.
string: また会いましょう

original: He'll want to use it.
string: 彼は使いたがるだろう

original: New recruits? Hmm.
string: 新入りだと？ ほう

original: You're an insult to our kind.
string: お前たちの存在自体が我々への冒とくだ

original: What?
string: 何？

original: Fortune smile upon you, milord!
string: 旦那様、ご幸運を！

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: I trust your journey was successful?
string: 旅はうまくいったのかな？

original: If you're putting yourself in harm's way, you'd best be prepared. Take these.
string: 身を危険にさらすなら、準備は入念にすべきだ。これを使うといい

original: Excuse me, but I must address the court.
string: 後にしろ。臣下達に下達をせねばならんのでな

original: My father's never been much for building things, so it just stayed like this.
string: 父は建築まわりに詳しくなかったから、そのままになっておりましたわ

original: Another one of those things. Let's keep our distance.
string: また同じのですわ。距離を保って

original: I guess we should have seen this coming... Moth Priest, moths... they're apparently related in some way.
string: この事は予測しておくべきでしたわね… 聖蚕の僧侶、蚕… 明らかに何らかの関係がありますわよ

original: Do you think we'll meet the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターに会うことになるのかな？

original: I should have killed you and your mother long ago!
string: 母親共々、はるか昔に殺すべきだった！

original: Look at you. Mortal. Weak.
string: ぜい弱な定命の体とは、情けない姿だ

original: There are others here like you?
string: 他にも仲間がここに？

original: Sounds like she was being cautious.
string: 用心していたみたいだな

original: Hhyyaarargghhhh!
string: はいやあああ！

original: Glad you made it here safely, Dexion.
string: 無事に辿り着いてくれて何よりだ、デキソン

original: Yes. Please, follow me.
string: ええ。お願い、ついてきて

original: That's a good way to be thinking.
string: それはいい考え方だな

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: But look around - there's really not much to join yet. I've only just started rebuilding the order.
string: しかし現状を見てくれ。まだ君を受け入れる準備ができていない。組織の再建を始めてまだ間もないからな

original: I didn't even know the crests could be removed. Maybe my mother's trying to tell us something?
string: クレストが取り外せるなんて知りませんでしたわ。ひょっとして母は私達に何かを伝えようとしてるのかしら？

original: Kill the beast!
string: あいつを殺して下さい！

original: Here's the location of the next set of Dwemer diagrams. Thanks!
string: 次のドゥーマーの図面がある場所はここよ。お願いね！

original: What will happen to you now?
string: そちらはこれからどうする？

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to. (Brawl)
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない(殴り合い)

original: Loyalty? You never intended to let me live.
string: 忠誠心？ 生かしておくつもりは元からなかっただろう

original: You again? I thought it was clear I was busy.
string: また来たのか？ こう見えておれは忙しいんだぞ

original: Something's happened, I can't quite remember...
string: 何かが起きたのか？ はっきり思い出せない…

original: I'm sure your reward will be great for ensuring our Lord's success.
string: 我らが王の成功を確かなものにしてくれたのだから、君へのほうびはすごいものになるはずだ

original: See you around... if you live long enough.
string: また会おう… 君が長生きできたら

original: Well, your thrall awaits and we have given him the Elder Scroll. Command him to read it, and let us hear the words of prophecy together.
string: お前の従徒が待っている。星霜の書を渡してあるので読むように指示してやれ。予言の言葉を共に聞くとしよう

original: I didn't even think you knew what a book was, my brutish friend.
string: 野蛮な君が本というものを知ってるとはまさに意外だな

original: Go now, and prove that my faith in you was not misplaced.
string: 行くがいい、お前を信じた私の判断が間違っていなかった事を証明して見せるのだ

original: Spiders!
string: スパイダーめ！

original: Yes, how may I serve you, milord?
string: 旦那様、ご用は何ですか？

original: I thought I'd be able to allay the after effects, but I was wrong. Now I'm paying for it.
string: 後遺症を和らげる事ができると思ったが、それは間違いだった。自業自得だよ

original: Are you alive? I must be imagining this.
string: 生きてる人？ きっと幻覚だな

original: He doesn't know we're here. I don't have time to explain.
string: わたし達がここにいるのをお父様は知りませんわ。説明している時間はありませんの

original: Anything else?
string: 他に何の理由がありまして？

original: Do you have any more work?
string: 他に仕事はあるか？

original: Why not just scream at the top of your lungs "Here we are, monsters! We're oh so tasty! Come and get us!"
string: 声の限りに叫べばいいじゃないか。「こっちだ、バケモノめ！ 俺達は美味いぞ！ 食べに来いよ！」とな

original: I have the bow.
string: 弓を手に入れた

original: Why can't they just let us in? We won't get in the way!
string: どうして入れてくれないんだ？ 邪魔などしないのに！

original: The voice of the Ancestor Moth has always been an integral part of reading the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を読む時は、聖蚕の声に耳を傾ける事が常に重要だ

original: Ah, yes. Saint Jiub, Jiub the Eradicator, Jiub the Magnificent... I've earned a lot of those titles thanks to my campaign against the Winged Menace.
string: そうだ。聖ジウブ、根絶者ジウブ、偉大なるジウブ… この種の名をほしいままにしたものだ。羽根のある敵との戦いで活躍したおかげでな

original: Put his mind to rest, allay his fear through vampiric seduction and when he is in a pliant condition, embrace him and bite him on the neck.
string: 彼の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: Good. You are weaker while on the ground, because you cannot access the blood magic.
string: 地上では血の魔法が使えないため、力が弱くなる

original: Nothing like a goose chase around the whole damned province.
string: 1つの地域をあてもなく探しまわるほど素敵な事はございませんわね

original: What do you want?
string: 何をすればいい？
