original: If you were to bring me some good quality elven arrows, I could imbue them with the proper incantations and rituals.
string: 質のいいエルフの矢を持ってきてくれたら、正式な呪文と儀式で魔法をかけてやろう

original: No, it's probably not.
string: いいえ、多分違いますわ

original: How dare you disobey me!
string: 私に逆らうとは！

original: Send the troll after them!
string: トロールに追わせるのよ！

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: Yes, I can smell it on you.
string: そうだな、臭いで分かる

original: You seem to have lost the gift that Lord Harkon gave you. I suggest you tell him at once.
string: ハルコン卿からの贈り物を失くしたみたいじゃないか。その事をすぐ彼に言った方がいいよ

original: The night eternal awaits.
string: 夜は永遠に待ってくれる

original: Rrrraaaaahhhh!
string: イイィィヤァアー！

original: No, I just... I thought perhaps...
string: いいえ。僕はただ… たぶんこうじゃないかと…

original: Very few people appreciate all the horrible things that can happen to you if you're not being cautious.
string: 注意が足りないせいで起こる不幸は、大抵の人にとって有難くないものよ

original: Trivial in your mind, perhaps. For me, it would mean a great deal.
string: そなたにとっては微々たる事かも知れんが、我にとっては大きな意義がある

original: All I heard is that without a Septim sitting on the throne of the Empire, the Dragonfires in a place called the Temple of the One were no longer lit.
string: よくは知らんが、セプティムが玉座にいなければ、最高神の神殿という場所にあるドラゴンファイアが消えるとかいう話を聞いた

original: This was just the end of something else.
string: 今のはただ、別な何かの命が尽きただけの事ですわ

original: Why don't you keep your things, and I'll keep mine.
string: あなたは自分の荷物をお持ちになって。わたしもそういたしますわ

original: Hhyyaarrgghh!
string: ハイヤァアア！

original: One less monster in the world.
string: これでこの世から化物が1匹消えた

original: You should have kept running.
string: 足をとめるべきじゃなかったな

original: Never... not yet...
string: ちっとも… 怖くなんか…

original: My family's home is west of Solitude. If you help me get back there, they'll be grateful to you.
string: わたしの実家はソリチュードの西部にありますの。無事に送り届けてくれましたら、家族も喜びます

original: Arkay says you'll be facing forsworn.
string: アーケイによれば、相手はフォースウォーンだ

original: What happened to this place?
string: ここで一体何がありましたの？

original: Die!
string: 死ね！

original: I... fell. When the earthquake hit. The ground just... opened up.
string: …落ちたんだよ。地震が起きた時。地面が自然に… 開いたんだ

original: The scroll!
string: 星霜の書か！

original: We need your help, Isran.
string: 力を貸してほしい、イスラン

original: You there. The Dawnguard is looking for anyone willing to fight against the growing vampire menace. What do you say?
string: そこのあんた。ドーンガードは増しつつある吸血鬼の脅威と戦う気のある者は誰でも受け入れている。興味はあるか？

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: Not sure what you're waiting for... step into the light.
string: 何を待っているのか存じませんけど… 光の中へお入りになって

original: I think so. And thanks for asking.
string: そうですわね。聞いて下さってありがとう

original: I believe the secret to unraveling that prophecy is written in Serana's Elder Scroll.
string: その予言の真実を突き止める鍵となる秘密が、セラーナの星霜の書に書かれているようなのだ

original: What do they resemble?
string: どんな形状をしているのか？

original: I've waited a long time for my chance to move up in the court.
string: 出世の機会をずっと伺っていたのよ

original: I was about to suggest that very thing. Yes, you most certainly deserve a reward.
string: 今まさにその話をするところだった。そうとも、当然ほうびをとらせるべきだ

original: You are in danger. A vampire has infiltrated your court. (Give letter)
string: 吸血鬼が宮廷の一員になりすましているため、危険だ(手紙を渡す)

original: The Dawnguard apparently like killing vampires.
string: ドーンガードは吸血鬼を殺すのが好きなようね

original: This weather is incredible.
string: この天気、信じられませんわ

original: I promise to make this as painless as possible. Hold still.
string: なるべく痛くないようにいたしますわね。そのまま動かないで…

original: Do you, now? Hircine doesn't usually bestow his favor on the fickle.
string: そうなの？ ハーシーンは普段気まぐれに誰かをひいきする事はない

original: I think he had regular contact with the Vigilants, and I know Isran kept track of them...
string: 番人とは定期的に会ってるはずだし、イスランは足取りを掴んでると思うけど…

original: Do I need to read the scrolls in any particular order?
string: 特定の順番で読む必要はあるのか？

original: This is the most peace and quiet I've had in a lifetime.
string: 生まれてから今まで得る事のできなかった平穏がある

original: Actually, now that you mention it...(Attack)
string: 言われてみればその通りだ…(攻撃)

original: You go ahead. I'll talk to Isran in a minute.
string: 入ってくれ。すぐイスランに取り次ぐから

original: Speak with Vingalmo. He has something for you.
string: ヴィンガルモと話すといい。何かあるようだ

original: With my guidance you will become a deadly instrument, striking terror in the hearts of mortals wherever you tread.
string: 私の導きのもとでお前は驚異的な存在となり、行く先々で定命の者達の心を恐怖に陥れる事だろう

original: I'll see you soon.
string: また会いましょう

original: Let me know if you need anything.
string: 困った時は言ってほしい

original: Tell you what, I'll sell it back to you for 4,000 coins.
string: 4000ゴールドでまた売ってやってもいいけどな

original: So why don't you just drink the blood from the spring? I mean, that seems easier than running a skooma den...
string: じゃあその泉から血を汲んで飲めばいいじゃないか。スクゥーマ部屋を経営するより簡単だ…

original: You've probably killed lots of vampires, huh? I'm sure Isran will sign you right up. Not sure he'll take me. I hope so.
string: 吸血鬼をいっぱい退治したんだね？ きっとイスランに取り立ててもらえるよ。俺もそうなるといいなあ

original: What are you talking about?
string: 何の話をしてるんだ？

original: Honestly, I don't think they care what a bunch of vampires would do with Auriel's Bow. They're pretty focused on the past.
string: 正直なところ、吸血鬼達がアーリエルの弓をどうしようが彼らは気にしないと思われますわ。彼らは過去に注目しておりますもの

original: Were you and Valerica close?
string: ヴァレリカとは親しかったのか？

original: I know how that feels. I mean... I know it isn't the same thing. But I was a pretty lonely child, myself.
string: その気持ち、分かりますわ。もちろん… 同じだという気はございませんの。ただわたしも寂しい子供時代でしたから

original: Fine, fine. No need to get your breeches in a twist.
string: そうか、そうか。そんなにムキにならなくてもいいだろう

original: My vision darkens, and I see no more.
string: 暗くてもう見えないよ

original: I will be. Just give me a little time.
string: もちろん。必要なのは時間だけですわ

original: Are you ready to go? I'm not entirely sure what this thing is going to do when I add my blood.
string: 準備はよくて？ わたしの血を加えた時に何がどうなるか、確証はございませんわよ

original: Can you train me in Restoration?
string: 回復の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: Okay. Hope this helps.
string: いいわよ。これが役立つ事を願うわ

original: They swept into the Chantry without warning and began killing everyone without pause.
string: 奴らは何の前触れもなく礼拝所に押し入り、そこにいた者を手当たり次第に殺していった

original: Go ahead. After everything you've done, you should do the honors.
string: さあ。これだけの事をしてくれたのだから、あんたがやるべきだよ

original: Does Harkon even care about you anymore?
string: 今のハルコンは、君のことを少しでも想っているのか？

original: Is that... oh no. Are we going down there?
string: あれは… まさか、あそこに降りますの？

original: What do you want from me?
string: 何が望みなのだ？

original: Maybe you should leave the writing to an expert and stop making foolish suggestions.
string: 文章の事は専門家に任せて、下らない提案はやめたらどうかね

original: I'm just here for the Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書を取りに来た

original: But I can't wait to see these drawings. Go on, get out of here!
string: それでも、最後の図面を早く見てみたいわ。さあ、行ってきて！

original: Never made it far in the Companions, but now... I'd like to see any of them try and call me "whelp" again.
string: 同胞団ではうまくいかなかったけど、今は… あの中に私をまた“お嬢さん”と呼ぶ者がいるか見てみたいわ

original: All this talk of Elder Scrolls and Auriel's Bow... Lord Harkon's ambition truly is great.
string: 星霜の書とアーリエルの弓の色々な話… ハルコン卿の大志は本当に偉大よ

original: I'm trying to put it to good use.
string: 私は砦を有効に利用しようとしてるんだ

original: Gah...
string: ぐう…

original: Oh, he just left a short while ago. He said he'd finished up his work and it was time to move on.
string: ああ、そいつなら少し前に出てったよ。仕事が済んだから引き払うと言ってね

original: Try asking one of the guards.
string: 衛兵に聞いてみればいいんじゃない

original: Go cull the brutish beasts before the problem gets out of hand.
string: 問題が手に負えなくなる前に、野蛮な獣達を処分してきなさい

original: Oh, good. Well then... let's head over to the portal vessel and I'll do the rest.
string: それはよかったですわ。…それなら、転移門の器の所まで行きましょう。後はわたしが

original: Then I've contributed to your kind's extinction.
string: とすると、そちらの一族の絶滅に寄与してしまったことになる

original: Someone will bleed for this.
string: このままでは済まさん

original: Forgive me, Qahnaarin. We will continue this when time releases you from its relentless grasp.
string: 許せ、クァーナーリン。時がそなたを手放した暁には、続けるとしよう…

original: I understand.
string: わかった

original: Don't try and impress me. It only leaves you looking foolish.
string: いいところを見せようとするな。愚かに見えるだけだ

original: But at that point, he'll have everything he's ever wanted.
string: でも、その時点で父は、ほしい物をすべて手に入れる事になりますわよ

original: Sometimes you get one who comes willingly, but most have to be convinced to join us here.
string: 時々好き好んで来るのもいるが、大半は説得しないとここには来たがらない

original: Finished?
string: 済みまして？

original: Now let's finish this.
string: さあ、ケリをつけましょう

original: Arkay says we're going to win this. Well, probably.
string: アーケイは、この戦いが勝利に終わると言ってる。多分な

original: Perhaps you still need convincing? Behold the power!
string: まだ納得できないか？ 我が力を見るがいい！

original: Mother?
string: お母様？

original: How dare you trespass here!
string: よくここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな！

original: Just call your name in Tamriel? That's it?
string: タムリエルで名を呼べと？ それだけなのか？

original: Idiot! I can't get to the scroll with Durnehviir attacking us!
string: 馬鹿者！ ダーネヴィールに攻撃されながら書を手に入れる事はできないわ！

original: Ah yes, I remember your Moth Priest now.
string: ああそうだ。あんたの探してる聖蚕の僧侶の事を思い出したよ

original: Oh, Serana. If you'd only open your eyes.
string: ああ、セラーナ。どうか目を覚まして

original: What are you doing here?
string: ここで何をしてるんだ？

original: Well, we're definitely not going to find our way out from here.
string: もし、これではいつまでたってもここから出る道は見つかりませんわよ

original: Anything good?
string: いいものはありまして？

original: Can you train me in Smithing?
string: 鍛造の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: I'll drain the life from you!
string: 命を吸い取ってやる！

original: What happened to the dragon?
string: ドラゴンはどうなった？

original: I've always been fascinated with Dwemer artifacts. I take them apart, poke around in their guts, and try to figure things out - with mixed results.
string: ドゥーマーの造った物には、いつも驚かされるわ。分解して、中の部品をいじり回して調べるんだけど、うまく理解できる事ばかりじゃないの

original: Fine. Arkay says it's a good idea for me to go. I don't agree, but he's not the sort of fellow you can just ignore.
string: いいだろう。アーケイは言っている、行くべきだと。賛成しないが、あの方の言葉に背く事はできない

original: Assuming you have the smithing skills, you should be able to make this yourself at Gunmar's forge. Either way, I'll have some for sale soon.
string: 鍛冶の技術を持ってるなら、ガンマーの鍛冶場で自分で造れるはずよ。近いうちに、商品としても売り出すつもりだけど

original: Oh. Good.
string: あら。そうですのね

original: Her name's Serana. It was her that the vampires were seeking.
string: 名はセラーナという。吸血鬼たちが探し求めていたのは彼女のことだ

original: There might be, but I don't think you're going to like it.
string: あるといえばあるかも知れませんが、おすすめはいたしませんわね

original: Mind yourself in that form. Don't go damaging my thralls.
string: その姿で暴れて従徒達を傷つけたりするなよ？

original: May you always prevail.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Surrender and give us the bow!
string: 降伏して弓を渡しなさいな！

original: He said he was heading for Dragon Bridge next. I hope that helps you.
string: 次はドラゴン・ブリッジに向かうと言ってたよ。お役に立てたならいいが

original: Yes. I've kept it safely secured here ever since I was imprisoned.
string: ええ。ここに幽閉されて以来ずっと、これを守ってきたの

original: What about you?
string: あなた自身のこと？

original: Why am I able to bestow the gift of Harkon's blood?
string: 自分もハルコンの血の恩恵を他人に授けられるのはどうしてか？

original: Change it? I can remake your face, if that's what you desire.
string: 変えるの？ お望みなら、あなたの顔を作り直せるわよ

original: Look, on the edge here. This has been cut, precisely cut. If you had another piece, about the same size, it would... it would snap right in.
string: ここの縁を見て。正確に切断されている。もし、ほぼ同じ大きさの破片がもう一つあれば… ぴったりはまるはずだよ

original: And then preyed on the Rift until finally someone put them down.
string: それで、リフトを襲ったんだけど、誰かに退治されたんですって

original: Were did you go?
string: どこへ行った？

original: Taron Dreth. The world's foremost expert on Dwemer forging techniques. Now answer my question!
string: タロンだ！ タロン・ドレス。ドゥーマーの鋳造技術に関しては世界最高の権威だ。さあ、質問に答えろ！

original: And I have half a mind to tell Lokil of your disloyalty.
string: 半ば、ロキルにお前の不実を伝えたくなってくるよ

original: You seem tense. Join a booth and relax a bit. Or did you need another fix?
string: 緊張してるみたいね。部屋に入ってリラックスしたら。それとも、もう一本イっとく？

original: You're talking about a book?
string: 本のことか？

original: Any other ideas?
string: 他にいい考えは？

original: As long as you don't get in my way.
string: 足さえ引っ張らなければ

original: Farewell.
string: さらばだ

original: Which, I'm sorry to say, means your usefulness is at an end!
string: つまり、お前はもう用済みだという事だ！

original: I can't remember how long I've been here. Has it been a day or a century?
string: いつからここにいるのか思い出せない。もう1日経った？ それとも1世紀？

original: Hurrnhh...
string: はああ…

original: My family used to live on an island to the west of Solitude. I would guess they still do.
string: 昔は、家族でソリチュードの西にある島に住んでおりましたの。今もそこにいると思いますわ

original: No. I try to avoid it. Always seems to end in an argument. You?
string: いや、避けるようにしている。口げんかが関の山だからだ。そちらは？

original: Something has shifted in the moons, sister.
string: 月の中で何かが変わったわ、同志よ

original: And so we've delivered her right to them. I should've kept her here until we were certain...
string: 我々は彼女を連中のもとに送り込んだというわけだ。確信が持てるまで彼女をここに置いておくべきだったな…

original: Maybe we can reason with him.
string: 理詰めで話せばわかってもらえるかもしれない

original: You first.
string: そちらからどうぞ

original: Sure.
string: いいだろう

original: Another adventure.
string: 新たな冒険の始まりですわね

original: Empire? What... what empire?
string: 帝国？ …どの帝国の事かしら？

original: I'll set out at once, then.
string: 直ちに出発します

original: You'll need to trust me. The family is safer this way.
string: 信じてほしい。こうした方が家族は安全だ

original: I've destroyed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: I've been trying to make my peace with it.
string: そう思う事で、安心したかったのでしょうね

original: I was expecting someone... like me, at least.
string: 誰か他の… わたしと同じ種類の人だと思っておりましたわ

original: Nuh...
string: ぬう…

original: Seems you're the court favorite. At least, for the moment.
string: 宮廷のごひいきのようね。少なくとも当分は

original: Did you hear something?
string: 何か聞こえて？

original: I don't know what you're talking about.
string: 何の話か分からないな

original: Might need a little convincing, but she should.
string: 多少説得は必要だが、彼女にはそうすべきだな

original: Then we find out where she hid it. If she's still alive... well, as alive as she was before. Or is now. Or... you know what I mean.
string: それから母が書を隠した場所を見つけましょう。もし母がまだ生きていましたら… 以前と同じように生きていましたら、あるいはとにかく今生きていましたら、それとも… お分かりになって？

original: I don't see you with any better ideas.
string: もっとマシな案がありそうには思えないが

original: I don't like him any more than you do. But he is my father.
string: 愛情はかけらもございませんわ。それでも、わたしの父なのです

original: These Vigilants are nothing but talk.
string: ここの番人達は口先だけなんだ

original: Wait... that almost makes sense!
string: ちょっと待って… きっとそうだわ！

original: My name is Serana. Were you... sent to wake me?
string: わたしはセラーナ。あなたは… わたしを目覚めさせにいらしたの？

original: With any luck he'll bleed to death before anyone notices. A cold corpse will say what we want better than a warm one.
string: うまくいけば誰かが気づく前に彼は出血多量で死ぬ。温かい死体より冷たい死体の方が私達の言いたい事が伝わるわ

original: Yes, milord? What can I help you with?
string: はい、旦那様。ご用は何ですか？

original: I don't care. Do as you like.
string: どうでもいい、好きにしてくれ

original: See those things in the alcoves up there? 'Kinetic Resonators', the dwarves called them. Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: あそこのくぼみにあるものが見える？ ドワーフは“動力共鳴装置”と呼んでいるんだ。正しい順番で叩けば、扉は開くはずだよ

original: Why did you ever agree to her plan?
string: どうしてそんな計画に同意したんだ？

original: Hide if you wish, it matters little to me.
string: 好きなだけ隠れるがいい。何も変わらない

original: I hadn't really thought about it.
string: これと言って考えていなかった

original: No! I will not allow that happen. The Elder Scrolls only tell of events that might be, not events that will be.
string: だめよ！ それは起こさせないわ。星霜の書は起こり得る出来事を示すだけ、起こる出来事そのものではないのよ

original: I'd try to visit my mother in the garden, and she'd quickly shoo me away saying she was much too busy.
string: 庭園にいる母のところへ行こうとしましたの。すると彼女は忙しいと言ってわたしをすぐ追い払ったのですわ

original: No more. I'm done with you.
string: もうたくさんですわ。家族の絆もこれまで

original: Now that I have reclaimed one of my Elder Scrolls, we must find a Moth Priest to read it.
string: 今ここに星霜の書の一つを取り戻せた、ゆえに聖蚕の僧侶を見つけて読ませる必要がある

original: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, go talk to Isran up in the fort. He decides who's Dawnguard material.
string: そこであんたの出番だ。吸血鬼退治に興味があるなら、砦にいるイスランに会うんだ。ドーンガードにふさわしいかどうかを判断してくれる

original: You know why I'm here. The Vigilants are under attack everywhere. The vampires are much more dangerous than we believed.
string: ここに来た理由は分かるだろう。番人達がそこら中で襲われている。吸血鬼らは我々が思っていたよりもはるかに危険な存在だ

original: See that thing?
string: あれが見える？

original: Harkon would likely sense my return to Tamriel. The last thing you need right now is a trail for him to follow.
string: おそらくハルコンは私のタムリエルへの帰還に感づく。今、彼にその跡を追わせる事だけは避けるべきよ

original: And I'll be unnecessary once he has it.
string: わたしも、父が目的を果たした後はきっと用なしですわね

original: May I strongly suggest that you make a visit to this spouse of yours. And "invite" him to the family by offering him Harkon's Gift.
string: 君の伴侶を訪問して、彼を家族に“招待”する事を強く勧めるよ。ハルコンの贈り物を彼に捧げるんだ

original: I am afraid you're beyond my meager abiliities. I am sorry I cannot serve you better.
string: そちらの方がよっぽど達者だよ。お役に立てなくて悪いね

original: Vigilants? Dawnguard? What are you talking about?
string: 番人だのドーンガードだの、意味がわからない

original: Why do I even post guards? This is the headquarters of the Dawnguard. Well, it used to be, a long time ago.
string: なぜ見張りを立てる必要がある？ ここはドーンガードの本部だ。まあ、少なくとも昔はそうだった

original: Thank you.
string: ありがとう

original: Focus on the dragon!
string: ドラゴンに集中して！

original: They tricked you.
string: だまされたのか

original: How dare you! I gave up everything I cared about to protect you from that fanatic you call a father!
string: よくもそんな事を！ あなたが父と呼ぶ狂信者から守るために、すべてを諦めたのよ！

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: If only it were so. With the world in shadow, we would never tire, never weaken... more than a match for their pitiful armies.
string: そうでもあるが。世が影に覆われれば、我々は疲れも衰えもしなくなる… 奴らのぜい弱な軍勢などとるに足らんよ

original: I wish I could have been there to hear the sounds of their screams.
string: 奴らの悲鳴をこの耳で聞きたかったものだ

original: Yeargh!
string: イイヤァ！

original: No. I was just curious.
string: ただの興味本位だ

original: Centuries of preparation will not fall to ruin because of you!
string: 何世紀もかけたこの計画を、貴様ごときに潰させはしない！

original: I hope you're not trying to lord your abilities over me.
string: あんたが威張りん坊じゃないといいけど

original: Well, unless my vision's playing tricks, there seems to be some sort of magical effect around you. Seems like we're on the right track.
string: 幻惑でも見ていない限り、あなたの周りに魔法の効果のようなものが見えますわ。やり方は間違っていなかったようですわね

original: Ha ha ha! I knew I'd find you.
string: あはははは！ 思った通りだ

original: The bow... you have Auriel's Bow!
string: その弓は… アーリエルの弓じゃないか！

original: You wanted to speak to me?
string: 話があると聞いた

original: Only I hear that's not quite how it happened. Secret organization, you see. No one to blame when homes are broken into, things stolen.
string: だが、聞いた話ではそれは間違いだ。何しろ秘密結社だから、家に侵入されて物を盗まれても、泥棒の素性すら分からないわけだ

original: This stranger aligns herself with those that would hunt you down and slay you like an animal, yet I should entrust you to her?
string: このよそ者はあなたを追いつめて動物のように殺す者達と手を組んでいるのよ。それなのにあなたを預けるべきだと？

original: Arkay and I will stand triumphant!
string: アーケイと俺に敗北はない！

original: Be sure to enjoy some of our Redwater Skooma before you leave.
string: レッドウォーターのスクゥーマを試していかなきゃ損するわよ

original: Oh, no. No way. I'm not helping a vampire. Get out of here, get yourself cured.
string: おいおい、冗談じゃない。吸血鬼に手を貸したりするものか。ここから立ち去って、治療を受けてこい

original: Caves? Oh, no. The Chantry encompasses far more than a few caves, as you'll soon discover.
string: 洞窟？ いや、それは大きな勘違いだ。今に分かる。この礼拝所はただの洞窟の集まりなどではない

original: Well, your loss...
string: まったく、残念だよ…

original: Well done! I said you'd return victorious, Arkay wasn't so sure. Wield it bravely.
string: お見事！ あんたなら勝てると言ったが、アーケイは信じてなかったよ。勇敢な奴だ

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: Ugh. The smell here... let's try to handle this quickly.
string: うっ。ここの臭いときたら… 手早く済ませてしまいましょう

original: Wait, is he talking about me?
string: 待って、彼がわたしの事を？

original: Any interest in ancient falmer tomes?
string: 古代のファルメルの書物に興味はあるか？

original: I just didn't know when.
string: それがいつになるかは分かりかねましたけれど

original: You'd be surprised what people leave behind when you burn their village to the ground.
string: 村を丸ごと焼いてみるといい。村人達がびっくりするようなものを残していくぞ

original: Your kind are finished.
string: お前たちの種族は終わりよ

original: You'd best beg Lord Harkon to turn you at once. Although, you do smell delicious...
string: 今すぐハルコン卿に頼んで自分を変えてもらうべきよ。実においしそうな匂いだけどね…

original: You're back and alive to boot! Fantastic.
string: 生きて戻ってくるなんて、素晴らしいわ！

original: I'm not afraid of you!
string: お前なんか怖くないぞ！

original: I'm still hard at work on the second volume of my epic.
string: 我が冒険物語の第二巻の執筆で忙しいんだ

original: They represented the steps the Initiates took on the path to total enlightenment.
string: 新人達がたどる、完全なる悟りへの道程を象徴していたのだ

original: Nope, never heard of you.
string: いいや、聞いたことすらない名前だ

original: May Auri-El watch over you.
string: アーリエルの加護があらん事を

original: Then let's get going. I want to get there before my father has a chance to track us down.
string: では急ぎましょう。父に見つかる前にそこへ行かなければ

original: How did you earn your nicknames?
string: 二つ名の数々の由来は？

original: Perhaps if he had spent more time with us, he would have recognized the beauty for himself.
string: もっとわたし達と一緒に過ごしていれば、その美しさを自分で理解できたでしょうに…

original: Have you talked to Isran?
string: イスランとは話した？

original: Speak with Florentius. He has something for you.
string: フロレンティウスに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: Woah!
string: きゃあ！

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: It's our time now.
string: 我々の時代が来た

original: Do I detect a hint of reproach? I am only looking out for your best interests. And perhaps, a small measure of my own.
string: もしかして気に食わないのかな？ 君のためを思っての事だが… まあ、ちょっとは私のためでもあるけど

original: Beautiful. That shield... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの盾… 非の打ちどころがない

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: Can't anyone become a vampire if bitten by one?
string: 噛まれたら誰でも吸血鬼になりうるのでは？

original: How do we get inside? We have to talk.
string: どうすれば中に入れますの？ 話がありますのよ

original: And yet, I have fallen so low that I must justify myself to a wanderer in the sewers of this backwater of the world.
string: それでもこれほど落ちぶれたからには、世界の果ての下水道に住む放浪者を自称せざるを得ないわね

original: How does Serana fit in?
string: セラーナにはどう関係するんだ？

original: Harkon's short-sightedness was his undoing. In his lust for power, he failed to consider the full consequences of his plans.
string: ハルコンの先見の明のなさは奴の破滅の元凶だ。力を欲するあまり、己の計画がもたらす結果の全体像を見失ったんだよ

original: Uh, crossbow? I've never...
string: クロスボウかい？ 俺なんか一度も…

original: You could be your own person again.
string: 自分の人生を取り戻せるかもな

original: They've holed up in an abandoned fort in the Reach.
string: 彼らはリーチにある廃墟と化した砦に潜伏したわ

original: The Chantry was constructed near the beginning of the First Era to provide a retreat for those that wished to become enlightened.
string: 悟りを開こうとする者達が集まる場所としてこの礼拝所が造られたのは、第一紀の始めの事だ

original: I'll rip the Dawnguard apart!
string: ドーンガードなど八つ裂きにしてくれる！

original: How are your friends?
string: やあ、ごきげんいかがかな？

original: If there's one thing I know, it's weapons and armor. Take a look.
string: 知っている事を一つ挙げるなら、武器と鎧の事よ。見てみて

original: Gunmar and I have a lot of work to do here, so we were hoping that maybe you could track him down.
string: ガンマーも私もここでやる事がたくさんあるから、あなたに彼を探してもらいたいの

original: What would you have of me, master?
string: 主様、ご用は何ですか？

original: Molag Bal created the first vampire.
string: 最初の吸血鬼はモラグ・バルによって生み出された

original: Really? Well, now, that make things easier...
string: 本当に？ まあ、これで少し楽になるかな…

original: She was so sure of what we did to my father, I couldn't help but go along with her. I never thought of the cost.
string: 父に対してわたし達がした事を、母があまりにも確信をもってやっていたから、ついていくという発想しかありませんでしたわ。代償なんて考えもしなかった

original: I'm married. (Lie)
string: 結婚している(嘘)

original: Seems that I'm the only of my kind here. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 種族うちでここにいるのは私だけみたいね。別に驚く事でもないけど

original: I've retrieved the <Alias=Item> from <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Item>を回収した

original: Light take you!
string: 光に呑まれよ！

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: I've located additional petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I'll extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 太古の吸血鬼が石化した遺体の手がかりをまた見つけたぞ。それを持ってきてくれたら、血の聖杯の効果を延長させる事ができるはずだ

original: We will march on their lair and destroy those wretched abominations so they can no longer corrupt our world!
string: 奴らの根城に進軍して、あの忌々しいバケモノどもを破滅させてやれ。奴らがこの世界を汚すのをこれ以上許すな！

original: It sounds like she was pretty selfish.
string: かなり身勝手な人だったようだな

original: But then it all changed.
string: でもすべてが変わってしまった、と

original: Hmmm. Not bad. We'd better hope that's good enough. Mistakes with these kinds of portals can be... gruesome.
string: あらまあ、悪くないですわね。それで事足りると願いたいですわ。こういった転移門で手違いをしてしまうと… それはおぞましい結果になる事がございますのよ

original: Don't. Get. Caught.
string: 捕まるなという事だ

original: Let's just... move on from here, ok?
string: 今はとにかく… 先へ進みますわよ。よろしくて？

original: Do so now and we will continue.
string: 次に進む前に、試してみるといい

original: Did you have anything to ask before you depart?
string: 出発の前に何か聞く事はあった？

original: Who can?
string: 誰なら可能なのか？

original: Absolutely. I can only do twenty at a time, so if you want the rest of your arrows blessed, let me know.
string: いいとも。一度に作れるのは12本だけだから、残りの矢にも祝福がほしいならまた言ってくれ

original: ... what's that?
string: …あれは何だ？

original: If Harkon obtained Auriel's Bow and Serana's blood was used to taint the weapon, the Tyranny of the Sun would be complete.
string: もしハルコンがアーリエルの弓を手に入れて、セラーナの血で武器を染めれば、太陽の専制は完成する

original: It's not like anything else in Skyrim, I can tell you that much. From now or... before.
string: スカイリムのどんなものとも趣が異なりますわ。それだけは確かですわね。今も… 昔も

original: Of course. What is it?
string: もちろんですわ。どうしまして？

original: I'm guessing you figured this part out already, but my father's not exactly a good person. Even by vampire standards.
string: もう薄々感づいているとは思いますが、父は吸血鬼の基準でも好人物とは言えませんわ

original: She had a theory about soul gems. That the souls inside of them don't just vanish when they're used... they end up in the Soul Cairn.
string: 母は魂石に関する仮説を話してくれましたわ。中の魂が消費されてもただ消えるのではなく、ソウル・ケルンの中に送られるのかも知れないと

original: Is that why you had retained your sight?
string: 視力を失わなかったのはそのためか？

original: Any dangers I should be aware of?
string: 用心すべき危険は？

original: The daedric princes disgust me.
string: デイドラの王子には吐き気をおぼえる

original: Yaahh!
string: ヤァー！

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Bleed Skyrim dry.
string: スカイリムの血を吸いつくすのよ

original: We have Auriel's Bow. We can't lose... right?
string: 私達はアーリエルの弓を持ってる。失うわけにはいかない… 分かった？

original: Did your mother keep gargoyles here?
string: 母親はここでガーゴイルを飼っていたのか？

original: Marriage is a fine institution, however, one that does present certain difficulties for such as like ourselves.
string: 結婚とは素晴らしい慣習だが、確かに問題もある。我々の場合もそうだが

original: The bow was said to be carried by Auri-El himself into battle against the forces of Lorkhan in ancient and mythic times.
string: この弓は、神話時代にアーリエルがロルカーンとの戦いで使ったものだと伝えられている

original: Rii...
string: リィ…

original: Good, I could use all the help I can get.
string: ありがたい、借りられる手はすべて借りたいからな

original: Nobody hears from them much anymore.
string: 音沙汰がほとんどなくなっている

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: Beware the dragon Durnehviir, destroyer of souls and harbinger of the fallen.
string: ドラゴンに気をつけて。魂を破壊し、滅びをもたらすわ

original: May Auri-El's light guide you in your darkest hours.
string: 苦難の時も、アーリエルの光の導きがあらん事を

original: The tyranny of the sun is over!
string: 太陽の専制は終わりだ！

original: Thank you! It's not much, but this will help a great deal with some things I've been researching.
string: ありがとう！ 量は少なくても、ある研究には大いに役立つものなのよ

original: But what you seek does not come easily, and can destroy those without a strong will.
string: しかし、入手は難しく、強い意志を持たない者を破滅させることもあるのです

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Does it work?
string: 使える状態なのか？

original: You are to make a public show of murdering someone. Do it in the streets for all to see. The higher the profile the better.
string: 君には公衆の面前で誰かを殺してほしい。みんなの目がある大通りでやるんだ。目立てば目立つほど望ましい

original: While I doubt we'll ever be truly rid of vampires in Skyrim, you've certainly made it a much safer place for now.
string: スカイリムからすべての吸血鬼を駆逐できるとは思えないけど、今までの活躍でかなり危険は減ったと思うわ

original: Killing vampires? Where do I sign up?
string: 吸血鬼退治か。加入するにはどうすれば？

original: You've mistaken me for someone who cares about you and your problems. Find someone else.
string: どうしてそんな事を気にかけなきゃいけないんだ。他を当たるんだな

original: I'm not backing down!
string: 決して退かん！

original: Yeah, all right. I'll take you as far as I can.
string: ああ、いいとも。超特急で連れてってやるさ

original: Are you going to help?
string: 手を貸してくれるか？

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: I can't imagine living here. Or... being dead here. Or... whatever they'd call it. Ugh.
string: ここで生活を送るなんて想像できませんわ。私は生きていませんけれども… 誰がなんと言おうとお断りですわ… うぅっ

original: Wonderful. I'll make the necessary preparations for infusion into the Chalice presently.
string: 素晴らしい。では聖杯に注ぐものをすぐ準備する事にしよう

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 間違えれば… ええと。あたしが試した時の結果は知ってるよね

original: I think we have a better chance of surviving here, don't you?
string: ここでは死なずに済む可能性が高そうじゃない？

original: What day is it? What year? What era even?
string: 今日は何日？ 何年？ というか第何紀なんだ？

original: What? What are you talking about?
string: 何だって？ 何を言ってるんだ？

original: All that just to end up dumping it out? Makes no sense to me.
string: それを処分するためだけにこんな大騒ぎを？ まるで理屈に合いませんわ

original: Your blood will not protect you!
string: お前の血はお前を守ってはくれない！

original: If this ends up being a wasted trip, your friend Dexion and I are going to have some words when we get back.
string: もしこれが無駄骨に終わるようでしたら、戻ってからお友達のデキソンと話をしなければなりませんわね

original: Do you know where he's staying now?
string: 彼が今どこにいるか知っておりますの？

original: Serana isn't yours, she's mine!
string: セラーナはお前のものではない、私のものだ！

original: Are you okay? Almost thought I lost you there... you went white as the snow.
string: 大丈夫ですの？ あそこであなたが死んでしまうのかと思いましてよ… 雪みたいに白くなってしまったものですから

original: You'll also want to find Gunmar. Big brute of a Nord, hates vampires almost as much as I do.
string: ガンマーも見つけた方がいいな。冷酷なノルドの巨漢で、私と同じぐらい吸血鬼を憎んでいる

original: But please, do be discreet. Our aim isn't to stir the nest, just to skin a rat, reminding them that they are the prey.
string: だが、慎重に進めろ。目的は騒ぎを起こす事ではない。ちょっとネズミの皮をはいで、奴らに自身が獲物だと自覚させる事だ

original: The kinship between us is gone. I don't understand what he's become, but he's no longer the brother I once knew.
string: もはや我らが絆は失われてしまった。何者になってしまったのかは分からないが、今の彼を兄弟とは思えない

original: I mean, why would that idea even cross your mind?
string: つまり、どうしてそんな事考えつくわけ？

original: I wonder if my family misses me? I wonder if they're still alive. How much time has passed?
string: 家族は心配してるかな？ それ以前に、生きてるのかな。一体どれほどの時間が経ったんだ？

original: If Isran hadn't left the Order, this could've been our home.
string: イスランが教団から抜けていなければ、ここが家になっていたかも知れない

original: Agh...
string: ああ…

original: I can see that. This has been my life for a long time, though. Do you understand that much?
string: 承知しておりますわ。ですが、ずっとこうして生きてきましたの。それを分かっていまして？

original: Come, infidel, meet your end!
string: 異端者め、死を受け入れるがいい！

original: You can't stop the prophecy!
string: 予言を止められると思うな！

original: This stranger may call himself vampire, but he knows nothing of our struggle. Why should I entrust you to him?
string: このよそ者が吸血鬼を名乗ったとしても、私達の苦悩を何一つ知らないのよ。どうしてあなたを任せられる？

original: There's my wife...
string: 妻がいる

original: They were good people. I miss them.
string: いい人たちだった。会えなくて恋しい

original: We have a happy life together.
string: 一緒に暮らせて幸せだ

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: Fortunately, you're in a position to breach the barrier that surrounds these ruins.
string: 幸い、あなたはこの遺跡を囲む障壁を破る事ができる

original: Damn! What the...
string: しまった！ こんな…

original: An old jetty where boats would bring supplies to the castle. Once we moved in, it never got used, along with the rest of the undercroft.
string: 城に物資を運ぶ船がつけていた古い桟橋ですわね。わたし達が住みついてからは、地下の設備共々、一度も使いませんでしたわ

original: So, I see this dragon has fangs.
string: なるほど、このドラゴンには牙があるのだな

original: It was. What happened?
string: そうだな。何が起きたんだ？

original: How did you end up in the Soul Cairn?
string: どうしてこのソウル・ケルンに？

original: Go to Lord Harkon at once, beg him to turn you back. You're dead if you don't.
string: すぐにハルコン卿のもとへ行って、戻してもらうよう頼んできなさい。さもなければ死ぬわよ

original: I've found the infidel!
string: ここにいたか、異端者め！

original: Only thing that stood out for me was Auriel's Bow. That's a powerful weapon, and I sure as Oblivion don't want the vampires to get hold of it.
string: 私にとって意味があるのは、アーリエルの弓だけだった。吸血鬼には絶対渡したくない強力な武器だ

original: I had no idea you felt that way about me, Serana. It was never my intention to push you aside.
string: そんなふうに感じていたとは知らなかったわ、セラーナ。のけ者にするつもりなどなかった

original: The prey is here!
string: 獲物はここだ！

original: We're done with this when none of them are left standing. Let's go.
string: 奴らを根絶やしにして初めてこの件は片づいたと言えるんだ。行くぞ

original: I'm putting a lot of faith in you. Don't let me down.
string: とても信頼しているのよ。失望させないで

original: Okay, let's head into the portal.
string: いいですわ、それでは転移門に入りましょう

original: Not a lot of our kind here, I see. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 同族はあまりいないわね。驚く事でもないけど

original: Isran? My help?
string: イスラン？ 手を貸せと？

original: How did you actually become a vampire, then?
string: 実際にどのようにして吸血鬼になったんだ？

original: Does Isran have a problem with him?
string: イスランとの間に何か問題でも？

original: I've collected all the Amulets of Night Power.
string: 夜の力のアミュレットをすべて集めた

original: What type of assistance do you need?
string: 手を貸すにはどうすればいい？

original: I'm lucky I made it out alive.
string: 生きて逃げられただけでも幸運だった

original: Never mind that... it worked!
string: おっと… うまくいったみたいだ！

original: Serana? What are you doing here? Where's your father?
string: セラーナ？ ここで何をしているの？ あなたの父親はどこ？

original: The Hall was a place of respite, learning and comradeship, where a road-weary brother or sister could rest for a time in peace and comfort.
string: 番人の間は憩いと研さんと親交の場で、旅に疲れた仲間達がしばらく快適に、静かに休める所だった

original: By the Eight... look at the sky!
string: 八大神よ… 空を見ろ！

original: If there's anything I can do before you depart, you must let me know.
string: 出発前に何かできる事があれば、必ず知らせてちょうだい

original: Hmph... maybe so. Then again, I thought I could, too.
string: ふふん… そうかもね。でも、あたしもできると思ったんだよ

original: Windhelm eh? City of kings, they say. Hope you packed warm though.
string: ウィンドヘルムかい？ “王の都”と呼ばれる街さ。暖かくしていきなよ

original: My sincerest pardons, I but look after your own peace of mind.
string: 悪いね、でも君の心の平穏って奴が気になったんだ

original: We need to strike a crippling blow against them before they muster more men against us.
string: 奴らが我らに対してより多くの人数を集める前に、大打撃を与えねばならん

original: Mind yourself.
string: お気を付けて

original: Scattered across Tamriel are secluded locations known only as Ancestor Glades. There's one in Skyrim, in the Pine Forest.
string: タムリエルのあちこちには、先人の湿地と呼ばれる人里離れた場所が存在している。スカイリムにおいては、パイン・フォレストにその一つがある

original: Explain this "ritual."
string: その“儀式”について説明してほしい

original: Well, I think it's time I got back to my work as an alchemist.
string: さて、錬金術師としての仕事に戻る時が来たようね

original: Are there... people in your life?
string: 今まで、あなたの周りに… 仲間はおりましたの？

original: There is much to learn, but if you master the powers of the Vampire Lord, few enemies will be able to stand against you.
string: 学ぶ事は多々あるが、吸血鬼の王として力を体得すれば、お前に抗える敵はごくわずかとなるだろう

original: You've heard of the Bloodstone Chalice?
string: ブラッドストーンの聖杯を知っているか？

original: Yah!
string: ヤァ！

original: Heard anything about a Moth Priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Oh, gods...
string: ああ、神よ…

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈るわ

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: This was my mother's garden. It... do you know how beautiful something can be when it's tended by a master for hundreds of years?
string: ここは母の庭園でしたのよ。そうですわね… 名人が何百年も手掛けたものがどれほど美しくなるか、想像がつきまして？

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: How would you feel about turning them over to me?
string: 書を私に授けるというのはどうかな？

original: And since the Dawnguard are still around, that must not have happened.
string: それにドーンガードが目を光らせておりましたから、そんな事は起こったはずがありませんわ

original: When it comes to vampires, if you're sloppy or careless, you're dead. And good people will die because of you.
string: 吸血鬼に対処する時の、軽率な行動は死を意味する。君のせいで無実の者が死ぬかも知れない

original: So we're pinning the murder on the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードに濡れ衣を着せろと？

original: Nargh!
string: ぬああ！

original: Do you trust Harkon at all?
string: ハルコンのことは信頼しているのか？

original: Well met, sister.
string: こんにちは

original: Have you been paying attention? It's obvious my father's well beyond reason.
string: ちゃんとその目は見開いていて？ わたしの父は理屈を超えた存在ですのよ

original: Hmm?
string: ふふん？

original: Well, if I were a betting woman, I'd say it's a scraper of some sort.
string: 憶測でも構わないのでしたら、多分それはヘラか何かのようなものでしたわ

original: But we have to stop him. Before he goes too far. And to do that, we need the Elder Scroll.
string: それでも尚、お父様を止めなければなりませんわ。手遅れになる前に。そのためには星霜の書が必要ですのよ

original: Sure. Here you go. Can't understand a word of it, maybe it will do you some good.
string: いいよ。ほらどうぞ。何が書いてあるのかさっぱり分からんが、君には価値があるんだろうね

original: Is that where you were attacked?
string: そこで襲われたのか？

original: Really?
string: 本当か？

original: Accept my gift and I promise that you will learn the difference.
string: 我が贈り物を受け取れば、その差が分かると保証しよう

original: I need to trade some things with you.
string: 持ち物を交換したい

original: The ice entombs the heart. The bane of Kagrenac and Dagoth Ur.
string: 氷は心を埋葬する。カグレナクの遺産とダゴス・ウルの招いた災いだ

original: Dragons weren't enough. Now we've lost the sun too?
string: ドラゴンだけでは飽き足らず、今度は太陽まで失うと？

original: I'm sure Lord Harkon will be most pleased with your efforts. Find him at once.
string: 君の働きぶりをハルコン卿もきっと喜ぶだろう。今すぐ彼に会うといい

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をしてるんだ？

original: Tread lightly. The law is unaware of the danger and will treat you as a criminal if you are caught.
string: 行動は隠密にな。司法側はこの危険に気づいていないため、見られたら罪人扱いだ

original: When will you return to Tamriel?
string: タムリエルにはいつ帰るのか？

original: I'm not the most powerful of vampires, but I'm good with a hammer. See for yourself.
string: 最強の吸血鬼ではなくとも、鎚の扱いはうまいのよ。自分の目で確かめて

original: Stay your weapons. I would speak with you, Qahnaarin.
string: 武器を下ろすがいい、クァーナーリン。話がしたい

original: Hey! Grab my journal. If you survive, you're going to need it.
string: ねえ！ あたしの日記を手に入れて。生き残れば、それが必要になるよ

original: I had just moved from my ancestral home in Morrowind to the continent of Cyrodiil.
string: 祖先から受け継いだモロウウィンドの土地を離れ、シロディール大陸に渡ってきたばかりの時だ

original: Just tell me how much it will cost.
string: とにかく値段を言ってくれ

original: Not as much as I would like. Even after spending decades of my life in study of the Elder Scrolls, they remain a great mystery to me.
string: 望みどおりというわけではないがね。生涯の数十年を星霜の書の研究に費やしたが、まだ分からない事が多すぎる

original: I'm afraid I won't be able to help you with the scrolls any longer, milady.
string: 奥様、書の件に関してはもうお手伝いできそうにありません

original: They're indestructible, so they'd make good armor.
string: 破壊不能なら、防具として使えそうだ

original: Aggh...
string: あああ…

original: This structure is known as a wayshrine. They were used for meditation and for transport when the Chantry was a place of enlightenment.
string: この建造物は祠だ。かつて礼拝所が悟りを開くための場所だった頃、瞑想や移動のために使われていたのだ

original: All right. I'll hear out Isran, see if there's anything I can do to help.
string: 分かった。イスランの言い分を聞いて、力になれるかどうか考えよう

original: Can you tell me more about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について詳しく知りたい

original: That's what I wanted to hear.
string: その言葉を待っておりましたの

original: Even with these vampires gone, the fight isn't completely over. Once we're settled back in at the fort, there will be more work to do.
string: 吸血鬼どもがいなくなっても戦いは続く。砦に戻ったら、仕事が山ほど待っているぞ

original: Bedroom. (<Global=HDSolitudeBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室(<Global=HDSolitudeBedroom> ゴールド)

original: I'm sorry, I don't feel comfortable giving them to you.
string: ごめんなさい、これらをあなたに与える気にはなれないの

original: Well met, brother.
string: こんにちは

original: Without a Septim on the throne of the Empire, Dagon was able to leave Oblivion through the gates and attack.
string: 帝国の玉座にセプティムが不在となった事で、デイゴンは門を通ってオブリビオンから攻撃を仕掛ける事が可能になった

original: Whenever you're ready.
string: いつでもよしなに

original: What is so special about your Skooma?
string: そのスクゥーマは何が特別なんだ？

original: Who threw you in here?
string: 誰の手でここに送られたんだ？

original: Another elf, I see. I'm sure Vingalmo will be sizing you up as we speak, trying to figure if you're friend or foe.
string: またエルフか。こうして話している間にもヴィンガルモが品定めをして、敵か味方かを見極めている事だろうな

original: The Empire supports Elisif, but there are many in Skyrim loyal to Ulfric.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持しているが、スカイリムにはウルフリックに忠実な者が大勢いる

original: I'm sure you've heard a bit of what we're up against. Powerful vampires, unlike anything we've seen before.
string: 我々の敵について少しは耳にした事があるはずだ。我々がこれまで見た事のないほど、手強い吸血鬼の事を

original: We now have Auriel's Bow. The gods themselves have favored us and we must answer with action!
string: 今や我々はアーリエルの弓を手に入れた。神は我々を選んだのだ。その期待に行動で応えようではないか！

original: Vampires threaten all of Skyrim. We need your help.
string: 吸血鬼がスカイリム全土を脅かしている。力を貸してほしい

original: Arkay bless you, friend.
string: アーケイの祝福があらん事を

original: Give Harkon my regards... and a dagger to his heart.
string: ハルコンによろしく伝えて… 胸にはダガーを刺してきてちょうだい

original: But I guess I don't really factor in at this point.
string: けれども今となってはわたしの事など、どうでもよくなっているみたいですわね

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of woman is she?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。どんな奥様なのかしら？

original: What can you tell me about Dimhollow Crypt?
string: ディムホロウ墓地について聞かせてほしい

original: I can't even begin to imagine how much time she spent in this room. Doesn't look too cozy.
string: この部屋で一体どれだけ長い時間を過ごしたのかしら。そんなに居心地が良さそうには見えないのに

original: Send them to Oblivion!
string: オブリビオン送りだ！

original: Need... to sleep...
string: 眠らなくては…

original: Well that's just fine. Orthjolf told me to finish off anyone who got in the way.
string: 大丈夫だ。オースユルフは邪魔する奴全員を始末しろと言っていた

original: Need something?
string: 何か探してるのかい？

original: Look, what is it you want from me?
string: それで、そっちの要求は何なの？

original: Out of our way.
string: 邪魔だ

original: Now it's my turn.
string: 今度はこっちの番だ

original: Yes. I'm speaking of the Cliff Racer of course. Wretched things.
string: そう。言うまでもなく、クリフ・レーサーの事だ。忌々しい連中だったな

original: Garden. (<Global=HDRiftenGarden> gold)
string: 庭(<Global=HDRiftenGarden> ゴールド)

original: Well done. Nothing like a good kill to get the blood pumping, is there?
string: よくやったわ。いい殺しほど血の巡りを良くするものはないわよね？

original: I suppose she's right. I shouldn't let my personal feelings get in the way.
string: 彼女が正しいようだな。個人的な感情をここで挟むべきではない

original: But I can't worry about that now. We need the scroll, and she's our only lead.
string: でも今はそんな事を心配している場合ではありませんわ。書を手に入れなくては。彼女が唯一の手掛かりなのですから

original: Even before that, we weren't the most normal family. We did worship a daedra, remember?
string: それ以前も、普通の家庭ではございませんでしたわ。デイドラの信徒だったと言いましたわよね？

original: Sorry it had to be this way!
string: こうするしかありませんの！

original: They won't respond to you in any way other than believing that you're an Initiate and you're undertaking the journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: 彼らは最奥聖域を目指す新人の巡礼以外には、何の反応も示さない

original: Lord Harkon, defeated. I never imagined I'd see the day.
string: ハルコン卿の敗北。この日を見るとは想像もしなかった

original: Run, coward! You're a traitor to your race!
string: 逃げるがいい、同族を裏切った臆病者め！

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: Oh, what is it?
string: あら、何ですの？

original: Some Imperial scholar arrived in Skyrim a few days ago. I was staking out the road when I saw him pass by. Maybe that's your Moth Priest.
string: 数日前に帝国の学者がスカイリムにやってきた。路上で張り込みをしていたら、彼が通り過ぎるのが見えたんだ。多分あれは君の探している聖蚕の僧侶だろう

original: I... don't know who that is.
string: 存じませんわ… 誰なのかしら

original: This won't be easy. But we can handle it.
string: 簡単ではなくてよ。けれどもわたし達ならやれますわ

original: You need to concentrate, boy. Try it again.
string: 集中しろ、若いの。もう1回やってみろ

original: Then I think I shall see to the repairs. Thank you for your time.
string: では修理を手配しよう。手間を取らせたな

original: Go destroy the feral beast before this becomes a problem.
string: これが問題になる前に、野蛮な獣達を殺してきなさい

original: We still have to find the Forge itself. I had a lead on that, too.
string: 鋳造器具自体を見つけないと。その手掛かりもつかんでいたんだ

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: Never saw anything like this back on the island.
string: 島ではこんなのを見た事もありませんでしたのよ

original: If my knowledge of history serves me, I recall that the Dawnguard was an ancient order of vampire hunters.
string: 私の歴史観が確かなら、ドーンガードは吸血鬼ハンター達が集ういにしえの組織だったはずだ

original: He claims to serve loyally, but he really covets the throne. He sees himself in charge someday.
string: 彼は忠実に仕えてると言い張るけど、本当は玉座をほしがってるのさ。あわよくばって思ってるんだ

original: Now what was it I said to that prisoner? "Stand up, there you go. You were dreaming..." Yes, that was it.
string: あの囚人に何と言ったんだっけ？ 「ほら立って、行った行った。寝れば… 夢だって見るだろう」うん、そうだ

original: I think...
string: わたしは…

original: But she loved it. I don't know. I guess it's like having a piece of art, if you're into that sort of thing.
string: でも母は気に入っていましたわ。芸術品を持つようなものだったのかも知れませんわね。あなたにそういった趣味があるかは知りませんけれど

original: For centuries I searched for an answer to this problem. I found an old prophecy written by a Moth Priest, those scholars who read the Elder Scrolls.
string: 私は何世紀もこの問題の解決方法を探してきた。そして星霜の書を読んだという学者達、聖蚕の僧侶の一人が記した古い予言を発見した

original: How do I turn him into a vampire?
string: 彼を吸血鬼に変えるにはどうすれば？

original: Then we're finished.
string: ならばおしまいだ

original: This is the kind of thing I've been wanting to see.
string: こんな光景を見たいと思っておりましたの

original: I have killed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: A vicious night stalker rules over a group of bandits - seeks to gain leverage over the righteous.
string: 夜の闇に住む邪悪な者が山賊を率いて、善良な人々の世界を脅かしている

original: He's a very powerful man. Or he was at one point. I'm surprised another vampire hasn't heard of him.
string: 彼は凄い力を持っていますの。少なくとも、ある時点ではそうだった。他の吸血鬼が彼を知らないのが不思議ですわ

original: Looks like they're better at making traps than they are at making bridges.
string: 彼らは橋を造るよりも罠をこしらえる方が得意だったようですわね

original: Will I be able to keep these rings?
string: 指輪はそのままもらっていいのか？

original: Somewhere in the ice fields, if you want to try to find him.
string: もし彼を探す気があるのなら、氷原のどこかを当たってみたらいい

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Next time I say to please not go over the waterfall, maybe you'll listen to me.
string: だから滝の向こうには行かないでと頼みましたのに。少しは耳を貸す気になりまして？

original: I suppose I could... what, praytell, is there?
string: 何か… 教えてくれ、一体何をすれば？

original: Be careful who you trust. Not all of us have the court's best interests at heart.
string: 信頼する相手は慎重に選んだ方がいいよ。宮廷の利益を優先しない者も中にはいるからね

original: Come on!
string: かかってこい！

original: It looks like some kind of temple.
string: どうやら聖堂か何かのようですわね

original: Their focus will be shifted from us, giving us one less nuisance to deal with.
string: 人々の注目は我々からそれる。面倒がひとつ減るというわけだ

original: Of course. Why did I suppose differently. Fine, tell me what you know.
string: もちろんだ。考えてる事は同じだな。いいだろう、君が知ってる事を教えてくれ

original: Yeah, too bad. Lord Harkon's new favorite, dead so soon after joining the family.
string: ああ、残念だね。ハルコン卿の新しいお気に入りが、家族の一員になってそんなにすぐ死んでしまったなんて

original: Here we are.
string: 着いたか

original: Shouldn't we keep moving? I really want to get back home.
string: 先に進むべきではなくて？ 早く家に帰りたいですわ

original: What kind of a favor?
string: 頼み事とは？

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: Thanks again for saving my life.
string: 命を助けてもらって、改めてありがとう

original: This has certainly been quite the adventure, hasn't it?
string: ちょっとした冒険だったな。そうだろう？

original: Well, look. Kill me, you've killed one vampire. But if people are after me, there's something bigger going on.
string: なら、わたしを殺せば、吸血鬼を1人仕留めた事になりますわ。けれども、大勢がわたしを追うのは、何かもっと大変な事が起きている証拠ですのよ

original: They request Auriel's Bow, and I request their assistance. It's been repeated so many times, I can't imagine it any other way.
string: 誰もがアーリエルの弓を求め、こちらは見返りに手伝いを頼む。数えきれないほど繰り返して、もはや他のやりとりなど想像もできない

original: How did you die?
string: どうして死んだんだ？

original: I'm a little nervous about all of this.
string: こういう事に、ちょっと神経質になっておりますの

original: These Falmer are... they're frozen in the ice.
string: このファルメル達… 氷漬けになっていますわ

original: Alright! One more set of dwemer plans to go.
string: さて！ ドゥーマーの図面も、残り1組よ

original: Look out! Gargoyles!
string: 気を付けて！ ガーゴイルですわ！

original: Was it "Having the adoration of thousands..." No, wait. I could make it "the adoration of tens of thousands."
string: 「数千人の歓呼を受けて」… いや、待った。「数万人」と書いたかも知れない

original: Did I start with my ride on the prison ship, or was it before that?
string: 冒頭は護送船に乗るところからだったか、その前だったかな？

original: Ah, so that was a Moth Priest, then?
string: ああ、するとあれは聖蚕の僧侶だったってわけか？

original: I've helped you all that I can. The rest is up to you.
string: できるだけ手は貸したつもりだ。あとは君次第だよ

original: I'm glad we found the scroll, but I... I wish she could come with us.
string: 書が見つかったのは嬉しいですわ、でも… 母にも一緒に来てほしかった

original: You are the Dovahkiin, the Dragonborn. You may not be one of us in body, but you have earned the right to bear this title.
string: そなたはドヴァーキン、すなわちドラゴンボーンなのだ。身体は我らの一員ではなくとも、この称号を名乗る資格を勝ち得ている

original: A sword. (25 husks)
string: 剣(魂のハスク25個)

original: I'm going to hold on to them for now.
string: 今は手元に持っておくことにする

original: I don't know. I honestly don't know. After all these years, it's a miracle even this much survived.
string: 分からないよ、全然全く。これほどの歳月を経て、これだけでも残っていたのが奇跡だ

original: Otherwise, you're a threat to all of us.
string: さもないと、我々全員の脅威となる

original: Leave it to my mother... always smarter than I gave her credit for.
string: それは母の手に委ねましょう… 母はいつもわたしが思うよりも賢明でしたわ

original: It may seem cruel that we hold our thin-blooded kin in low esteem. But our needs must come before theirs.
string: 血の薄い同族を蔑むのは残酷に思えるかも知れん。だが彼らより我らの需要が優先されるべきだ

original: There you are!
string: そこだ！

original: Precisely.
string: 全くその通りですのよ

original: Yes, but when I was here it wasn't so... crumbly. This used to be a city.
string: ええ、でもわたしがいた頃はここまで… 崩れかかっていませんでしたわ。大きな街でしたのよ

original: But if you want to know the whole story, help me get back to my family's home.
string: でも、すべてが知りたいのでしたら、わたしを家族が住む家に帰して頂きますわよ

original: I can smell your blood!
string: お前の血の匂いがするわ！

original: I think... mostly I hate what it's done to my family.
string: 多分… 家族にされた事が、我慢できなかった

original: So, this was my old stomping grounds. Not the most normal childhood.
string: 昔はここでよく遊びましたわ。ごく普通の子供時代とは言えませんわね

original: You've managed to turn into one of them. Wonderful. I won't kill you, but you'd better get yourself cured.
string: 彼らの仲間になれたわけね。大層な事だわ。殺しはしないけど、治療を受けた方がいいわよ

original: A handful of soul gem shards, some finely-ground bone meal, a good bit of purified void salts...
string: 魂石の破片をいくつか、細かく引いた骨の粉、浄化された虚無の塩をかなりの量…

original: Have we angered the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターを怒らせてしまったのだろうか？

original: I'm ready to go when you are.
string: わたくしはいつでもよくてよ

original: You have the bow...
string: 君は弓を持ってる…

original: Little patience for talk? Good. Let's end this!
string: 言葉を交わすのも面倒か？ ならば決着をつけてやろう！

original: It's ironic that we're "helping" these priests.
string: 司祭たちに“協力している”のは皮肉な話だ

original: DLC1VQ04Hellos
string: DLC1VQ04Hellos

original: All right. I'll meet you at the glade.
string: そうですわね。湿地でお会いしましょう

original: Good. I prefer to nip budding problems before they reach full bloom. I trust it wasn't too much of an effort on your part.
string: よろしい。問題は早めに摘み取っておきたい。お前にとってはさほどの手間ではないだろう

original: My wares? I, uh... Oh so sorry, I'm all sold out.
string: 商品を？ あの… 悪いけど、全部売れちゃったんだ

original: Now, what were you saying?
string: で、何の話だったかな？

original: No, sire. I have not.
string: いいえ。まだです

original: Unh!
string: あああ！

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: A wondrous blade... ahhh, never mind. Just take the darn thing.
string: これぞ伝説の剣… あああ、気にしないでくれ。持っていきな

original: I knew it was only a matter of time before your ambition outgrew your loyalty.
string: お前の野心が忠誠心を追い落とすのも、時間の問題だとは分かっていた

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: I see you've already taken it upon yourself to gather the information you seek.
string: 求める情報は自分で集める責任を引き受けたらしいね

original: I no longer hunger, grow weary or feel anything but loneliness.
string: お腹も減らないし、疲れもしないし、何も感じない。孤独以外はな

original: Peace at last...
string: ようやく平穏が…

original: I do. It's how the vampire has survived for millennia, and the only way we can continue to survive in the future.
string: ええ。そうやって吸血鬼は何千年も生き延びてきた。そして私達が将来も生存し続けられる唯一の方法よ

original: Are you alright? Come on, we can do this. I know we can.
string: 大丈夫ですわね？ さあ、きっとやり遂げられますわ

original: Running is your only chance to live.
string: 逃げられなきゃ終わりだ

original: Put her mind to rest, allay her fear through vampiric seduction and when she is in a pliant condition, embrace her and bite her on the neck.
string: 彼女の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼女が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: I already found all of the ingredients.
string: 材料は全部見つけた

original: If you find any more Elder Scrolls lying about, be sure to let me know!
string: また星霜の書を見つけたら、必ず教えてくれよ！

original: I once killed thirty vampires with my bare hands, you know. Ask Arkay, he'll tell you.
string: 昔、吸血鬼30人を素手で殺した事があるんだ。嘘だと思ったら、アーケイに聞いてみろ

original: What did she research?
string: 研究の内容は？

original: We hunt down and kill vampires. Haven't you been paying attention?
string: 我々は吸血鬼を追い詰めて殺す。知らなかったのか？

original: Excellent. I trust he'll find his situation more accommodating, now that he is a member of the family.
string: 素晴らしい。彼は今や家族の一員だから、肩の荷も少しはおりるだろう

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Lah...Haas!
string: ラー…ハース！

original: I suppose you're right. I should have a little more faith.
string: それはそうかも。もう少し信じるようにすべきなのかも…

original: This is the power that I offer!
string: この力が手に入るのだぞ？

original: Good luck out there.
string: 幸運を祈りますわ

original: (Panting)
string: ハッ、ハッ、ハッ、ハッ、ハッ

original: Don't know how well I'd have managed by myself. You have my thanks.
string: 自力ではどうなるか分からなかった。ありがたい

original: The sooner we get the scroll home, the sooner we deal with my father.
string: 早く書を持ち帰る事ができましたら、それだけ早く父と決着をつけられますのよ

original: Hmmm... I see. Clever dwarves. With a similar technique and a little tinkering I should be able to improve the capabilities of our crossbows.
string: ふーん… なるほど。頭のいいドワーフね。同じような技術を使って、少し手を加えれば、クロスボウの威力を上げられるはずよ

original: Take a deep breath and let it out as you fire.
string: 深く息を吸って、発射する時に吐き出すんだ

original: You wouldn't like it.
string: …これでも冗談のつもりでしたのよ

original: The Empire supported Elisif, but Ulfric now controls Skyrim.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持していたが、現在はウルフリックがスカイリムを支配している

original: I will herald the fall of eternal night!
string: 我こそは、永遠の闇の始まりを告げる者だ！

original: Do you still feel that way?
string: まだそう思うのか？

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何？

original: A shrine to Molag Bal, the mighty Daedra Prince who is father to all our kind.
string: 我々の同朋すべての父であるデイドラの王子、モラグ・バルをまつった祠だ

original: The prophecy's end approaches!
string: 予言された終末は近いぞ！

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: But be warned. The Jarl's guards are unaware of the threat, and will treat violence against this "advisor" as a crime.
string: だが注意しろよ。首長の衛兵達はその企みに気づいていない。もし“特別顧問”に危害を加えようとしたら、それは犯罪行為とみなされるだろう

original: Good job.
string: よくやったわ

original: I'm afraid there's not much more to tell. Even today, the Elder Scrolls remain a great enigma.
string: これ以上話せる事はないよ。今日においても尚、星霜の書は大きな謎に包まれているからね

original: Besides this isn't so bad when you think about it.
string: これはこれで、まあ悪くはないがな

original: What... have I done... Auri-Eil forgive me...
string: 私は… 一体何を… アーリエルよ、ご慈悲を…

original: We've been so terribly fortunate. I can't wait to see what's in these drawings.
string: 最高にツイてるわ。この図面に何が描かれてるのか、早く確認したい

original: Auriel's Bow. Well done, indeed.
string: アーリエルの弓か。実によくやった

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of bandits. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 野蛮な血の者が山賊の一団と一緒に潜伏したわ。おそらく同族の隠れ場所を作りたいのね

original: It's fine, it can just be kind of a sore subject.
string: 構いませんわ、嫌な話なのは、自分で分かっておりますの

original: In keeping with tradition, you must use a specific tool in the Ancestor Glade, an implement known as a Draw Knife.
string: 伝統に従って、ドローナイフと呼ばれる特別な道具を先人の湿地で使用するんだ

original: An old escape tunnel from the castle exits there. I think that's our way in.
string: 昔の脱出用トンネルが城からそこまでつながっていますわ。あそこから入れるはずですわよ

original: Watch your back.
string: 背後に気をつけろ

original: I like what Isran has done with the place. It's good to see someone else who's really prepared.
string: あそこでは、イスランはいい仕事をしたわね。自分の他にも有事に備えている人がいると分かって嬉しいわ

original: Ain't too often we get a visitor like that.
string: ああいう客人は珍しいからな

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: I think perhaps... I think you did more than that. You have my thanks.
string: 多分… 君はそれ以上の事をしてくれたと思う。ありがとう

original: Count yourself fortunate that I'm a forgiving man. Now, be still while I give you the ancient blood once more.
string: 私が寛大な心の持ち主でよかったな。古き血をもう一度与えてやる。じっとしていろ…

original: Any luck finding my pages yet?
string: 原稿は見つかったか？

original: You really don't look well. Have you talked to Florentius? Maybe he can help you.
string: 相当具合が悪そうだけど、フロレンティウスに話してみた？ 彼なら力になってくれるわよ

original: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
string: ブリーズホーム、ホワイトランの家だ

original: Enjoy your hunt.
string: 良い狩りを

original: Do me this simple honor and I will fight at your side as your Grah-Zeymahzin, your Ally, and teach you my Thu'um.
string: 名誉を証し立てるべく、グラー・ゼイマージンはそなたの兄弟として共に戦場を駆けん。さあ、我がスゥームを授けよう

original: Wound up turning into a vampire. The Jarl, unable to kill his own son, spent a fortune building this keep and hiring men to guard it.
string: 息子は結局吸血鬼になった。首長は我が子を殺す事ができず、大金をはたいてこの砦を築き、守りを固めるために人を雇った

original: Here I am. Human as ever.
string: これがわたし。元の人間の姿ですの

original: Whether or not you've become one of us in order to survive the Soul Cairn, you're still a vampire hunter at heart.
string: ソウル・ケルンを生き延びるために私達の仲間になってもならなくても、心は今でも吸血鬼ハンターなんだわ

original: I've sensed the blood pulsing a little stronger, of late. I had assumed you had as well.
string: 最近血の鼓動をより強く感じるわ。あなたも同じだと思っていた

original: Why haven't you pursued the prophecy?
string: 予言を追い求めていない理由は？

original: It appears the Nords won.
string: ノルドらが勝利したようだな

original: You got it. Horse, wagon and all. Plopped here without so much as a word.
string: 馬でも馬車でも何でもありさ。何も言わなくてもここにドサっと集まるんだ

original: I've often asked myself that very same question. The blinding of my race was supposedly accomplished with a toxin.
string: ずっと、同じ事を疑問に思っていた。種族の皆は、毒を使って光を奪われたはずなのだ

original: Yes, I did. When I told you that I was grateful for my daughter's safe return, I told the truth. But I did not tell you everything.
string: そうだな。娘が無事に戻って感謝している、というのは事実だ。だがその先がある

original: The world is alive, and so am I, for once.
string: 世界もわたしも、今は生命に溢れているみたい

original: So I'm thinking that wasn't the right way.
string: ですから、道を間違えたのではないかと思っておりますの

original: It is time to cull the weak.
string: 弱者を処分する時だ

original: Was I wrong?
string: 違いまして？

original: They say if a vampire so much as scratches you, you'll turn into one. That better not be true.
string: 吸血鬼にひっかかれただけで吸血鬼へと変わると言う。真実じゃないといいがな

original: Rrrraaaaarrggghhhh!
string: らああああぐ！

original: Where did he go?
string: どこへ行ったんだ？

original: W...Where's the sun?
string: 太陽は… どこ？

original: I assure you, no harm was done. In truth, your strength surprises me. Not all mortals can withstand my embrace.
string: 心配せずとも、害はない。正直なところ、お前の強靭さには驚いた。我が抱擁に耐えきれぬ定命の者もいる

original: Don't worry, I think we can make a Dawnguard out of you. Here, take this crossbow and let's see how you shoot.
string: 大丈夫だ。我々が君を立派なドーンガードにしてやろう。ほら、このクロスボウでちょっと腕前を見せてくれ

original: That will make them all more upset to have one of their citizens slain, and under such flimsy pretense.
string: そうすれば仲間を殺された事に対する市民の怒りは倍増する。見え透いた手だがうまくいくだろう

original: I'll remember this.
string: この事は忘れませんわ

original: Don't speak to me, meat.
string: 気安く話しかけないで

original: Tolan was right. And he's dead. The vampires killed him.
string: トランの言っていた通りだ、本人は死んでしまったが。吸血鬼らにやられて

original: Oh, most certainly! Let's find out what secrets the scroll can tell.
string: もちろんだとも！ 書に隠された秘密を探ろうじゃないか

original: This is generally performed at the Imperial Library, but as history has shown us, that isn't always possible.
string: 解読作業は主に帝国図書館で行われるが、歴史を見れば分かるように、それが不可能な場合もあるんだ

original: I don't trust that man, and I don't want him here.
string: あの男は信用できない。ここにはいてほしくないな

original: Destroy the Keepers that are tending them, and it should bring the barrier down.
string: それを見張っている番人達を倒せば、障壁は崩れるはずよ

original: Afraid my memory can't be bought with what you've got there.
string: 悪いけどそこに持っているものでは記憶がよみがえらないな

original: Maybe.
string: そうですわね

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: Do you think mudcrabs might've taken it? I saw one the other day... Wouldn't be surprised if it followed me here.
string: マッドクラブに取られたのかしら？ この前、見かけたから… あの時、ここまでついて来たのかも知れないわ

original: Have you made up your mind?
string: 決心はつきまして？

original: After all these years, Lady Serana's back. Now that's something.
string: 長年行方不明になっていたセラーナ様が戻ってくるとは。驚いたよ

original: I know you didn't know your parents. But if they were anything like mine, you're better off.
string: あなたに両親がいないのは存じておりますが、わたしの両親みたいなのでしたら、いない方がマシですわよ

original: If the Moth Priest has guards, show them no mercy.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が護衛を連れている場合、護衛には容赦するな

original: That... well, that might change things.
string: そうか…それなら話が変わってくるな

original: That's it...
string: それでいい…

original: Allow me to gather some of my things and I'll head back to Castle Volkihar.
string: 荷物をまとめさせて。それからヴォルキハル城へ向かいましょう

original: Where do I begin?
string: どこから始める？

original: If you're so worried about the trolls, why agree to let me go ahead with it?
string: トロールの事がそこまで心配なら、何故止めなかったんだ？

original: Vampire, yes.
string: そう、吸血鬼ですのよ

original: Look what it did to your family.
string: そのせいで家族がどうなったかを考えてみろ

original: So don't get your hopes up. It's mostly lies, leavened with rumor and conjecture.
string: だから期待はしないでくれ。ユーモアや憶測はなかなか面白くて退屈しないが、ほとんどは嘘だ

original: Then I'll take it from your corpse! Kill him!
string: ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！ 奴の望みを絶て！

original: Your wife, kidnapped!
string: 奥さんが、さらわれた！

original: Good thing the boss heard that old farmer running his mouth off in the tavern about finding this place.
string: 親分が酒場で老いた農民からこの場所について聞き出せたのは幸運だった

original: It's gone now.
string: 消えたよ

original: I knew it! I knew Arkay would save me. I asked for help, and he sent you!
string: やっぱり！ アーケイが救ってくれた。彼に助けを求めたから、あんたが来たんだ

original: These people seem nervous, which makes me nervous.
string: ここの人達はなんだか張り詰めているように見えますわ。それでわたしも気が張ってしまいますのね

original: So these Initiates had to lug around a heavy pitcher of water. Marvelous.
string: それであの新入り達は重たい水差しを抱えて歩き回らなければならなかったというわけですのね。素晴らしいですわ

original: The ability to summon powerful undead guardians as one would conjure an atronach or daedra.
string: 精霊やデイドラを魔法で呼び出すように、強力なアンデッド・ガーディアンを召喚する能力よ

original: Her blood will be mine!
string: その娘の血は私のものだ！

original: May Auri-El light your path.
string: アーリエルの導きを

original: ...Yeah. I thought I was prepared for anything. How can you prepare for a damned earthquake?
string: …ああ。備えは万全だと思っていた。でも地震に対してどう準備できる？

original: Of course not. He's an elf, isn't he?
string: そんなはずないだろう。奴はエルフだぞ？

original: Kill your brother, why?
string: 兄弟を殺せと？ 理由は？

original: I'll stain the ground with your blood!
string: 血の海でもがき苦しめ！

original: I studied with the Faculty of Chirurgeons in Cloudrest. I walked with the Hollow-Faced Men of Nohotogrha for three years.
string: クラウドレストの外科教授陣に学んだわ。ノホトグラの穴あき顔男どもと三年間一緒に過ごしながら

original: Right. Well, you can relax. I have it under control.
string: そうか、なら安心しろ。こちらで何とかする

original: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
string: プラウドスパイヤー邸、ソリチュードの家だ

original: I don't converse with my meals.
string: 自分の食べ物とは話さないわ

original: Very good. Should you visit her again, I suspect you'll find our new sibling appreciates her transformation.
string: 素晴らしい。彼女に次会った時、我々の新しい同胞として自分に起こった変化を感謝してる事が分かるだろう

original: Are you sure? I'm willing to turn you, but you need to think it through.
string: 本当に？ わたしとしてはあなたを変えてもいいけれど、入念に考えないと

original: What foul magic could put the sun out?
string: どんな卑劣な魔法を使えば太陽を消せるんだ？

original: Why, because of that story about the prophecy? About some vampire trying to put the sun out?
string: あの予言の事か？ 吸血鬼が太陽を消そうとしているという？

original: Look, I've just gotten myself out of quite a mess here, in case you haven't noticed, and while I appreciate your help, I...
string: 分からないのか、やっと大きな問題が片づいたばかりなんだ。助けてくれたのは感謝するが、そんな事…

original: Well, then...  Best of luck to you.
string: そうか… なら幸運を祈る

original: Vampires, perhaps?
string: 吸血鬼とかかな？

original: Is he working for my father?
string: 父の下で働いておりますの？

original: The second scroll declares that "The Blood of Coldharbour's Daughter will blind the eye of the Dragon."
string: 二つめの書は、「コールドハーバーの娘の血がドラゴンを失明させるであろう」と示している

original: Don't tell me you're that naive.
string: まさか本気で信じておりませんわよね

original: I'd like to treat some arrows with your blood.
string: 矢を処理するのに血を提供してほしい

original: I'm afraid he's a few years too late. I've moved on. I have more important business to attend to.
string: 数年前に言ってくれればな。あいにく新しい暮らしに移ってしまって、外せない用事がある

original: How did you survive the vampires' attack?
string: 吸血鬼の襲撃を生き延びられたのは？

original: I've already got an animal with me, maybe next time.
string: もう動物を連れているので、またいつかな

original: Prison? You mean the Soul Cairn?
string: 監獄？ ソウル・ケルンのことか？

original: You think I can't tell my own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
string: 自分が何者かも、分からないように見えまして？ 目を開けなくても、匂いで気づくぐらいですわ

original: So that's how you got here.
string: そうしてここにやって来たわけか

original: Well Arkay isn't going to intervene... not here, not now. Best point yourself towards Morthal, find a man named Falion.
string: アーケイは手を出すつもりはない… 今、ここではな。モーサルへ向かって、そこでファリオンという男を探すといい

original: The feast never ends here in Castle Volkihar.
string: ここヴォルキハル城では日夜宴が催されている

original: No, sorry. It's 4,000 coins or no deal.
string: いいや、4000ゴールドじゃなけりゃ売るつもりはない

original: I seek the knowledge of the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書についての知識がほしい

original: The Ideal Masters's weakness is their insatiable hunger for pure souls.
string: アイディール・マスターの弱点は、純粋な魂への飽く事のない飢え

original: I wish to regain the gift of beast blood.
string: 獣の血の恩恵を再び受けたい

original: Oh, they definitely were.
string: ええ、間違いなくそうでしたわ

original: Did you spend a lot of time down here?
string: よくここに来ていたのか？

original: But we all took part in it. Not really wholesome family activity, but I guess it's something you do when you give yourselves to a daedric lord.
string: ですが、確かにその場にはおりましたわ。家族でやるような事ではございませんけれど、デイドラの王に仕える者としては普通の事ですのよ

original: Listener! Fancy seeing you out here.
string: 聞こえし者！ ここで会うなんて奇遇ね

original: In that case, I'm glad you're the one doing it.
string: だとしたら、君に頼めたのは幸いだった

original: Nobody really knows.
string: 誰も本当の事を知りませんわ

original: It belongs among our kind, not gathering mold in some vagabond's treasure pile.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。放浪人の宝の山の中でカビを生やしたりなどしてないよ

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Go, then, and do not forget who is your master.
string: さあ行くがいい。くれぐれも誰が主君であるのかを忘れるなよ

original: The Dawnguard have increased their operations and have been aggressively recruiting.
string: ドーンガードはその活動範囲を広げ、積極的に構成員を募集している

original: Feed well.
string: よく食べなさい

original: Brother Adalvald had been there not long ago. Said he found something of great importance.
string: アダルヴァルド修道士はほんの少し前にそこに行き、何かとても重大なものを発見したと言っていた

original: Very well. I am Harkon, lord of this court. By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
string: いいだろう。私の名はハルコン、この一族を率いている。我々の素性については娘から聞いている事だろう

original: Does it bother you that I'm here?
string: わたし、お邪魔かしら？

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: I will darken the skies!
string: 空を暗くしてやる！

original: You can't hide, father!
string: 隠れても無駄ですわ、お父様！

original: I knew I heard something!
string: 何か聞こえたぞ！

original: I'm no fan of the sun, but it would be better than this.
string: 太陽は好きではありませんけれど、これよりはマシなはずですわ

original: Others think they use them as payment to an even higher power... almost like a currency. A very strange currency.
string: より大きな力への代償として彼らはそれを使うという人もおりますし… まるでお金ですわね。お金にしては奇妙ですけれど

original: Once again, the Elder Scrolls have proven their value.
string: 星霜の書が自らの価値をまた証明したわけだ

original: Your powers are nothing!
string: 通用しませんわよ！

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: I can't afford to make any assumptions. That's how people wind up dead.
string: 仮定の話をする余裕はない。そんな事をしてたら死ぬのがオチだ

original: Thought you'd never ask.
string: 誘って下さるとは思いませんでしたわ

original: I understand.
string: 分かりますわ

original: Let me address the Dawnguard, and then we'll be off. The men deserve to know that we've finally gained the upper hand.
string: ドーンガードに話をさせてくれ。それから出発だ。我々がついに有利な状況に立った事を知る権利が彼らにはある

original: Despite my present low estate, I am no beggar. Begone until you have the coin to warrant my skills.
string: 今の地位が低くとも、物乞いではないわ。私の技術を受けられる現金ができるまで消えなさい

original: Is your... pet keeping you entertained?
string: お前は… そのペットで満足しているのか？

original: What's the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: The amulets increase the effectiveness of your vampiric powers.
string: アミュレットは君の吸血鬼としての力を高めてくれるんだ

original: Back, huh? Well, price is still 4,000 coins.
string: 戻ったのか？ 値段は変わらず4000ゴールドだ

original: Don't you worry about me. I've been through worse. I'll come out of this just fine.
string: 心配するな。もっとひどい状況も生き延びてきたんだ。今度も切り抜けてみせる

original: Living with you would be perfect.
string: あなたと一緒に住めれば言うことはない

original: So you're just going to give up?
string: あっさりあきらめるのか？

original: I think even Gunmar's been impressed with what we've managed to do with the Dwemer drawings. Let's see what we can do with these ones!
string: ドゥーマーの図面から作り出したものには、あのガンマーでさえ驚いたはずよ。今度はどんな発見があるのかしら！

original: There are plenty of other adventures I've had over the years, but you'll just have to read my next work to find out.
string: 他にも多くの冒険を経験しているけど、その話が知りたければ次の作品を読むといいんじゃないかな

original: What was this place?
string: この場所は？

original: Exactly.
string: その通りでございます、ってね

original: Your choice.
string: あなた次第ですわ

original: I'll be around here if you need me.
string: ここにおりますわ、用がありましたらまた

original: My sister in darkness. While it's good to see you, we'll keep up appearances, yes?
string: 闇の姉妹よ。会えてうれしいけれど、平静を装いましょう。いいわね？

original: A spell tome. (25 husks)
string: 呪文の書(魂のハスク25個)

original: I merely wish to respectfully ask a favor of you.
string: そなたに頼み事をさせてもらいたい

original: Forgive me... Auri-El...
string: ご慈悲を… アーリエル…

original: This time, to the death!
string: 今こそ死ぬがいい！

original: I love it when dinner walks right into my arms.
string: 自分から夕食になりに来るがいい

original: I don't know, but she must be connected.
string: わからないが、人脈はありそうだった

original: What did this area used to be?
string: この一帯、元々は？

original: I need to go there anyway.
string: いずれにせよそこに行かないと

original: Come now, and hear my proclamation.
string: さあ、我が宣言を聞くがいい

original: You're mine!
string: お前は私のだ！

original: Amazing...
string: すごいな…

original: Good.
string: いい返事だ

original: Oh thank you, milord. Thank you!
string: 旦那様… ありがとうございます！

original: Just hit them, and they'll... do whatever it is they're supposed to do.
string: 叩いてみて、そうすれば… 必要な仕掛けを担ってくれるはず

original: I'm ready to learn about my new powers.
string: 新たな力について知りたい

original: Die, mortal!
string: 死ね、定命の者め！

original: Revel in your power.
string: 自分の力を満喫したまえ

original: He stopped in to do some research in the library, then left for Dragon Bridge. If you hurry, you might catch him there.
string: 図書館で調べ物をしに立ち寄った後に、ドラゴン・ブリッジに向かったようだ。急げば向こうで追いつけるかもな

original: We can't give up. There's no one else to stand against these monsters.
string: あきらめるわけにはいかない。あの化け物達に抗えるのは我々だけだ

original: Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald thought it contained some long-lost vampire artifact. It seems he was right.
string: ディムホロウ墓地か。あそこにはるか昔の吸血鬼の秘宝があるとアダルヴァルド修道士は考えていたみたいだが、その通りだったようだ

original: Look at the device here - the gear in the center is just about the right size. Try putting the shards in and... we'll see what happens.
string: ここの機器を見て… 中心の歯車がちょうどいい大きさだね。破片をはめ込んでみて… どうなるか確かめてみよう

original: I wonder what we're up against here.
string: 一体、何と戦わなくちゃいけないのかしら

original: How about right here, in the castle?
string: この城の中は？

original: Must be gone now.
string: 行ったか

original: Very well, then.
string: それでは

original: What now, Isran?
string: 次はどうすればいい、イスラン？

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: All right. Here's the extract.
string: いいでしょう。これがエキスよ

original: "Just step into the painting" he said. Yeah, sure... like it's that simple.
string: 彼の言う通り、「絵の中に入っただけ」。そうよ… 簡単で素敵だと思ったのよ

original: By the Eight...
string: なんて事だ、八大神よ…

original: I can't do everything for you.
string: なんでもして差し上げるわけにはいかなくてよ

original: What do you do here?
string: ここではどんな役目を？

original: Maybe you're finally ready to list to me.
string: ようやく耳を貸す気になったのかしら

original: Report to Isran at Fort Dawnguard. And get moving if you're serious about it. The vampires aren't going to wait around to make their next move.
string: ドーンガード砦にいるイスランに会え。本気なら急ぐんだ。吸血鬼達は次の行動を起こすのを待ってはくれないぞ

original: Very well. I suppose a moment or two of my time couldn't hurt.
string: そうだな。時間はいくらでもある事だし

original: It can stay for now, but if it so much as lays a finger on anyone here, I'll hold you responsible. Got it?
string: 奴がここにいるのは構わないが、ここの誰かに少しでも危害を加えたら、それは君のせいだ。いいな？

original: The sooner we get out of this place, the better.
string: できるだけ早くここから出た方がよろしくてよ

original: I'm ready.
string: 準備はできてる

original: Does it bother you that we're working with your father?
string: 父親に協力していることが気になる？

original: You're welcome here, as long as you don't overfeed on the thralls.
string: 従徒達の血を吸いすぎさえしなければ、歓迎する

original: Auri-El... save me...
string: アーリエルよ… ご加護を…

original: Oh. All right, then.
string: あら。でしたら構いませんわ

original: Pah, your blood is foul.
string: うっ、お前の血ときたら酷い味だ

original: If you can prove you're reliable, maybe you can join the Dawnguard. We have ways of dealing with vampires.
string: 君が頼りになると証明されたら、ドーンガードに参加してもいい。我々は吸血鬼の扱いに慣れている

original: Where do you need to go?
string: 行き先は？

original: Drinking it gives you strength, but it also gets you pretty messed up... That's why we thought of putting it in the skooma.
string: 飲むと力が湧くんだけど、何しろ副作用が酷くてね… だからスクゥーマに混ぜようと考えたってわけ

original: You said you were in prison?
string: 投獄されていたと？

original: May Auri-El's brilliance illuminate your path.
string: アーリエルの光が行く手を照らさん事を

original: You've done Lord Harkon two great services. Take what you've learned to heart, and be careful who you trust.
string: つまりお前はハルコン卿へ二つの大きな貢献をしたのだ。学び得た事を肝に銘じ、信頼する相手は慎重に選べ

original: Oh my, that's... Well, that's not exactly what I had in mind.
string: おお、それは… ちょっと予想外だな

original: There were ten of them in all. Find them for me, please, I beg you!
string: 原稿は全部で10枚。探してきてくれ、頼む、お願い！

original: I see you, heathen!
string: 見つけたぞ、野蛮人め！

original: Something's not right here. Be careful. I think we may be in for some trouble.
string: ここはどうも変ですわね。気を付けて。面倒な事になったようですわ

original: Hard to say. Maybe if we found the missing crests, we could figure it out.
string: それは何とも。なくなっているクレストを見つければ、解明できるかも知れませんわね

original: I did. But something about you makes me think I can trust you. I hope I'm not wrong.
string: そういたしましたわ。でもあなたは何故か、信用してもいい気がしておりますの。勘違いじゃなければいいのですが

original: Thank the divines for you!
string: 神々に感謝を！

original: Those last ones helped me immensely. If you could collect this one for me, it's sure to result in extraordinary success!
string: 前に見つかった分は、すごく役に立ったわ。また見つけてきてくれたら、驚きの成果が挙げられると思うの！

original: Now your blood is mine!
string: お前の血は私がいただく！

original: It's time for us to part ways.
string: ここで別れよう

original: Farewell, and good journey milady.
string: では奥様、よい旅を

original: Get the ingredients in the vessel and let me know when you're ready.
string: 材料を器に入れて、準備ができましたらお知らせになって

original: Finally, a trace of honesty in our little conversation.
string: ようやく会話に誠実さの片鱗が見えたな

original: What makes you say that?
string: どうしてわかる？

original: Yes. These vampires are a new threat, and a truly deadly one.
string: ええ。吸血鬼は新たな脅威であり、その影響力は致命的よ

original: I'm not going to die like this!
string: こんなふうに死ぬつもりはありませんのよ！

original: Be on your guard at all times. Avoid sleep if you can... Sleep is for the weak.
string: 警戒を常に怠るなよ。できれば眠らない方がいい… 眠るのは弱者だけだ

original: Totally unprepared for any real threat. And yet I was the one ridiculed for trying to be ready for anything.
string: 本物の脅威という奴にまったく備えがなかった。そして私は何かに備えようとして、周りから笑われたんだよ

original: Are you saying Harkon means to kill her?
string: ハルコンは彼女を殺すつもりだと？

original: You want to find him, try talking to anyone who'd meet a traveler. Innkeepers and carriage drivers in the big cities maybe. But you're on your own.
string: 彼を見つけたいなら、旅人を相手にする連中をあたればいい。大きな街の宿屋の主人とか、馬車の御者とか… 君自身の足でこなすんだ

original: I need to find a Moth Priest.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探している

original: True. But I know a way we can get to the courtyard without arousing suspicion.
string: そのようですわね。けれども騒ぎを起こさずに中庭まで行く方法がありましてよ

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: You think I'd have the audacity to place my own daughter in that tomb for the protection of her Elder Scroll alone?
string: 私が娘を、彼女の星霜の書を守るためだけにあの墓へ置くほど厚かましいと思う？

original: Well, using an arrow with the bow that's been dipped in blood may cause it to function differently... corrupting its purpose.
string: 血に浸した矢を使うと、また別の効果がある… 当たった者を腐敗させるのだ

original: Never.
string: 断わる

original: By the Divines... you're infected. What are you doing here?
string: 大変だわ… 感染してるじゃない。ここで何してるの？

original: Come on, old man. You should get some rest.
string: ご老体よ。少々休んだ方がいいぞ

original: It is my sworn duty to see Arkay's wrath delivered to all the undead. It's usually a good bit of fun, too.
string: アーケイの怒りがアンデッドを滅ぼすのを見届ける事が使命なんだ。何より楽しいしな

original: Have you been listening to me? Like Serana, I'm a pure-blooded vampire. My presence on Tamriel is as much of a danger as hers.
string: ちゃんと話を聞いていた？ セラーナと同様、私も純血の吸血鬼よ。タムリエルに私がいれば、彼女がいるのと同じぐらい危険よ

original: I never knew the darkness held such colors, or the night air smelled so sweet. You have given me a great gift.
string: 暗闇がこんなにも色彩豊かで、夜の空気がこれほどまでかぐわしいとは。すばらしいプレゼントをありがとう

original: All of the ingredients for our potions came from there. She used to say that my father couldn't stand the place. Too... peaceful.
string: うちの薬の材料はみんなそこで採っておりましたの。母いわく、父はその場所が大嫌いだったようですわ。ちょっと… 和やかすぎるから

original: I beg your pardon, ma'am. I don't know what you're getting at, but whatever it is, it's not appreciated.
string: どういうことだ？ 何が言いたいのか分からないが、とにかく不愉快だ

original: I ought to cut you to pieces right where you stand...
string: そこから動くなよ。バラバラに切り刻んでやる…

original: You'd do well to watch that tongue, elf.
string: 口の利き方に気をつけるんだな、エルフめが

original: What're you up to, Garan?
string: 何を考えてる、ガラン？

original: If he's moved on, perhaps the Vigilants there can tell you where he's gone.
string: もしそこからさらに移動したなら、現地にいる番人達が行き先を知ってるかもな

original: How are you feeling after talking to your mother?
string: 母親と話した感想は？

original: I see. Where are you taking me, then? Is that much my business?
string: 分かりましたわ。それで、どこに連れて行く気かしら？ わたしに関係のある所ですの？

original: I was in the midst of writing the second volume and they just threw me into this prison. It's unfair!
string: 第二巻の執筆中だというのに、この牢屋に入れられちまったんだ。ひどい話だよな！

original: Are you going to help?
string: 手を貸してくれるか？

original: Though there's plenty more where he came from. Be ever watchful.
string: 仲間はまだ大勢いるはずだ。気を抜くなよ

original: We need to do something about these vampire attacks.
string: この吸血鬼の攻撃を何とかしなければ

original: Yes?
string: はい？

original: Didn't you fight back?
string: 反撃しなかったのか？

original: What exactly are we looking for?
string: 何を見つければいいんだ？

original: Got anything left?
string: 他に何かあるか？

original: You appear to have something on your mind. What is it?
string: 何か気になっているようね。何なの？

original: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, come talk to Isran at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften.
string: そこであんたの出番だ。吸血鬼退治に興味があるなら、リフテンの南東にあるドーンガード砦でイスランに会うんだ

original: Way I hear it, Lady Serana's been gone a real long time.
string: 聞いた話じゃ、セラーナ様はかなり長い間いなくなっていたらしい

original: Deciphering one of the Elder Scrolls is nothing like reading a simple book. There's quite a bit of ritual and concentration required.
string: 星霜の書の解読は単なる本読みとは大違いだ。非常に儀式的なものだし、集中力も必要とする

original: I have found such a soul and the stars appear cooperative.
string: よき星に導かれた、素晴らしい魂を見つけたぞ
