original: They tried me for murder, threw me on a prison ship and sent me to the jail in Vivec City.
string: 殺人容疑で裁判にかけられ、護送船でヴィベク・シティにある監獄に送られたよ

original: It was no mere chance that brought you to me. It was destiny.
string: お前がここに現れたのは偶然ではない、運命だ

original: You'd think a vampire would be right at home in this place. You'd be wrong. Let's just find my mother and get out of here, quickly.
string: 吸血鬼にはかえって居心地がよさそうですって？ それは誤解ですわ。とにかく早いところ母を探し出してここからおさらばしましょう

original: Madness. It was madness to attack that coven of witches! Why didn't they listen to me?
string: イカれてる。魔女の集団に攻撃をかけるなんて！ どうして注意を聞かないんだ？

original: Then root out the monster, and destroy it.
string: その上で、化け物を追い詰めて倒せ

original: The Dawnguard will now be dedicated to safeguarding it, making sure that prophecy will never come to pass.
string: ドーンガードは、弓を守る事に今後は身を捧げよう。あの予言は決して実現させてはならない

original: Let's get to my home, and I'll have a better sense of where we all stand.
string: 家に着けば、我々がどういう状況にいるのかがもう少し分かるはずですわ

original: I don't care about politics. You want to fight over the throne with the rest of them, go right ahead.
string: 政治には関心がないの。他の者達と玉座を争いたければ、ご自由にどうぞ

original: I... I almost can't believe it. We did it! We actually did it!
string: ああ… 信じられないよ。やった！ 本当にやったんだ！

original: I have some preparations to make, first.
string: 先に準備する必要がある

original: This must be the place.
string: ここに違いありませんわ

original: I'm getting out of here!
string: ここから出るぞ！

original: That sky... it feels like I'm being watched. Can't stand it anymore!
string: あの空… なんだか、ずっと見張られてるみたいだ。もう耐えられない！

original: You've simply used Serana in an attempt to take away what should rightfully be mine.
string: 私が手にすべきものを、セラーナを利用してお前が横取りしようとしただけだろうが

original: Hiding won't help you!
string: 隠れてもどうにもならんぞ！

original: I'm glad you're here. I don't think I could be doing this alone.
string: あなたがいてくれてよかった。独りでは無理だったと思いますの

original: I don't think so.
string: そうは思いませんわね

original: You know, I've asked myself the same thing.
string: 同じ内容の自問をした事がありますわよ

original: That make you feel any better?
string: それで気休めになる？

original: Don't think that'll keep them from turning on you eventually. They'll figure out what you are.
string: それでいつまでも、彼らの目をごまかせるとは思えませんわ。遠からず正体に気づかれましてよ

original: I have everything I need right here.
string: ここにいればなんの不足もないわ

original: Deal. (Give Book)
string: 商談成立だ(本を渡す)

original: Yes, I see them now... One contains the ancient secrets of the dragons, and the other speaks of the potency of ancient blood.
string: 見えてきたぞ… 書のひとつにはドラゴンに関するいにしえの秘密が含まれ、もうひとつには古き血が持つ力の事が記されている

original: What about Auriel's Bow? Do you know where we can find it?
string: アーリエルの弓は？ どこに行けば見つかるのかしら？

original: So go and meet your beloved Stendarr.
string: 最愛のステンダールとやらの所に行くがいい

original: It's not easy to get supplies way out here, but I'm managing. Take a look.
string: こんな場所では、仕入れも一苦労なの。でも、なんとかやってるわ。どうぞ見ていって

original: Done and done.
string: 片付きましてよ

original: I think we've talked about that enough. Come on, now.
string: それについては、十分話し合いましたわよね。さあ、行きましょう

original: The screams... they pierce my mind. I can't stand it!
string: あの叫び声… 心を引き裂くようだ。耐えられない！

original: I wanted to thank you for getting me this far. But after we get in there, I'm going to go my own way for a while.
string: ここまで連れて来てくれてありがとう。でも中に入ったら、わたしはしばらく自分の道を進む事にいたしますわ

original: Your kind are a blight upon Tamriel, monster!
string: お前らはタムリエルの破滅の元凶だ。バケモノめ！

original: Death to the vampires!
string: 吸血鬼どもに死を！

original: Do you know where I can find him?
string: どこに行けば会えるだろうか？

original: That'll teach you.
string: いい教訓になるな

original: Sorry, what?
string: ごめん、何？

original: I'm not going to talk you out of it, am I? I know, I know. I was just like you, once.
string: やめるよう説得するのは無理そうかな？ 分かるよ。あたしも昔はあんたみたいだった

original: So there's no way in, then.
string: 入る方法はないということか？

original: Could I help?
string: 手伝えることはあるか？

original: What do I do with the knife?
string: ナイフはどうすれば？

original: Haven't heard from him since.
string: それからというもの彼から音沙汰がないんだ

original: Auri-El bless you, child. For you are a step closer to the Inner Sanctum and everlasting wisdom.
string: アーリエルの祝福は汝と共にある。最奥聖域の深淵なる英知に、また一歩近づいたのだ

original: Sorry, I know you're trying to help. Thanks.
string: ごめんなさい。あなたの善意は分かっておりますのよ。ありがとう

original: Oh, I get it. Is that why you're wearing an Amulet of Mara?
string: ああ、分かりましたわ。だから、マーラのアミュレットをしておりますのね？

original: I've been thinking about this for a long time.
string: この事はずっと考えておりましたわ

original: Serana, my darling. I see you still favor keeping a pet.
string: 愛しいセラーナよ。今でもペットを連れ歩くのを好むのだな

original: What will you do now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: Everyone! Gather 'round!
string: みんな！ 集合だ！

original: Only those who can trace their ancestry through Harkon's mortal blood line can faithfully accept the power conferred by his Vampiric blood.
string: ハルコンの血を持つ定命の者だけが、吸血鬼としての彼の力が授けし力を忠実に受け継ぐ事ができるんだ

original: If I return to Tamriel, that increases Harkon's likelihood of bringing the Tyranny of the Sun to fruition.
string: タムリエルへ戻れば、それによってハルコンが太陽の専制を実現する公算は高くなる

original: What are you talking about? I don't know anything about any monsters.
string: 何の話だ？ 怪物なんて知らない

original: That something... was probably me.
string: その何かとは… おそらくわたし自身の事ですわね

original: My mother had a bit of a thing for magical constructs. Not... not what you're thinking. She just found them fascinating.
string: 母や魔術で作られたものに興味を持ってはいましたけれど… あなたが思っている意味ではなく、神秘的に感じていた程度の事ですわ

original: I trust you're faring well?
string: うまくいっているのだろうな？

original: Because of this, I strongly believe you were meant to hear the ancestral chorus. Only one way to find out.
string: つまり君は先人のコーラスを聞く運命にあるというわけだ。それが真理を得る唯一の方法だよ

original: They're bound to bring me fortune and glory.
string: 持っていれば富と栄光が舞い込んでくるだろう

original: A small measure of his blood now and forever flows through your veins.
string: 彼の血は少量でも、永遠に君の血管を流れ続けるんだ

original: I'm gonna have to kill you... again!
string: 殺すしかありませんわ… もう一度！

original: Now... you'd be lucky to find a single room intact.
string: 今は… そのままの部屋が一つ見つかれば幸運だね

original: That's how I ended up here. I can't rest. Not until I find the Forge, until I can prove that it was my discovery. Mine, not his!
string: それでここに行き着いたんだ。眠りにつく事はできない。鋳造器具を見つけ、それがあたしの発見だと証明できるまで。彼じゃなくあたしの！

original: The first lay at the end of Darkfall Passage, a cavern that represents the absence of enlightenment.
string: ダークフォール洞窟の闇が無知の象徴とするなら、さながらその出口で最初に差し込む光だ

original: May not look like much, but my boat can get you there faster than walking.
string: 大した船には見えないだろうが、歩いていくよりは早いぜ

original: I'm the Arch-Mage. It's 2,000 coins.
string: 私がアークメイジだ。2000ゴールドだ

original: I was. But unlike some of my brethren, I sought solutions outside the norm in order to maintain my superiority.
string: いかにも。だが同族の一部とは違い、我は優位を保つために尋常ならざる策を求めたのだ

original: Maybe.
string: そうですわね

original: I'm guessing it's the one you found in Dimhollow Crypt. Says it's got something really important to say to you.
string: おそらく君がディムホロウ墓地で見つけた奴だろう。そいついわく、君に重要な話があるそうだ

original: In this form, you can drain the life from your foes with your right hand.
string: この姿では右手で敵の生命力を吸い取る事ができる

original: See you.
string: またね

original: May Auri-El's brilliance illuminate your path.
string: アーリエルの光が行く手を照らさん事を

original: May the light of Auri-El cleanse your soul!
string: アーリエルの光で罪を洗い流すがいい！

original: Yes, how may I serve you, milady?
string: 奥様、ご用は何ですか？

original: People say there's someone in Riften that can... change your face. Make you look completely different. Do you believe that?
string: うわさではリフテンに… 顔を変えられる者がいるらしい。外見を完全に変えるんだ。信じられるか？

original: Have you been paying attention to everything that's happened? He'll betray us the second our backs are turned.
string: 何があったのかちゃんと見ていまして？ 背中を向けたらすぐ父はわたし達を裏切りますわよ

original: You're pretty good. I don't think there's anything more you can learn from me.
string: なかなかやるわね。これ以上私から学ぶ事はないと思うわ

original: Indeed! One moment I was writing diligently, and the next, my door bursts open.
string: そうなんだよ！ 書き物に集中できると思ったら、次の瞬間には扉を叩く奴がいやがってだね

original: What's the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: I got a warmer welcome from my father, and that's saying something.
string: 父の歓迎の方がマシでした、と言えばお分かりでしょう

original: And I thought the Soul Cairn was creepy.
string: ソウル・ケルンは不気味な場所だと思っていましたけど…

original: Good...
string: よし…

original: Dur!
string: ダー！

original: It is good to have powerful allies, is it not?
string: 頼もしい味方がいるってのはいいもんだね

original: Pouring the contents of the ewer into the sacred basin of the Sanctum would allow him to enter for an audience with the Arch-Curate himself.
string: 聖域にある水瓶に水差しの水を注ぐと、最高司祭と直々に面会できる仕組みとなっている

original: The more you fight me, the more you will suffer, mortal.
string: 抗えば抗うほど苦しみは続くのだぞ

original: So... what now?
string: で、これからどうする？

original: I will find you.
string: 逃がさないぞ

original: Are you... Did you get infected?
string: まさか…感染したのか？

original: Why me...
string: なぜ私が…

original: You're a fool to have become mortal again. I want nothing to do with you.
string: 再び定命の者に戻るとは愚かな。あなたとかかわる気はない

original: Now, where was I...
string: さて、続きはどこからだったか…

original: But those temples paled in comparison to the glory of the Chantry and its wayshrines.
string: だが、それらの聖堂もこの礼拝所と祠に比べれば色あせて見える

original: The lower floors are home to the Imperial Council, and the Order of Moth Priests occupies the middle floors.
string: その下層部は帝国議会の本拠地で、中層部は聖蚕会が占有している

original: What do we need?
string: 何が必要だ？

original: I'll also assume Vyrthur didn't exactly give you the option to stay your hand.
string: それに、ヴィルスールの状態を見れば、倒す事をためらう余地などなかっただろう

original: If you want me to come along, it has to just be me and you.
string: 一緒に行ってほしいのでしたら、二人だけというのが条件ですわよ

original: I need to speak to you, stranger. Now.
string: 見知らぬ者よ、今すぐ話がある

original: You've got plenty of moths. What's our next move?
string: 蚕はたっぷり集まりましたわ。次はどうしますの？

original: You're welcome.
string: どういたしまして

original: They threw me out, Tolan!
string: トラン、奴らは私を追い出したんだ！

original: This accursed place is nothing but a prison without walls.
string: この呪われた場所は、まるで壁のない牢獄だ

original: I was. Honestly, it took me up until now to figure out that my mother was really just as bad as he was.
string: 以前はそうでしたわ。正直に言いますけど、母が父と同じぐらい悪者だというのは今になってようやく分かった事ですのよ

original: You're not going to keep me in here!
string: 縛りつけられるのはごめんこうむりますわ！

original: She actually did it... created a portal to the Soul Cairn. Incredible.
string: 母は本当に成し遂げた… ソウル・ケルンに通じる転移門を造り上げたのですわね。信じられませんわ

original: She always seemed happy, before we heard the prophecy. Then it all changed. She became a different person. They both did.
string: 予言を耳にするまではいつでも幸せそうだったのに、すべてが変わってしまった。母はまるで別人になった。両親とも変貌してしまったのです

original: So, the deed has been done.
string: 為すべき事が為されたのだな

original: I can't think of a more deserving champion to carry it than you.
string: これだけの手柄を挙げられる勇者は他にいないだろう

original: Dur...
string: ダー…

original: Go on inside. Isran'll want to talk to you.
string: 中に入れ。イスランが話したいそうだ

original: I knew you'd miss me.
string: わたしでなければダメだと分かっておりましたのよ

original: Always a pleasure to serve a fellow alchemist.
string: 仲間の錬金術師のためならいつでも協力するよ

original: Your time will come.
string: 終わりは近いぞ

original: I keep an eye on their comings and goings. No one suspects poor Cairine. Poor, poor Cairine. Ha!
string: 彼らの行動は見張っているわ。哀れなカイリーンを疑う者はいない。哀れな、哀れなカイリーンを。アハ！

original: I'll tell you, the only thing more surprising than hearing from Isran after all these years was hearing that he wanted my help.
string: イスランが今さら連絡を寄こしたのも驚きだが、奴が俺の助けを求めてるってのはもっと驚きだ

original: Poor thing. I know it would have tried to kill us, but still...
string: 哀れなものですわ。わたし達を殺そうとしたかも知れない相手ですけど、それでも…

original: You have kept your side of the bargain, now let me fulfill mine.
string: そなたは約束を守ってくれた。今度は我の番だ

original: Why can't I just die? I fear I'm cursed to walk this desolate land forever.
string: どうして死ねないんだ？ この何もない場所をさまよい続ける呪いなんて嫌だ

original: Auri-El himself may have been beyond my reach, but his influence on our world wasn't.
string: アーリエルは手の届かぬ存在だが、その力はこの世界に届いていた

original: You're vampires.
string: 吸血鬼か…

original: Then the rest is up to me.
string: あとはわたし次第というわけですのね

original: Get it on the ground!
string: それを地面に置きなさい！

original: "My pa's axe", Stendarr preserve us.
string: “私の父親の斧”だ。ステンダールが我々を守って下さる

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: But you did not follow instructions to kill the victim in view of others while wearing the Dawnguard uniform.
string: でも指示を守らなかったな。ドーンガードの制服を着て、人目につくところで殺せと言ったはずだ

original: Why? What do you want?
string: なぜ？ 何が目的なんだ？

original: He's alive. I've seen him.
string: 彼は生きている。姿を見た

original: Why in the world did you ever try putting armor on trolls?
string: トロールに防具をつけさせて、一体どうするつもりなの？

original: Only a single spire remains. Be careful, I'm almost certain the final Keeper will be prepared for your assault.
string: 残りは尖塔一つだけよ。慎重にね。最後の番人があなたの襲撃に備えているのはほぼ確実よ

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵でしたけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうでしたわ

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. Stand aside!
string: 悪いけど、ドーンガードのための大事な仕事があるの。邪魔しないで！

original: Orthjolf, I'm surprised!
string: オースユルフ、驚いたよ！

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: And the crystals?
string: あの水晶は？

original: I told you, I've prepared for this. It's going to work.
string: 言っただろ、準備はしてある。うまくいくさ

original: I saw more than enough political maneuvering in my time in House Dres. I was tired of it then, and I'm tired of it now.
string: ドレス家にいた頃、さんざん政治工作を見てきた。昔も今もうんざりだ

original: Fine, don't worry about it. When we get in, you won't have to babysit about me any more.
string: いいですわ、気にしないで。いったん中に入れば、わたしの事を手取り足取り気にかけなくてもよろしいですから

original: Suit yourself.
string: どうぞよしなに

original: How will vampires gain power over the sun?
string: 吸血鬼がどうやって太陽を司るつもりなのか？

original: I'm sorry. I wish I knew a better way, something that would be easier for you.
string: あなたの負担が軽い、もっと冴えたやり方を知っていればよかったのですけど…

original: That is the very purpose that first brought me to Skyrim.
string: 私がスカイリムに来たそもそもの理由がそれなんだよ

original: I'm no so easily coerced. I've got my eye on you. Try anything, and you will be the one who regrets it.
string: 脅迫は無駄だ。隙は見せない。変な真似をしたら、後悔することになるぞ

original: I must return to the frontline Alessian headquarters at once... lives are hanging in the balance!
string: すぐに前線のアレッシア司令部に戻らないと… 人々の命が危ないんだ！

original: I find it tiring to converse with someone in that form. Too much effort.
string: そんな姿をした者と話をするのは疲れるよ。多大な労力を必要とするからね

original: Of course he will.
string: もちろん、そうですわね

original: That's actually only a fraction of its potential.
string: 実はそれも、弓の持つ力の一部に過ぎない

original: Relieved... I think.
string: 安心いたしましたわ… 多分

original: All over Skyrim. It's my job to collect them. I try and keep something for everyone. For every taste, I mean.
string: スカイリム全土だ。あいつらを集めるのが仕事だ。幅広い趣味をまかなえるよう、配慮している

original: Remember your place, and you'll be taken care of.
string: 自分の立場をわきまえれば、相手をしてもらえるだろう

original: That's it. That's the last scroll.
string: それですわ。それが最後の書ですのよ

original: Fight well.
string: 奮闘に期待する

original: The people of Skyrim owe you a great deal, whether they know it or not.
string: 知ってか知らいでか、スカイリムの民に大きな貸しを作ったな

original: Enough games, let's finish this!
string: お遊びは十分だ、決着をつけるぞ！

original: They also have an Elder Scroll.
string: 連中は星霜の書も一巻、持っている

original: They didn't stop to visit, though. They rode through town heading south, and went across the big bridge.
string: ここには立ち寄らなかったけどね。南に向かって街を走り抜けて、大きな橋を渡って行ったんだ

original: Lord Harkon's orders, Orthjolf. Calm yourself.
string: ハルコン卿のご命令だ、オースユルフ。落ち着け

original: Which friends would those be?
string: 友達というのは？

original: It's only a matter of time!
string: 逃げられると思うな！

original: The Betrayed weren't to blame.
string: 裏切られし者のせいではなかった

original: Isran had a surprising stockpile of weapons and armor. Take a look.
string: イスランが妙に大量の武器や防具を集めていた。見てみるといい

original: I already have another shard.
string: 既に破片をもう1つ持っている

original: I've killed the vampire masquerading as a <Alias=Target>.
string: <Alias=Target>になりすましている吸血鬼を倒した

original: An impressive display, but a wasted effort. You delay nothing but your own deaths!
string: いい態度だ。しかし、死ぬのが少し遅くなるだけだ！

original: I could use help with the crystals around here.
string: ここらにある水晶について教えてほしい

original: I think we should part ways.
string: ここで別れた方がいいだろう

original: May mortals quake at your approach.
string: 君が近づけば定命の者達は震え上がるだろう

original: It's just... it's not for me.
string: そんな事… すべきではありませんわよ

original: If it'll get him closer to being in charge, he'll slit your throat without a moment's thought.
string: 自分が上に立つためには、一瞬のためらいもなくお前の寝首をかきにくるぞ

original: We had always maintained an uneasy alliance with the underground-dwelling dwarves, and when faced with extinction we turned to them for help.
string: 我々は地下に住むドワーフとの間に不安定な協定を結び、維持する努力をしてきた。そして滅亡の危機に瀕して、彼らに助けを求めた

original: But Auriel should have protected you...
string: でもアーリエルが守ってくれたはずですわよ…

original: And you'd do well to be more careful of whom you engage in witty banter.
string: 軽妙なおしゃべりの相手はもっと慎重に選んだ方がいいね

original: Hold it. If you're going downstairs, you keep your weapons to yourself or we'll be getting better acquainted.
string: 待て、下に下りるなら武器をしまえ。さもないと仲良くする事になるぞ

original: Only what I've heard.
string: 話に聞いた事しか知らないが

original: That makes sense.
string: それなら分かりますわ

original: It was expected of her, just as it was expected of me.
string: それが彼女に期待されていた、私と同じようにね

original: It's important that I find him right away. (Persuade)
string: すぐにその彼を見つけないといけない(説得)

original: Next thing I knew, I arrived here.
string: 次に気がついた時には、ここにいた

original: I'm sure Lord Harkon is grateful you've returned his daughter.
string: 娘を連れ戻してきてもらって、ハルコン卿は感謝している事だろう

original: You share her blood.
string: あなたの血を使ったらどうだ？

original: Once I get it done, first I'll publish a regular edition, then the folio. I'll be rich!
string: それが完成したら、まずは通常版を発表し、拡大版も制作する！ 大金持ちになれちゃうな！

original: I understand you know how to change someone's appearance.
string: 人の外見を変える技を知っていると聞いた

original: Yeah? You change your mind? The Dawnguard could use somebody like you.
string: おっ？ 気が変わったのか？ あんたならドーンガードの一員として活躍できるかもな

original: Are you all right?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: You've met both of my parents. They're both crazy in their own way.
string: 両親には会った事がありますわね。それぞれ、違う意味で道を外れた人達ですわ

original: So far this hasn't been too bad. Gets lonely exploring by myself, though.
string: これまでのところ、そんなに悪くありませんわね。独りで探索してると寂しくなりますけれど

original: Now it's a race to claim the remaining Scrolls and discover what part Auriel's Bow has to play in this prophecy.
string: 残りの書を手に入れて、この予言におけるアーリエルの弓の役割を誰が先に解き明かすのか… 競争だな

original: I don't know who she is. She says she lives in a castle near Solitude.
string: 素性は知らない。ソリチュードの近くの城に住んでいると言っていた

original: Do you regret becoming a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼になったことを後悔しているのか？

original: A Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶？

original: By having the Ancestor Moths close to the Moth Priest, they can utilize the conduit and share the moth's augury.
string: 聖蚕会は聖蚕の僧侶の身近に置かれて初めて架け橋となり、その予言の力を共有できるんだよ

original: Therefore, when an arrow is loosed from the bow, it produces a magical effect very similar to being burned by fire.
string: 放たれる矢には魔力が宿り、当ったものは炎に包まれたようになる

original: My blood is potent. At first, the body is overwhelmed by it.
string: 私の血は強い力を宿している。最初は相手の体を圧倒してしまう

original: So you found the Moth Priest. Let's see you find the rest of the Elder Scrolls all on your own.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけたか。残りの星霜の書も自力で集められるのか？

original: I heard you were looking for vampire hunters.
string: 吸血鬼ハンターを募集していると聞いた

original: Very well, master.
string: 主様、それでは

original: We should keep moving.
string: 先を急ごう

original: Who's your father?
string: 父親はどういう人物だ？

original: I'll wait for you at the dock.
string: 波止場で待っておりますわよ

original: You need anything, talk to Master Dreth.
string: 至高のマスター・ドレスに聞け

original: Stay on your guard.
string: 油断禁物ですわよ

original: For the first time in a long while, I think I - we - may actually be able to do this. And... and I owe it all to you. Thank you.
string: この長い間で初めて、あたしが… あたし達が… 本当に成し遂げられる気がする。あんたのおかげだね。ありがとう

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: You have done me a great service, and now you must be rewarded.
string: 多大な貢献に対し、ほうびをとらせねばな

original: And then you get to the real danger. We can discuss that when the time comes. If it comes.
string: 真の危険はそこからだよ。その時が来たら話し合おうじゃないか。その時が来れば、だけどね

original: You were waiting... all this time for someone with my blood to come along.
string: 待っておりましたのね… ずっと、わたしの血を持つ誰かがやってくるのを

original: I could feed again.
string: また食事にありつけるな

original: Minutes? Hours? Years? I can't even begin to guess. I suggest we don't wait around to find out.
string: 数分？ 数時間？ 数年？ 考えもつかないわ。それが分かるまで待つ事もないでしょうね

original: You heard the Scroll reading. Now do you believe Serana?
string: 星霜の書の内容は聞いただろう。セラーナを信じるか？

original: I don't think the vampires would be stupid enough to attack us here, but you never know.
string: 吸血鬼がここで私達を襲撃するほど愚かだとは思わないけど、どうかしらね

original: Why don't you come back with us?
string: 我々と一緒に戻ってはどうだ？

original: No... Serana... your own father....
string: そんな… セラーナ… 実の父をお前は…

original: He tried to hire me for a trip to Dragon Bridge, but I told him that ain't one of my stops.
string: ドラゴン・ブリッジに行きたいって言われたけど、そこはコース外だから断ったんだ

original: If you're not happy with things... that's not my business.
string: 気に入らない事がありますのね… それはわたしのせいではございませんわ

original: Set my hatred aside? Not a chance. It's what keeps me strong.
string: 憎しみを忘れろだと？ 無理な事だ。憎しみこそが私を強くする

original: How's a moth related to the Elder Scrolls?
string: 蚕と星霜の書の間に、どうして関係が？

original: Neh!
string: ネー！

original: It feels... old, doesn't it? Even by dwarven standards. No one has been here in thousands of years.
string: 古い感じだね… そうじゃない？ ドワーフの基準をもってしても。数千年間、誰もここに来ていない

original: And it all ended with me being locked underground for who knows how long.
string: そのせいでわたしは、誰も覚えていないほど長く地下に閉じ込められていたわけですし

original: You must be clever. Find a way not to be caught or accused of murder.
string: うまくやらないとな。捕まったり、殺人の罪を負わされたりしない手を考えるんだ

original: Keep that in mind, will you?
string: 今言った事を覚えておいてくれ

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: See that thing? Dwarves called them 'Kinetic Resonators'. Don't see them very often, least not among the clans in Skyrim.
string: あれが見える？ ドワーフは“動力共鳴装置”と呼んでる。スカイリムの人々には殆ど知られちゃいない代物だよ

original: You managed to destroy all three Keepers? Very impressive.
string: 三人の番人をすべて倒したの？ 本当に見事だわ

original: The reason I was down there... and why I had the Elder Scroll.
string: わたしがあそこにいて、星霜の書を持っていた理由…

original: You're right. Let me think about it.
string: そうだな。もう少し考えてみる

original: I'm back from <Alias=Dungeon> with the <Alias=Item>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Item>を持ち帰った

original: Not like this...
string: こんなはずでは…

original: That is... I don't think we'll actually trip over her there. But it's worth a look.
string: つまり… そこへ行っても母に会えるとは思わないのですけど、調べる価値はありそうですわ

original: The order of the day would be our destruction until every last vampire was hunted down and eliminated.
string: 絶滅するその日まで吸血鬼を一人残らず追いつめて抹殺する、そんな風潮になるはずよ

original: Here you are.
string: ほらよ

original: The prophesied time is at last upon us. Soon we will claim dominion over the sun itself, and forge a new realm of eternal darkness.
string: 予言の時がようやく訪れた。我々は程なくして太陽そのものを支配し、永遠の闇に覆われた新たな領域を作り出す事となるであろう

original: Good. That should slow them down.
string: 上出来よ。これで彼らは失速するはず

original: Of course, if you've got any more adventures planned...
string: 願ったりですわ。次の冒険の計画はどんなのかしら…

original: Let me go...
string: 放してくれ…

original: It's not exactly the hospitality I'm used to, but your man Isran has seen to my needs well enough.
string: こういうおもてなしには不慣れだが、君の友達のイスランはとてもよくしてくれているよ

original: I hope you've read the first volume of my epic by now.
string: 手記の第一巻、もう読んでくれただろうな

original: He won't need either of us anymore.
string: 父にとって、わたし達はもはや用済みなのですわ

original: Die!
string: 死ね！

original: It will be done, my lord!
string: 仰せの通りに、我が主よ！

original: Now you decide to give up? Fine. I'll be here.
string: あきらめるわけ？ いいよ。あたしはここにいるから

original: Where is he now?
string: 今はどこに？

original: Find Lord Harkon. Let him know the time of the prophecy is at hand.
string: ハルコン卿を見つけろ。予言の時が間近だと知らせるのだ

original: How hard would it be to feed a few extra mouths? I'm sure they can manage, and not leave us sitting out here like cattle.
string: 人数がちょっとくらい増えても大差ないだろう。放牧中の牛のように出したままにせずに、入れてくれてもばちは当たらないと思うが

original: Maybe this will put your mind at ease. (<bribecost> gold)
string: これで気が変わるかな？(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Hmm, I suppose I can work with your face. After all, the sculptor cannot always choose the finest clay.
string: ふむ、あなたの顔を何とかできそうね。結局、彫刻家がいつも最高の土を選べるわけじゃないもの

original: To come in here alone... a fool like all the rest of them.
string: ここに一人で来るのは… 他の皆と同じ愚か者よ

original: And now... I think I can rest. Farewell, my friend, wherever your travels take you.
string: ようやく… 眠りにつける。名残惜しいけどここでお別れ… 楽しかったよ、じゃあね

original: I had no idea that her laboratory even existed.
string: 研究所があったなんて存じませんでしたわ

original: Oh, I see. I just assumed he'd sent for both of us. How awkward for you.
string: なるほど。我々両方を呼びつけたものかと。あいにくだったな

original: While you're thinking about it, the vampires will be gathering strength in the shadows, waiting to strike.
string: 君がそれについて考えている間に、吸血鬼達は闇の中で力を蓄え、襲撃の時を待っている事だろう

original: Seems the previous incarnation of the Dawnguard had, at one time, some interesting toys.
string: かつてのドーンガードの死霊術では、面白いオモチャが作り出されたようだ

original: How did you know I was a vampire?
string: どうしてこちらも吸血鬼だと？

original: How has it affected your family?
string: 家族にはどのような影響が？

original: Ah, it's so good to breathe again!
string: ああ、また息ができるなんて素晴らしいですわ！

original: I've rescued <Alias=Prisoner> from <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Prisoner>を<Alias=Dungeon>から救出した

original: If you want the Elder Scroll, it's yours.
string: 星霜の書が望みなら、あなたのものよ

original: I got nothing on me. If you're looking for Skooma, head on downstairs.
string: 私は何も持ってないわ。スクゥーマがほしいなら、下へ行ってよ

original: Didn't want that lot getting wind of it. Especially my father.
string: あの者達に聞きつけられたくありませんでしたわ。とくに父には

original: Well, let's move then. I'm nothing if not persuasive.
string: さあ、先を急ぎましょう。わたしは説得力には自信がございますのよ

original: Don't worry about that. Just tell me.
string: それはいいから、聞かせてほしい

original: Well done! Somehow I knew it would be you and Serana who found our moth priest.
string: 上出来だ。聖蚕の僧侶を見つけるのはお前とセラーナだろうと、何故か確信があったのだ

original: I'm waiting to hear what any of this means.
string: こいつがどういう事なのか早く聞かせてくれ

original: Unnnnhhh...
string: ううううう…

original: Cease your flight and we will move on to the next lesson.
string: 飛行をやめれば次の話をしてやろう

original: Be still!
string: 動くな！

original: I had expected Ysgramor's city to be... bigger.
string: イスグラモルの都はもっとその… 大きいと思っていましたのよ

original: In my heart, I know that it was my wife, Valerica, who took my beloved daughter away from me.
string: 私は内心、愛する娘を連れ去ったのは妻のヴァレリカだったと心得ている

original: I'm not sure about this circle, but it's obviously... something.
string: 確かな事は言えませんけど、でもこの円環、明らかに… 何か重要なものですわよ

original: If you have a better lead than this, I'm all ears.
string: もっといい手掛かりを持っているなら、聞いてさしあげてもよくてよ

original: I don't think he even sees me as his daughter anymore. I'm just... a means to an end.
string: 父はもうわたしの事を娘とは思っておりませんわ。わたしはただの… 道具にすぎませんのよ

original: I keep thinking that there's got to be another way, but he'll turn on us both the moment he gets the chance.
string: 他の道があるはずだとずっと考えておりますけど、父は機会があればすぐにでもわたし達二人を襲ってきますわよ

original: You fight worse than you smell!
string: 臭いも酷ければ、戦いぶりも酷いですわね！

original: Oh please, milord. Please... forgive me!
string: 旦那様、お願いです… お許しを！

original: What you probably don't know is that he still grants it to his more impressive followers.
string: ですが、彼が今でも高位の部下にその力を与えている事は、知らなかったのではなくて？

original: Who are the contenders?
string: 候補者は誰なのかしら？

original: You've nothing to fear from me. Please, we have much to discuss.
string: 恐れる必要は何もない。話したい事がたくさんある

original: Mortals aren't allowed to freely roam the castle. Not even you.
string: たとえお前でも、定命の者が自由に城をうろつく事は許されない

original: I cast you out!
string: 消し去ってやる！

original: Are we ready then?
string: さあ、用意はよろしくて？

original: Well, back before I... you know. The College of Winterhold was the first place I'd think to go for any kind of magic or historical thing.
string: まあ以前は… 色々と。最初に行こうと考えたのはウィンターホールド大学でしたわ。魔法や歴史を学ぼうと思いましたの

original: Look around you. There are some extremely powerful undead here.
string: 周りをご覧あそばせ。ここにいるのはとてつもなく強力なアンデッドですわよ

original: Depends on who you ask. Some say Molag-Bal himself gave these rings to ancient powerful vampire lords. Some say that is just a myth.
string: 聞く相手によるね。モラグ・バルが大昔の有力な吸血鬼の王達に自らこの指輪を授けたという話もある。ただの神話にすぎないという人もいる

original: Where is this "Darkfall Cave?"
string: その“ダークフォール洞窟”はどこにありますの？

original: We've made it to the courtyard.
string: 中庭にたどりつきましてよ

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of one of the ancient Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 太古の血の魔法の指輪のひとつがどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: There isn't any Aetherium here, is there? Damn it!
string: ここにエセリウムはないんだね？ ああもう！

original: You've found her journal!
string: 日記が見つかったのですね！

original: Gods, you're one of them! Get yourself cured before you think about asking me to help you again.
string: おいおい、あんた奴らの仲間じゃないか！ 協力してほしいなら、まずそれを治してから来るんだ

original: Why are they collecting these souls?
string: どうして魂を集めているんだ？

original: Look at this place. No one's been here in centuries.
string: ご覧になって。何世紀というもの、誰一人訪れなかった場所ですわよ

original: But when it was all said and done, those elves were either slaughtered, vanished or gave up and took the dwarves' bargain.
string: だが、彼らも結局は殺されたり、追放されたり、考えを曲げてドワーフの要求に従わされたのだ

original: Help me!
string: 助けてくれ！

original: It seems they wanted to send a message to the other Vigilants still walking the roads of Skyrim.
string: スカイリムの道を歩んでいる他の番人達に警告を発したかったようだな

original: I don't think he knew much of anything.
string: ほとんど何もわかっていなかった気がする

original: All right, now pull your lever!
string: いいですわ。そっちのレバーを引いて！

original: Once enough of the moths are following, they'll provide you with the second sight needed to decipher the scrolls.
string: 聖蚕が十分集まれば、書の解読に必要な第二の視覚を身につける事ができる

original: Monster? What monster? Don't know what you're game is, but I'll humor for a moment.
string: 怪物？ 怪物って？ 何の話か知らないけど、今は付き合ってやるよ

original: Since the Keepers weren't able to claim my soul, they had their minions construct a barrier that I'd never be able to breach.
string: 私の魂を手に入れられなかった番人は、手先に命じて私が決して破れない障壁を築いたの

original: Hatred born of your neglect.
string: ないがしろにされたゆえの憎しみだ

original: I hope we can go home soon. I don't like it here.
string: 早く家に帰れるといいけど。ここは嫌いよ

original: Nothing else?
string: 他には？

original: It seems our work is not yet done. But I have waited this long, and we are so very close now. I can wait a bit longer.
string: まだやるべき事があるようだな。だがこうも長い間待たされ、あと一歩となったのであれば、もう少しくらいは待ってもいいだろう

original: Well, I hate to see it go, but what am I gonna do with it here anyway?
string: 本当は手放したくないけど、ここでそんなもの持っててもしょうがないしな

original: They shouldn't be that hard to find. Shelves, tables... should be easy to find. She wouldn't have hidden them.
string: そんなに苦労するはずはありませんわ。棚やテーブルを探せば簡単に見つかると思いますの。母は隠さなかったでしょうから

original: A prophecy that lacked a single, final ingredient... the blood of a pure vampire. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour.
string: 予言を完成させる、最後の要素… 純粋なる吸血鬼の血液。コールドハーバーの娘の血液だ

original: Yes, of course Lokil. Do not forget who brought you news of the Vigilants' discovery.
string: ええ、もちろんよロキル。番人の発見を知らせたのが誰か忘れないで

original: Return to me when your part is done.
string: やるべき事が済んだら戻ってきてくれ

original: When something is trapped in a soul gem, and then the energy is used for powering an enchantment, the remnants are sent here.
string: 何かが魂石の中に閉じ込められて、そのエネルギーが魔法の強化に使われたら、残り物がここに送られてくるのですわ

original: I will banish you from this castle. I will spare your life this once, but after that, you are prey.
string: この城からお前を追放する。今回ばかりは見逃してやるが、その後は獲物とみなす

original: Lady Serana's back! Open the gate!
string: セラーナ様がお戻りだ！ 門を開けろ！

original: You've done exactly as I predicted and brought your fetching companion to me.
string: 確かにお前は言った通りの仕事を終え、魅力的な人物を連れ帰ってきた

original: No... all these wasted months, or has it been years? I don't even remember how much time has passed.
string: そんな… 何か月、いや何年、いや、思い出せないほどの時間は無駄だったってのか？

original: What can you tell me about Auriel's Bow?
string: アーリエルの弓について何か知らないか？

original: If Isran is really asking for me, it must be serious. I'll help. Where do you need me to go?
string: イスランが私を必要としているなら、かなり深刻な事態ね。手を貸さなくちゃ。どこへ行けばいいの？

original: Suit yourself.
string: お好きなように

original: Is... everything all right here?
string: その… ここは大丈夫ですの？

original: Farewell, and good journey milord.
string: では旦那様、よい旅を

original: All of Skyrim will tremble before us.
string: スカイリム全土が我らに恐怖するだろう

original: Well, that's the second one - we're halfway there. I'll keep looking. See you soon!
string: ああ、あれが二つめだよ… これで半分だね。あたしは探し続けるよ。また後でね！

original: Come with me "bard/merchant/pilgrim"
string: “吟遊詩人だろうと商人だろうと巡礼者だろうと”、一緒に来てほしい

original: I'll see you again. Soon.
string: また、近いうちに会いましょう

original: Why were you locked away?
string: 幽閉されていた理由は？

original: Leaving the wayshrines unguarded would be violating my sacred duty as a Knight-Paladin of Auriel.
string: アーリエルの騎士司祭として、祠の守護という聖なる使命を無視してここを離れる事はできない

original: Finally came to your senses, eh? Realized what you gave up?
string: ようやく目が覚めたか？ 自分が何を見過ごしたのかに気づいたか？

original: We need to find my mother, Valerica.
string: わたしの母、ヴァレリカを見つけなくては

original: Especially not me. I mean... with my history, I still kind of get a chill just walking by a temple. Can't imagine going in one.
string: 特にわたしは違いますわ。今までの行いを考えると、今でも聖堂の横を通るだけで震えが止まりませんの。中に入るなんて、とんでもない事ですわ

original: Ugh...
string: うぐっ…

original: Did you really come here expecting to claim Auriel's Bow?
string: ここに来ればアーリエルの弓が手に入ると、本気で思ったのか？

original: I'm surprised you think you can manage without me, but it's your choice.
string: わたしがいなくても大丈夫だなんて、大した自信ですのね。好きにしてよろしくてよ

original: Hey... we did pretty well for ourselves here. Good work.
string: なかなかうまくできたんじゃないかしら。お見事ね

original: We'll secure the castle. You just get to their master!
string: 城の安全を確保する。あんたは彼らの主人のもとに行くんだ！

original: I only know what she told me.
string: 聞かされた話しか知りませんわ

original: Home? Where's that?
string: 家だと？ それはどこに？

original: Now, listen to my words and do as I instruct.
string: さあ、私の言葉を聞き、言う通りにするがいい

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について知りたい

original: Keep your eyes open.
string: 気を抜くなよ

original: Beautiful. That crown... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの王冠… 非の打ちどころがない

original: I never knew it would be this beautiful.
string: こんなにも美しいとは存じませんでしたわ

original: That's why I always try to be ready for anything.
string: こういう事があるから、備えが大切なのよね

original: You're a good son.
string: あなたはいい息子ですわ

original: I feel like it was a long time. Who is Skyrim's High King?
string: 長い時間に思えてなりませんわね。スカイリムの今の王はどなたですの？

original: And if he's that concerned, the situation must be pretty bad. Make sense?
string: それほど悩んでるって事は、状況はかなり悪いに違いない。そうでしょ？

original: Molag Bal is a powerful daedric lord, and his will is made reality.
string: モラグ・バルは強大な力を持つデイドラの王で、すべては彼の意のままなのですわ

original: Guards! Kill him!
string: 傭兵ども！ 奴の頭をねじ切れ！

original: Hsss...
string: シャー…

original: Actually, I can't stop to play games right now.
string: 正直に言うと、遊んでいる時間はないんだ

original: Speak with Garan Marethi. He has something for you.
string: ガラン・マレシと話すといい。何かあるだろう

original: Son of a...
string: こんの…

original: No, you must be mistaken. He made it exceedingly clear the last time we spoke that he had no interest in my help.
string: きっと何かの間違いだわ。前に話した時、手助けは必要ないとはっきり言われたもの
…うーん？

original: The... Empire. From Cyrodiil.
string: 帝国だ… シロディールの

original: Not the most solid construction here. About what I'd expect from... creatures like this.
string: ここの造りは微妙ですけれど、このあたりに関しては例外ですわね…

original: Well, that's usually the trick. It's possible to do it through a simple portal.
string: 普通はそれでうまくいきますわ。簡単な転移門を通れば十分可能ですの

original: Yes? What did you need?
string: はい？ 何が必要ですの？

original: It is.
string: そうですわ

original: That's... a long story.
string: それは… 長い話になりますわ

original: If you're not one of us, you're just another piece of meat.
string: 私達の仲間でないなら、あなたはただの肉片と同じよ

original: It is true there are some here who have spent years studying the accumulated knowledge of the scrolls.
string: 確かにここには、書に蓄積された知識の研究に、幾年も費やしている者達がいます

original: Each sought to gain power by using his underling to kill you and keep the Chalice for himself.
string: ゆえにそれぞれが手下を使ってお前を殺し、聖杯を自分のものにして政権を握ろうとした

original: Revel in your new powers, but do not forget who gave them to you.
string: 新たな力を堪能するがいい。だが、誰にもらったものかを忘れるな

original: She was practically smirking as we left home. Almost like she was proud of herself.
string: わたし達が家を出る時、母はにやついているようにさえ見えた。勝ち誇ったかのようでしたわ

original: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
string: マルカルスの家なら完ぺきだ

original: Then let's face him, together.
string: 共に彼と対決しよう

original: I suggest you have Serana change you back. At once.
string: セラーナに頼んで元に戻してもらうといい。直ちにな

original: A little bit. That's... one of the reasons I wanted to come with you.
string: 少しは。それも… あなたについてきた理由の1つですわ

original: Fine. If it will get you to leave me alone. Lead the way.
string: 分かったよ。それで放っておいてくれるならな。先導してくれ

original: Hey there, friend. If you're looking for a fix, you're at the right place. Just head on down the trap door.
string: あら、こんにちは。一服していくならここよ。落とし戸から入ってちょうだい

original: Hmmm, I'd say five of them would be enough.
string: ふむ、5つあれば十分だと思うわ

original: The sky shouldn't look like that...
string: 空の様子がおかしい…

original: Do you ever think about curing yourself?
string: 治療法を探そうと考えたことはあるか？

original: Will I be able to keep these amulets?
string: アミュレットはそのままもらっていいのか？

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: I wasn't told where to take you.
string: どこに行けばいいか聞いてなかった

original: I've been keeping her safe.
string: 彼女の安全を守る、護衛だ

original: Good. Go and speak to Garan Marethi. Tell him it is time. He will understand.
string: よし。ガラン・マレシに時が満ちたと伝えるがいい。それで分かるはずだ

original: Definitely. You must think my life has been so strange. It sounds like your family wasn't nearly as fractured as mine.
string: そのとおりですわ。わたしの人生がすごく変わってるとあなたは思うのかしらね。わたしと違って、あなたの家族は全然壊れてなかったのでしょうから

original: Fair enough.
string: なるほど

original: Hmph.
string: ふふん

original: You should find no difficulty using the portal any longer.
string: もう転移門の使用に困難を感じる事はないはずよ

original: Ah, it's good to be home again.
string: ああ、故郷に戻るのはいいものね

original: Yes, you've explained yourself. I'm supposed to just throw myself in front of you all and offer protection, am I?
string: ああ、言いたい事は分かった。君達みんなの前に身を投げ出して、守ってくれというわけだな？

original: Congratulations. And... thanks, Katria.
string: おめでとう… そしてありがとう、カトリア

original: He wanted me to take him out to Dragon Bridge, but I told him it ain't one of my stops.
string: ドラゴン・ブリッジに行きたいって言われたけど、そこはコース外だから断ったんだ

original: It's important, so please just listen before your friend, here, loses his patience.
string: 大事な事ですから、そこのお友達がかんしゃくを起こす前に黙って聞いて下さいませ

original: Yes, I have them. What now?
string: 持っている。それで？

original: If you're holding out for more gold, it's never going to happen.
string: 値を釣り上げるつもりなら、あきらめるんだな

original: The Hall of the Vigilants is in ruins, my brothers and sisters dead or scattered.
string: 番人の間は荒れ果て、仲間達は死んだり散り散りになったりしてしまった

original: It sounds like they were both being selfish.
string: どちらも身勝手だったみたいだな

original: Yes. I once practiced my art in the salons and manors of Tamriel's great and good. Now, the scum of Skyrim are my only clients.
string: ええ。かつてはタムリエルの名士達のサロンや邸宅で施術していたわ。今では、スカイリムのクズが唯一の顧客よ

original: And now the feeding begins.
string: さあ、食事の始まりよ

original: Death to those who defile the Chantry!
string: 礼拝所を穢す者に死を！

original: I despise your presence, mortal!
string: 忌々しい定命の者め！

original: We're meeting at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で合流予定だ

original: Where can I find the people we need?
string: 必要な面々はどこに？

original: What's the matter with you?
string: どうかしたのか？

original: Ugh. I thought this place was supposed to be secret?
string: この場所は秘密じゃなかったのか？

original: Florentius still worked with the Order from time to time.
string: フロレンティウスはその後も時々教団と仕事をしていた

original: Indeed. He's off to Redwater Den.
string: いかにも。彼はレッドウォーターの隠れ家へ向かった

original: I have a message from Harkon.
string: ハルコンからの伝言がある

original: You're right. I shouldn't have brought it up.
string: そうだな。話題にすべきじゃなかった

original: Cozy little place, isn't this?
string: 居心地のいい場所だな

original: Look at this place. I can't imagine choosing to come here. My mother must have been terrified.
string: ご覧になって。好きこのんでこんな所に来る人なんておりますかしら？ 母は無理強いされたに違いありませんわ

original: Take the scroll, then be on your way.
string: 書を受け取って、行きなさい

original: See if you can find a pattern in the sequence. Most of these locks have a pattern of some kind.
string: 順番にパターンがあるか確かめて。こういう鍵のほとんどは、ある種のパターンがあるよ

original: The Elder Scroll is just ahead.
string: 星霜の書はすぐ先よ

original: What a horrible place.
string: なんてひどい場所だ

original: It's a werewolf! To arms! To arms!
string: ウェアウルフだ！ 戦闘準備！ 戦闘準備！

original: He's been working on that place for years now. Never lets anyone in.
string: 奴はもう何年もあれに手を加え続けている。誰も中には入れようとしない

original: Tolan, tell her about, what was it, Dimhollow?
string: トラン、彼女にあの事を教えてやれ。あの… ディムホロウだったかな？

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: Well, maybe it really is time to resurrect the Dawnguard.
string: まさに今こそドーンガードを復活させる時だ

original: I'll rend the flesh from your bones!
string: 骨から肉を引き千切ってくれる！

original: I mean, what do you think my father will do when we bring him the bow?
string: 弓を届けたら、父は一体何をするつもりだと思いますの？

original: And while I do not know its exact whereabouts, I do have information suggesting someone who does.
string: 正確な居場所は知らないが、知っているであろう人物の手がかりは得ている

original: There's plenty for all.
string: 不自由などない

original: Once the Initiate completed his mantras, he'd dip a ceremonial ewer in the basin at the wayshrine's center and proceed to the next wayshrine.
string: 新人は真言を得た後、祠の中央にある水瓶に水差しを浸し、次の祠へ向かうという儀式を行っていた

original: But I have something for you to do, since you're asking.
string: でも君が望むなら、少々やってほしい事がある

original: I'm telling you, there's something strange with the moondial.
string: あのですね、この月時計はどこかおかしいですわ

original: No, you don't...
string: そんな、違いますわ…

original: Because she's one of them.
string: 彼女も一員だからだ

original: I assumed you were here to see me about your face. To have it sculpted into something more... artful than Nature has bestowed upon you.
string: 自分の顔の件で私に会いに来たんでしょう。何かもっと… 自然が授けたよりも技巧的な顔へ改造するために

original: Well, go on, take it!
string: さあ、どうぞ。ほら！

original: The only way I'd even consider returning to Tamriel was if Harkon were not only to fail, but to be destroyed.
string: タムリエルへの帰還を検討するとすれば、その唯一の道はハルコンが失脚するだけでなく、死ぬ事よ

original: There's no use hiding from me.
string: 隠れても無駄だ

original: Isn't that pretty risky, staying around the castle?
string: 城の周囲をうろつくのは危険じゃないのか？

original: I could see through my eyes, but I could not control my actions.
string: 状況は理解してたけど、体が勝手に動いたんだよ

original: In reward, he gave everlasting life to myself, my wife and my daughter. And so I have defeated mortality itself.
string: 見返りとして私と、妻と娘の三人は無限の命を授かった。そうして私は寿命にさえも打ち勝ったのだ

original: You're lucky Isran hasn't killed you outright. Get cured while you can.
string: イスランにとどめを刺されずにすんで幸運だったな。早く治療した方がいい

original: Yes. They swarmed the Chantry in vast numbers until we were completely overrun. We never really stood a chance.
string: そうだ。奴らは大群で礼拝所に攻め込み、すべてを破壊し尽くした。我々は為す術もなかった

original: I think my father wanted to see you. Have you talked to him yet?
string: 父があなたに会いたがっていたと思いますけれど、もう話はいたしましたの？

original: What is your decision?
string: どう判断するんだ？

original: She has the scroll!
string: 彼女は書を持っている！

original: They aren't going to let us use the front door.
string: 正面から入れてもらえるとは思えない

original: Of course he did.
string: もちろんだ

original: Bedroom furnishings. (<Global=HDWhiterunBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室用品(<Global=HDWhiterunBedroom> ゴールド)

original: Fellow dovah? I am not a dragon.
string: 仲間のドヴァー？ こっちはドラゴンではないぞ

original: I am but your humble servant, milady.
string: 奥様、私はあなたの忠実なしもべです

original: Isran, these vampires are different. I know you've disagreed with the Order in the past...
string: イスラン、今回の吸血鬼は別物だ。かつて教団と対立したのは知っているが…

original: All right, let's see what you have.
string: さて、何がありますかしら

original: The woman was a vampire, and they wanted her back.
string: 女性は吸血鬼で、連中は彼女を奪還しようとしていた

original: I know you're here somewhere.
string: ここにいるのは分かっていますの

original: The voice fades and the words begin to shimmer and distort. But wait, there is more here.
string: 声がかすれて言葉が歪み始めている。でもちょっと待った… まだ続きがある

original: Do you know this place?
string: この場所は知っているのか？

original: Do we at least know what the vampires are after?
string: 我々に吸血鬼どもの狙いが少しでも分かっているのか？

original: Thought I'd come here to be safe. Now they won't so much as let us in.
string: 安全を求めてここに来たというのに、入れてすらもらえないなんて

original: Gather your things and rest well, my friend. We meet outside Castle Volkihar.
string: 荷物をまとめて十分休んでおけよ。ヴォルキハル城の外で落ち合おう

original: Rii...
string: リィ…

original: Hunnnhh...
string: うううう…

original: Sorine thought we'd need his help.
string: ソリーヌが、彼の助けが必要になるだろうと

original: Let's just get it over with.
string: とにかくやってしまおう

original: You've already seen my father's obsession. My mother's not a whole lot better, but you'll see that soon enough.
string: 父の強迫観念は、その目でご覧になったでしょう。母の方だって、それと同じくらいひどいものでしたわ。もうすぐお分かりになりますわよ

original: Why wouldn't you be safe there?
string: どうして安全じゃないんだ？

original: Oh, you're off on your own for a while? All right.
string: 一人で行きますの？ 今だけならよろしくてよ

original: You know you can't win, so all you can do is hide...
string: 勝ち目がない以上、隠れるしかないのだろう…？

original: Farewell, friend. May the radiance of Auri-El fill your heart with joy.
string: お別れだ、友よ。アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たすよう祈ろう

original: Oh sure, keep pestering me then, by all means.
string: いいよ、好きなだけ商売の邪魔でもしてくれ

original: I'll be with the Dawnguard if you need me.
string: わたしに用がありましたら、ドーンガードの所におりますわ

original: Arvak...You saved him! His soul is free, I can feel it!
string: あんたはアルヴァクを救ってくれた！ あいつの魂は自由だ！

original: Absolutely. I've spent a great deal of time perfecting an extract that increases the potency of soul husks.
string: その通り。魂のハスクの能力を増加するエキスを完成させるのに膨大な時間を費やしたわ

original: As a king is to his subjects, so you are to other vampires.
string: 王に臣下がいるように、お前には他の吸血鬼がいるのだ

original: You'll remain mortal, but you'll find yourself weakened within the Soul Cairn.
string: 定命の体は変わりませんけれども、ソウル・ケルン内では力が弱くなってしまうでしょうね

original: Where did these amulets come from?
string: それらのアミュレットの出どころは？

original: Thank you for your kindness. I'll remember it the next time I'm feeling hungry.
string: ご親切にありがとう。次にお腹がすいた時には今のを思い出す事にいたしますわ

original: I don't like the look of this...
string: 見た感じが気に入りませんわ…

original: I have returned from <Alias=Dungeon> with the <Alias=Remains>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Remains>を持ち帰った

original: They didn't think Skyrim has a vampire problem, and I did.
string: 私はスカイリムが吸血鬼の脅威にさらされていると考えた。連中は違った

original: Figured.
string: なるほど

original: How many more wayshrines are there?
string: 祠はあといくつあるんだ？

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: Look into my eyes, Serana. You tell me what I am.
string: この目を見ろ、セラーナ。私は何者だ？

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of a set of ancient Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 太古の血の魔法の指輪一式がどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: The poor thing living here probably just fell out of favor upstairs.
string: ここにいるお気の毒な方は、上の階で機嫌を損ねたのでしょうね

original: Let's go. My mother must be waiting on the other side of that thing.
string: 行きましょう。母があの向こう側で待っているに違いありませんわ

original: How do I obtain Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢はどうすれば手に入る？

original: We'll talk more when we're there.
string: 続きは向こうに着いてからにしましょう

original: How'd you get caught?
string: どうして捕まったんだ？

original: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
string: ソリチュードの家に住もう

original: Lord Harkon has never cared to use the Chalice, relying on his more than adequate powers until now.
string: ハルコン卿は自分のあり余る力を当てにして、今まで一度も聖杯を使おうとしなかった

original: Your obedience pleases me.
string: お前の忠誠には満足している

original: Indeed. She's off to Redwater Den.
string: いかにも。彼女はレッドウォーターの隠れ家へ向かった

original: Hmph. I tell you what's crazy.
string: ふんだ。本当にイカれた話を教えてやろう

original: Good. You deserve that much.
string: よかった。あなたのためなら喜んで

original: Over time, your powers will grow in strength and you will find new ways to use your gifts.
string: 時間と共に力が成長し、恩恵の新たな使い方が見えてくる事だろう

original: We have not finished speaking yet. Come back at once.
string: 話は終わっていない。今すぐ戻れ！

original: You said you didn't know where she went.
string: どこに行ったのかわからないと？

original: Arkay is so hard to understand when it comes to life and death. Is he still alive? There's always hope...
string: 生や死に関しては、アーケイの言葉は分かりにくい。彼は生きてるのか？ まだ希望はあるはずだ…

original: I don't like the feel of this place. I'll wait for you back by the entrance.
string: ここの雰囲気はどうも好ましくありませんわ。戻って入口のところで待っておりますわね

original: I do not practice my art for free, however. I doubt you can afford my services. You have the smell of the vagabond about you.
string: ただし、無料では施術しないわよ。支払えるとは思えないわ。あなたからは放浪者の匂いがするもの

original: Let Auri-El smite you with his wrath!
string: アーリエルの怒りを受けろ！

original: Does anything live here?
string: ここには生き物は住んでいるんだろうか？

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of nercromancers, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 野蛮な血の者の一人が死霊術師の一団に加わった。おそらく彼ら全員に血の力を授けるのが目的だ

original: Hurry back. You don't want to keep Lord Harkon waiting.
string: 急いで戻れ。ハルコン卿を待たせたくはないだろう

original: Do you know anything about this place?
string: この場所について知っていることを教えてほしい

original: We earned this.
string: 苦労して手に入れたものですのよ

original: The Vigilants mostly hunt down daedra worshippers, which is why they got torn to pieces when they went up against vampires.
string: 番人らは主にデイドラの崇拝者を狩っているのだが、だからこそ吸血鬼を相手にした時に壊滅させられてしまったのだ

original: I'm not going to take your blood right now.
string: 今すぐに血をもらう必要はない

original: Sorry, maybe next time.
string: 悪いな、また今度

original: I will see you dead, monster.
string: まっぴらだ、怪物めが

original: We're not sure, but Isran is concerned.
string: わからないが、イスランが気にかけているようだ

original: This "stranger" has done more for me in the brief time I've known him than you've done in centuries!
string: その“よそ者”の彼は、お母様が何世紀もの間にしてくれた以上の事を、わずかな間にしてくれましたのよ！

original: I'd heard stories about the Soul Cairn, but never thought I'd see it myself. So far it's... about what I imagined.
string: ソウル・ケルンの事は話に聞いていましたけれど、この目で見る事になるとは思いませんでしたわ。今のところは、おおむね想像した通りの場所ですわね

original: Not quite, though I can see how an outsider might arrive at that conclusion.
string: 正確には違うが、部外者がその結論に達するのは無理もない事だ

original: Never much cared for folks who can't mind their own business.
string: 他人の事をあれこれ詮索する連中は虫が好かないんだが

original: I'm going to hold onto it.
string: ひとまず手元に持っておくことにする

original: Yes, quite. I'm growing weary of speaking to you and my traitorous daughter.
string: そうだな。お前と、私を裏切った娘とこうして口をきくのも疲れてきた

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Should your blushing bride go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 清らかな君の花嫁がいなくなったらどうする？ 一緒に住むのが耐えられなくなって… その… バケモノとね

original: Fine, then.
string: そう、なら結構ですわ

original: Maybe a shorter title is in order?
string: 題名が長すぎるのでは？

original: We don't need competition for blood, and we don't want the mortals getting up in arms making things difficult for us.
string: 血の獲得競争は必要ない、そして定命の者達がいきり立って状況を困難にする事も望ましくない

original: There's no need for that kind of talk. I said it was possible.
string: そのような話に意味はない。可能性があると言っただけだ

original: The Ideal Masters have charged him with overseeing the Keepers, and will undoubtedly intervene if you're perceived as a threat.
string: アイディール・マスターに、番人を監視する任務を負わされているの。あなたを脅威と感知すれば間違いなく邪魔に入るはずよ

original: Troll, wait!
string: トロールよ、待て！

original: Not much. If you read any history, it shows up from time to time, but it's a hard thing to track.
string: そうでもありませんの。歴史の書物には時々出てきますけれど、その行方を追い続けるのが難しいのですわ

original: What? What meeting? I wasn't informed of any such thing!
string: 何？ 会合だって？ そんな話はまったく聞いてないぞ！

original: Give up while you can!
string: あきらめて引くがいい！

original: After I was freed from prison, I decided to turn my life around. Give something back to the people of Morrowind.
string: 牢屋を出てから、人生を変えようと思い立ったんだ。モロウウィンドの人々のためになる事がしたくてね

original: They say anyone who steps foot on that island will meet an early death... hope you know what you're doing.
string: あの島に上陸すると早死にするって言われてるんだが… 後悔しなさんなよ

original: They tried to kill me!
string: 殺されそうになった！

original: The vampire is eternal, and with immortality comes the revelation that these bonds never endure... it's fleeting, momentary at best.
string: 吸血鬼とは永遠の存在であり、不死の身にはそのような絆が決して永続しないという悟りが伴うものだ。よくて束の間の、一瞬の事

original: Well of course they did.
string: 彼らは当然そうした

original: Awake at last, good.
string: ようやく目覚めたか

original: No one ever escapes. There is no escape. Why would you even try?
string: 誰も逃げたりしないな。逃げ道なんかないからな。やるだけ無駄じゃないか？

original: If they're bold enough to attack us here, then this may be bigger than I thought. I have good men here, but...
string: 奴らが大胆にもここを襲撃するなら、状況は思ってたより悲観的だな。ここにも優れた人材はそろっているが…

original: A pathetic creature in her present condition, but the gift will embolden her. And her lowly state suits her to being our eyes and ears in Markarth.
string: 今はただの惨めな生き物だが、贈り物を与えれば彼女も元気になるだろう。それに彼女の卑しい身分は、マルカルスで我々の目や耳になるのには適任だ

original: And Serana's opinion in this?
string: セラーナの意見は？

original: Damn it. How could I be so foolish?
string: クソったれが。おれの大馬鹿野郎が

original: But the way she said it... "someplace he would never search." It was cryptic, yet she called attention to it.
string: でもあの「父が決して探さない場所」という言い方は… やたらと強調的で、どこか謎めいておりますわね

original: I did, in fact. Quite perceptive of you.
string: 確かにそのとおりだ。君は鋭いね

original: And you didn't stop them? You didn't secure the scroll?
string: そして君は奴らを止めなかったと？ 書を確保しなかったのか？

original: Then there's no hope for them.
string: ならば望み薄だな

original: Land on the ground, and I will have more to teach you.
string: 地面に下りろ。さらに説明してやる

original: They're a splinter group of the "Vigilants of Stendarr." A bit more ambitious, it seems.
string: 彼らは“ステンダールの番人”の分派よ。もう少し野心が強いようだけど

original: Of course I do.
string: もちろんだとも

original: Arvak?
string: アルヴァクか？

original: Tell me, what is your name?
string: お前の名は何だ？

original: It's not safe out there. Horrible creatures attacking towns in the night... If they won't let me in, at least I can stay here.
string: 外は安全じゃないわ。恐ろしい生物が夜に街を襲撃する… 中に入れてもらえなくても、ここにはいられるわ

original: Perhaps they were once corporeal beings, but they've obviously reached a point where they no longer require a tangible presence.
string: かつては物質的な存在だったかも知れない、でもすでに有形の存在を必要としない地点に達したのは明らかね

original: Were you looking for me?
string: わたしを探しておりましたの？

original: For the thousands of years I've served as the Chantry's sentinel, there hasn't been a single visitor here for any other reason.
string: 礼拝所の守り人として何千年も過ごしてきたが、それ以外の理由で訪ねてきた者は誰もいない

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何？

original: For all of this to end, he must die.
string: このすべてを終えるには、彼が死ぬしかない

original: But my master is dead, and his enemies will pay!
string: だが私の主様は死んだ。かの敵どもは報いを受けるぞ！

original: We're very close. I can't wait to see them again.
string: 親子の仲は良かった。会うのが待ち遠しい

original: That makes sense.
string: それなら分かりますわ

original: Now where is it Isran expects me to go?
string: さて、イスランは私にどこに行けと？

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Are you ready to go?
string: 行く準備はできたか？

original: Make it seem you are a member of the Dawnguard, thus sowing confusion among the herd. Wear this armor and plant this note on the victim.
string: ドーンガードのメンバーになりすまし、大衆を混乱させるんだ。この鎧を着て、それからこのメモを犠牲者の死体に仕込んでおけ

original: Off the northern coast of Skyrim, due west of Solitude.
string: スカイリムの北海岸、ソリチュードのほぼ西…

original: I'll be waiting.
string: 待っているぞ

original: I was wondering when I'd see you again.
string: いつまた会えるか、気になっていた

original: All of the ingredients for our potions came from there. She used to say that my father couldn't stand the place. Too... peaceful.
string: うちの薬の材料はみんなそこで採ってたの。彼女いわく、父はその場所が大嫌いだったみたい。ちょっと… 和やかすぎるから

original: Been a pleasure doing business with you.
string: 毎度ありがとさん

original: I can't think of any reason I'd want to lose this gift. Especially after what I did to get it.
string: この力を捨てる理由なんて、どこにもございませんわ。あれだけ苦労して手に入れたのに

original: No matter. Serana will sacrifice her blood for the sake of the prophecy, and I will feast upon yours in Molag Bal's honor!
string: まあよい、セラーナの血を予言成就のために捧げ、モラグ・バルを称えつつお前の血をすするとしよう！

original: I don't know much about it.
string: それについてはほとんど知らない

original: Watch yourself. The sky is a bad omen.
string: 気をつけて。空が不吉だ

original: I'm not sure what they would do with one, but in this case Isran is probably correct in thinking it isn't good.
string: 彼らがどうするつもりか知らないけど、この場合はイスランが正しいと思う。つまり、良くないって事

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: There you are.
string: そこにいたのか

original: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
string: 星霜の書を取り戻したのだから、もう行くべきよ

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: So let's hear it.
string: では聞かせてもらおうか

original: I've brought the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を持ってきた

original: Somewhere up north, in the ice fields.
string: 北の氷原のどこかだ

original: I just hope we weren't too late.
string: 遅すぎたのでなければいいが

original: Ideas?
string: いい案はないか？

original: I'm afraid I won't be able to help you with the scrolls any longer, milord.
string: 旦那様、書の件に関してはもうお手伝いできそうにありません

original: You're no match for me!
string: 貴様などには負けん！

original: Time has very little meaning to me. Consequently, it has little meaning to the Ideal Masters as well.
string: 時間は私にとってほぼ無意味。それゆえに、アイディール・マスターにとってもほぼ無意味なの

original: I'll return to Castle Volkihar as soon as I'm finished gathering my things.
string: 荷物をまとめ終わったらすぐに、ヴォルキハル城へ戻るわ

original: These things are everywhere, aren't they?
string: これってどこにでもありますのね

original: I'm ready if you are.
string: あなたさえよければよろしくてよ

original: Yes, well... I never wanted any of this to happen. I tried to warn all of you... I am sorry, you know.
string: ああ… こんな事は望んでなかった。君達みんなに警告しようとしたんだが…  すまなかった

original: There's no escape.
string: 逃げ道なんてないぞ

original: I can't believe I'm trading this for some dried up plants. Oh well, a sale's a sale.
string: こいつをしなびた植物と交換するなんて信じられないよ。まあ、商売は商売だ

original: Vyrthur said something about using blood?
string: ヴィルスールが血を使うとか言っていた気が

original: And you haven't forgotten what you need to do, have you?
string: 自分の仕事は忘れてないな？

original: They're trolls. They smell like trolls. I can't help that either.
string: トロールだよ。トロールの臭いがする。どうしようもない

original: You're sweet to say that, but you need to sort things out on your own. It's not something I'm going to get involved with.
string: お優しいのね、けれど自身の問題は自身で整理するべきですわ。わたしは関わり合いになりたくありませんの

original: Hey! Journal?
string: ねえ！ 日記は？

original: Your voice drips with the venom of your mother's influence. How alike you've become.
string: 母親の影響が毒となってお前の声から滴っている。実によく似てきたものだ

original: You've done well. I won't forget that.
string: よくやった。今回の功績は忘れん

original: Well, well. Where've you been, Vingalmo? Nose stuck in a book all day?
string: おやおや、どこにいたんだ、ヴィンガルモ？ 一日中本にでも埋もれていたか？

original: You came for me? How did you know? I thought I was going to die in here. Thank you!
string: 助けに来てくれたのか？ なぜ分かったんだ？ ここで死ぬと思ったよ。ありがとう！

original: But if this miracle were to somehow happen, I would gladly return to Tamriel.
string: でも、もしこの奇跡が何らかの形で起こるなら、喜んでタムリエルへ戻るでしょうね

original: Then we kill him, before he kills us.
string: ならばやられる前にやるまでだ

original: By the Divines, what happened to the sky?
string: ああ、神々よ、空はどうなってしまったんだ？

original: What about you? What were your parents like?
string: あなたはどうなのです？ ご両親はどんな方でしたの？

original: You do? Alright then, enough mysteries.
string: 君が？ いいだろう。謎には事足りてるからね

original: Without the Hall, the Vigilants need a new rallying point.
string: 番人の間を失った番人達には、新たな拠点が必要だ

original: Many in the court don't bother with potions, but I keep things stocked just in case.
string: 宮廷の連中は薬にはあまり興味がないんだ。私はまさかの時に備えて保管しているが

original: One more word of warning. There's a dragon that calls itself Durnehviir roaming the Cairn.
string: もう一つ警告するわ。ダーネヴィールと名乗るドラゴンがケルンをうろついている

original: Well, I don't take just anyone into the secret parts of the place I grew up.
string: わたしが育ったところの秘密の場所には、誰でも入れるわけではございませんの

original: Does that mean you can take us to it now?
string: 今すぐ案内してもらえるということか？

original: I hope we reach Ancestor Glade soon.
string: “先人の湿地”が近いといいのですけれど

original: Can you feel it? You're now so much more than you were before.
string: 感じる？ 以前よりはるかに大きな存在になった事を

original: Can we really trust the words of this Moth Priest? What if he's just lying to save his worthless skin?
string: その聖蚕の僧侶とやらの言葉を信じていいのか？ 自分の身かわいさに出まかせを言っているとしたら？

original: Sadly, the magic used to construct these wonders were lost long before I arrived here.
string: 残念ながら、そうした奇跡の力を持つ建造物は私がここに来るずっと前に失われていたが

original: We'll make sure there's nothing left of them.
string: 毛筋一つたりとも残さず片づけてやる

original: You already know as much as I do. And that's a compliment.
string: 君の知識は私のそれと変わらない。これは褒め言葉だ

original: 6000 gold, and they're yours.
string: 6000ゴールド出すなら売ろう

original: No one will soon forget that you were the one to defeat Harkon.
string: ハルコンを倒す者があなただった事をすぐに忘れる者はいないわ

original: Most of our learning could be found there. We always studied our enemies, so we might better learn how to defeat them.
string: 我々の知恵のほとんどがそこに集められていた。我らは敵と有利に戦えるよう、常に研究を続けていた

original: It seems they were looking for a woman who was sealed in a crypt.
string: 連中は墓場に閉じ込められた女性を探していたようだ

original: You're not welcome here as long as you're one of those... monsters.
string: ここにいてはいけないわ。今のあなたは… 怪物なのよ

original: If you think I'm going to let you have all the fun, you're crazy. I'll let you lead ahead, but I'll be keeping an eye on you.
string: 楽しみを独り占めできると思っておいでなら、酔狂にもほどがありますわ。先に行かせてさしあげますけど、ちゃんと見ておりますわよ

original: I'll fight anything that can be fought. Beyond that... I don't want your death on my conscience.
string: 戦えるものとは何であろうと戦う。その先は… あんたを決して死なせたくはないよ

original: You're here because we're abominations in your mind. Evil creatures that need to be destroyed.
string: ここにいるのは、内心では私達を嫌悪しているからだわ。破滅させられるべき邪悪な生物として

original: It's only for Serana's sake that I have let you live.
string: セラーナに免じて生かしてやっているに過ぎん

original: I figured it would be more of an issue for you.
string: むしろ、あなたの方が問題だと思っておりましたわ

original: I see. That would explain much.
string: なるほど。それで説明がついた

original: This cave is a temple to Auriel?
string: この洞窟はアーリエルの聖堂なのか？

original: I yearn to see the great dunes of Hammerfell once again.
string: ハンマーフェルの砂丘を、もう一度この目で見てみたいな

original: You can't hide from us!
string: 隠れても無駄ですわ！

original: It's no Warmaiden's, but I've got a decent supply.
string: 戦乙女の炉にはかなわんが、そこそこの品ぞろえはある

original: Feel free to poke around the fort and take what you need. There isn't much yet, but you're welcome to anything you can use.
string: 好きなだけ砦を散策して、必要なものがあったら持っていってくれ。大したものはないかも知れないが、使えそうなら何だっていい

original: I knew she was deep into necromancy. I mean, she taught me everything I know.
string: 母が死霊術にのめりこんでいた事は存じておりましたわ。だって、わたしの知っている事はすべて母から教わったものですのよ

original: It had to be one of us, and, well, she's so much more powerful than I am. It just made sense for her to be out here.
string: きっとわたし達の味方ですのよ。そして母はわたしよりずっと力がある。ここにいる事自体が彼女にとって意味があったのですわ

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Come with me. (Persuade)
string: 一緒に来てほしい(説得)

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally rewrite the prophecy as we see fit.
string: となれば、ほぼ終わったようなものですわ。予言をいい方向に書き変える事がようやくできますのね

original: You're right. Let me think about it.
string: そうだな。もう少し考えてみる

original: Have I heard anything? It was the talk of the city for three days straight.
string: 何か聞いてないかって？ 街はその話題で持ちきりだよ、もう3日もね

original: How dare you profane this place!
string: この場所を穢す事は許さん！

original: I absolve you of your sins!
string: 罪深き命を消し去ってやる！

original: She would have hated to see it like this.
string: 母がこの様子を目にしたら悲しんだでしょうね

original: In the meantime, don't make me regret my sudden outburst of tolerance and generosity, because if you do, your friend here is going to pay for it.
string: それと、私が突然寛容の念に駆られた事を後悔させないでくれ。後悔したら、迷惑を被るのはここにいる君の友達なんだぞ

original: However, the night powers are still yours to command, and your claws are still formidable weapons.
string: だが夜の力はまだ使えるうえに、爪の驚異的な威力は変わらない

original: Someday, we'll rebuild the Hall of the Vigilant. Mark my words, I'll see it done before they put me in the ground.
string: いつの日か、番人の間を再建してみせる。自分が死ぬ前に実現させると誓おう

original: I guess it doesn't matter now. At least Isran is trying to do something noble with the name.
string: 今となっては、関係ないわ。少なくともイスランは、その名にかけて高貴な事をやろうとしてる

original: Possibly. I guess even a vampire mother is still a mother.
string: ですわね。吸血鬼の母親であっても、母親には変わりないのかも知れませんわ

original: Look at the sky... the Divines must be angry with us!
string: 空を見て… 神々が私達に怒っているに違いないわ！

original: This is our fight and this is our fate!
string: これは我々の戦いだ。そして我々の使命だ！

original: I don't really care what you are.
string: そちらが何者であろうと、気にしない

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Sorine and Gunmar are settling in.
string: ソリーヌとガンマーは腰を落ち着け始めている

original: Not exactly.
string: ちょっと違うな

original: Bleed!
string: 血を流しなさいな！

original: She just wants to go home.
string: 家に帰りたいだけだろう

original: To harness it is to know. The fundaments. The Dwemer lockbox hides it from me.
string: 抑制する事は知る事だ。基本だよ。ドゥーマーの鍵付きの箱が私から隠すのだ

original: He wasn't always like that, though. There was... a turn. He stumbled onto this obscure prophecy and just kind of lost himself in it.
string: でも昔からそうではなかったのです。ある時、埋もれた予言を見つけて、没頭してしまってからですのよ

original: You can find us at Fort Dawnguard, near Stendarr's Beacon.
string: 我々はステンダールの灯近くのドーンガード砦にいる

original: The herd is becoming distressed, which makes it more difficult for us to slip in and out undetected.
string: 民衆の動揺がこれ以上続けば、我らが気づかれずに出入りするのがより困難になるだろう

original: You have brought my daughter back safely, and for that I am grateful.
string: 娘を無事に連れ戻してくれた事には感謝している

original: Tolan, I don't think that's a good idea.
string: トラン、それはいいアイデアとは思えないが

original: This meant that we were vulnerable to the forces of Oblivion.
string: そうなりゃ、オブリビオンからの攻撃を防ぐ手段はないわな

original: You don't think you can escape me, do you?
string: まさか私から逃げきれると思ってるのか？

original: She didn't want to follow me here. But she wants me to take her home.
string: ここについて来るのには難色を示したが、家に連れて帰ってほしいと言われた

original: Any moment now, I'll find you...
string: すぐに見つけてやる…

original: I settled in the city of Kvatch to write my memoirs and to find some peace and quiet.
string: おれはクヴァッチの街に住んで、手記を書きながら静かに暮らそうと思っていた

original: Spheres! On the upper level!
string: スフィアだ！ 上の階に！

original: I had a map, in my journal. That's where we should start.
string: あたしの日記に地図があったわ。そこから始めるべきだね

original: Why would a dremora attack you?
string: どうしてドレモラに襲われるんだ？

original: Do not presume to tell me who I can and cannot trust. I possess the wisdom of a dozen lifetimes, and I will make my own judgements.
string: 誰を信用すべきかは私が決める。永き時間を生きてきたこの知恵で、私が判断するのだ

original: Quick, the bow!
string: 早く弓を！

original: No... my blood is strong...
string: そんな… 私の血は強いはず…

original: That many fewer vampires to worry about. Good work.
string: これで吸血鬼どもがだいぶ減ったな。よくやった

original: What do you think of this place?
string: この場所の印象は？

original: Even so, I almost made it... another foot or two to the side, and the water would have broken my fall. But... nothing I could do.
string: それでも、あと少しだった… 横にあと一歩か二歩で、水が落下を受けとめてくれたはず。でも… 仕方ないね

original: (grunt)
string: うう…

original: I can help you get it, but first I must have your assistance.
string: あれを手に入れたいなら協力してもいいが、その前に手を貸してほしい

original: Mother had something similar back home when she was tending the courtyard gardens to scrape moss and fungus off of the trees.
string: うちに似たようなやつがあったわ。母が中庭の庭園でコケやキノコを木からはがすのに使ってたの

original: Tolan was telling me about some cave that the Vigilants were poking around in. Seemed to think it was related to these recent vampire attacks.
string: 番人達がある洞窟を探ってたとトランが言っていたな。最近の吸血鬼の攻撃とそこの関連性を調べていたらしい

original: I don't even know who that is...
string: それが誰なのかも分かりませんのに…

original: I've found a new candidate, ripe for Harkon's Gift. I'm sending you to welcome this soul into our family.
string: ハルコンの贈り物を捧げる新たな候補者を見つけたぞ。我々の家族にしてやってくれ

original: I've planted some new herbs in the courtyard garden. I hope they'll grow.
string: 新しいハーブをいくつか中庭の庭園に植えたの。育つといいわね

original: ...I'll find you...
string: …隠れても無駄だ…

original: They are determined and well-armed, but foolish if they think they can defy us. We will deal with them in time.
string: 奴らは決意と武装こそ固いが、我々に抗えると思っているのであれば愚かだな。いずれ対処しよう

original: I never forget who my friends are. Or my enemies.
string: 誰が仲間で、誰が敵なのか、忘れなどしない

original: There was a time when I called Tamriel my home, but those days have long since passed.
string: タムリエルを故郷としていた頃もあったが、遥か昔の事だ…

original: Well, considering no one else in Skyrim would buy something they couldn't possibly read, I'd say you don't have much of a choice.
string: スカイリムで読めすらしない書物を買ってくれる奴が他にいるとも思えないから、選択肢があるわけでもないな

original: Almost as much as we like killing them.
string: 私達が彼らを殺すのが好きなのと同じくらいに

original: Yes, he definitely sounds like he knows what to do.
string: ええ。何をすればいいのかを、彼は完璧に知っているようですわね

original: What do you have against the Vigilants?
string: 番人たちとの間に何か？

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: Where'd you come from?!
string: どこから来たんだ？

original: So maybe you could ask Isran if he knows anything? Just keep in mind that he... well, he might not like the idea.
string: だから、イスランに聞いてみるといいんじゃない？ ただし… 彼はこの考えが気に入らないかも知れないから注意して

original: There's no one around to disturb me and distract me from my writing. Present company excepted of course.
string: 書き物をしていても邪魔される事がない。ああっと、お前の事を言ってるわけじゃないぞ

original: Vampires?
string: 吸血鬼だと？

original: Not your first choice, I'd guess.
string: 迷わず選べる道ではないかも知れませんわ

original: This used to lead into the castle's great hall. It looks like my father had it sealed up.
string: 以前ここは城の大広間に通じておりましたのよ。どうやら父が封印したようですわね

original: Bleed and die!
string: 血を流して死ぬんだ！

original: Show yourself!
string: 姿を見せろ！

original: That's it? All right.
string: あれがそうですの？ 分かりましたわ

original: If we had the crests, we wouldn't have to keep hanging around this lovely place.
string: クレストさえあれば、この“素敵な”場所に長居する必要はありませんのに

original: Don't keep our master waiting. Take him the bow immediately.
string: 主様を待たせるな。今すぐ弓をお届けしろ

original: For the time being, they will remain open.
string: しばらくの間は、閉ざされる事はない

original: I finally bit off more than I could chew.
string: 調子にのって、とうとうやりすぎちまったわけだ

original: Valindor of Riften has his ears in places that we'd love to listening in. Joining our family should increase our possibilities in the south.
string: リフテンのヴァリンドルは我々のいい耳になってくれるぞ。仲間に加えれば南での活動の可能性が広がる

original: At this rate, my first volume will be complete. Don't give up.
string: この調子でいけば、第一巻が復元される日も近い。諦めるなよ

original: Last I'd heard of him, he was aiding the Vigilants of Stendarr at Ruunvald. He may still be there.
string: 彼の消息を最後に聞いた時は、ルーンヴァルドでステンダールの番人達に手を貸していた。まだそこにいるかも知れない

original: I will accept your gift and become a vampire.
string: 恩恵を受けて吸血鬼になろう

original: I wish I could say it was courage, or skill at arms that saved me. But that would be a lie.
string: 勇気か武器の腕前で助かったと言いたいが、それでは嘘になってしまう

original: Where did you get to?
string: どこに行きまして？

original: Isran's at Fort Dawnguard.
string: イスランはドーンガード砦にいる

original: Step from the shadows, defiler.
string: 陰に隠れず出てこい、冒涜者め！

original: To know the complete prophecy, we must have the other two scrolls.
string: 予言をすべて知るには、残りの2巻の書が必要だな

original: Show yourself.
string: 出てこい

original: Not that it helps us anyway, because they're all half a continent away in Cyrodiil.
string: いずれにせよ、大陸の反対側のシロディールにいるから役に立ちませんわね

original: I have not always been a ragged beggar. I learned my art from the masters of the art of flesh sculpture.
string: ずっとみすぼらしい物乞いだったわけじゃない。肉体改造の達人から技術を教わったのよ

original: Why?
string: 何故だ？

original: Now tell me, who is this stranger you have brought into our hall?
string: して、我らの殿堂に見知らぬ者を連れて来たようだが、何者なのだ？

original: Does this ice feel a little... thin to you?
string: この氷、少しばかり… 薄くありませんこと？

original: No...
string: 嫌でしてよ…

original: How many pages did you lose?
string: 失ったページの数は？

original: I requested refuge in the Soul Cairn, and in exchange, I would provide the Ideal Masters the souls that they craved.
string: ソウル・ケルンでかくまってもらうよう頼み、見返りにアイディール・マスターが切望する魂を提供するつもりだった

original: Your mind was strong, but you're exhausted from the struggle.
string: 強靭な精神であったが、抗う中で疲弊してきているな

original: So what exactly am I doing to it?
string: 具体的にどうすれば？

original: Then he found that prophecy, and... that was it.
string: そんな時に父があの予言を見つけて… それが終わりの始まりでしたの

original: That's all I can tell you. He asked me not to let anyone know where he was going. I suppose he didn't want the attention.
string: それ以上は言えないよ。行き先は誰にも教えないでくれと言われてるんでね。余計な関心をひきたくなかったんだろうさ

original: Safe? You call bringing her here safe? Has she explained nothing to you?
string: 安全？ 彼女をここへ連れてきて安全だと言うの？ 彼女は何も説明しなかった？

original: Why did you come here?
string: ここに来た理由は？

original: I keep a stable of thralls in the castle should you need to feed like the baser vampires to stave off the sun.
string: 下々の吸血鬼のように血を吸う事で日の光から身を守りたいのであれば、城に従徒を数名待機させてある

original: There's something out there.
string: あそこに何かある

original: Free? No. I have been here too long, Qahnaarin.
string: 自由だと？ 我はここに長居しすぎたのだ、クァーナーリン

original: What am I doing here? I don't belong in a place like this!
string: なぜここにいるんだ？ こんな所、私にはふさわしくない！

original: Come on!
string: かかっておいで！

original: (Sigh)...
string: はぁ…

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: No... why?
string: いいえ… どうして？

original: Are you prepared to read the Elder Scroll?
string: 星霜の書を読む用意はできているか？

original: DLC1VQ07Attack
string: DLC1VQ07Attack

original: I beg your pardon, sir. I don't know what you're getting at, but whatever it is, it's not appreciated.
string: どういうことだ？ 何が言いたいのか分からないが、とにかく不愉快だ

original: Forge something? With what?
string: 鋳造って？ 材料は？

original: It doesn't last long, though. The blood of your foes can sustain you. If you're willing to feed.
string: あまり長い時間は無理よ。でも敵の血で時間を伸ばせるわ。血を吸うのが嫌じゃなければね

original: Hmm... well, you can pick up where I left off. My notes should still be in my journal, if you can read it.
string: ふふん… あたしの続きから始めればいいんだよ。もし読めれば、日記にまだメモがあるはず

original: That sounds pretty lonely.
string: それは孤独だったろうな

original: Not going to happen.
string: あり得ませんわね

original: Isran will never admit it, but I'm sure he's proud of you.
string: イスランは認めないだろうけど、きっとあんたの事は鼻が高いはずだよ

original: Good luck. I hope you find the answers you seek.
string: 幸運を祈るよ。答えが見つかるといいな

original: Even in the Soul Cairn, the defeat of the World Eater has reached my ears, Dovahkiin.
string: ソウル・ケルン内にいても、世界を喰らう者を打ち破った事は耳にしているぞ、ドヴァーキン

original: You were hunting?
string: 狩りをしていたのか？

original: Mind yourself. There's a vicious bear on the loose.
string: 気をつけろ、凶悪なクマがうろついてる

original: Well, I don't know. Everything seemed fine until that dremora attacked me. I only heard later about the gates from the other souls.
string: さあてね。あのドレモラに襲われるまでは、何の問題もなかったんだ。あとになって、他の連中から門の話を聞いただけだ

original: They slaughtered everyone and stormed the Inner Sanctum where I believe they corrupted Vyrthur.
string: 皆を殺し、奴らは最奥聖域に攻め込んだ。ヴィルスールはそこで奴らの手に落ちたのだろう

original: Any luck yet?
string: まだうまくいきませんこと？

original: Where are you?
string: どこにいる！

original: Just... try to make it quick.
string: ええ… 早く終わらせて下さいましね

original: They increase the abilities of your vampiric powers.
string: 君の吸血鬼としての力を高めてくれるんだ

original: Arrrggghh...
string: ああああ…

original: I knew it would come to this one day. I knew, and no one believed.
string: いつかこうなるのは分かっていた。でも誰もそれを信じようとはしなかったのだ

original: No one is going to stand in my way!
string: 誰にも邪魔はさせない！

original: Forgive me, my instinct was to grant you this title. I am uncertain why. Perhaps one day it will become clear to both of us.
string: 許せ、かようにもこの称号を与えねばならぬと思えたのだ。理由は我にも分からん。いつか明かされる日が来るのかも知れないが…

original: I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard, then. Don't worry, Arkay will show me the way.
string: では、ドーンガード砦で会おう。問題ない。アーケイが導いてくれる

original: Welcome to the politics of Lord Harkon's court.
string: ハルコン卿の宮廷の政略争いへようこそ、だな

original: Trust me. I lived here for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: お任せあれ。長い間住んでいましたからここの事なら隅から隅まで知っていますの

original: I think we'll want Sorine Jurard. Breton girl, whip-smart and good with tinkering. Fascination with the Dwemer. Weapons in particular.
string: ソリーヌ・シュラルドを仲間にしよう。手先が器用でとても賢いブレトンの娘だ。ドゥーマーの文化に魅せられていて、特に彼らの武器への興味があるらしい

original: Arvak. My horse. We came to this horrible place together. We were attacked by monsters, so I told him to run.
string: アルヴァク。俺の馬だよ。一緒にこのおぞましい土地にやってきたはいいが、化け物どもに襲われたんで、逃げろと命じたんだ

original: Haven't you heard that the Hall of the Vigilants was destroyed by vampires? They never took the threat seriously, and now they've paid the price.
string: 番人の間が吸血鬼達に壊滅させられた話は聞いてないのか？ 奴らの脅威を甘く見ていた代償が高くついたな

original: What do you think I mean?
string: どういう意味だと思う？

original: He's holed up with a group of a necromancers.
string: 死霊術師の一団と共に立てこもっている

original: She wanted to get it as far away from my father as possible. I can't imagine a better place.
string: 母はそれを父からできるだけ遠ざけたかったのですから。他にもっといい場所なんて思いつきませんわよ

original: I'll need your help.
string: 力を貸してほしい

original: Winged Menace?
string: 羽根のある敵？

original: Now I'm trying to reestablish the Dawnguard. Take the fight to the vampires for a change. I hope it isn't too late.
string: 今私はドーンガードを復興して、吸血鬼に戦いを挑み、状況を変えようと奮闘している。手遅れでなければいいのだが

original: That's all I wanted to ask.
string: 聞きたいのはそれだけだ

original: Where would a Moth Priest actually go?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶はどこに行こうとするだろうか？

original: I'll take this one back to the castle.
string: これは城に持って帰っておくわ

original: They probably would have tried to kill her, and that has a way of souring relationships.
string: 彼らはきっと母を殺そうとしたでしょうね。でしたら関係は最悪ですわよ

original: I am Harkon, lord of this court.
string: 私の名はハルコン、この一族の王である

original: It's possible that your killing blow has merely displaced Durnehviir's physical form while he reconstitutes himself.
string: あなたのとどめの一撃は単にダーネヴィールの物理形態を置き換えただけで、復活中の可能性もあるわ

original: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
string: ソウル・ケルンを旅した事で、あなたの身体はかの地に同調したの

original: Refuse me, and I will banish you from this castle. I will spare your life this once, but after that, you are prey.
string: 断ればこの城からお前を追放する。今回ばかりは見逃してやるが、その後は獲物とみなす

original: That's, what, your third? All right, only one left to go. I'll meet you there.
string: それは、三つめかな？ いいね、残りは一つだけだよ。そこで会おう

original: May Auri-El's radiance fill your heart with joy.
string: アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たさん事を

original: Well, we've got that knife. There has to be a use for it.
string: さあ、ナイフは手に入りましたわ。あとはその使い道ですわね

original: That was... not as useful as I would have liked. Even so, you did well.
string: どうもあれは… 期待していたほど有用ではなかったな。それでも上出来には変わらない

original: Aye. And you be careful with the creature.
string: ああ。大事にしてやってくれ

original: As much as it pains me to send you and Serana back alone, I can't take the risk.
string: あなたとセラーナだけを送り返すのはつらいけれど、危険は冒せない

original: Testing this will require some extra precautions, I think.
string: これを試すには、かなり注意が必要ね

original: I'll try my luck elsewhere.
string: 他を当たってみよう

original: Ah, hello there!
string: やあ！

original: Back already? Can't wait.
string: もう戻ってきたの？ 早く見せて

original: I'm getting there. Making my peace with it.
string: もう少しですのよ。そうなれば、悩まなくて済むようになりますわ

original: And now you want to come running to safety with the Dawnguard, is that it?
string: ドーンガードに守ってほしいというわけか？

original: Have you decided? I am not a patient man.
string: 決めたのか？ 私は決して気の長い男ではない

original: Good, they should be able to help us.
string: よし、それなら力を貸してもらえるかも

original: I see you have returned. Lord Harkon will be pleased.
string: 戻ったようだな。ハルコン卿はお喜びになるだろう

original: Who sent you?
string: 誰に言われてここに？

original: I'm not talking about this with you any more.
string: あなたとは、もうこの話はいたしませんわ

original: Argh!
string: あ痛っ！

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 間違えれば… ええと。あたしが試した時の結果は知ってるよね
