string: 吸血鬼らが番人たちを襲った理由に心当たりは？

original: Let me guess. You're here for the treasure, aren't you? Just like all the others.
string: 当てて見せようか。宝が目的だね？ 他の皆と同じように

original: He was obsessed with power. She was obsessed with seeing him fail. It was just so... toxic.
string: 父は力にとりつかれていた。母は父が失敗するのをどうしても見たかった。それは… 中毒みたいなものですわね

original: I would never use Serana like that.
string: セラーナをそのように利用したりしない

original: If you wish to learn more about the bow, or obtain Sunhallowed Arrows for it, I'd be more than happy to help. You've but to ask.
string: あの弓の事が知りたい時や、あの弓で使う太陽神の矢がほしい時は、いつでも言ってくれ。喜んで力になろう

original: Can anything be done to help you?
string: 助けられる方法は何かないのか？

original: May Auri-El's radiance fill your heart with joy.
string: アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たさん事を

original: The dwarves may have stolen their sight, but it took many generations for them to become what they are today.
string: ドワーフに奪われたのは視力だけだが、何世代も経つうちにあのような姿になってしまったのだ

original: Come to visit this lost soul again?
string: この迷える魂に、まだ何か用か？

original: Why not hide it in the Soul Cairn and then return?
string: ソウル・ケルン内に隠して、自分だけ戻らなかったのは？

original: By the blood...
string: ああ、ご先祖様…

original: When will you fools learn? The night is ours!
string: 何度言えば分かる？ 夜は我々のものだ！

original: Watch the recoil. Takes some getting used to.
string: 反動に注意しろ。慣れるまで時間がかかるぞ

original: Yes, he's a fanatic... he's changed. But he's still my father. Why can't you understand how that makes me feel?
string: ええ、お父様は狂信的に… 変わってしまいましたわ。それでもわたしのお父様なのです。そういう父親を持った娘がどんな気持ちでいるのか、どうして分かってくれませんの？

original: Did you at least find out what the vampires were looking for in there?
string: 少なくとも、吸血鬼達があそこで何を探していたのかは分かったか？

original: If my desire to end your life was still my purpose, we would not be speaking.
string: いまだに我が目的が、そなたの命を終わらせる事であれば、こうして話してなどいないだろう

original: Is he... like me?
string: わたしと… 同じですの？

original: I used to hide down here and look out at the sea. Usually when my father was in a bad mood.
string: よくここに隠れて海を眺めたものでしたわ。大抵は父の機嫌が悪い時でしたのよ

original: The scrolls gave me its exact location.
string: 星霜の書が正確な位置を教えてくれた

original: All I needed was the blood of a vampire and his own weapon, Auriel's Bow.
string: 必要なものは吸血鬼の血液と、その武器であるアーリエルの弓だけだった

original: What?
string: 何？

original: It's the Dawnguard! Let none escape!
string: ドーンガードだ！ 1人も逃がすな！

original: So... this is the place.
string: すると… ここがそうですのね

original: You are prey, like all mortals. I banish you!
string: お前は獲物だ、定命の者の例に漏れずな。立ち去るがいい！

original: "Saviour of Morrowind." Hm, that's good but it sounds too narrow of scope...
string: “モロウウィンドの生存者”。うーん、響きは悪くないが、少し範囲が狭すぎやしないかね…

original: The letter left on the corpse shall have to suffice. It will no doubt be found.
string: まあ、死体に残した手紙が見つかるはずだから、それで十分だが

original: I live in a dark world, where no light shines through. I carry this burden with every step I take.
string: ここは光の差さない、暗闇の世界だ。一歩一歩が、この苦しみと共にある

original: Indeed. The day hasn't been won while Harkon still walks Tamriel.
string: 確かにな。ハルコンがタムリエルの地を歩いている以上、勝利の日は訪れない

original: Door's shut tight. I bet those Resonators would open it, though.
string: 扉は密閉されている。でもあの共鳴装置で開くはずだよ

original: And now that you've stirred up the vampires against you, you come begging for my protection?
string: 吸血鬼達を自分で怒らせたくせに、私に守ってほしいと言うのか？

original: We're not close anymore.
string: お互いの距離が離れてしまった

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. I have no time to speak with you.
string: 悪いけど、ドーンガードのための急ぎの仕事があるの。あなたと話す時間はないわ

original: What exactly does it do?
string: 何をするものなんだ？

original: Watch yourself.
string: 気をつけて

original: Ambushed by vampires... I certainly wasn't expecting that.
string: 吸血鬼達に待ち伏せを喰らって… 完全に予測外だったよ

original: You're mine, mortal!
string: お前は私のものだ！

original: All right... Here, take this.
string: 分かった… これをどうぞ

original: Please, he's such a loyal creature, and he's been running for so long. You have to save him! A place like this will change you...
string: 何しろ忠実な奴でね。それ以来ずっと逃げ続けてる。なんとか助けてやってくれ！ こんな所にいたらおかしくなっちまうよ…

original: Keep watch for Durnehviir. With the prison's barrier down, he's almost certain to investigate.
string: ダーネヴィールに警戒して。牢獄の障壁が壊れた今、調査しに来るのはほぼ確実よ

original: Wouldn't that kill me?
string: 死んでしまったりしないのか？

original: Gods, Vampires! I... I can't take this anymore! I'm not cut out for this!
string: げっ、吸血鬼ども！ 俺は… 俺はもう耐えられない！ 入団するんじゃなかった！

original: No, I haven't seen any.
string: いや、見ていない

original: Are you able to give us the scroll now?
string: これで星霜の書をもらえるのか？

original: I don't trust things that try to kill me.
string: 殺そうとしてきた相手を信用しろと言われてもな

original: Not... like... this...
string: こんな… ふうには…

original: Well. After you.
string: さあ。先にどうぞ

original: I swore I'd have my revenge, no matter what the cost.
string: どんな犠牲を払ってでも、復讐を果たすと誓ったのだよ

original: With Sunhallowed Arrows, you would be able to produce a much more spectacular effect... causing bursts of sunlight to envelop your foes.
string: 太陽神の矢を使えば、さらに絶大な効果を発揮するのだ。敵は太陽の炎で焼き尽くされるだろう

original: All those things had been building for a while. You have no idea how long I wanted to say that to her.
string: すべてがしばらくの間ずっと積もって大きくなっていきましたの。どれほど長く母にその事を伝えたかったか、あなたには想像もつかないでしょうね

original: I've never been in those tunnels before, but I'd bet they run right under the courtyard and into the tower ruins.
string: このトンネルには入った事がありませんけど、中庭の下を通って塔の廃墟に通じている事は賭けてもよくてよ

original: Just get to it!
string: 細かいことはいいから早く！

original: He's such a loyal beast. Here, I'll teach you how to call him to you.
string: あいつはすごく忠実でね。どれ、呼び方を教えてやろう

original: You have earned my trust, so I will share what I can.
string: 信頼に足ると判断して、話せる事は話そう

original: The Tyranny of the Sun has been broken!
string: 太陽の専制は打ち破られた！

original: My claws have rended the flesh of innumerable foes, but I have never once been felled on the field of battle.
string: 我が爪は新鮮な肉をあまた引き裂いてきたが、戦場で倒された事は一度もなかった

original: And you were caught in the middle.
string: 間に挟まれてしまったと

original: Look out! Gargoyles!
string: 気を付けて！ ガーゴイルですわ！

original: I made it.
string: 自力で作った

original: Must... resist...
string: 抵抗… しなければ…

original: Well? Ready to join the fight against the damn vampires?
string: 忌々しい吸血鬼達と戦う覚悟はできたのかな？

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: No matter how long I've been here, I'll still never get used to this place.
string: どれだけ長くここにいようと、決してこの場所には慣れないわ

original: How dare they cast me from the Battlespire! I will make them pay dearly.
string: バトルスパイアーからこんな所に飛ばすなんて！ 必ず復讐してやる

original: The Elder Scroll is just a bit further.
string: 星霜の書はあとほんの少し先よ

original: What? What is this?
string: 何だ？ 何だこれは？

original: I assume that the Arch-Curate was corrupted by them when they found a way to breach the Inner Sanctum.
string: 奴らは何らかの方法で最奥聖域に侵入した。おそらく最高司祭はその時に奴らの手に落ちたのだろう

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: An axe imbued with magic fueled by the destruction of the unholy. With every victorious blow against an undead creature, its power grows.
string: この斧にかけられた魔法は、邪悪なものを破壊する事でその強さを増す。アンデッドに打撃を加えるたびに、斧は強くなっていく

original: Now a voice whispers, saying "Among the night's children, a dread lord will rise."
string: 声がささやく… 「夜の子供達の中から、ドレッド・ロードが現れる」

original: Then how do I even stand a chance?
string: だとすれば、自分にできるとは到底思えない

original: I'm over here!
string: わたしはこちらよ！

original: We should keep it small. Too many people, and we'll draw unwanted attention to ourselves.
string: 集団の規模は小さい方がいい。人が多すぎると余計な注目を浴びてしまう

original: I could see it in your eyes. You looked about a thousand leagues away.
string: 目を見れば分かりますわ。あなたはずっと遠くにいるように見えましてよ

original: You need something?
string: 何か必要なものが？

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: If we head back to the castle and kick the front door in, we're going to be knee-deep in his friends.
string: 城に戻ってドアを蹴破って中に入りましたら、彼の友達が大勢でお出迎えして下さるのでしょうね

original: Carefully gather the bark? How?
string: 樹皮を慎重にはがすって？ どうやって？

original: Follow me. I need your help.
string: ついて来てくれ。手を貸してほしい

original: Oh. All right. Goodbye, then.
string: ああ、そうですの。それでは失礼いたしますわ

original: Only the most resilient of priests can do it this way... it takes years of practice to interpret the harmony.
string: これを実行できるのは、僧侶の中でも回復力が最も高い者のみだ… それに調和の解釈には何年もの鍛錬が必要になる

original: No, but there's no way she would have left it in Tamriel.
string: いいえ。でも母がそれをタムリエルに置いていったなんてありえませんわ

original: You think I do this for my health? Come back when you've got the coin.
string: 健康のためにやってるとでも？ 金をこしらえてから来な

original: I just need to be alone. For a while. There's a lot of feelings wrapped up in this old place, and I don't think you're quite ready for them.
string: しばらく独りでいたいだけですわ。ここには昔からの想いが色々と眠っていて、それらにつき合わせるにはまだ早い気がするのです

original: Finish them!
string: 奴らを殺せ！

original: Good. Strong instincts and a cunning mind will serve you as well as blade, spell or claw.
string: ふむ。強い本能と機転は武器や魔法や爪に劣らず有用なはずだ

original: Normally, the study of a scroll's meaning can take months or even years. Even then, there are no guarantees.
string: 書の解読には通常数ヶ月、時には数年を要する。だが時間をかけたからといって成功は保証されていない

original: For those willing to subjugate themselves, he will still bestow the gift, but they must be powerful in their own right before earning his trust.
string: 彼は、自分に忠誠を誓った者には力を与えるけれど、彼の信用を得るには元々の能力も強くないと無理なのです

original: You only delay the inevitable.
string: 逃げ回っても、どうせ死ぬのだぞ

original: It should be among our kind, not laying about unguarded for mortals to find.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。定命の者達の目につかないようにしっかり保管されているよ

original: Please... end this misery.
string: 頼む… ひと思いに楽にして

original: Let's just get this over with. Do you have any elven arrows?
string: 済ませてしまいましょう。エルフの矢は持っておりますの？

original: A small price to pay for the betterment of our kind.
string: 我が一族の発展のための、微々たる犠牲だ

original: Who said something, Sorine or Gunmar? I thought they'd have learned their lesson by now.
string: 誰が言ったんだ？ ソリーヌか？ ガンマーか？ 彼らは十分教訓を学んだと思っていたが

original: I suppose you could call this the ultimate waiting game, each watching the other to see which will give in.
string: 究極の持久戦と呼べるかも知れないわ。どちらが先に降参するか、お互いに監視し合う

original: A... can't you tell just from looking at me? A vampire.
string: きゅ… 見てお分かりでしょう？ 吸血鬼ですわ

original: Yes… master…
string: はい… ご主人様…

original: What went wrong?
string: 何か問題でも？

original: It's on an island near Solitude. Hopefully we can find a boat to take us there.
string: ソリチュードの近くの島にございますわ。渡るのに使える小船でもあるといいのですが

original: We could just "pay the toll" another way. It wants a soul, so we give it a soul. Yours.
string: “通行料”を別の形で払えばいいのかも知れませんわね。魂をほしがっているなら、魂を差し出せばいい。あなたのを

original: But to finalize the deal, you have to travel here yourself... and most of them never come back.
string: でも契約を仕上げるには、あなた自身の足でここを旅しなければ… そして旅した者はほとんど帰ってまいりませんわ

original: My mother was meticulous about her research. If we can find her notes, there might be some hints in there.
string: 母の研究は実に入念なものでしたの。記録を見つけられれば、そこに手がかりがあるかも知れませんわ

original: I'm not going to blamed for whatever happens.
string: 何が起きても、わたしのせいになさらないで

original: Come on, let's go home.
string: さあ、帰りましょう

original: Does the air feel... heavy down here? I'm a little woozy, but it might just be from waking up.
string: ここの空気… 重く感じませんこと？ 少し頭がぼんやりいたしますわ、寝起きだからかも知れませんけれど

original: Rival assassin?
string: 対立関係にある暗殺者？

original: Is it normal for Moth Priests to go blind?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が失明するのはよくあることなのか？

original: Then I see nothing preventing my return to Tamriel.
string: では私のタムリエルへの帰還を妨げるものはないわ

original: I've saved her from your foolish plan.
string: あんたのばかげた計画から彼女を助け出した

original: Oh, I'm sure I have something you'll find useful.
string: 君の役に立ちそうなものを持ってるよ

original: It's so bright out here. I don't know how you stand it.
string: ここはひどく明るいですわね。あなたはどうして平気でいられますの？

original: Please, turn back... before it's too late...
string: お願い、引き返して… 手遅れになる前に…

original: I'm quite alright, thanks to you. Dexion Evicus is my name. I'm a Moth Priest of the White Gold Tower.
string: 君のおかげで大丈夫だよ。デキソン・エヴィカス… 白金の塔の聖蚕の僧侶だ

original: I don't want you to feel like I'm forcing you into this.
string: 無理強いされていると思わないで下さいましね

original: Parading around in that form won't do you any good here.
string: ここをその姿で練り歩くのは何の得にもならないわよ

original: Will I be able to keep the ring?
string: 指輪はそのままもらっていいのか？

original: Perhaps they'll never return to their former appearance, but over the centuries, I've noticed a rise in their intellect.
string: 元の姿には戻れないかも知れないが、何世紀もの間に彼らの知性が確かに高まってきているのを感じる

original: May Auri-El's warmth imbue your body with strength.
string: その身がアーリエルの力で満たされん事を

original: Got to keep alert. We don't want to get caught napping like the Vigilants did.
string: 用心しないとな。番人達のように寝込みを襲われたらたまらない

original: Armory. (<Global=HDWindhelmArmory> gold)
string: 武器庫(<Global=HDWindhelmArmory> ゴールド)

original: I need the Elder Scroll that speaks of dragons.
string: 竜族について書かれた星霜の書がほしい

original: You've served us all well, friend.
string: 私達皆に尽くしてくれたわ

original: Finally! I never thought I'd see these again.
string: やっとか！ もう戻らないかと思ってた

original: I'm ready.
string: 準備はできてる

original: Do you... hear something?
string: 何か… 聞こえる？

original: Bedroom furnishings. (<Global=HDWindhelmBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室用品(<Global=HDWindhelmBedroom> ゴールド)

original: But, we haven't gotten rid of them completely. A body can rattle around confused long after it's head's been severed.
string: でも、彼らを完全に始末してはいない。死体は首を切られた後も長い間混乱を引き延ばせるものよ

original: And might I add, this is a remarkable fortress. I have colleagues back home that would love to study this place in detail.
string: それにしても、ここは素晴らしい砦だね。故郷の仲間にも是非ともじっくり見せてやりたいよ

original: Is it fragile? Do we need to be careful with it?
string: 壊れやすいものなのか？ 慎重に扱う必要はあるのか？

original: No... it's not working!
string: 違う… これでは駄目ですわ！

original: You'd become the very thing you've sworn to destroy. I don't know how the Dawnguard will react.
string: 倒すと誓った敵そのものになる事ですのよ。ドーンガードがどう反応するか、分かりかねますわ

original: Oh wow. This is gorgeous.
string: はわぁ… すごく豪華ですわね

original: Perhaps her death is destined.
string: 彼女の死は運命で決められたことかもな

original: I know your friends would probably want to kill everything in here. I'm hoping you can show some more control than that.
string: あなたのお仲間はここの住人を皆殺しにしたがるのでしょうね。あなたにはもう少し話が通じると思いたいですわ

original: Of course I do.
string: もちろんだとも

original: What's wrong? You want to go hunt some vampires?
string: どうした？ 吸血鬼でも狩りに行かないか？

original: What do you mean by allaying fear through vampiric seduction?
string: 吸血鬼の誘惑で恐れを鎮める、というのは？

original: No, we are vampires, among the oldest and most powerful in Skyrim.
string: 訂正しよう。我々は吸血鬼、スカイリムにおいて最も古く、最も強大な種族だ

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: In an age long forgotten to history, I ruled as a mighty king. My domain was vast, my riches endless and my power infinite.
string: 歴史上忘れられてしまった遥か昔、私は強大な王として君臨していた。領土は広く、富は際限なく、権力は無限とすら言えた

original: Be careful with those crystals. They feel... hungry.
string: そういうクリスタルには注意なさって。どれも… お腹をすかせてますのよ

original: Snow elves? You're a Falmer?
string: スノーエルフ？ ファルメルなのか？

original: Leave me be!
string: 放っといてくれ！

original: It probably didn't have anything to do with you.
string: おそらく君がどうこうという話じゃなかったんだろうな

original: And what exactly are you going to pay me with? Take a look around. Gold doesn't exactly win you any friends around here.
string: 支払いはどうやって？ 周りを見ろよ。この辺じゃあゴールドを持っててもそんなに意味はないぞ

original: Grrargh!
string: がるるる！

original: Play me a song, "bard."
string: 吟遊詩人なら歌の一曲でも聞かせてほしい

original: Turns out you don't learn much from just sleeping with something.
string: 何かと一緒に寝るだけでは、大した事は学べないみたいですわね

original: Oh, I see. You've decided to cease pursuing your busy schedule and wish to talk now. How kind.
string: ああ、忙しい中、予定を後回しにして話をしてくれるのか。そりゃどうもね

original: If we're going to survive this, we're going to have to be as ruthless as our enemies.
string: この戦いを生き抜きたいなら、敵と同じぐらい非情に徹しなければならない

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: Why didn't you say something earlier?
string: もっと早く言わなかったのは？

original: A man named Isran.
string: イスランという名の男だ

original: A little extra protection never hurts.
string: 少し余分な防備を持つに越した事はないわ

original: I have to admit, I'm impressed. I didn't think you had the spirit for it.
string: 正直なところ、感心いたしましたわ。そんな度胸はないと思っておりましたもの

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: He just became absorbed... obsessed. It was kind of sick, actually.
string: 父はそれに熱中… 没頭してしまったのです。病的ですらありましたわ

original: Can you imagine it? A world without a sun... we would all have been doomed, vampires and men alike.
string: 想像できるかい？ 太陽のない世界なんて… そうなったら吸血鬼も人間もみんな終わりだよ

original: (Heavy breathing)
string: ハァ、ハァ

original: Ah. Been working more on his secret hideout, has he? It'll be interesting to see how much progress he's made.
string: ああ、ずっと秘密の隠れ家で仕事してたのね？ どれだけ進んだか、見るのが楽しみだわ

original: Let's get this over with.
string: 終わらせてしまおう

original: The Dawnguard will want the Bow, and they will fight us, hard, to get it.
string: ドーンガードは弓をほしがる。手に入れるためには必死で戦うでしょうね

original: Maybe this will put your mind at ease. (<bribecost> gold)
string: これで気が変わるかな？(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: The wizards know about all kinds of things that people probably shouldn't know about.
string: ウィザードは普通の人達が知るべきではない事を色々とご存知ですものね

original: Even a necromancer as seasoned as my mother would be willing to spend years trying to gain access to them.
string: わたしの母と同じぐらい経験を積んだ死霊術師でも、彼らとお近づきになれるなら喜んで数年間を費やすのでしょう

original: Harkon himself disbelieved in their existence, though perhaps he felt slighted they were not already in his possession and only feigns indifference.
string: ハルコン自身はその存在を疑ってるよ。でも多分、彼は指輪が自分のものではない事が気に食わないんだ。だから無関心を装ってるのさ

original: This is it!
string: いよいよだな！

original: Oh no...
string: ああ、なんて事かしら…

original: I'd be happy for you to have them. Here.
string: もらってくれれば嬉しい。渡そう

original: Wait! ...Yes, yes there is. The shards we collected... they're pure Aetherium, remember? It's not much, but it'll do.
string: 待って！ …うん、あるよ。集めた破片は… 純粋なエセリウムだよ、覚えてる？ 多くはないけど、使えるね

original: Let me take a look at it.
string: わたしに読ませて

original: I doubt there's any other place like it in Skyrim. It's beautiful.
string: スカイリムに二つとない場所だわ。なんて美しいのかしら

original: I'm, uh... my name is Agmaer, sir.
string: 俺は… いえ、私の名前はアグミルです

original: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
string: 本物なの？ 信じられないわ！

original: Conduits through which the Ideal Masters speak to their underlings and feed on their victims.
string: アイディール・マスターが手下へ語りかけ、彼らの犠牲者達を捕食するのに使う導管よ

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: The more they worry, the more they talk about it. I've been hearing rumors for a bit now.
string: 不安が高まれば、人々はもっとその事を口々にする。そして、すでに少しうわさを耳にした

original: Sure... do you have any arrows, though? They would have to be of elven quality, I'd guess.
string: もちろんですわ… でも矢は持っておりますの？ おそらくエルフの矢みたいに立派なものでなければ駄目ですわよ

original: Lead the way. Take me to this "monster" of yours.
string: 案内してちょうだい。その“怪物”のところへ

original: An island near the border to Highrock.
string: ハイロックとの境界線近くの島だ

original: I'll never tell you anything, vampire. My oath to Stendarr is stronger than any suffering you can inflict on me.
string: 言ったろう。何の話か分からないな

original: I suppose that's as much as I can hope for.
string: それがせめてもの願いだ

original: You're no merchant.
string: 商人などではないな

original: The trolls will serve us well, I think.
string: トロールらが役立ちそうだな

original: Excellent. That's one less beast and nest of broodlings we needn't worry about any longer.
string: 素晴らしい。これで危険な化け物一家を一つ減らせたわけだな

original: What will you do now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: Rrarggh!
string: うらああ！

original: Now my work will never see the light of day. My name will be forgotten.
string: あの作品は永遠に日の目を見ない、と。この名も忘れられてしまうってのか

original: I need you to do something.
string: 手伝ってもらおうかな

original: I'll tell you what. I appreciate what you're trying to do, so I'll play along.
string: こうしよう。あんたのやろうとしてる事は気に入ったから、協力してやるよ

original: I thought you said you were happy together.
string: 一緒にいれば幸せだって言いましてよね？

original: Let's go have a little chat with it, shall we?
string: ちょっとおしゃべりでもしようか

original: Let's run as far from him as we can.
string: 彼からできるだけ遠くに逃げるんだ

original: If you'll excuse me.
string: では失礼する

original: You there! Traveler! Over here!
string: おーい！ そこの旅人！ こっちだ！

original: It may have driven my family apart, but I'm still here, and I'm alive. I won't give this up.
string: そのせいで家族はバラバラになりましたけど、わたしはまだ生きておりますわ。力を捨てたりなどいたしませんのよ

original: And an assault on the Betrayed guarding the Inner Sanctum would only end with my death.
string: それに、裏切られし者が守る最奥聖域に攻め込んだところで、無駄死にするだけだ

original: She'll definitely know where it is, and if we're lucky, she actually has it herself.
string: 母ならそのありかを絶対に知っていますわ。もしかしたら持っているかも

original: "And without any regard for my safety, I fearless charged the enemy!" No, much too dramatic...
string: 「そして、身の危険も顧みず、恐れる事なく敵に立ち向かう！」 いや、ドラマチックすぎるかな…

original: I once paid 3000 gold for this fungus that grows in giants armpits. Couldn't stand up for days, but no where as good as this stuff.
string: 前に、巨人の脇の下に生えるというキノコに3000ゴールド払いましたよ。何日も立ち上がれなくなった上に、味もこれの足元には及びませんでした

original: Hm. Most interesting.
string: ふむ、実に興味深い

original: All right. Good luck.
string: 分かった。がんばってね

original: Barknar insisted we come here, said we'd be safe. He also said we'd be inside the walls.
string: バークナールが、安全だし壁の内側にいられると言ってここへ来させたの

original: If I'm reading this right, there's a formula here that should give us safe passage into the Soul Cairn.
string: 読み間違いでなければ、ソウル・ケルンへと無事に入るための手順が記されていますわ

original: It sounds like... that's the last bit of the prophecy. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour can corrupt the bow.
string: そうですわね… 予言の最後の部分ですわ。コールドハーバーの娘の血が弓を汚せばいい

original: How did you know?
string: どうしてそれを？

original: And if she doesn't?
string: そうでなければ？

original: Well, at least we're getting closer. Let's go.
string: でも、少なくとも近づいてはいますわ。行きましょう

original: What about me?
string: 自分がどうしたって？

original: Do you have the Elder Scroll with you?
string: 星霜の書は持っているのか？

original: You talk about being lonely a lot.
string: 孤独を話題にすることが多い気がする

original: Hey, watch it!
string: ちょっと、気をつけて！

original: I won't beg for protection, but I'm not even sure that would work with this Isran.
string: 守ってもらおうと懇願するつもりはないが、したとしてもイスランとやらには通用するだろうか？

original: Sometimes they go out looking for Elder Scrolls. Lucky for you, there's a Moth Priest in Skyrim right now, doing just that.
string: 連中は時に、星霜の書を求めて遠出する。幸いこのスカイリムにもまさしくそんな聖蚕の僧侶が来ている

original: So I am. I guess we could use my blood. Do you have any arrows? Elven arrows. I'm not going to just bleed on any old thing.
string: そうですわね。わたしの血を使ってよろしくてよ。矢は持ってますの？ エルフの矢がいいですわね。古いものはダメですわよ

original: What is the Chantry of Auri-El?
string: アーリエルの礼拝所とは？

original: I discovered too late that the Ideal Masters favor deception over honor and had no intention of releasing me from my binding.
string: 気づいた時には手遅れだった。名誉よりも欺まんを好むアイディール・マスターどもは、我を解き放つつもりなどなかったのだ

original: You've found the Wayshrine of Radiance, Initiate.
string: ここは輝きの祠だ、新人よ

original: Your death will be my gift to Auri-El!
string: 貴様の命をアーリエルに捧げてやろう！

original: I am well, sire.
string: 元気です

original: Well, don't just stand there!
string: ほら、突っ立ってないで！

original: How about sitting in your home, minding your own business and then suddenly getting attacked by a dremora and his cronies.
string: 自分の家で用事に集中している時に、ドレモラとその仲間に突然襲われる話だ

original: That covering on your eyes. Are you-
string: その目隠しのようなもの、まさか…

original: Wait, stop! I yield!
string: おい、やめてくれ！ 降参だ！

original: Talk to Serana, and decide which you want to be.
string: セラーナと話して、どちらになりたいか決めなさい

original: Well met, friend. We've been chasing that fiend for a long time. On behalf of the Vigil, you have my thanks.
string: よくやってくれたわね。長い間追い続けていた敵だったのよ。番人に代わって感謝するわ

original: By ensuring the Chalice reaches our Lord, you have increased his power over them, and at the same time deprived them of their little pets.
string: お前は我らの主へ聖杯を確実に届ける事で、彼らに対する主の支配力を強め、同時に彼らの小さなペットを剥奪した

original: Your soul essence was trapped inside a gem. When you and Serana entered the Soul Cairn, it was "given" to the Ideal Masters as payment.
string: あなたの魂のエキスは石の中に閉じ込められ、セラーナと一緒にソウル・ケルンへ入った時にアイディール・マスターへ報酬として“捧げられた”の

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Like she didn't want to just stop my father... she wanted to stick it to him, too.
string: 父を止めるだけでは飽き足りず、思い知らせてやりたかったかのような…

original: What are you doing that's so dangerous?
string: そんなに危険な事とは？

original: The Soul Cairn has become a part of what I am. I can never fully call Tamriel my home again, or I would surely perish.
string: ソウル・ケルンは我が存在の一部と化している。タムリエルに戻ろうとしても、この身は滅んでしまうだろう

original: I admit, I feel a bit frustrated that I can't be more helpful. Still, our enemy is likely just as much in the dark as we are, and that's something.
string: 正直言って、力になれなくて残念だよ。だが暗闇をさまよってるのは敵も同じ事。そう思えば少しは気も楽になるだろう

original: So, this is snow elf magic. Incredible.
string: するとこれはスノーエルフの魔法ですのね。すごいですわ

original: Even with Vyrthur gone and the Inner Sanctum destroyed, my duty as a Knight-Paladin of Auri-El remains.
string: ヴィルスールまでもが連れ去られ、最奥聖域が破壊された今でも、アーリエルの騎士司祭としての使命は続いている

original: It appears I have you to thank for turning my daughter against me.
string: 娘を心変わりさせたのはお前の仕業のようだな

original: Keep in mind that Redwater Den has fallen into... well, let's just say less reputable members of society now dwell there.
string: 覚えておけ、レッドウォーターの隠れ家は… まあ、社会であまり信頼できん者達のすみかになっているとだけ言っておこう

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について知りたい

original: I've located the last known resting place of a set of ancient Amulets of Night Power.
string: 太古の夜の力のアミュレット一式が眠る最後の場所が分かったぞ

original: You've no chance against a true vampire!
string: 真の吸血鬼に勝ち目はないわ！

original: I'm sure.
string: 迷うところじゃない

original: I'm as ready as I can be.
string: 自分なりに覚悟はできてる

original: I don't have 25 husks.
string: ハスク25個の手持ちはないな

original: Let's see what you've got there.
string: 見せてちょうだい

original: Keep your guard up.
string: 気を抜かないことね

original: The clouds, the sky... it's all wrong. Everything's wrong.
string: あの雲も、空も… 何もかも、全部がおかしい

original: Time was I could barely hold my own in the Companions. Now I could slaughter them all without a second thought.
string: 同胞団にいた頃は自制するのがやっとだった。今なら何のためらいもなく彼ら全員を殺せそうよ

original: I remember Keeper Carcette telling me repeatedly that Fort Dawnguard is a crumbling ruin, not worth the expense and manpower to repair.
string: 番人のカルセッテが何度も言ってたな。ドーンガード砦は廃墟寸前だから、人と金を使って修復する価値はないって

original: Then behold Auri-El's gift, my child. May it light your path as you seek tranquility within the Inner Sanctum.
string: では、アーリエルの祝福を受けるがいい。最奥聖域へ導く光が、汝と共にあるように

original: Didn't you try to kill me?
string: こちらを殺そうとしなかったか？

original: Do you think this would help? (Give Journal)
string: これは手がかりになるだろうか？(日記を渡す)

original: It's... well, it's about me. And the Elder Scroll that was buried with me.
string: 話は… わたしの事、および、一緒に埋まっていた星霜の書の事なのですが…

original: She doesn't seem too fond of him.
string: 母親が父親を好きだったようには聞こえないな

original: If only such a miracle existed, I'd overcome the impossible in order to secure it if it meant pleasing you.
string: そんな奇跡が起こせるなら、不可能を可能にしてあなた様を喜ばせるのに…

original: But no matter. The greatest artists are never recognized in their own time.
string: でも関係ないわ。最も偉大な芸術家は決して生前には認められないものよ

original: Die, heathen!
string: 死ね、異端の者め！

original: I killed them both.
string: 両方とも手にかけた

original: They say that vampires attacked the Hall of the Vigilant. Burned it to the ground! Never heard of vampires doing anything like that before.
string: 吸血鬼が番人の間を襲撃したらしい。全焼させたそうだ！ 吸血鬼がそんな事をするなんて、今まで聞いた事がない

original: Don't worry, we'll find the glade.
string: 心配しないで。“先人の湿地”はきっと見つかるわ

original: Last I knew, he was headed to Ruunvald. But then, we hadn't heard from anyone there in a few weeks.
string: 最後に聞いた時はルーンヴァルドに向かっていたが、その時点で音信は数週間途絶えていた

original: Have to say, I'm pretty impressed.
string: 正直言って、かなり感心した

original: No, and if you're smart you won't either. I know he's one of your kind and all, but he's only looking out for himself.
string: いいや。お前も同族だからと言って、信用しない方がいい。奴は自分の事しか考えていないからな

original: Why are we speaking?
string: 話すことが何かあるのか？

original: But we'll put a swift end to that.
string: だがそれもすぐに終わりにしてやる

original: I understand. Take your time.
string: 分かりますわ。焦る必要はなくてよ

original: You mean the Betrayed.
string: 裏切られし者のことか？

original: I am at your service, as always.
string: いつもどおり、ご用があれば何なりと

original: This is no ruse. I want to keep her safe.
string: だますつもりはない。彼女を守りたいだけだ

original: This will put my father in a great mood. You should come enjoy it while it lasts.
string: これで父は上機嫌になるはずよ。曇らないうちが花だけど

original: Get out while you can.
string: 逃げられるうちに、ここを離れるんだな

original: I don't think they'll involve you.
string: 関与してもらう余地があるとは思えない

original: For me? I've done what I set out to do.
string: あたし？ 目的はもう果たしたよ

original: We're called the Dawnguard. We're fighting a vampire conspiracy.
string: 我々はドーンガード。吸血鬼らの陰謀と戦っている

original: You've reached the Wayshrine of Learning, Initiate.
string: この学びの祠へようこそ、新人よ

original: Your soul was trapped.
string: 魂を捕らわれたんだ

original: Werewolf!
string: ウェアウルフ！

original: I've destroyed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: I've fought worse than you!
string: 何のこれしき！

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: I do not fear death.
string: 死なんかちっとも怖くない

original: You're mortal? What are you doing here like that?
string: あんた定命の者かい？ こんな所で何をやってるんだ？

original: What kind of beast is that? No law against it, but if that thing starts attacking people, it's getting a sword in the gullet.
string: 一体何の獣だ？ 違法ではないが、もし人を襲い始めたら喉に剣を突っ込まれるぞ

original: And you carried out my instructions to kill the victim in view of others and while wearing the Dawnguard uniform. Very good.
string: ちゃんと指示を守って、ドーンガードの制服を着て人目につくところで殺したんだな。いいぞ

original: Maybe he knows what's going on.
string: 彼なら、この状況を理解しているかも知れませんわ

original: And with that... it's done. No one could possibly deny what we've found now.
string: そしてこれで… 完了だ。もうあたし達が見つけたものを否定できる奴なんていない

original: You disrespect Lord Harkon by walking around here like that. Go see him at once, else you might find yourself in a cage.
string: そのように歩きまわるのはハルコン卿に対する非礼だ。直ちに拝謁しに行け、さもないと檻にぶち込むぞ
…ふうん…

original: Take care of yourself.
string: 気をつけて行け

original: Do you need something?
string: 何か必要なものでも？

original: Hey, if you don't like it, you could always shop for your Elder Scrolls elsewhere.
string: 嫌なら別の場所で星霜の書を探せばいいだけの話だ

original: Come on boy, let's go.
string: ほらほら、行くぞ！

original: What did you want?
string: 用件はなに？

original: This is your home?
string: これが家なのか？

original: I know, I know, but just... anyway. Molag Bal is the original source of vampirism, and still grants it to his more worthy followers.
string: はいはい、そうですわね、ですが… とにかく、吸血鬼を最初に造ったのはモラグ・バルで、高位の手下には今も吸血鬼の力を与えていますわ

original: Why would your wife betray you?
string: どうして妻に裏切られたんだ？

original: Put his mind to rest, allay his fear through vampiric seduction and when he is in a pliant condition, embrace him and bite him on the neck.
string: 彼の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: If I may ask, what will you do with them now?
string: それをどうするつもりか、教えてもらってもいいかな？

original: The true power of the ancient blood is found in the form of the Vampire Lord.
string: 古き血の真の力は、吸血鬼の王の姿となった時に発揮される

original: Can't we inform the Jarl's men of the threat?
string: 首長の部下に警告すべきでは？

original: How is the work coming along?
string: 進み具合はどうだ？

original: Are you out of your mind?
string: 酔狂にもほどがありましてよ？

original: If you wanted to bring some to me, I'd be happy to provide you some of the extract. It should help resist the draining aura of the crystals.
string: いくつか持ってきてくれれば、喜んでエキスを渡すわ。水晶からオーラが流出するのを抑えられるはずよ

original: You must be crazy.
string: すっかりおかしくなっているな…

original: Said he found some old Dwemer artifact, but... well, that was years ago.
string: ある古のドゥーマーの秘宝を見つけたと言っていたが… それもずっと昔の事だ

original: I'll be at Castle Volkihar if you need me.
string: ヴォルキハル城におりますから、用がありましたらおいで下さいませ

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: ShoutStartShort
string: ShoutStartShort

original: ...maybe the clans have it right... hunting's so chancy... why not keep a few thralls... blood whenever you want it...
string: …一族の言う事は正しいんだろう… 確かに狩りは当てにならない… それなら従徒を何人か抱えた方がいい… ほしい時に血が手に入るからな…

original: He was a vampire. He controlled them.
string: 彼は吸血鬼で、その力を使って彼らを操っていた

original: I can't help that space is cramped in here, Florentius.
string: 狭いのは仕方ないぞ、フロレンティウス

original: Kind of fitting that the Vigilants would be wiped out by vampires.
string: 番人らが吸血鬼によって壊滅させられたのは、然るべき皮肉に思えてしまう

original: If you want to cure yourself, I'll support you.
string: 根治したいというなら、力になろう

original: I admire your devotion.
string: 見上げた信仰心だな

original: Look, I'll be honest with you. I have no idea. But I'm sure we can find something worth your time.
string: じゃあ、正直に言おう。見当もつかない。だけど、探せば何か出てくる。損はさせないよ

original: Sorine needs help with her project to improve our crossbows. And if that doesn't interest you...
string: ソリーヌがクロスボウの改良を手伝ってくれる人を探してる。それに興味がないなら…

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: None of this feels right. We need to know more.
string: 話がどうもしっくりこない。もっと情報が必要だな

original: We're not going to have a problem with your little... project, are we?
string: 君のちょっとした… 計画とやらはうまくいくんだろうな？

original: Die, damn it... die!
string: 死ね、クズめが… 死ね！

original: This is an intriguing change.
string: 興味深い変化だな

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of bandits, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 野蛮な血の者の一人が山賊の一団に加わった。おそらく彼ら全員に血の力を授けるのが目的だ

original: My apologies. I shall not trouble you with it again.
string: すまなかった。二度とこの件では煩わせない

original: Since you could've attacked me before now, I'm going to assume this was a little accident on your part.
string: これまで君には私を襲う機会があったのだから、今回の件はちょっとした事故だと思っておく

original: Vampires aren't counted among the living. I could probably go through there without a problem.
string: 吸血鬼は生ける者と見なされないから、おそらく問題なく通れるはずですわ

original: Get it now while we can!
string: 今のうちに手に入れて下さい！

original: She persuaded an elven artisan to make some improvements. You can see the plates that show the phases of the moons, Masser and Secunda.
string: 母はエルフの職人を説得して日時計を改造させましたの。二つの月、マッサーとセクンダの満ち欠けを示すプレートが見えますかしら

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: I've only heard stories. Not sure if any of them are true.
string: 話を耳にしただけよ。本当かどうかは分からない

original: Well... we weren't the closest of friends... Here, take this.
string: まあ… 親友でもなかったしな… さあ、これを

original: Your suffering will be legendary!
string: その苦しみは伝説として残るだろう！

original: We cannot afford to relax.
string: 気を抜いている余裕はない

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Then behold Auri-El's gift, my child. May it speed your journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: では、アーリエルの祝福を受けるがいい。汝の最奥聖域への旅が滞りなき事を

original: That was the plan, yes. Assuming the rest of them can trust a vampire. Come on, I'll need you to help convince them.
string: そのつもりですわ。残りの者達が吸血鬼を信用できればですが。さあ、行きましょう。説得するのにあなたの助けが必要になりそうですわ

original: No, you're right. We just have to convince the others you're on our side.
string: いや、その通りだ。君が味方だと残りの者を説得すればいい

original: He was out of control, Garan. It had to be done.
string: お父様は正気を失っておりましたのよ、ガラン。やむを得ませんでしたわ

original: What are you talking about?
string: 何の話をしてるんだ？

original: All right. Lead on, then.
string: 分かった。じゃあ先導して

original: If I'd known Skyrim was so dangerous, I'd have brought more guards.
string: スカイリムが危険な場所だと知ってたら、もっと守りを固めて来たのに

original: What sort of prophecy?
string: 予言とは？

original: So this is it...
string: これだね…

original: We're not sure, but they have an Elder Scroll.
string: 確証はないものの、彼らは星霜の書を持っているようだ

original: Who's there?
string: 誰だ？

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: I am sure Nazir's cooking is great and all, but my appetites are a little more... discerning.
string: ナジルの料理は確かに申し分ないわ、でも私はもう少し… 舌が肥えているの

original: I'll give you a single chance to turn over the bow to me. There will not be a second.
string: 今すぐ弓を引き渡せ。二度目はないぞ

original: But I had no idea she had a setup like this.
string: でも、こんな仕掛けがあるなんて夢にも思いませんでしたわ

original: Isran? Wants me?
string: イスランが？ 私に？

original: I'll stick around this place if you need me.
string: ここにおりますから、用事がありましたらまた

original: Ancestors guide you.
string: 先人の導きあれ

original: He's dead?
string: 彼は死んだのか？

original: It's also quite possible that there are some other isolated conclaves of snow elves nestled elsewhere on Nirn.
string: ニルンのどこかに他のスノーエルフの秘密教団がある可能性も残っている

original: With each passing day that you do not feed, that weakness will become more deadly, but your powers will also become stronger.
string: 血を吸わずにいれば一日ごとにその弱点が致命的なものとなっていくが、同時に力も強大になっていくだろう

original: As far as I know, though, it's never been held by a vampire. That would be a new one.
string: でもわたしの知る限り、吸血鬼の手に落ちた事はありませんわ。それは新しい個体かも知れませんわね

original: The Ideal Masters assured me that my powers would be unmatched, that I could raise legions of the undead.
string: アイディール・マスターどもは、我（われ）が無二の力を得て、不死の大軍を作り出せるだろうと念を押した

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: There are some things I want to ask you about.
string: いくつか聞きたいことがある

original: Ironically, our undoing came at the hands of our own people.
string: そして皮肉な事に、我々に滅亡をもたらしたのは我々自身に他ならなかったのだ

original: Was it "Between the forces of good and evil."? No, no... that's not it...
string: 「善と悪のはざま」？ 違う、違うぞ… 何だったっけかな…

original: Between you and me, there's too many of them. Can't trust the lot of them; never could.
string: ここだけの話、エルフは数が多すぎる。どいつも信用できないし、した事もない

original: Over here!
string: こっちだよ！

original: Get out of my way.
string: 邪魔をするな

original: For too long we've allowed these vampires to poison the night and kill our people! Now, we finally have the means to strike back!
string: 吸血鬼どもが夜を汚し同胞達を殺すのを、我々はあまりにも長い間許してきた！ しかし今、我々はついに反撃の手段を手に入れたのだ！

original: We need to destroy him before he turns his comrades into a brood of vampires.
string: 仲間達を吸血鬼の一団に変えてしまう前に仕留める必要がある

original: A savior?
string: 救世主だって？

original: Your blood calls me...
string: お前の血が呼んでいる…

original: I'm going to go away for a while. I'll meet you back home when I'm done.
string: 少しの間、出かけてきますわ。終わったら家に帰ってきますわね

original: After 400 years, you think you'll be the one to take me down?
string: この400年間で初めて、私を倒す者になれると思うのか？

original: I've never seen leaves this color.
string: こんな色の葉は見た事がありませんわ

original: Isran and I still need your help.
string: イスラン共々、まだ手を貸してほしいと思っている

original: I'll have to think about it.
string: 考えさせてくれ

original: Don't let me stand in your way, then.
string: でしたら、あなたの邪魔はしたくありませんわ

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to. (Intimidate)
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない(威圧)

original: Any idea what I'll be up against?
string: どんな脅威に直面するか、わからないか？

original: I leave politics to others. I serve the lord of the castle.
string: 権力闘争には興味がないの。私が仕えるのはあくまでもこの城の主よ

original: Dur...
string: ダー…

original: I don't relax. Ever.
string: 気が休まる時などないよ。一瞬たりとも

original: Watch it!
string: 気をつけてよ！

original: I miss the flowers.
string: 花が恋しいですわ

original: You disappoint me, Serana. You've taken everything I provided for you and thrown it all away for this... pathetic being.
string: 失望したぞ、セラーナ。私がお前に与えたもののすべてを投げ捨てたというのか、この情けない存在のために

original: Here you go.
string: ほらよ

original: We'll speak again soon.
string: また会おう

original: I have two of the other shards already.
string: 既に破片をもう2つ持っている

original: Good work. It's always best to deal with a problem by ripping it out at the root.
string: よくやったわ。問題は根源を引き裂く事で対処するに限るわね

original: Are you a...
string: 君はもしかして…

original: I never knew what became of Kvatch. I wonder if they were triumphant without me.
string: クヴァッチがどうなったのかも知らない。残った人々は勝てたのかな

original: I had thought better of you.
string: お前を認めていたんだが

original: Here, I've got a dwarven gyro. Take it.
string: ドワーフ・ジャイロがあるので、渡そう

original: Because that means there's still hope that they might one day shed their hatred and learn to believe in Auri-El once again.
string: 彼らにもまだ望みが残っているという事だ。いつの日か、憎しみを捨てて再びアーリエルを信じるようになるかも知れん

original: The reason I had it... and why I was down there.
string: 星霜の書を持っていて、あそこにいた理由…

original: By forging something, of course!
string: もちろん、何かの鋳造によってね！

original: Something's not right.
string: 何かおかしいな

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: I was simply an addict who needed money for skooma. The stuff wasn't cheap, and murder always seemed to be in demand.
string: 単にスクゥーマをキメてて、そのための金がほしかっただけ。安いものではなかったし、殺し屋はいつの時代も食いっぱぐれないもんだ

original: Find your own thrall. This one's mine.
string: 他をあたって。これは私の従徒よ

original: You'd best find him soon. Ask him to change you back.
string: すぐに会って、元に戻してもらうようお願いするんだな

original: The night belongs to us.
string: 夜は私たちのものだ

original: A bunch of feral vampires are running wild, upsetting the mortals.
string: 野生化した吸血鬼の群れがはびこり、定命の者達を混乱させている

original: Let's get back to work.
string: さあ、仕事に戻りましょう

original: Watch out! He's pulling down the ceiling!
string: 気を付けて！ 天井を落とすつもりですわ！

original: I was.
string: 以前はそうでしたわね

original: If there's assistance I can provide, just ask. It's the least I can do.
string: 何かできる事があれば言ってくれ。私にはそんな事しかできないのだ

original: The Soul Cairn is home to very powerful beings. Necromancers send them souls, and receive powers of their own in return.
string: ソウル・ケルンには強大な力を持つ存在が複数いる。死霊術師はそれらに魂を送り、見返りとして力を得ている

original: Oh no. I hope not. But even I haven't seen him in years, and we were close.
string: とんでもない。そうじゃなければいいと願っているのだが、親しいこの私でさえ、もう何年も彼と会っていないからな

original: Moths barely make a sound, let alone speak.
string: 聖蚕は言葉どころか、ほとんど音を発しないはずだが

original: The way I've heard it, the sun represents the connection from our world to theirs.
string: わたしが聞いた話によると、太陽は我々の世界と彼らの世界のつながりを表していますわ

original: That letter's the last I've heard of her and mentions where she is. Now please, leave me alone.
string: あれが彼女から届いた最後の手紙だ。居場所が書いてある。さあ、もう一人にしてくれ

original: I was paid to assassinate some high-ranking official from House Redoran.
string: おれはレドラン家の高官を暗殺する仕事を引き受けた

original: Look at this place. This has to be it!
string: この場所を見て。ここに違いありませんわ！

original: You would dare address me?
string: 誰に口を利いている？

original: Do you need something?
string: 何か必要なものでも？

original: I am more than happy to buy or sell whatever you might need.
string: 売り買いなら喜んで相談に乗るよ

original: Brought some soul husks or are you wasting my time?
string: 魂のハスクを持ってきたのか？ それとも私の時間を無駄にしたいのか？

original: You're no pilgrim.
string: 巡礼者などではないな

original: Where have you been?
string: どこにおりましたの？

original: Is that your best, mortal?
string: それが精一杯ってわけか？

original: I'll meet you at Dimhollow. It's the least I can do to avenge my fallen comrades.
string: ディムホロウで待ち合わせよう。倒れた仲間達の仇を討つくらいはやらせてほしい

original: Enough of these games.
string: 遊びは終わりだ

original: I'm not sure what they did to this Moth Priest, but he doesn't look right.
string: 連中がこの聖蚕の僧侶に何をしたか知らないが、どうも大丈夫じゃなさそうだぞ

original: Wait...
string: お待ちになって…

original: Please, don't be angry with me.
string: お怒りにならないで下さい

original: How many more?
string: 残りいくつだろうか？

original: I have Auriel's Bow.
string: アーリエルの弓を手に入れた

original: Nnnnyyaarrgghh!
string: ぬおおおお！

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: Welcome, Initiate. This is the Wayshrine of Illumination.
string: ようこそ、新人よ。ここは光の祠だ

original: When you offer the embrace, do so away from prying eyes. Our new sibling will then likely require rest while her blood undergoes the change.
string: 抱きしめる時は人目を避けるように。おそらく我々の新しい同胞は、血が変化する間休息を必要とするだろう

original: What sort of attention?
string: 関心とは？

original: Follow me.
string: ついて来い

original: My Lord.
string: ご主人様

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: Where did you find it? Tell me!
string: それをどこで見つけた？ 言え！

original: You wanted to speak with me?
string: 話があると聞いた

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: Yeagh!
string: いたたっ！

original: Let's... uh... let's just keep going.
string: さあ… うっ… 先に進みましょう

original: Heavy armor. (25 husks)
string: 重装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: The bow draws its power from Aetherius itself, channeling it through the sun.
string: この弓は太陽を通じてエセリウスの力そのものを取り出し、矢に込める

original: Time for you to head home.
string: 先に家に帰ってほしい

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: In the meantime, we're going to get to the bottom of why a vampire showed up here looking for you.
string: さて、それでは吸血鬼がなぜ君達を探してここに姿を現したのか、その真相を探るとしようか

original: Damn it, not again!
string: もう、またか！

original: What do you mean by a "high profile" target?
string: “目立つ”標的とは？

original: You really ought to become one of us again. Bad for your health, otherwise.
string: 再び我々の仲間になるべきだ。君の体のためにもね

original: There is but one gift I can give that is equal in value to the Elder Scroll and my daughter.
string: 星霜の書、そして我が娘と同等の価値をもつ贈り物となると、一つしか考えられない

original: I think I'll hang on to my things, thank you.
string: 自分の物は自分で持ちますわ。ありがとう

original: But of course, those days are gone now.
string: だがそれも、今や過去の事となってしまった

original: After so many centuries, I feared the Elder Scroll and my daughter were lost to me.
string: 何百年もの時が過ぎ、私は星霜の書と娘は二度と戻って来ないのではないかと恐れた

original: What's all this have to do with the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードにどう関係が？

original: I wonder how long they've been like this.
string: 彼らはいつからあんなふうなのかしら

original: I believe in civility among seasoned warriors, and I find your ear worthy of my words.
string: 互いに古強者として礼節は守るべきだ。そなたの耳は我が言葉を聞かせるに値する

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: We call such confluences the "Daughters of Coldharbour."
string: その状態になった者を“コールドハーバーの娘”と呼ぶの

original: You will not touch her.
string: 彼女には指一本触れさせませんわ

original: You are worth very little if you're not one of us.
string: 我らの仲間でなければ、お前はほぼ無価値だ

original: Keep quiet! We're hunting vampires spotted in the area.
string: 静かに！ 近くで目撃された吸血鬼を探してる

original: If we don't, he'll keep chasing us for the rest of our lives.
string: この時を避けたら、残りの人生ずっと彼に追いかけ回されますわよ

original: Deep inside, it brings me joy that the Betrayed weren't to blame for what happened here.
string: 内心、ここで起こった事が裏切られし者の仕業ではないと知って嬉しいのだ

original: Ssssss!
string: しゅーっ！

original: I must rest now. The reading has made me weary.
string: 休息が必要だな。書を読んだせいでクタクタだよ

original: In the meantime, if there are any potions you might need, feel free to help yourself.
string: その間に、もし必要な薬があれば自由に持って行きなさい

original: Ah, yes. Hmm. I'm afraid they don't quite work that way.
string: そうか… 残念だがそうはいかないだろう

original: Now, let me get the scroll's case opened.
string: さあ、書の封を解きましょうか

original: Nothing right now.
string: 今は特にない

original: Any advice?
string: 何か助言でも？

original: I suspect now it was Brother Adalvald's journals they were after. He was obsessed with ancient vampire artifacts and burial sites.
string: どうやら連中はアダルヴァルド修道士の日記を狙っていたようだ。奴は太古の吸血鬼の秘宝や埋葬場所の研究に熱中していた

original: Speak with Isran. He has something for you.
string: イスランに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: What else do you want to know?
string: 他に知りたい事はあるか？

original: Why?
string: どうしてだ？

original: Enough, Vyrthur. Give us the bow!
string: もうよろしいですわ、ヴィルスール。弓をおよこしになって！

original: <Alias=Candidate> has been welcomed to the family.
string: <Alias=Candidate>が血を分けた家族となった

original: You're going to go kill a Dawnguard spy.
string: ドーンガードの密偵を殺すのよ

original: Come on boy, let's go.
string: ほらほら、行くぞ！

original: I guess I'm expected.
string: わたしが来ると分かっていたようですわね

original: We're all that stands between Skyrim and disaster.
string: スカイリムを破滅から救うのは我々だけだ

original: I wasn't sure you'd come back for me. I'm still looking for a guide to get me home. What do you say?
string: 戻って来てくれるかは自信なかったけど、まだ家に案内してくれる誰かを探しているわ。お願いできないかしら？

original: The sun's gone dark. What could be happening now?
string: 太陽が暗くなった。一体何が起こっている？

original: Often I take on tasks that Garan or Feran find distasteful, or... beneath them.
string: ガランやフェランの仕事を肩代わりする事も少なくないよ。二人がその… やりたがらない時にね

original: How did you end up here?
string: どうしてこんな所にいる？

original: Huh? What do you want?
string: ん？ 何しに来たんだ？

original: All right, I suppose I could do that.
string: まあ、それならいいだろう

original: Follow me, or you'll regret it. (Intimidate)
string: おとなしくついて来ないと、後悔することになるぞ(威圧)

original: My lady, you have my deepest sympathies. I am sure this was not easy for you.
string: お嬢様、心からお悔やみ申し上げます。さぞつらかった事でしょう

original: What will you do then?
string: これからどうするつもりなんだ？

original: May Auri-El's glow shield you from your enemy.
string: アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守らん事を

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: I'll be off then.
string: それでは、先を急ぐか

original: Where... am I...
string: ここは… どこ…

original: The Elder Scroll gives insight deeper than the deep ones, though. To bring about the opening.
string: だが星霜の書は深遠よりもさらに深い明察を与えてくれる。開放をもたらすためのな

original: Of course, my dear. All will be well now.
string: もちろんだ。これですべて良くなる

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: What we do know is that some are born with the special gift to read the Elder Scrolls.
string: 分かっているのは、星霜の書を読む才能を持って生まれてくる者達がいるという事

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: Now be silent, and hear what I have to say.
string: 黙って私の話を聞くがいい

original: This attack... it's unlike the vampires. Do we at least know what they were after, or is this completely a lost cause?
string: 今回の襲撃は… どうも吸血鬼らしくない。我々は少なくとも奴らの狙いが分かっているのか？ それともこれはまったく勝ち目のない戦いなのか？

original: That was... a bit before my time.
string: それは… しばらく前の話だな

original: Oh, I've read a few things. Heard a few more things. Arkay's told me a bit as well.
string: ああ、本で読んだ事があるし、噂も耳にした。アーケイからも聞いた事がある

original: I've killed the Dawnguard leaders.
string: ドーンガードの幹部たちを始末した

original: And then realizing a troll with armor is even more intimidating.
string: でもって、鎧を着たトロールはさらに厄介だ、と

original: If Isran is anything, he's stubborn.
string: イスランは石頭の頑固者だよ

original: Of course. You're here for Auriel's Bow. Why else would you be here?
string: 分かっている。アーリエルの弓が目当てだとな。でなければ、こんな所まで来ないだろう

original: If you think I'll help you, you're mistaken.
string: 手を貸してもらえると思ってるならそれは間違いだ

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵だったけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうだったわね

original: Can't you tell your own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
string: 自分の種族もお分かりになりませんの？ 目を開けなくても、匂いだけで分かるぐらいですのに

original: And frankly, I need to get home to figure out what's happening.
string: それに実のところ、何が起こっているのか確かめに、家に帰りたいのですわ

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: And heed also this. He's no pet. Mistreat the beast or leave him alone for too long, and he'll return to the wild forgetting you ever existed.
string: それからこれも忘れるな。ペットとは違う。扱いがひどく、長時間放ったらかしにしようものなら、野生に戻ってお前の存在自体を忘れるだろう

original: Another victory for the Dawnguard.
string: またドーンガードの勝利ね

original: That doesn't make much sense. Where is this woman? Who is she?
string: 話がよく分からないな。その女性はどこにいる？ 彼女は誰なんだ？

original: Exactly. It's a lost art. Most necromancers just raise up whatever bodies are nearby. A simple trick, really. Child's play.
string: そのとおりですわ。まさしく失われた技術。ほとんどの死霊術師は、近くにある死体を何でも甦らせているだけですの。簡単な子供だましです

original: The dovah roamed the skies, vying for their small slices of territory that resulted in immense and ultimately fatal battles.
string: ドヴァーは大空を舞い、細切れとなった領土を奪い合って、やがてどちらかが命を落とすであろう決戦を繰り広げる事になった

original: Can't it wait?
string: 後じゃだめなのか？

original: Running will warm your blood nicely.
string: 逃げれば血が温まって飲みごろになる

original: Tell you what, you bring me books like this, and I'll pay a thousand gold each. I'll even throw in a translated edition I have for free. Interested?
string: こんなのはどうだ。この類の本を持って来てくれれば、一冊につき1000ゴールド出そう。しかも翻訳された版をただで差し上げる。どうだ？

original: Cyrodiil is the seat of an empire?
string: シロディールに帝国が？

original: Well... so long as you don't tell anyone. Here take it and slip into a booth before someone notices.
string: いいけど… 内緒だからね。ほら、これを持って、他の人に見られないうちに部屋に入って

original: Let's go to the castle's secret entrance.
string: 城の秘密の入口に向かおう

original: There you are, father!
string: 見つけましたわよ、お父様！

original: You've been imprisoned here for all this time?
string: ずっとここに幽閉されていたのか？

original: My what? Wait. That means...
string: 何だって？ という事は、つまり…

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: We'll stop them, whatever it is they're up to...
string: 奴らの企みが何であれ、止めてみせるわ…

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally put an end to this ridiculous prophecy.
string: となれば、もうほとんど終わりですわね。このバカげた予言にようやくピリオドを打てるのかしら

original: If remnants of our kind who escaped the betrayal at the hands of the dwarves exist out there, perhaps they will find this place one day.
string: もし、裏切られし者の手を逃れ、ドワーフに助けられた同胞がいたら、いつの日かここを見つけてくれるだろう

original: Auriel's Bow is ours. Deliver it to Lord Harkon at once, so we can reap the benefits of this prophecy.
string: アーリエルの弓は私達のものよ。このお告げの恩恵を受けられるよう、すぐにハルコン卿へ届けて

original: Halt, vampire!
string: 止まれ、吸血鬼め！

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: Come and face your destruction!
string: さあ来い、死を受け入れろ！

original: Not even the gods will show you mercy!
string: 神でさえお前らには慈悲の心を持つまい！

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: This is about more than killing vampires.
string: 吸血鬼狩りだけの問題ではない

original: If he can maintain some appearance of normalcy, I'll allow him to stay.
string: 彼がまともに振る舞う事ができるなら、滞在を許そう

original: I know why they needed you, because we need you for the same purpose.
string: 彼らが何を求めていたのかは分かる。同じ理由で力を借りたいからだ

original: What's wrong?
string: どうした？

original: And unless I'm seeing things, you're starting to... glimmer.
string: それに、わたしが幻を見ているのでもない限り、あなた… 発光してますわよ

original: I never knew them. I grew up alone.
string: 両親の顔は知らない。物心ついた頃には独りだった

original: So what ended up happening to you?
string: どういう流れで監獄に？

original: Spare me the details.
string: 具体的な話は省略してくれていい

original: There's no blood here for you.
string: ここにはお前のぶんの血はないぞ

original: I'm ready to be turned.
string: 変わる覚悟ができた

original: Just what my mother told me. I've also studied a little bit on my own, but there's not much.
string: 母から教わった事ですわ。自分でも少しばかり勉強しましたけれど、大した知識はございませんの

original: Because unlike her, I'm not afraid of you. Not anymore.
string: わたしはお母様とは違う。もうお父様など恐れませんわ

original: I've destroyed the vampire in the Jarl of <Alias=Capital>'s court.
string: <Alias=Capital>の首長の特別顧問に紛れていた吸血鬼を始末した

original: Look at this. I should've known it was only a matter of time before they found us.
string: この有り様だよ。奴らが我々を見つけるのは時間の問題だった。それを分かっていれば…

original: You've given me a great gift friend. The night air hums and the shadows are full of color.
string: 素晴らしいよ。こんなにも夜の空気が新鮮で、暗がりには色彩があふれているなんて

original: I believe you, Vigilant. And I don't think you even know what you've found here.
string: その言葉を信じよう、番人よ。どうやら自分が見つけたものの意味すら理解していないのだろう

original: What's that you're shooting with?
string: その武器は？

original: Good hunting.
string: 良い狩りを

original: You'd better know what you're doing.
string: 自分のしてる事が分かってるんだろうな

original: How could they trick me like this? I was one of Reman's court wizards!
string: あんな奴らに騙されるとは思わなかった。レマンの王宮魔術師である、この私が！

original: My mother taught me a trick or two. I could partially soul trap you, and offer that gem to the Ideal Masters. It might be enough to satisfy them.
string: 母にいくつか教わりましたの。あなたに部分的な魂縛をかけて、その魂石をアイディール・マスター達に捧げる手がございますわ。それで満足してくれるかも知れませんわよ

original: My trip to Skyrim has become quite the adventure!
string: スカイリムへの旅がちょっとした冒険になったよ！

original: I suppose we're all a little crazy to be here, right?
string: ここに来てる時点で、頭おかしいと思わない？

original: I see. Interesting that you can set aside your morals when it suits you.
string: なるほど。必要に応じて道徳心を捨て去れるとは…

original: Vaaz...Zol!
string: ヴァーズ…ゾル！

original: To judge us.
string: ひいてはわたしの家族の事も

original: The law will require proof that we can't present. And Jarls disapprove of bloodshed they haven't called for themselves.
string: 法は我々では提示できない証拠を求めるだろうし、各首長は自ら命じたもの以外の流血に眉をひそめるものだ

original: Actually, I have some things to do first.
string: 実は、先にやっておきたいことがある

original: Go on.
string: 続けてくれ

original: Not just vampires. We are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim.
string: 吸血鬼であるだけではない。我々はスカイリムの吸血鬼の中でも最も古く、最も強大な一族だ

original: Hsss
string: シャー！

original: Isran's done nothing but mock me. He's never given me the respect I deserve.
string: イスランにはバカにされてばかりだ。あるべき敬意が全く感じられない

original: It's like from the stories I used to hear... the two adventurers seeing the world.
string: 昔によく聞いた物語みたい… 二人の冒険者が世界中を旅しますのよ

original: Farewell, friend. May the glow of Auri-El shield you from your enemies.
string: さようなら、友よ。アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守るだろう

original: And from what I could tell, a thousand extra years of obsession haven't made him any better. We should have found him a hobby.
string: わたしに分かる限りでは、さらに千年ほど没頭した事で改善するはずもなかったようですわね。何か趣味でも見つけてあげるべきでしたわ

original: We have to do something.
string: 何とかしなければ

original: Here, take this one and give it a try. You'll want to get to know how to use it if you really plan to join the Dawnguard.
string: こいつを持っていって使ってみるといい。本気でドーンガードの一員になるなら、使い方を身につけておくべきだ

original: You may not be dovah, but the defeat of Alduin earns you the right of title.
string: そなたはドヴァーではないかも知れんが、アルドゥインを倒したとなれば、その権利を認めよう

original: Threaten me all you like, it won't matter.
string: 好きなだけ脅すがいい。痛くもかゆくもないぞ

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Can I assist you? You know I live to serve.
string: 手伝いましょうか？ そのためにいるんですから

original: Ah, my rescuer! It's good to see you again.
string: おや、私の救世主じゃないか！ また会えてうれしいよ

original: Arkay be with you, my friend.
string: 友よ、アーケイの加護がありますように

original: Forget I said anything.
string: 言ったことは忘れてくれ

original: You've worked with Isran before?
string: 以前にもイスランと組んだことが？

original: I need training in Speech.
string: 話術の訓練をしてほしい

original: Your shield... gods, it's made of Aetherium! Pure Aetherium!
string: お前の盾は… 何てこった。エセリウム製じゃないか！ 正真正銘のエセリウムだ！

original: Keep your guard up.
string: 気を抜かない事ね

original: Do you?
string: 本当か？

original: Time is almost irrelevant to the Ideal Masters.
string: アイディール・マスターにとって、時間はほぼ無意味よ

original: She wasn't, always. But I think you're right.
string: 昔は違いましたのよ。でもその通りかも知れませんわね

original: I sense the power of the ancient blood in your veins. It has made you strong.
string: 古き血の力が体をめぐっているのが分かる。力を得ているようだな

original: Best of luck to you.
string: 幸運を祈るよ

original: Last I knew, she was out in the Reach, convinced she was about to find the biggest dwarven ruins yet.
string: 最後に消息を聞いた時は、彼女はリーチにいた。ドワーフの最大の遺跡を発見できると見込んでいたようだ

original: But... what about you?
string: けれども… あなたはどうなのかしら？

original: What do you know about Auriel's Bow?
string: アーリエルの弓について何か知らないか？

original: I would gladly accept my fate at their hands if it robs Harkon of victory.
string: ハルコンから勝利を奪えるなら、喜んで運命を彼らの手に委ねるわ

original: A noble cause. Arkay likes the idea very much, so I'm happy to help.
string: 高潔な動機があるんだな。アーケイも気に入るだろう。喜んで手を貸すよ

original: I try and meet the needs of everyone here. No reason for any of us to go hungry.
string: ここにいる全員分は確保しているつもりだ。わざわざ腹を空かせる事もないからな

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: North, I think, then they turned west and that's the last I saw of them.
string: 北に向かった後、西に曲がったのを見たのが最後だった

original: Don't make a big scene. Don't get caught.
string: 派手な事はしないで。捕まらないように

original: What you might not know is that for the most devoted and impressive followers, Molag Bal will give the gift anew, in its pure form.
string: ですが、モラグ・バルが忠誠心と能力の高い部下には、純粋な力を新たに与える事ができるのは、まだ知らないのではなくて？

original: I'm not ready yet. Give me more time.
string: まだ準備ができていない。もっと時間がほしい

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: I don't know that name. You say she's Jarl of Solitude? Who supports her?
string: 聞きおぼえのない名前ですわね。ソリチュードの首長ですって？ 後ろ盾は？

original: This may be the last time we're able to converse. If you have any questions before you leave, I suggest you ask them.
string: 話ができるのは、これが最後になるかも知れない。分からない事があれば、今聞いておいた方がいいぞ

original: You should not have come here, vampire.
string: ここはお前の来るところじゃない

original: What's so special about the moondial?
string: その月時計は何か特別なものなのか？

original: The Chantry is quite isolated, so it took some time for word of the dwarves' offer to reach us here.
string: 礼拝所は周囲から孤立していて、ドワーフからの申し出がここに届くには時間がかかった

original: I need to trade some things with you.
string: 持ち物を交換したい

original: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
string: つまり、あなたのほんの一部がかの地に乗り移って、代わりに、ソウル・ケルンのかけらがその隙間を埋めたのよ

original: None of this makes any sense. What does she have to do with this?
string: どうも話が分からないな。彼女はこの件とどう関係しているんだ？

original: I'd rather not be here either, but I needed to talk to you.
string: わたしもここに来たくはなかったのですが、話したい事がありまして

original: You arrived just in time. I think those vampires were getting hungry.
string: ちょうどいい時に来てくれた。あの吸血鬼どもも腹を空かせてたところだよ

original: Well, I certainly can't help any less than the Vigilants of Stendarr, now can I?
string: まあ、私もステンダールの番人とそれほど変わりはないがな。そうだろう？

original: What do Moth Priests do, exactly?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶の使命とは？

original: I'm ready to be soul trapped.
string: 魂縛を受ける用意ができた

original: Very well.
string: よろしい

original: You need something? I am happy to help, if I can.
string: 何か必要なものでも？ 喜んで力になるよ

original: How in the name of Zenithar was I to know the ingredients were phony? Do I look like someone that would double-cross a necromancer?
string: ゼニタールに誓って言うが、商品が偽物だなんて知りようがなかったよ。俺が死霊術師をあざむくような奴に見えるかい？

original: So, the deed has been done. My brother is dead.
string: 為すべき事は為され、我が兄弟は死んだ

original: Die, monster!
string: 死ね、化物！

original: You met Stalf and Salonia, I assume? Lord Harkon and I suspected they might follow you there.
string: スタルフとサロニアには会ったな？ ハルコン卿と自分は彼らがお前の後を追うと思っていた

original: Look at the sky!
string: 空を見て！

original: It is a cherished gift you have given me. To see the world this way, through your eyes. It will only bring us closer.
string: この恩恵は実に大切なもので、こうして愛する人と同じ目で世界を見つめられることで、我々の距離はさらに縮まることでしょう…

original: I want to show you something. It's important. You really must come. (Persuade)
string: 見せたいものがある。大事な話だ。ぜひともついて来てほしい(説得)

original: That part, I don't know. Once we have it, hopefully it'll be obvious.
string: その部分はよく分かりませんわね。手に入れたら明らかになるかと思いますわ

original: Looks like these Falmer are here to stay.
string: このファルメル達はここに住んでいたようですわね

original: If you can manage that, the Dawnguard still may have use for you.
string: 君がその件に対処できたら、ドーンガードは君をまだ見捨てないかも知れない

original: I used to walk through here after evening meals. It was beautiful, once.
string: 夕食のあと、よくここを散歩したものですわ。当時はなんとも美しい場所でしたのよ

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: Put her mind to rest, allay her fear through vampiric seduction and when she is in a pliant condition, embrace her and bite her on the neck.
string: 彼女の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼女が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: It sounds like you already didn't like him much.
string: 元々そこまで好きではなかった様子だな

original: Did you know I visited Elswyr once? What a strange and wondrous place.
string: エルスウィーアに行ったことがあるって話したか？ 奇妙で驚くほど凄い所だったな

original: You're not welcome here.
string: 歓迎はできないな

original: It's not working! Try something else!
string: 効果がないよ！ 別の方法を試して！

original: Yyyaaahh!
string: イイヤァー！

original: Stay vigilant, friend.
string: ステンダールの加護あれ

original: Lord Harkon has searched for his daughter for so long. He must be very grateful.
string: ハルコン卿はずっと長い間娘さんを捜してきた。本当に感謝しているでしょうね

original: If I ventured far from the Soul Cairn, my strength would begin to wane until I was no more.
string: ソウル・ケルンから離れれば力が衰え、やがてこの身も滅んでしまうだろう

original: I guess so.
string: そうかも知れませんわね

original: Aren't the Dawnguard here to help, to make it safe for us? Can't see why they wouldn't let us in.
string: ドーンガードは我々を守り、助けてくれるためにここにいるのでは？ 中に入れてくれない理由が分からない

original: Emptiness consumes me.
string: 虚無感に押しつぶされそうだ

original: ...first kill is always the best... the blood has never tasted as sweet since...
string: …最初の獲物が最高とはよく言ったもんだ… あれ以上の味にいまだ出会えない…

original: Did you see where it went?
string: どこに行ったか見まして？

original: I'll find you soon.
string: すぐに見つけてやる

original: So, let's get this straight.
string: それでは、話を整理しますわよ

original: I will avenge you, sister.
string: 仇は討ってやる

original: Will it be hard for you if we have to kill him?
string: もし彼を殺すことになったら、つらいか？

original: First thing is to get this fort back into shape. Right now, a vampire could practically walk right in the front door.
string: まずこの砦を再建しなくては。吸血鬼が入口からすんなり入ってくるのはさすがにまずい

original: Harkon is dead.
string: ハルコンは死んだ

original: Thank you for breaking that foul vampire's hold over me.
string: ありがとう。あの薄汚い吸血鬼の手に落ちずに済んだよ

original: I've found another beast hiding from the light of day.
string: 日の光から隠れている化け物をまたしても見つけた

original: I need to find someone named Florentius.
string: フロレンティウスという人物を探している

original: No. It'll have to run its course, and there's always the chance I may never recover.
string: いや、運命には逆らえないだろう。それに回復不能になるのは常にありうる話だ

original: I was always taught to avoid these types of ruins. I think I see why, now.
string: こういう廃墟は避けるようにと教わりましたけれど、ようやく理由が分かりましたわ

original: You're worried about what we're up against?
string: 敵が手強すぎると？

original: Sadly, yes. It's the inevitable fate we agree to pursue when reading the Elder Scrolls.
string: 残念ながらそうだ。星霜の書を読むならば、目にした運命そのものをたどる事を覚悟しなければならない

original: It might take decades to restore the castle to its former glory... but I appear to have plenty of time.
string: 城の壮観を取り戻すには何十年もかかりそうよ… でも私には時間がたっぷりあるわ

original: Welcome back.
string: お帰り

original: Quickly now! The longer you delay, the more danger the Jarl is in.
string: 急ぐんだ！ ぐずぐずしてたらそれだけ首長の身の危険は大きくなるぞ

original: We need to stop this creature before it kills again.
string: これ以上犠牲が出る前に、あのけだものを止めないと

original: Do you still feel lonely?
string: まだ孤独を感じるか

original: Fool. You should have run.
string: 馬鹿だな。逃げればよかったのに

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: We have the bow, he'll listen to us.
string: 弓があれば、こちらの言い分に耳を貸すだろう

original: What do these amulets do?
string: そのアミュレットの効果は？

original: Why?
string: 何故だ？

original: I admit, I do not entirely understand your sense of humor.
string: 正直なところ、お前の話の笑いどころが今一つ分からんな

original: Not... over... yet...
string: いや… まだだ…

original: Someone is here. Find them!
string: 誰かいるぞ。見つけ出せ！

original: I don't think so. In fact, I'm going to help her get home.
string: いいや。むしろ、家に帰れるように力を貸すつもりだ

original: They'd be even less welcoming to her than they've been to me. It would have been a bloodbath.
string: 母はわたしよりもっと歓迎されないでしょうね。血の海になってもおかしくなかったですのよ

original: I think my father really died a long time ago. This was just... the end of something else.
string: お父様はずっと前に死んでいたのだと思いますの。今のはただ… 別な何かの命が尽きただけの事ですわ

original: The light be with you.
string: 光のご加護あれ

original: I want us to be a family again. But I don't know if we can ever have that.
string: わたしはもう一度家族になりたい。でも、それが可能かどうかは分かりませんわ

original: It's through this ancestral chorus that the moths tap into a form of primal augur and become a conduit for deciphering the scrolls.
string: この先人のコーラスを通じて蚕は原始の予言者となり、書の解読における架け橋としての役割を果たす

original: I hope the vampires try to attack us here. A lot easier than hunting them down in their holes.
string: 吸血鬼がここで我々を襲撃するといいのに。穴の中で追跡するよりずっと簡単だ

original: Wait... I hear something!
string: 待って… 何か聞こえましてよ！

original: If I hadn't lost all of the pages, I wouldn't be in this predicament and we wouldn't be having this conversation.
string: 原稿を丸ごと失ったりしなければ、そもそも困っちゃいないし、こんな話もしなくて済んだんだ

original: Good luck out there. Hopefully I'll see you again soon.
string: 幸運をお祈りしますわ。またお会いできますよう

original: While I ready things here, you find out what this woman means to the vampires. She must be important somehow.
string: 私がここで準備している間に、君はその女性が吸血鬼達にとってどういう存在なのかを探ってくれ。彼女には何か重要な意味が隠されているはずだ

original: I'm right behind you.
string: すぐ後ろにいましてよ

original: I can't wait to see the courtyard again.
string: 中庭をもう一度見る時が待ちきれませんわ

original: I look forward to our next meeting.
string: 次に会うのを楽しみにしてるよ

original: Were you always a vampire?
string: 元々吸血鬼だったのか？

original: They were eventually forced to put him down. The Jarl banished them from the hold, but they stuck to their cause.
string: やがて彼らはやむなく息子を殺さざるをえなくなった。首長は彼らを砦から追放した。しかし彼らは任務を放棄しなかった

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: ガンマーに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: I cast you to Oblivion!
string: オブリビオンに送ってやる！

original: I've scrounged up a few things. Here, please, take a look.
string: 苦労して仕入れた商品なんだ。ひと目だけでも見ていってもらえないかな

original: Arkay has some grave news, friend.
string: アーケイから悪い報せが届いたんだ

original: Yes, let me show you.
string: ああ、見せてやろう

original: In case you haven't noticed, Isran is always concerned about something. That's what got us working together in the first place.
string: 気づいてるかも知れないけど、イスランは常に何かを気にかけてるの。私達が協力して働けるのは、それが理由よ

original: At that point, you'll have given him everything he's ever wanted.
string: その時点で、あなたは父のほしい物をすべて渡す事になりましてよ

original: What now?
string: 次はどうする？

original: So you take a major decision for me, and make it all about you?
string: わたしの事で大事な決断をして、その責任を負うつもりですの？

original: I've located the whereabouts of a vampire masquerading as a common citizen.
string: 一般市民になりすましている吸血鬼の居場所が判明した

original: That's right. I used to be a Vigilant, but we had a difference of opinion.
string: そうだ、かつては番人の一員だったが、意見の食い違いがあってな

original: Make it count. This may be the only chance we ever get to use the Forge.
string: 有効に使って。鋳造器具を使える唯一の機会かも知れない

original: That's what he's after. He wants to control the sun, have vampires control the world.
string: 父の狙いはそこなのです。太陽を操り、吸血鬼に世界全体を支配させたいと考えています

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Where'd you say this vampire was hiding?
string: 例の吸血鬼の潜伏先はどこだったか？

original: Agh!
string: ああ！

original: You can't beat us!
string: 貴様らには負けないぞ！

original: And what's this thing?
string: それにしても、これはなんなのかしら？

original: I've heard of you. From Katria.
string: 話は聞いている、カトリアから

original: One thing about living in Skyrim I could never stomach... all the damn vampires!
string: スカイリムに生きる種族の中でも奴らには我慢ならない… いまいましい吸血鬼どもめ！

original: Don't worry, I think I can help you.
string: 心配しないで、手伝えると思うわ

original: How did you know?
string: どうしてそれを？

original: It's come to my inescapable attention that you, my dear friend, are married.
string: 友よ、君は結婚してるね。私の目はごまかせないよ

original: DialogueRiftenGoodbyes
string: DialogueRiftenGoodbyes

original: Well, as far as I'm aware it's the only one in existence.
string: わたしが知る限りは、この一つしか存在いたしませんわ

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Has it been that long? Oh my.
string: そんなに長く？ そりゃあ大変だねえ

original: What treasure?
string: 宝とは？

original: Look at you, wandering around causing trouble. Precious.
string: すごいじゃないか。あちこちで面倒を起こしてるんだな。素晴らしい

original: Do you have a moment to talk?
string: 少し話がしたいのですけれど

original: Oh, gods...
string: ああ、神よ…

original: Any clues about the other Elder Scroll?
string: もう一つの星霜の書について何か手がかりは？

original: You've destroyed our family. You've killed other vampires. All over some prophecy that we barely understand.
string: お父様はわたし達の家庭を壊してしまいましたのよ。それに他の吸血鬼も大勢殺しましたわ。あやふやな予言なんかのために

original: Dawnstar doesn't have much of a port, but the miners say its got rich ore veins.
string: ドーンスターには大した港はないが、鉱山労働者が言うには、とにかくいくらでも掘れるらしいんだと

original: You still got it, Morven... a salesman even beyond the end.
string: モルベン、お前はまだ大丈夫だ… 最後の最後まで商売人さ

original: I'll bring you down!
string: 叩きのめしますわ！

original: Once that's done, the blood of a powerful vampire needs to be added to it.
string: それが済んだら、強力な吸血鬼の血をそこに加えなければならない

original: Damn. Well what do you know?
string: まったく… 君は何を知ってるんだ？

original: All this talk is making me thirsty. Perhaps another Vigilant will wander in soon.
string: しゃべってばかりで喉が渇いてきた。また番人が迷い込んでこないものか

original: Could you tell your companion to head home?
string: お供を家に送り返してもらえるかしら？

original: I'll be seeing you.
string: また会いましょう

original: Justice will prevail!
string: 正義は勝つ！

original: Surely you've heard of "The Rise and Fall of Saint Jiub the Eradicator: Hero of Morrowind and Savior of the Dunmer."
string: 「モロウウィンドの英雄にしてダンマーの救世主、根絶者・聖ジウブの興亡」というありがたい書物だ。聞いた事、あるだろ？

original: And you think I do? Humph.
string: そうだと思うのか？ ふんだ

original: Something has shifted in the moons, brother.
string: 月の中で何かが変わったわ、同志よ

original: And promise me you'll keep my daughter safe. She's the only thing of value I have left.
string: そして娘の安全を守ると約束して。私に残された価値あるものは彼女だけなの

original: I wish I could help. The scrolls have changed hands so many times, it's impossible to keep track.
string: 力になれなくて残念だよ。書はその持ち主が何度も変わるうちに、ついに行方が分からなくなってしまった

original: Suit yourself.
string: どうぞよしなに

original: Yes, I can feel your defenses crumbling. You want it to end. You want to give in to me.
string: 守りが崩れていくのが分かる。早く終われと思っている。屈服したがっているな

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: I never trusted those damn scrolls. Who knows what those things could have done to you... just look at Dexion.
string: あの下らない書を信じた事などございませんわ。あんなものに関わるとろくな目に遭わないですわよ… デキソンがいい例ですわ

original: Sorry, I'm not that easy to get rid of. If you want to run ahead, I won't stop you, but I'll be following.
string: お生憎様、そう簡単には離れませんわ。一人で先に行きたいならご自由に、しっかりついて行きますわよ

original: You watch yourself around him.
string: 奴には気をつけた方がいい

original: Go now, and carry out this task. This is my command!
string: お前に命ずる。行け、そして使命を果たせ！

original: Then we'll have to take care of him.
string: ならば彼をどうにかする必要がある

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: The Chantry was a place of peaceful worship. I led a small group of paladins, but we were no match for the Betrayed's sheer numbers.
string: かつての礼拝所は祈りのための平和な場所だった。小さな司祭団を率いていたが、裏切られし者に数で圧倒されてしまったのだ

original: Find their leader and kill him!
string: 首謀者を探し出して殺すのよ！

original: We don't have many other options, do we?
string: 他に選択肢はあまりないようだな

original: Your mother maintained quite a laboratory.
string: 彼女の研究室は、かなり本格的みたいだ

original: Perish, worm!
string: 死ね、虫けらめ！

original: So how has it come to pass that a vampire of mixed blood is in the company of my daughter?
string: それで、吸血鬼の血が入った者がなぜ私の娘に同行する事になったの？

original: There's no time. You need to get moving now. (Persuade)
string: 時間がない。先を急がないと(説得)

original: This is fine for now, but we can't stay holed up here forever.
string: 今はいいが、いつまでもここに立てこもってもいられない

original: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello
string: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello

original: Hello
string: やあ

original: Well, what are they up to?
string: それで、今の状況は？

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Here we go, let's get the blood flowing again.
string: さあ、もうひと暴れして差し上げますわよ

original: Vampires enjoy stalking their prey. Passing among us undetected emboldens them. Makes them feel powerful, untouchable.
string: 吸血鬼は獲物をゆっくり追い詰めるのを楽しんでいる。奴らは気づかれず我々に紛れ込む事で自信をつけ、無敵の力を得たつもりになっているんだ

original: Never seen a crossbow before, eh? Not surprised. Kind of a Dawnguard specialty. Nothing better for putting down vampires.
string: クロスボウを見るのは初めてか？ 無理もない。ドーンガードの専用品に近いからな。吸血鬼を倒すにはもってこいだ

original: Are you alright?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: It's like I said, I'm not going to talk about it.
string: 言っただろう？ その話はしないって

original: Excellent! I'm sure you'll put those to good use.
string: 素晴らしい！ 君ならきっと有効に利用してくれるはずだな

original: Isran needs your help.
string: イスランが力を借りたがっている

original: A swift death is all you deserve!
string: 今すぐ死んで罪を償え！

original: There are at least thirty different ways of being attacked and killed in your own home at any given moment.
string: 家の中にいる時も、突然襲われて殺される危険は常に30個以上あるのよ

original: So, welcome to Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦にようこそ

original: Well, if you do just let us know. We'll be in this area until we find them.
string: もし見つけたら教えてほしい。見つけるまではこの周辺にいる

original: Remember, you are no mere vampire. You are something far greater.
string: 自分がただの吸血鬼ではなく、はるかに上位の存在である事を忘れるな

original: Don't just stand there! Come on!
string: 突っ立っていないで！ さあ！

original: Other than that, she wouldn't tell me anything.
string: それ以外は何も言わなかった

original: Darkness shroud you.
string: 闇に包まれん事を

original: Arkay says bandits. Or, wait... no, he says bandits.
string: アーケイは山賊だと言っている。待てよ… いや、やっぱり山賊だ

original: It's time to end this.
string: 今こそ終わらせる時よ

original: Sure, I'd like the help.
string: そうしてくれれば助かる

original: They what?
string: 奴らが何だって？

original: He simply said "It is time."
string: “時が満ちた”とだけ

original: Absolutely. You could turn around and travel back from wherever you started empty handed, or you could assist me.
string: その通りだ。何も持たずに旅を始めた場所に帰ってもいいし、頼みを聞いてくれてもいい

original: You never asked me if hiding me in that tomb was the best course of action, you just expected me to follow you blindly.
string: あのお墓にわたしを隠す事が最善の方法と、何一つ教えもしないで、ただ黙って言う通りにすればいいとでも思っていたのではなくて？

original: Dexion didn't really give us a lot to go on, did he?
string: デキソンは大してやる事を示してくれなかったのではなくて？

original: What else would you like to know?
string: 他に何が知りたいのですか？

original: You don't scare me.
string: 脅しには乗らない

original: Go to Morthal and find Falion. He's the only one I know of in Skyrim that can cure vampirism.
string: モーサルに行ってファリオンに会うんだ。それを治せるのは、スカイリムでおそらく彼だけだろう
そんな…

original: Your parents didn't make it easy on you.
string: 両親のせいで孤独好きになった？

original: I'm already a vampire. What more can you offer me?
string: 既に吸血鬼になっているのに、それ以上得るものがあるのか？

original: He's obsessed... insane. Everyone around him fears him as they would a rabid dog.
string: 彼は取りつかれて… 正気を失っているわ。周囲の皆が、狂犬を恐れるように彼を恐れている

original: You are the new Master; we bow to your power. A power which, I note, includes Auriel's Bow.
string: お前を新たなマスターに迎え、その力に従おう。アーリエルの弓を含む、その力に

original: Remember, I'm not leaving until Harkon's no longer a threat.
string: 覚えておいて、ハルコンが脅威でなくなるまでは行かないわ

original: Run, coward! Run back to the filthy Dawnguard!
string: 逃げるがいい、臆病者め！ 汚らわしいドーンガードのところまで！

original: Follow your instincts.
string: 本能に従うんだ

original: Fortunately, I was able to hold them at bay and retreat into these ruins.
string: 幸い、彼らを寄せつけずにこの遺跡へ逃げ込む事ができたわ

original: Follow me and stay close. Keep your eyes open for Durnehviir.
string: 私についてきて、離れないで。ダーネヴィールに十分気をつけて

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of a vampire lair.
string: 吸血鬼の巣窟の位置を特定した

original: Their hearts are in the right place, of course. But Isran and I were never comfortable.
string: もちろん連中は至ってまともなんだが、イスランと俺には水が合わなくてね

original: Got it!
string: やったね！

original: Stay alert.
string: 注意を怠るな

original: I'll have some for sale soon.
string: もうすぐ、商品として生産できるわ

original: Auriel's power is ours!
string: アーリエルの力が我々のものに！

original: Gunmar, there's an area large enough for you to pen up some trolls, get them armored up and ready for use.
string: ガンマー、ここには広い場所があるから、トロールを囲いに入れて、武装させて戦闘に備えるといい

original: Oh, this is simply getting infuriating!
string: おう、これ以上は腹に据えかねるな！

original: The barrier should be gone now. Let's head back.
string: これで障壁は消えたはずですわ。戻りましょう

original: What's this "Soul Cairn" that she mentions?
string: その“ソウル・ケルン”とやらはいったい？

original: I don't have time for this.
string: そんな暇はない

original: Aha... and now you die.
string: そこにいたのか… さあ、覚悟しろ

original: Back to visit Jiub the Magnificent, eh?
string: またもやこの偉大なるジウブを訪ねて来たりしたのかな？

original: I had hoped you would have chosen a higher profile target. But the deed is done, and it's effect secured.
string: もっと人目につく標的を選べばよかったのに。でも済んだ事を言ってもしょうがない。それに成功は約束されてるしな

original: Look at the size of that fort. They must have room for a few more in there.
string: あの砦の大きさを見て。中にあと数人分の広さはあるはずよ

original: What do you mean... "lost himself"?
string: “没頭してしまって”とは？

original: But I'm afraid that they're well beyond a cure at this point.
string: 彼らがもはや治療できる状態ではない事を残念に思う

original: Are you sure that was wise, Lokil? He still might have told us something.
string: 本当に賢明だったと思う、ロキル？ まだ彼は何か話したかも知れない

original: I... Well, that's actually something I never would've anticipated. Interesting.
string: うーん… それは少しも予想していなかったわ。興味深いわね

original: I promise you, it didn't always look like this.
string: 誓って言いますわ、昔はこんな風ではありませんでしたのよ

original: Arvak, please! You can stop running now!
string: アルヴァク、頼む！ もう逃げなくていいんだ！

original: It begins again.
string: また始まったか

original: Are you ready to do this?
string: 心の準備はできたか？

original: I don't much like him, but I can't allow the people of Skyrim to be preyed upon by those monsters.
string: 彼の事はあまり好きじゃないけど、スカイリムの仲間が怪物達の餌食にされるのを黙って見てるわけにはいかないわ

original: I got enough troubles on my mind just tryin' to scrape by out here.
string: ここで何とか暮らしていく事で頭が一杯なんだ

original: Only those who have suffered long can find the light within the shadows.
string: 長く苦しんだ者だけが、暗闇の中で光を見つけることができる

original: I have news, but I wouldn't call it good.
string: 報せはあるが、朗報とは呼びにくい

original: Must stay away from the Keepers... must stay away from the Keepers.
string: 番人に近づいてはダメだ… 番人に近づいてはダメだ

original: So are you here as a client? Shall I remake your face?
string: それで、顧客として来たの？ 顔を作り変えましょうか？

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…
